@#/_/yon tan rin po che'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'dzeg 'den gnyis shing rta zhes byab bzhugs so/_/

/_yon tan yin pa[ @]'amadzod kyi rgya cher 'grel bden pa gnyis kyi shing rta zhes bya ba/_'jam dbal gzhon nur gyurabadadu byang chub sems dpa' 
rimed grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gcig bu ma yin dumar mi gnas so so yang ga rig pa'i thugs/_/'gog dang lam bden 'khor lo rnam gsum bden gnyis 
rnam par 'byed pa'i gsung*/_/_khro ba med bzhin 'khor ba'i dgra bcom mthonganami mthun med pa'i sku/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi mngon brjod nyid de dkon cog gsum ga'ang bla 
mdo/re zhig 'di ni rjod byed la ltos yan lag bcu gnyis lung gi chos/_/_mtha' dag bsod nams lam dang mya ngan 'da' ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni//brjod byatshoDa
ston_rnam

ka _@#_/
_dwapa'i don la 'jug pa bstan pa dam pa'i chos kyi rgyud/_/theg pa gsum gyi lam du grags pa'i gdugs dkar gcig gis 'gro 'di skyobs/_/_lhag pa'i tshul khrims 
goms par gyur las sems kyi bslab pas yang dag 'byor/_/de de'i brten pa shes rab bslab pas nyon mongs dgra bcom zag pa du/_/'phags pa'i rgyud nirig grol gnyis ldan bslag 
bden gnyisashisit+ta_
pa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid/_/chos rab 'byed pa'i blo gros mchog ldan byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la'ang 'dud/_/ces pa ni dkon cog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'i dngos pos
par bstan pa nyid mchod brjod kyi lus su bros ba'o_dgos pa ni klu sgrub kyis/_bstan bcosabyed pos ston pa la/_/mchod par brjod pa 'gas med min//_ston pa dang ni bstan bcos la dad 
gnyis

'dun bskyed par bya phyir ro/_/_zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/rin cen rnam gsum grags pa'i spring yig gis/_/_mu tig 'khri shing rab tu dga' byas nas/_/bdud kyi bumo'i bzhin ras kunu'i tshal//
skal ngan baspyod lamadon phyogs sangs rgyas mthu/_/zhes smos te/_dol dkon mchog gsumani bsod nams kyis bon bskyed pa'i gzhi/_/'gro ba thams cad la mnyos gshin pa'i skyabs khan 
mtho ba med par bzhugs pa/'jig rten sgrol ba/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas pa/_zhi ba'i lam du 'dren pa mu stegs can dang /_bdud sngog can gyi rgol ba ngan pas gsung dang /_thugs dad 
dpal dngamathu la ma gnod pa/_mtshan dang dpe byad dang /_stobs bcu mi 'jigasarnam bzhi la sogs pa mtha' dag gi 'byung gnas yin pa'i grags pa rang yig gang gi rnalam du song ba'ang don dang 
ldan pa'i tshul sdon khyung gi gtam dang sbyar nas ston pa ste/_dpag bsam 'khri shing las nor chen zhes bya'i tshong pa ni/_/_wA ra NA sir sngon byung gyur/_/de yi khyim thab bsod nams can/_/_nacin ldan

@#/_/zhes bya bar gyur/_/bdag po lha pa nyid gyuratsho/_/bud med de yis mchodartenatser/_/_do shalachen po yus ldan pas/_/mchod pa byasanas yul bar gyur/_/bsodanams rnam smin 
des de nyid/_/_sing+ga la yi bdag po yi/_/bumemu tig 'khri shing gyur/_/_de nyid skye ba gzhan la ni/_/phyug pas rgyags shing rmongs gyur nas/_/mchod pa smod cing sbyinagyur pa/_/_de yis yun ring 'bangasamor 
ces pa ltar shAkya'i khyim du 'basamoro hita zhes bya batsho'aposanas sing+ga la'i rgyal po'i bu momu tig 'khri shipa zhes bya bar gyur_

bden gnyis shing gsum di'i bsod nams kyi mthus mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams rgya mtshor song nas sing+galar slob/_mtshan mo'i thun mthar lagaso'i dbugs 'byin thob pa'atsho/_sangs rgyas kyis gsus pa'i chos tshigs su 
bcad pa dag glur blas pas/_bu mos thosanas tshong ba rnams la de'i rgyusaso/_/de dag gis 'dan sangs rgyas kyi gsung zhes smra'o/_/desas sargyas kyi mtshon thos patsam gyis rma bya la 'brug gi sgra grags

bgyid/_/ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar bshad cing nyan kha'i dgos pa'ang /_/_sbyin pa rnams kyi nang nasachos kyi sbyin pa mchog tu 'phags pa'i tshul la spro bar bya ste/_mdo las/_dge slong dag gang zag gnyis po 'dis bsodanamasamang po bskyed de

@#/_/gzungs 'thob/_ngan 'gro dang log par mi ltung /_gar phyogs kyi lhas bsung _  zhing nad dang gnod pa nyung /_shes rab kyi mig rnyed pas myur du 'khor ba las 'das nas thamasacad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang rnyed par gnamezasan

pa gyur pa dang /gnodasbyin pa spu khab dug gis   rdeg par byed cing gsod pa dang /rgya mtsho'i nya ta ming gi la tshang bstong phrag dum gsod par byed pa dang /_sbrul pa dud 'gro log par lhung ba'i 'dziT pa dang /zla ba sgra gcan gyi 'jiT pa dang /_nyim lham yinagyi [，]

bshad pa/_skabs kyi don bsdu ba'o//dang bo ni/_'di ltar 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi 'brog dgon bani nyes pa mtha' dag gi snod/_skye ba sna tshogs kyi 'obs/_dur khrod chen pe ltar mi gtsang zhing cho ma 'debs pa'i gnas la mi'i lasarten 'thob pamatha' dgachos kyi snod

@#/_/'ba' zhig 'thob pa/_bya ba mtha' dag nyas par spyod pa/_sdig pa'i rang bzhin dang yongasu 'dres pa/_byed pa mad la 'bras bu zung //_snyan pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang bcas pa/_longs spyodathob kyang yid brtan med pa/_mang po'i khrod du'ang 'jigs pa dang bcasar 
ka _
sem btang ba'i chu snod ltar yon gyi phyoT mi 'dzin pa/_mdza' bshes dang nye du 'dral ba/_sngon chadabyang mgo dang yan lag gtad pa'i las cholamanya' mi thug pa spyod zin pa/_da dung yang gdonami za bar myong bar 'gyur ba dam pa rnams kyis nam yang bsngaT param

bden banyimahopa tshu 
rgyusami'i 'jig rten du yang skyes/_dbang po rnas*da yongasu chang /rtag tu chos spyod pa'i yul du skyes kyang las dang las kyirnam par smin pa mi shes/_mi dge ba'i lam la mad du brtan cing spyod pa de dag mir gyur ba zhes brjod kyang tha mar gyur pa ste shi ba'i 'og 
tu ngan 'gro mumatha' med par ltung ba'i phyir ro/_/zhes so/_/de bzhin du bstan pa'i lam srol lam zhuT pa'am/_zhugs kyang dge sdig 'dres mar spyod pa dang /_tshe 'di 'ba' zhig las phyima'i gnas skabasacad mi dran pas 'du 'dzi dang 'dod pa'i yon la gcig tu yid 
gzhol zhing des 'byung gi dam la mi 'du/_yul gyi longs spyod 'ba' zhig lachaT/_mnga' ris dang 'od tshos rgyaDa/_'dod pa'i yul lnga la rang dgar srid cing rmos pa ni slob dponamatitsitas/_ga' bar bgyid pa'i yul rnams dang //_rgyaDa bar bskyid pa'i lad tsho 
sbyang 

dang /_(bdag nyid rang dgar spyod pa de/_/kun tu don med bgyid pa'i sgo/_/zhes bshad pa ltar lus dang ngag dang yid natu mi bsrun zhing 'phyar g.yeng ba de dag gisazhir zhigachos thos pa'am/_khyim ba'i rtags spus pa'am/_gzhasachosakyi gtam tshonapo sgrog cing 
snya'aga'ani ge ba'i chos la skyed pa ltar snang yang rgyun chags pati ni sdig pa'i bsam sbyor dang hu'as shing rmongs pa'i phyir/_yang ngan song du 'bab cing gzhol par 'gyur la/_da lana'ang na 'gro dang /mi'i lusarten tsam popa las cung zad 'phags shing

[6]
_ba lhur len pas/_lus dang ngag dang yid mi bsrun zhing 'phyar ba nganasong gsum du'abab cing ngan 'gror gzhol ba'i las can de dag kyang /_sangasargyas kyi shugs rje nyi ma'i bod kyis gzigau tu yun ring mo [《]gan thar pa'i sa bon dang ldan pas/_de'i phyir mi 
sa khyad par can zhes bya'o//_zhes dang /_slob spring las/_gang zhig 'khor ba'i 'khor lor rtag tu 'khor gyur pa'i/_/nad du zhugs nas bsti pa tsam la bder sems pa/_deni nges par rim gyis dbang med brgya phrag tu/_/'gro bamanyam da yomanyam

@#/_/rnam par rtog pas dbyen bcos te dge ba'i phyogs la khom du mi ster ba brgyad du 'khyams chos bsgrub pa'i skabs med bar ston paste/_bsam parlag de ni 'dis yad ltung la/_nganasong gsum dang 'du shes /
zla[| ]med pa'i lha/_/_mtha' 'khob dbang po ma tshod lta ba log_/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa dag tu 'khyams/_/zhes smos so/_/rnamagras kyisgenas bzhagan/_rang rgyud rten gyi mi khom pa brgyad 'phrol byung rkyen gyis mi khom pa brgyud/_ris

nga 
lkugs pa_nyid/_/tshe ring wa tid gang yad rung bar ni/_/_skye ba zhes bgyi mi khom skyon brgyad po/_/zhes rang rgyud kyi rtenacan brgyad las/_dang bo bskyal bani/_thang cigaskabs btsalam yin lcags bsregs gzhir/_/mtshon gyi chad pa lhub 
[* ]mos yang dang yang /_/_srog 'phrog 'chi bar mi nus dmyal ba pa/_/da dung khong khro'i las ngan rnye la thogs/_/zhes smosanas gang zhig semasacanadamyal ba bar gyur pa de ni lcags sregs kyis gzhi la mtshonakyi char ba 'ba' zhig gis 
a ཚོར་གཅོད་བ་ལ་སོགས་པའི་སྡུག་བསྔལ་དྲག་པོ་ལ་ལ་གསོ་བབམ་ བག་ཡངས་པའི་སྐབསུནུང་ཟད་ཀྱང་བཙལ་དུམེད་ཅིང་། ད་དུང་ཁོང་ཁྲོའི་རྙིལ་ཤོགས་པའིཚོགཆོད་ནི་དབགཏུམེད་ན་ཆོགགྱིརྟནདུ་ཁོམ་པའི་གནས་སྐབསམེད་བགོ།

[1:|]rnams/_/'phags pa'i ded dpon dag dang phradagyur kyang /_/_bragaca'i cho gas bzung ba'i ca co bzhin/_/brda' mi 'phrod pa'i 'brog dgon chen por gdungs/_/zhes 'tshos nas 'di ltar ngag lkugs pas tshig gi brda'ami 'phrod pa'am/_yid zhugs

@#/_/brgyad/_/bsamasanas rang gi dal ba don yod mdzod/_/ces gdams so/_/gsum bdala'abyor gyirangabazhin ngos bzung ba laganyis/_ngo bo dal bgad pa dang /_khyadapar gyi chos 'byor ba bshad pa'o/_/dang bon/_de ltar mi khom pa'i

sa_rgyas pa de'i tsho tshal de'i me tog kyang rab tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/namatsho'i 'du byed bor ba de'i tshe tshal de rnyings par 'gyur ro/_/nam yo sumya ngan las 'das pa de'i tsho tshal de'i lo mdung me tog 'dab ma dang 'bras bu yang lcags par 'gyuraro/_/_18

rnyed par dka' ba'i dpe ni/_bshes pa'i springs yig las/_rgya mtsho gcig gnas zhes pa la soDa pa'i don mdo sde nyid las rgyas par bstan te/dge slong dag 'jig rten rgya mtsho gcig gyur pa'i nangan rus sbal long ba tsho rid ba yun ring bor 'tsho ba zhig gnas

ga[7]
par gyur na ni phyis gsor mi rung bar 'gyur ta re/_zhes pa dang tshulam[é]sa pa mi tog gi tshems las kyang rgya cher gsungs pa yinano/_/de tsam du mi lus thob bar dka'an/_mimang po 'di tsam 'dug pa snyaman/_spyir khom ldan gyi mi lus khab phyir yungs 
'bu chags pa lta bu yin/_khyad par 'gro ba gzhan gyi gras la bsamasan mi'i lus rtenatsam thob pa yang dka' ba'itshul/_'di ltar mi'i las nyin mo'i skar ma tsam la/dud 'gro zhimatshan mo'i skar ma tsamamo/_/_du 'gro na nyin mo'i skar ma tsam la/_yi 
gsaninub mo'i skaram tsam mo/_/_yi dgas kyang nyin mo'i skar matsam la/_phyal ba ni nubamo'i skar ma tsam ste de skad du/_dud 'gro'i phyi'i rgya mtsho la chang gi sbang ma tsam yod/_mi gas ni kha ba bu yug 'tshubs pa tsam yod/_phyal ba ni sa chen po'i rdul 

brarab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa tsam yod ces gsungs pa yin no/_/'dini rig pas kyang shes te/nags tshal gcig gam/_chu klung gcig gam/_sbu tshang gatshig gam/_nyi zer gcig la mthong ba'i srog chags la ltosan/_snod kyi 'jig rten thad mi med pa/_grong

pa'i thabs la 'bad dgos te/_'dul ba rnama'abyedalas/_dge slong dag_/_na song pa'i 'gro ba la ltos/_phyi phyir mi nyid kyi dngos po thob pa yang shin tu dga'o//log par lta ba'i ston pa 'di dag la ltos/_yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes

/mamadzes pas bstanasdug go_/_steng na brag lta'i cha blta bu legasu dpyas pas rtana'o/_/rtse menang du cung zad 'dud pas rnam 'dud/_/thams cad tshimatha' maramu khyud ltar yod bsamud 'dzinano/_/ri de dag gi bar b.ran klu chen po/

nyenaganyiba'i[6 4 |]
rgya pachung du dang gnyis bsdoms pa las bzhi po spel ba 'bring /_dang po gnyis ba gsum pa/_gsum dang bzhi bo spel bachen po/_bzhi porung tshan re re bzhi po dar spel ba ches che ba/_de dag thod rgal du bsgoms samachog tu chen po'o//thod rgalani bzhi

nyaragatseg
_'og min rnam mdzes dbang phyug chen po'i gnas yod de/_zha rang 'phags pa gtsangasal bgrodapa las byang chub sems dpa' 'phags par gzhas kyi khyad par gyis kyang che bar shes bar bya'o//skye mched skye bzhin dngos snang gi gzugasugrub pa med 

pas srid pa'i rtse mor brdar btags pa tsamaste/_de'i gnasasu grub pa'ang phra rags gnyis ka med do/_/gzugs khamasakyilhaganasatshas ris nas bzung bsam gtan bzhi po'i rgya khyon ni mapa bzhin/_gling bzhi dang /_stong dang po spyi phud dang*/_stengaganyis pa bar
mdang /_stong gsum gyi stong rjen po'i 'jig rtenareradangamachusal/_gtsangs la la rgya tshad med de namakha' la gza' skar bkram pa bzhin no/_/_khyad par 'og mnarnam mdzes chen po'i sprul ba'i rang snang gis bsdus pas dngos snang med do//stongashamum 
gyistong chen po lasogs pa'i bgrang gzhi'i mngon pa mdzod las/gling bzhi dang ni nyi zla dang //rirab dang de 'dodaltar bcas/ chos pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni/_/_stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod//destongalani stong gnyisaM pa/_/bar ma'i 'jigarten khams yin 
no_/de stong la ni stong gsum ste/_/mnyamadu 'jig cing 'byung ba yin/_cis pas stong gsum de dag bgrang gzhi'i ngos nas tha dad par smad kyang /_'og gzhi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gcig la brten pas na gnas pa dang 'jigaba'i dusani gcig pa nyidado[15]lta

lar A'i grub mtha' te
[# ]chags tshularang sra'i grub mtha' te/_/_gzhan du na dbyings kyi rig pa lu ma bstan de la mos pa las sonaglo bur ba'i 'khrul banim nges te/_gsang snying las/_emaho/bde gshegs snyid pa las/_rang rang rnam rtog las kyis sprul//zhes pas so//

minamed min dugyur pa'o//gong ma las 'du shes tsam du yod la gzhan ci yang med par gnas pa de las 'gro ba dpag tu med par mched pasaci yang med pa'am/rtog dpyodazhi ba'i dga' bdes brgyan pa cir yang mi sems pa'i ngang du yul dang bral 
bar bsgoms pas ci yang med pa'o/_/_gcig la gcig rnam par shes pa tsam las bdag tu rtog ba'i lus sdud ba'i dngos po med pa las 'gro ba'i gzuDamatha' yas par mchod ba'ag/_spyod pa tsam dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan gsal ba byung tshor

+/ l[ 1]ཉམས་དགའ་བར།། ཡང་དོགསངསརྒྱས་དོར་འཆོང་རྒྱུ། །ཞེས་པ་ལྟར་རོ།།གཉིས་པསོསོ་སྐྱེ་བོའི་གནས་བསམ་གཏན་རིཊ་བཞིའི་གོང་མ་གསུམ་གྱི་རྩེ་མོ་ནི་འཕྲས་བུ་ཆེ་བ་སྟེ། བསེད་ས་ཆ་མཐུན་གྱི་དགེ་བའི་བཤས་པ་ཆེ་པ་འདས་གབ་པ་ཞེས་རྩོད་མགོ་

ka _/bsam pa tsam gyis gang 'dod du phyin pa/_zas su dga' ba la spyod cing /_bo dang med med pa/_nyon mongs ba mdon rgyu ba med pa la bskal pa dad po zhes bya ste 'gro ba de dag gi ming la yang sen zhes graDa la yon tan yalatsher ltad

mtshungs pa yod do//

sang phyed dang bzhi par bri zhing /_rim bzhin bcu pa'i bar tsho dang lus yongs gas kyi 'grub cing /_de bzhin du lus kyi 'od dang /_gzi brjid dang /dbal la sogs pa'ang dman par 'gyur ro//_'dzam bu'i gling dumi rnams 'phel nas ring zhig song/_'od kyang yal/
bsod nas kyang bags gyis bri ban/_shar gyi lus 'phags gling du lha las miramachod pa ni lus tshad khu brgyud pa/tshod nyis brgyalnga bcu thub pa'o//des sgra mi snyan pa nisumadum gsum pa las mdu de lus tshad rang khru sum tuN+Da gnyis/_tshe lo stong phrag 
nyer bdun _
gcig la a ma yin pa'i 'chib medado/_/_nyi shatshota'i skad du smra'i sgra skadami snyan pas sgyu mi snyan pa zhes kyang bya la/_da skam ba zhag bdun na 'gyel ba dngamidi yang shinas sum cu rtsa gsum du skye ba yin no//de bzhin du nub kyi ba lang spyod ba'ang lha las 

mched de lus tshod rang khru bcu drug pa/tsholo lnga bcu thub pa'o//rim bzhin so so'i gling phranagyi mi yadamached do/_/_gling bzhi'i mirnams kyi byung phyis kyang gling dang rnam pa mtshungs par yod de/dper na 'dzam bu'i gling sog kar yod pas mi'i gdong dang /lus 
bsams pa 'aki kha pog ngang mthun b.rayod do
gnyis ka sog ka'i phyi su yod pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin du gling so so'i namakha' yad ri ba kyi kha dog dang mthun par yod do//skyid 'di'i satshiganigling 'a'i ngosatshigani//'dzam bu Ti sha bya ba'i shing gis nye bar brgyun bsan de skad ces bya la rdo rje'i gdan gyi byang phyogasu ri nag po dgugazha

[FA]khan gangs ri'i rgyal po ti se/de'i byang na ri bo spos da ldan/gsari'i byung spos da ldanagyi lho gnyis kyi bar rnamatsho chen po kun nas bsil ba ma dros pa klu'i rgyal po dang bcas pa yodad/_mtsho de na pad+ma'i sdodapo yal ga gshol mda' tsam la/_'dabam glang 
gi ko ba tsamachubya snatshogs dang bcas brdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pas 'phrod par dka' ba'o/ gangs ri de'i 'dasan/brag gser gyi bya skyibs can la dgru bcom pa lnga brgya'i phug pa dang*/_lha ma yin gyi sa bya ba chu zheng dpag tshad lnga bcu pa brgya byin gyi
glang po che rab brtan gyi gnas/ rten ta la'i phreng ba 'dun gyis bskor ba'i shing gi rgyal po   rab brtan dang*/_glang po shi brtsas rdzing bu dal gyis 'thor ba zhes bya ba gling g.yog lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba ste/_de la bod kyi bstan bcos rnamasan   dpyad 
pa smatshogs snang ste gsung rab rnas nas gangs can rigs mi 'dra ba lngar bshad pa mngon pa'i 'khril chon gyis bstan paama' gtsig mi gzung ngo*//_mtshoms pa'i 'gramanabrag gi gzugs tha dad pa'i shar phyogs glang po che'i kha nas gad+mam sa 

[1s]@#_/_/_pa la lan bdun bskor nas chu bun lnga brgya dang bcas shar gyi rgya mtshor 'bab po//_de bzhin du lho phyogs khyu mchog gi khan[ “]mnub phyogs rta mchog gi nas paklu/byang phyogs seng+ge'i kha nas si ta rnams sngar bzhin phyogs 
so so'i rgya mtshor 'bab po/_/khacig tu/_shar phyogs rtsamachog gi kha nas chu chen lo hi ta dngul gyi bye ma 'dren pa/_lho phyogs glang po'i kha nas gad+ma gser gyi bum 'dren pa nub phyogs rma bya'i kha nasasin rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khyim 'dren pa/_byang 
phyogs seng+ge'i khanas paklu rdo rje'i byi ma 'dren pa sngar bzhin bskor ba dang bcas 'bab par bshad do/mtsho de'i 'gramagayas rolan shing 'dzam bu Ti sha'i sdong po rgya dang 'bad du yangs pa la 'bras bu ro bda' bo smin pa mtshonang du lhung ba 'jom buchu bo'i 
ka bden gnyis shing rta nyo brgyad
rgyu gser du gyur pa ni/_gsor phal pa lan bcu drug tu bzhubal byas pa'i dwas zhun lta bu'i kha dog dang 'od yod pa'o//mtsho de'i bya ba phyogs na shel me li rtse mo rab tu mtho ba la namakha' khrid rnam pa bzhi'i ching yod do/_/de lta bu'i bkod ba phun sum
tshogs pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/bskal pa dang poratsho lo dpag tu med/_spyi mthun gyi mid sen zhes grags pa nas/_mi zhes grags pa'i bar du dga' bde'i bag la yes pa'i dus ri mo zhig nas rim bzhin tsho dang bsod nams kyang sngar bas brnga 
kyis bri ste tshe lo bye ba thub pa'i dus na 'byung bzhi'i rdul phran dang po dkyirang bzhin du 'dus pa'i sgo nga las skye/_las kyi rlung gisazhamakha' la 'gro zas su 'byung ba'i dwasam bza' /_tsha grang gi sdug bsngal med pas lus la gos mi dgos/de'i stob

za[ | ]@#/_/'gro ba lasarnamakha' la 'gro ba'i mthu nyams/_'ga' zhig gis sa'i zhag la gsog 'jog byas pa'i rjes su bslas pas de'anganub/_bar der mu ge dang /_mun pa'i gnas skabs kyang lomang du byung ba na spyi mthun gyi bsod

thog mar mtshon gyi bskal ba ni/
sos sum nga /_mu ge'o//

mtshon char gyur te gcig gis gcig gsod do//_shi chod kyang dmyal bar lhung bas semasacan dmyal ba pa'ang de'i dus lasamang ba med do//de nasand kyi bskal ba ni sdig spyad kyi mthus/_lham yin rnams 'khrugs nasand kyi rnam pa du ma gtong bas_/_/
thebs tshad gsor mi rung bar 'chiba'o//de nas mu ge'i bskal ba ni/_mtshon dang nad kyis gum ba'iyi lhag ma de dag gis mi dge ba spyad pas/_klu rnams bros nas char chum 'bebs pas thog ngan pa de'ang nyes par gyur te/_gabatsho pa dang /_rus gong dkar po 
ba dang /_thurams 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i mu ge 'byung ste/_gab tsho ba ni/_de'i tshonas la sogs pa'i 'bru bzang po sngon gyi an skyes pa'i ma rnyedanaya mtshan chen po byed cing /_tsholo bcu gcig pa'i dus kyi bra bo la sogs pa'i 'bru ngan pa mthong na'ang za ma 
tog tu bcuganas bsrung bar byed do//hacang bkres pas nyams stobs zad de sa la 'gyilan ldad mi nus par de nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/rus gong dkar po ba ni/_sngon shiba'i sa pa 'thusanas 'di ni khams kyi zas zos pa'i rus pa'i zer zhing chu 
nang du bskol nas 'thung ba'o//thuram bani/_'bru'i blo kha rnyed pa cung zad kya chu mang po'i nad du bskol nas 'thung zhing /_'bu de thurams rngub pa'o//de ltaramatshon gyi bskal pa lazhag bdun/_nad kyi bskal pa zla ba bdun dang zhag bdun/_mu ge'i bskal pa lo 
bdun dang zla ba bdun zhag bdun gyis rnams zad cing stos par byed do//byang chub sems dpa'is las ni tsholo sum cu ba lamu ge_/_nyi shu pa la nad/_bcu pa la mtshon 'byudabar bshad do//'dzam bu'i gling pa dang sems dpa' la khyad zhugs pas ra 

ka_@#/_/nubakyi gling gnyisazhani gnod sems lhag par 'gyur ba tsam dang /_kha dog nganacing nyamatshu ba tsam dang /_bkres skom gyi gdung ba 'phel ba tshom las med cing /_byang glin sa ngan pa'i 'gyur ba de gtan nas med do//des gong 'phel 
ji ltar 'byur bzhi/dge ba can 'ga' zhig tsam lus pa chu'i gling dang /_ri'i ljongs brag dbar la sogs par zhugs pa zhag bdun du chus 'tshozhing 'gu pa grong du 'os pa gcig gis gcig mthong ba na/_e mami gson po mthong ngo zhes phan tshun 
bdenubanyis shing rta
_dga' ba dang yamachenasdon med pa skyes te/_slar 'dus nas sngon gyinyes pa spyad pa gleng zhing /_de dag ba rgyu mi dge bas byas par shes nas rang rang gi rgyud sdom pa la 'badad//de'i tshe byams pa'i sprul pa gzugs dang skye mched de dag las 'phags pa 
[2\] ]zhig mthong nas dris pa[) ]bag cagazhi tshalo bcu pa'i mir mtshusan/_khyed kyi gzugs dang 'dra tshomatshog tu gyur pa'i rgyu gang las byung*/_des smras_/_srog gcod pa spus pa las byung ngo//de dag giso_na bdag cag kyang srog gcod spong ngo zhes 
[g]dam bcas pas sngon bsand med cid zomadog bde ba dang stobasache bar gyur to//de'i rgyus de dag gis bu dang bumo btsas parnamasatshe lo nyi shu par gyur to/_/_yang sprul pa 'byung ba lasdur ltar dris pas ma byin len spyasapa'i phan yon bshad cing de dag 
sha/gas dad du bla ma pas rteshu pa'i bu dang bumos bzhibacu thub par gyur to//de bzhin du sprul pa'i skyes bu re res log g.yem dang /phram dang*/_dag 'khyol dang/chigirtsub dang /brnabasemasadang*/gnodasems dang /_log lta dang /_mi rigs pa'i 'dod pa 

/_thamang /dge sbyong dang bramathu dang/rigs kyi gtso bo rnams la de dang de mi 'dzin pa'i chos spangs te/_pha la yur 'dzin pa lasogs

ya thog 'grib pa dang /_ma thog 'phel 'gribani yun shin tu ring ba'o//

@#_/_/_gas 'dud dang gnod sbyin pa/_srin po lasogasapa ga' zhig[f]sgo nga las skye'o//martochu shi las skye ba ni drod gsher skyes so//_de bzhin du lo sumu gzu ba'i gzhi drug dang /dusazhama' btung /bskalabang /_lo zla nga*/nyin mtshan dang /

so so skye bo'i dbang po'i gzugs canamig lasogs pa'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bka'i dngos po dgu lasogs mi basmos parnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gzhung tshogasachesakyi dogs pasam bkral yang /_nges par 'khor ba dang mya na'as su pa'i rnam gzhag

[a ]@#_/_/dog bzhika dang /gzugs dngam+b+hamisazhan sha dogadag po 'ba' zhig dang dbyang dang 'dod lhal dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i bosasras 'dzamaya ba rnams yod do//_de'adabyang gi gos la ljidasrangagacig/_/rgyalachen bzhi pa'i gos la srung

'dzomabu'i gling du 'ongs pa'atsho/_lus gnas de lasam g.yos par/sprul pa ston gyi thos pa'isims gyis mtshungasamed ba'i zhatshab la brtegs 'od do//gzhan yuman chad 'dod pa'isamatshungs pas lus sakyis 'ong ba'o//_rgyu gang gis semasakyi

[= ]@#/_/grags brgyad la dpagatshad/_sar dang yul dang /_gnas thamasaca[ @ ]chodagazhalal/_de lta'ache lasazhing brtan pa'ang mthar gyis rdul phrarab tu bltaramamangon pa nyid do
//phyogs gnyis pa dusamatha'i skadacigamani/_skyes bu stobasacan gyis/
se 'a la gtogs pa'i yunal skad cigam drug cu rtsa bzhi 'da'/de'i chagacig brgyanyi shul de'i skad cig_/de'i skad cigam drug cu la thang gcig/thung gcig dgu brgya la zhag gcig_/_thung gcig sum cu la yud tsam/_yud tsamasum cu la nyin zhag gcig go/_na 
kyi zhag sum cu la zlob/_debacu gnyisalaler brtsi ba dang /_
atshad de'i khod du byang bgrod nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bul byed kyi rlung stobs chung la/_

lho bgrod 'phul byed [73]
stobs chel rten byed stobs chung bsamu khyudakunang rol la nye ba tsam du lhor phul bas dgun nyi thu zhing 
/_nyi zer la rlung gi reg pa dang rgyang ring ba'i byedab bsdoms pas grung ba'o//de'ang nyi zlaganyis ring stobs kyis ri rab la g.yen du bskor ba yin+date/_'char 
[1 :]bzhud 'gayas su bskor bar mthong bzhigo la'i 'khrul 'khor gyi byedapa lasaso//
gza'agazhan rnams 'gros bzhim nges par brtsam pa yin te rgyu skar rnams lazhi bkod pa med do
//de la nyin zhag dang /_tshes zhag dang /_khyim zhag dang /_zhagamishub pa'i cha 
sa zlabashol 'byung ba dang /_
phyishang gzhan gsum gyi rnam gzhag sbyar ba'i gtanatshogasanisakyi 'khor lo'i lag rtsis rnams su'ang gtan la phebs pa ltar go
de lta bu'i tshul gyis la'o klas nges pas skye dgu rnamasakyi tsho dang sa la sogs gzhal 

la[i]'jal byedade yang lugs las ldog na dus mtha'i skud drig mas 'jig go_/
phyogs gsum pa ni ming gi mtha' yige 'dusapasteyi gesil bu gsum 'dus pa 'dachos zhes pa lta bu ste/_tshadung na'odang /_sasos na gnas su chosakyi ming du mi 'grubakyang/_/
gsumapotshogs pa las 'byung ba'o/_/de la bros pa ni yi ge'i rnamapa ste/_mgo dang /dpung pa dang /_zags mchung /_yar 'thenadang mar 'then dang*/_spyodong /mig bu la sogasatshogs pa lasayi ge'i gzugs brnyan du grub pa'o//_yi gnisgra dang sgra'i don spyi tshogs 
pa'i chos zhesarjod byed du grub pa de yin la/_de la yi ge'ang gtsug laming gzhi'ang gcig yod pa ka zhes pa dang /_yi ge gcig la ming gzhi gnyis yod pa lha zhes pa lta bu/_la dang harnam pa gnyis so//yi ge gcig laming gzhi gsum yod pa'i gzhan zhes 
[jA]
pa lta bu ga dang /_zhadang /na'o//de bzhin ngu bzhi yodapan/_rgyunazhes pa lta bu ste/ra dung dag dang /_ya btags dang /na'o/_lta yod pamang mtha' byas zhes pa lta bu ste/da dang /ba dang /_ya btags dang /_du dang /_su'o/da'adu gsal byed sum cu la dbyangs zhugs 
pa[w]mid la sogs mngon 'byung gi yi go 'grub ste/_sde pa'i dang po ka brjod pa na de'i srog tu yi ge a rang bzhin du zhugs paka a zhesapa lta bu'o//_de lagi ga byinan ur 'gyur te ki i zhes pa'o//de bzhin ngu na ro las o dang /_'grebu las i/
'aakyu phaurang bzhin du 'byung ba'o//_gsal byed rnams nyishu rtsa bzhir bsdu ba'i tshulaM/_ca cha ja dang zhaza 'a rnams rgyagar na med de bod skad la 'jug pa'i dbang du thonamisamadzad ri phyogs mtshungs tsamadu brtsin
/_cachang gsumazhi sde pa gnyis/

ka _@#/_/_pa'i dang bo gsum dang cha 'dra'adrazhanisha dang mtshungs shing /_zanis 'a a dang mtshungs pa'i tshul rgya gar bas zha lu la sha lu zer ba dang*/_za hor la sa to rar 'bod pas mtshon la/_'ani rgya gar gyi yi ge la ring cha ra yod pa bzhin du/_bod du'ang 'bul 
rten dang ring char 'gyur bshasatshezhing*/deltar sgra'i nyag ma 'dus pa las lan bu dang/_ku sha'i nyagam 'dus pa las chun podang /_rtsa'i nyagam 'dus pa las ne'u gsing du grub pa ltar yi ge 'dus pa lasaming /_ming 'dus pa las ga_tshig 'dus bu las bka' dang bstan 
bden gnyis shing rta[# ]btsas su 'grub ste/_de'ang le'u dang /_bam po dang /_3chon dang*/_klad dang /_gzhung dang*/_
rjes kyi don tshogs pa las gang zag gcig thog mar sems bskyed panasamathar 'tshong rgyab 'bar gyi lus bsamyu gsal lhun pa ltapany+tsa/_brjod bya'i don gzhan rnam pa thams [5]
cadapa la'ang mtshungs so/_/_de ltar grub pa'i dus na'ang rang bzhin du yi gesil bum 'dres par gnas te/_thag pa rang sa'i dus su spu nyag ma re rer gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du g.yag rta dang ne'u gsing bzhin no//de'i phyir snang zhing srid pa dang /'khor ba dang mya ngan las
na/'das pa'i chos thams cad blo dang_/_snyam byedadang*/_rtog pa las/_ming tshig yi ge'i tshogasakyis sgro btags shing brjod pa'i dus nyidanas/_ming don 'khrel pa med ba yigi sil bu lta bu ste/_yi ge'ang sgra dang sgra'i don tshogs bsosor rtog pa'i shes rab kyisnyam byed 
[# ]las byung bas/_snyam byed nyid kyi ngo bo lashin tu brtags na ngos bzung med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhinadu gnas pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad snang la rang bzhinamedapar shes par 'gyur ro//gnasapa'i bskal pa bshad zinato//gsum pa 'jig pa'i bar bskal nyi'u 

ni/bcud kyi sems can 'jig pa la bar bskal bcu dgu_/snodakyi 'jigarten 'jig pa la bar bskal gcig go_/de la bcud 'jig pa'i dadab dmyal ba nasamago brtsamaste/_gsems can gsar paskyob mi 'gyur zhing /rnying pa las zadapa rnams ni gnas gong mgang gi las _/
myong dgos pa der skyel kha cig yi dwags dang /_kha cig dud 'gro dang*/_khacig lha mi la sogs par do//
de'i las dang tshe ma rdzogs parnams ni dmyal ba'i gnas 'dizhig kyangazhing gzhan gyi dmyal b.raganas 'pho ba yinate stong phrag brgyab las
/_de yang mes spud pa'i bskal 
pachen po byung ba de'i tsho/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi sems can stsal bachen po rnams su 'dong bar 'gyur ro//zhes bstan la/_
de ltar dmyal ba'i 'jig rten zhig nas rim pa bzhin yi dwags dang dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dag gi gtso bortsis na gnas pa gnyis 'jig ste
kha 'thor ba lha mi'i gnas na yod pa rnamasamatho ris 'jig pa dang lhan cig pa yinano//ngan song de gnyis kyang rang rang gi las ma zad pa rnams zhing gzhan gyi gnasong du 'gro tshul ni gcig go/mtho ris ji ltar 'jig na/_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni tsholo bcu pa'i nad [76]
mtshon mu ge'i bskalachung gsum 'das nas mi gcig gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen lam ltos par bsam gtan gnyis pa thob ste delas las nas dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bdebani 'dit+ta'o
//zhes ched du brjod pas sgra des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad khyab ste/
gzhan dag gis kyang thosamakhag tu de'i rjesasu bslabs bsasems can de dag thogama'ang 'od gsal gyi mtshungs pa'i sems las chad pa'i rten 'brel gyis mthar yang ting nge 'dzin de gnas 'od gsal gyi lhar skyesanas 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can gcig kyangam _

@#/_/lus bar stongs bar 'gyur ro//_de ltar stongs pa'i rjesanas shar gyi lus 'phags gling dang /_nub kyi ba glang spyod kyang snga phyi rim pas 'dzam bu'i gling pa ltar 'dod pa la skyo bsakhams gong mar skye ba'i rgyu rang bzhin gyis bsam gtan gnyis pa thob nas 
ka _
7_stongs par 'gyur ro/_de nas khyad gi sgo yisnyan parnams ni 'dod pa la chagasapa dngamabral bas sum cu rtsa gsuyaba'i yaskye'o//gling phran rnamasakhyadagatso bo'i gling ltar gyur nasami 'ga' malus pa de'i mi'i[n]jig rten zhig pa zhes bya'o//de nas rgyal chen rigs bzhis 
bden gnyis
_nyin byasate bsgoms pa las/_thams cad kyis sdaya ltar bsam gtan gnyis pa thob nas 'od gsal gyi lhar skye'o/_/de'i tsho 'dod khams zhig 
'i _pa zhes bya'o//_de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du sems can gang yang rung bas rang gi chos nyid kyis thob pa'i bsam gtan gnyisapal snyoms par zhugs sa waMtshulatshig tu brjod pas/_kun gyis de ltar bslabs pas shi 'phos nas 'od gsal gyi lhar skye'o/_/tshul 
rta_
de lta bus gzugs khamasakhyadazhiganas 'jig rten na sems can gcig kyang med par 'gyur ro//_di yang rten snod ni 'byung bachen po gsum gyis 'jig par byed//_thogamar mes 'jig pa'itshulanamamakha' la nyi ma gcig po 'di rab tu tsha bar shar nas rtsi shid 
so da
_nags tshal thams cad skam _  par byed do//gnyis shar nas chu klung dang stengaka thamasacad skamamo//gsum shar bsaMtshu klu tshonapo thams cad skemamo//bzhisharabs mtsho chen po ma dras pa yang skemamo//lngashar bas rgya mtsho chen po yang skemamo/_/

dziltar skeman thog mar zabs su dpag tshad brgya bskams nas/_rim bzhin nyis brgya dang /_bdun brgyadang /_stong dang /_khri dang /_brgyud khri'i bar du bskams nas mthAr chu rngams dpag tshad gcig dang /rgyang grags phyed dang /_ba glang gi rmig rjes tsamam lus par bskams nas 
bdu shar bas lhun por bdun 'khor yug gser gyis gzhi dang bcas ba bye ba phrag brgya pom lus par bsregs nas 'bar ba'i 
thigs bgacigakyang lusapar mi 'gyur ro/_/_ga shar bas sachen bo gangasari dang bcas pa 'bar 'bur du byed pa thamasacad bsreg go_/
/_kun tu2bar shin tu 'bar bas 'od gsal gyi 
gyen du rlung gis sparab 'khyil nas rtse mos rmongs pa'i zhal med khang stong parnams bsreg cing 'bar rab tu 'bar
mar gser gyi sa gzhir myal ba'i gnas dang bcas pa la thugasing /_
me lcegacig tu 'khyil ba/_
lha gzhon nu rnams skrag cing nyab pa la/_b+hargan po rnams kyis grogs dag ma 'jigs shig/me lce 'di ltawani sngon yang chos ba'i 'jig rten gyi bar byung nas stongs su zhig pa yin no/_/de nas mi snang bar 'gyuran 'dir ni gnod pa med do zhes dbugs 'byin par byed 
do//nyi ma banani dngos bstan du bgrod ba dang /rimakhazhi'atshakhyad du spyar ba'i phyogs gnyis 'dod do//de nas chus 'jig pa ni/_namamakha' las char gyi rgyun gnya2ga tsam dang /_gsholamada' tsam babs pas bsam gtan gnyis baman chad lan tshwa chur zhu ba ltar 
/de'ang bsam gtan dang poman chadames lan bdun du 
denas 'og gzhi'i rlung rdo rje rgya gram langs te kun nas kun tu 'thor bas bsam gtan gsum laman chad zhig ste nam mkha'i rang bzhin gcig tu stong bar gnas go
gyur nas zhig go/rlung gis 'jig bzhi/_

al ། །འཇིག་པའི་བར་བསམ་གཏནགཉིས་པའི་འཇིག་བསམ་གཏན་གཉིས་པཚུས་འཇིག་སགསུམབ་མི་འཇིག་གསུམ་པ་ཟུང་གིས་འཇིག་དུས་བཞི་ཁམི་འཇིག་པ་ནི་མཚུངས་པར་ལྡན་པའི་བསམ་གཏན་ཕྱི་རྒྱུལས་ཡིན་ཏེ། བསམ་གཏན་དང་པོ
nasems dang sems byung gi rtog dpyodame dang 'dra ba yod pasames 'jig la/gnyis pa ngaga' ba'inyamasau rgyun lta bu yod pas chus 5ga la gsum lan dbugs 'byung tshugats+tsaMgayo 'gul rlung lta bu yod pasarlung gis 'jig pa yin no//de'ang 'dod pa'i 
[79 J ]khams ltararags pa'i rlung rtsa 'dab dang rten dang brten bar 'brelabanamed de rnamasmin skyesa'abyung ba'i rdul phran dang po las thob pa'i tshangamatshul pa'i dbugs rgyu bas bsam gtan rang bzhin gyis dwangs ba'ang de nyid do//bsam gtan 'di dag grub pa dang 
tu ma grub ba lasarnal 'byor bsgom pa dag la'ang 'byung ba'i dgrus gsod mi gnodachos mtshusapa'i phyis ltaseyasadang sems byung gi rtog pa'am 'gags/_tshor ba dga' midaga' rang son gnas shing rlung gi 'gyu bam dag/_so so rang 
rig gi rnam shes dran 'dzin gyi thag pas bcis ba dag gis 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan yangam grun/'jigarten las 'das brgyal ba'i ye shes dang rje zhig rgyab spyad pa'o//bsam gtan bzhi pa la ni bskal pa 'jig par mthun snang du grub pa'i 'khru 
[ka]pa'i gnod pa yod kyang rang rang gi las kyi 'chi 'bo yodapas rtag pa ma yin no//_mi 'jig pa'i gang gisan/_de nas bsam gtan dang bo dang mtshungs ba'i rtog dpyod kyi 'jug pa sems dang sems byung rags pa dang*/_gnyis pa mtshungs pa'i bsam 

gtan gyi ro myong la chags pa'i dga' bde dang /_gsum pa dang mtshungs pa'i g.yo byed kyi rludar bzhin rnam pa gsum gyis de'i nyin de 'dzin mi g.yolas/_rkyen gsum dang mtshungs ldan gyi 'byung bas mi gnodade_/_dgrwa med pa la mtshon gyi 'jigs pamed pa'i 
phyir ro/_/de ltar 'byung ba gsum gyis 'jig la gnyisakyis mi 'dzig ba gang yinan/nam mkha' 'jig pa'i go 'byed pa dpyidas kyi char gnas pa las gnod byed kyi rang bzhin du medal/_sa ni gzhig bya'i yul du grub kyis 'jig byed kyi yul du ma skyes pas 
//don bzhi pa stongs pa'i bskal 
ga_so bsam gtan de dag 'jig pa'i sngon rol du de na yod pa'i lha de dag gis gong ma'i semasarang byu ru thob nas dge rgyas la sogs bar skye'o de ltar 'jig pa'i mgo brtsams pa nas ril zhig pa'i bar du bar bskal nyi shu yod ba'o
pan/_thamasacad namamakha' gcig gi rang bzhin du gnas nas rtenasnod dang /_brten pa bcud kyi 'dus byas sam byas pa'i byisasustongs pa na/_a ba'i don la gzugs sku chos sku'i dbyings su zhi khro'i mtshon dper gnas pa ste/ri zhiganang gi chags gnas 
'jig stongs dang sbyar na/thal 'gyur las/_don ni 'jig dngachags pa dang //_gnas pa nyid dang stongs la dag/skyed dang na dang 'chi//_srid pa'i 'khrul 'khor nyid du'o//zhes gsungs la/_de ltar stongs pa'i yunasrid kyang bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu'o/_/slar yang de'i 
'og tu rdul phran 'dus pa las 'jig rten gyi khams zhig brtsam pa'i mgo 'dzin te/_munapa'i bskal pa drug cur chags gnas 'jig stos drug cu 'byung la/_de'i 'og tu bskal paskar ma lta bu lasangs rgyas grangs med par 'byung bzhi sgron ma'i bskal pa 

2du rnam par snyadamadzadagangs chenamacho'i byag gi yats+tsha'i yum brumal sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga'i zhing khams gzhidang snyilomi tog gsalargyanasazheyabya[n]lha tshonal las/_bcu gsum pa thugasaka dpal gyi be'u'i thad dud rdo 
[# ]rje theg pa'i zhing khams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten bye ba phrag brgya'i satshigs 'di'i namamakha' la ston yang 'jig rten bsam phyis mi khyab pa byung zhing /_ma rtos pa phyi ma'i mthar yangachags 'jig gi bskal ba dang /_'jig rten grungasamed pa 'byung ba bzhin du 
phyogs bcu gzhan yang rnam pa mtshungs la/de ltar chags gnas 'jig stongs bzhi'i bar dus mnyam pa'i bar bskal nyi shumatshus la bsdoms pas brgyud chu la bskalapa chen po gathig ces gragasab ste/_de dag tshad legs bar gnasaMshing chags pa'i 
[8t]
ka bden gnyis shing rta zhi gcig sa skabasanasrab/_brtan pa/gzhan du mi 'gro ba/_rgyu rkyen gang gis kyang gzhig parayinus la/_'byor zhing rgyas pa_/skyabem pos bkang ba yin na'ang /'jig rten zhes bya ba'i ming nyid kyis glu babs nas tshags pa'i mthar thug pa tsam nas rgud pa'i mgo brtsis 
shingamathar gyis gcig kyang med par 'jig cing stos par 'gyur ba'i tshul la ltos/de ltar brtagasan bdag ya gi lus ni nyin zhag gcig pa'i sbrang bu bzhin du nyamachung ba/_srogani shin tu g.yo ba/_gnod pa mang bsamatha' nas bskor ba/_chu'i lha 
ba las kyang yid brtanadaka' ba 'di la rab tu skyo bas thar pa dam pa'i chos la brtson par bya'o zhes don bsdu ba yin te/_de skad du mi rtag pa'i gtam las/gang dus rnams bsreg 'gyur to//lhun po'ang thal bar 'jig pa dang //rgya mtsho'i chu yang bskam /

[\[ ]'gyur na//_lus can de dag smos ci dgas//_zhes bshad do//de'anganang du sems can rang rang gi 'jig rten nub pa la ltosan/_dwangapokunagazhi'i chos nyid namamakha' lta bu'i dang las/_ma rig pa dang kun rtog gi rlung la 'khor bar sdud pa'i las 'dodachagasakyi chu brten 
zhing /_phama'i khukhrag las lhun po lta bu'i las/_nyi zla lta bu'i mig_/gling bzhi gling phran lta bu'i skyemached/_khams bcu bat+ti_/_ri bdunakhor yug dang bcas pa'i rnam shes tshogs brgyud/_'gro ba drug dang mthun pa'i rtsa 'khor drug/de dag kyang gnas rigs tha dad pa 
bzhin du bde sdug la sogs du mar snang ba'i rdung gi stong chen gyi 'jig rten 'di yang snod 'jig pa dang phyogasamatshungs par 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na/_phyi 'byung bzhinang 'byung bzhir sdud pasam bdun dang chu gcig te brgyadwathal nas/_nang dang gsang ba'i 'byung ba thog ma'i 'od 
gsal la thim pas thams cad nam mkha' gcig tu'agyur ba'i skabs yod de/_'di ltar lusakyi 'byung bzhi bsdus/_rtsa thig rlung gsum stongs pa'i mi bdun dang /srog 'pho ba'i chu gcig/dbugs 'grol thag chad pa'i rlung gis gtor nas lus sems so sor 'khrul zhing /

gsaargyas rnam par gzigs nas shAkya thubapa'i bar phyi rabs bdunadang /bzang po'i bskul pa 'di la byon zhing 'byon par 'gyur ba mosapa'i bar gyi sangasargyus stong rtsa gnyis dang /bar bar du byon pa'i rang rgyas la sogs pa de dgakyang 
[\[ ]ma'i'i zhing khams su mngon par 'du brjod pa tsam nas rdo rje'i sku yang 'jig pa'i mngon rtogs ngom pa la zhugs shing*/_sangs rgyas rnamasakyi bstan pa 'ang daranuba'i mo pa mtha' yasan bdag cag gi las ni dbu ba brdos pa lta bu sems sna/
slong la spang gi ches can yin pa'i phyir nyen mo'i thog mtha'atsamadu'ang rtog pa'i gnas skabs ga la zhig ste rta dbyangs kyis/ci ste sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/_/mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa//rdo rje'i sku yad mi rtagan//_chu shing snying po med 'dra ba'i/_2[3]
ka bdonagasashing rta ni gas lusacan gzhan rnams smos ci dgos//_zhis dang /dga' ba'i dbang pos gzugs dang longs spyod thos pa dang //tshul khrims la sogs rtagAyin te/_gang yang 'dod chags bral yang //kunacu gnas pa mamathong ngo //zhes so/_/gnyis pa ni/bsam

'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /_drang srong chen po rgyas pa dang /_grog mkhar ba sogs rig pa'i yon tan dang /_spyan dang mngon shes mnga' ba rnamasadang /_gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur rgyal sogs bsod nams dang gzi brjid kyi grags pas kun tu khyab cing /_'byor ba'i 
khyad par dam pasasnyems shing dregs pa de dag kyang ma ngoms bzhin du 'chi3[:]'o 'alas thar ba'i thabs ma bsam ste/'dul ba lung las dge slong dag 'byor pa 'di dag rgudacing snying po med pa la ltas/ngas sngon dran pa'i 'khor ba na/_tshangs pa dang /brgya byin dang /
'jigarten skyong ba la sogs pa'i dbang po bsam gyis mi khyab paspyod yad /_mngoms bzhin du cho'anyos te ngan song du gzhol bar gyur to zhis dang mya ngan bsal ba zhes bya ba'i sprin yig las/_rtag par 'du shesarnam log_//_srid spyi las kyang 'gro ba rnams/[ 34]
'chiba'i zhags pas drangs gyur ba//zhags pas glang po bzhin du'o//bsam gtan las skyos bde ba myong_/chos pas tshangs pa'i gnas las kyang //mi rtag phyir ni lhung gyur pa//_chu yi rlung gi 'gramapa bzhin//brgya byin dang ni stong rnams kyang //'khor 
los bsgyur ba brgya dag dang //dus kyi 'chi bar 'gyur bzhi//maram 'badra ba rlung gis bzhin//drang srong chen po lnga mngon shes//mkha' la rgyang ring 'gro ba yang //_gangan spyod yul 'chim pa//de ni 'grokhar nus pa med//ces so//gsum pa ni/_mtho 
ris sman ljongs nyams dgar 'khrigs pa yi//skyes bu'achi srog yid la yang nas yang //bgyid ba'i sngonapa lagan chon can//don gnyer gcig pu nyid las gzhan mi sems//'di ltaramatho ris kyi bde'i gyong dang phun sumatshogs ba dbyar zla gsuM

@#/_/_mngon du ston pa'i phyir/_soka'atsho bas gdungs ba'i skye bo dag/_ston zla gsal ba'i 'od la dga'agyur nas//nyin zhag brgya yis rang gi tsho thal ba'i//gnas la sems nam skyug par gyur pa med//ces pas 'di ltar skye bo phal mtshan ma brtag   lha dang /
[# ]bab col la goms pa yin pas rang bzhin du 'chim 'tshe'i rnam par rtog pa gang yang med pa'i ngal thugaphrad du 'tshi_/_tshadadu brjod pa'i choms lasaM/_mdal du dang po 'jug pa'i mi//dwazhebasnonamed god 'gyur zhing //_sod ba lasakyang ldog pa med//_sa rdo skye 
ka brtanaganyisashing rta _bomangamathong ba_/_phyi dro kha cigamathong mi 'gyur//zhisaso//gal torkyenasna tshogs pa'i stes dbang las/_mthar gyis 'chi ba'i chos nyid la nges pa brtan par rlom pa dag kyang skyes pa'i nang par nas las kyi gzhan dbang gis 'phangs pa'i'ichod rje snyad yod pa
/tsho'i tshad de skyed kyang sa tshugs med par 'phro ba'i dbazhi 'dir yi [89]
glo bur gyis 'grib pa'irkyen ni shin tu mang ste tshe ring ba'i yimathun phyogs srog gcodapasogs bsodanams ma yin pa la spro zhing 'jug pamar pa'i phyin

cher rol pas bstan/dzisId dngos por 'dzin ba ma zad pa'i bar la bsod nams yin pa'i las phrazhing phra bas spyad 'bras khu chen po 'byin te/_rtsamatshochen pomu dang gting zug pa'i rlabs kyad rtagadong dam kha'i mes bskams bar nus pa bzhin du

[fo]7_pamong+gal gyi bu kun tu rgyus bkrongs pa dang*/_'phags ba sgyur chung bza' bas yongs nas ltogs grir zhum pa dang /dge slong ma ut+pala'i mdog lhas sbyin gyisamago la khu tshur brdabs te bkodas pa sogs/dag bcom pa thob pa'i gang zag kyang las

ka[ j]rnam par dag na lus ngag gi las re zhig rnam pa gzhan du mngon ba dag kyang dge ba 'ba' zhig rtsa 'gro ba theg pa chen po'i gnas skabs su yod pa/_rin chen phreng ba las/mchagasamisdang gti mug med_/_sa bskyed las ni dge ba'o//

_ngu bzhin gzhan gyis bsal gyur pa/_gnyis kas rgyal srid thob par 'gyum zhes pas don dpyis phyin pa shes te chad pas sku gzugs 'dzig gi dogs pa dang /_skyed pas sku la nongs kyi dogs pa gnyis ka'i bsam pa rgyal srid theb pa'i rgyun 2
song ba'i phyir ro//_de'ang 'dir ni 'dod pa'i khamasan spyod pa rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lci yang gi byebag gtso bor ston pa'i skabs yin pas/_'diltar rtag da6mdon zhin gnyon po med_/_yon tan gtso cha sa byung ba'i las/_rnam pa lta pa

nga bdun 
[\[ ]yang dusaring mo zhig tu sbyar ba dper na 'gro ba gzhan la gnod pa chung du zhig bya ba'i don du'ang a ri mo zhig nas bsam pa dan pa de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i khod du chud par byas pa'o//_gnyis pa bsam pa'ikhyad paranimangon par zhon pa ste/_las dam 

la yun thung ngu lasamedachar nyon mongs pa dang rab tu dang ba drag po dang ldan pa khro bzhin du 'khyugs bzhin du mas bzhin du lus de kho na las gzhan du yid mi gtod pa dper na rgyal bo mya ngan med sdig pa'i sems kyis gzir ba'i tshe nyin gyi dang po lasog
gcod pa la sogs pa'ibya ba mngon du ma grub par sems rnal du mi phebs pas sakyang ba bar mi byed pa bzhin no//gsum pa gnyen po'i khyadapar /_las byas pa de yang rten gyirang bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dkon cog gsum la brtenacing rnam 
pa sun 'byin pa la legs pa'i gnyen po stobs dang ldan pas zil gyis mnan na nyam*chung dur 'gyur la/_las de nyid gnyen bomed par 'dod rgyal du spyodan stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro//khazhi pa gzhi nirnam pa gnyis te/_yon tan dang ldan pa dang /

ནས་གཟུགསམཐོང་བའི་མཐོ་ཚདེ་ཉིདམིག་གི་རྣམ་པར་ཤེས་པར་གཞག་པས་མཚོན། སྣུབ་དང་། སྣ་དང་། ལྕེ་དང་། ལུས་ལ་བརྟེན་ནས་སྒྲ་དང་། དྲི་རོ་རེག་བྱར་ཤེས་པའི་ཚནི་ཡུལ་ལྔའི་ཤིས་པ་སྟེ། དེ་དག་སྔ་མའི་ཆལས་ཕྱིམའི་ཤེས་པ་སྐྱེ་ཞིངམཆོད་{js

[# ]dang /sems 'khrul pa dang /_tshor bas gzir ba rnams la'i nyes pa med cing /_de bzhin du gzhi dang /_bsam pa dang /sbyor ba dang /_mthar thug bzhi pomatshang na'ang las demathar thug pa ma yin pa'i tshulakun la sbyar ro//dag gi bzhin rdzun smras 

gzhan dag 'khrul/_phyogs mthunu'adu shes bslad nas gzhanasems pasla_/_phramamathunayam btang snyoms gnus pa 'dul/_/_phyogs mthun sbyor tshig gzhan sa'akhon du 'chos//ngaga'akhyal bre mo'i gtamalasachags sdang bskyed phyogasamathunadamag
dang chom rkun 'brelamed gtam/_tshig rtsub bal snyidal 'jigs pa ste/_/phyogs mthun gzhan yidAmi bde'i rkyen dang sprod//ngag gi bzhi po la'ang dngos bstan dang phyogasamathun pa gnyis las/daa bstan gyi brdzunani yan lag bzhis rdzogs par 'gyur 
1_/_skya pa'i gzhimanor pa dang gzhan bslu ba'i bsam pa dang lta ba yid la bzhag nas bden bam yin par spyas pa dang /de'i 'du shes bsgyur ba'o//slob dpon blo gros chen po ni/_thatshom za ba'i dngos po la des pa bzhin du smra ba yang brdzun du smra ba kho na 
yinanozhisa'achad do/_/dil gzhi ma nor ba zhesapani/_rang nyid 'phags pa ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du mngon shes med pa rang la lkog tu ma gyurabazhinadu/_deltar yinano ba'i bdenabam yin pa dngos susmra ba'am/_yi ger 'bri'am/_lus kyi brda' sprad pa 
de/_phal pos gonas 'phags pa'amamangon shes can du 'khrul zhing 'du shes 'gyur ba de brdzunarlabs po che mi tshos blamar grags bsamatshon pa'o/_/phyogasamathunanedrang po ltarabasdus pa'i tshig gisapal bslu bar sanas brjodapa'o//_phramaniyan 
lag gsum gyis rdzogs pa yin tangabya ba'i gzhi gang zag yazhatshunamadza' ba'am gtsang snyomasasu gnas pa la_/dbyen sbyor gyi tshig smras pa dang /_mtha don go ba'o//rdzun dngasham gnyis la 'dra rung ba'i gnas skabs khyad yod de brdzunanibaslu ba'i/

[|:]2ga _/bsam pa canadang /_phramani dbye ba'i bsam pa can du khyad par dbye'o//_phyogs mthun ni phan tshun yimaradas pa'i tshig de dang de la bskyar zhing smras pa'o//_ngag 'khyalani/_gzhanAgasum po gang du'ang ma gtogs pa nyonamos ba'i sems kyis
brjod pa dang /_gsum po'i don mthar thug pa ya rol pos mgo na'ang dag 'khyal du 'gro dad bshes mdzod gnyis ka'i 'grel pas bstan to//de skad dubatsun bachos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyis kyang mig 'khyil bzhi yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur 
lha tre/_chos dang mi ldan pa der bsam pa dang /_tshig 'khyal ba smras pa'o//_zhes chos dang mi ldan bachos su bsems nas tshig 'khyalabar smrasalamatha' dag yin pas/mchod sbyin dang /_snyanadad gsal sogs pa dang /bram ze'i gsang sngags dang chags selaM/
kyi glu dang /_zlosagar gyi tshig dang /_smad 'tshod ma'i gtam dang sdon rgyag dugazhi lnga bsngags par byas pa lta bu chos dang 'gal ba'i bstan bcos la sogs dang /_mdor nubremo'i gtam 'dod rgyal lam gnam babs su brjod pas chags sdud skye ba'i gnas 
[* ]su gyur pa mtha' dag go_/phyogs mthunani/dmag dad chom rkun la sogs dus dang ma 'brel ba'i brjod pa smra ba'o//chig rtsub ni yan lag gsum gyis rdzogs pa yin te/gzhi gang zag de la ched du dmigs pa dang /_sbyor batshig rtsub mo smras pa dang /
tshun/mthar thug yid mi dga' bar byas pa'o/_/phyogs mthunani/_tshig snyanapar smras kyangadon gyis yid mi bde ba'i gnas la sbyor ba'o//_yid kyi gsum la dadapo brnab sems_/gzhan 'byoradabal lo brdams shid bdago gir byed// phyogs mthun bal 

dzas la brkam zhing spyang //gnod sems bdazhanal khod bsgrubs 'tsho bslong phyogasamathun bzhabasalama'adu'abrababasgom/_yog la rgyu 'bumamed dang rtag chad blta_/_phyogasamathunamed la sgro 'dogs yod lobaskur//_yid kyi rnam pa gsum po lA'ad
dngos dang /_phyogasamathunapa re re las/brnabasemasazhi yan lagaganyis kyis rdzogs pa ste/_gshigabal bsnubasaMms skye shu dngos po gzhan gyi yin pa dang /_de la brnab sems bskyed pa'o//'di la chosazla ldan gyi sems sbyor bar dpyad nas gzhi 
gzhan gyi ma yin na brnab pa'i _med/_de la chags semasam bskyedazhabarnaba'i rkyenamed/_dzas de'i khyadapar mngagasaromyong bzhin du yid kyisabadagagi mabyasan 'khusems sa bstan du mi 'gyur/_yid kyisartsol ba mi byedan brnab sems kyang ma 
[\[28]
_yin bas sa bzhi po de ni brnab sems skyes pa'i mod la lhan skyes sutshadab zhig yin no//_yang skye ba phyi'am donomagro'i bde sathobar 'dodaasmon lam 'debs pa lta bu'adabarnagasemasamathar thugatu 2don/_yod bzhig gis mig 'thob 
bar shogacigasmonapa de'ang brnabasems su 'gyur bas na mig ldanasu zhig gi mig la migs pa yin/_rigs 'dis bsod nams cha mthun gyi las 'bras la nyes pa bskyed par shes bar bya'o//_mdzod las kyang /_brnabasems log pas gzhan 
nor chags//gnod sems semasacan lasdad ba/_/dge dang mi dgemed blta ba//log par blta ba yin 'dil//zhes bas smyug 'di gnas rigasamathunapa'i nor la brkam zhing yid kyis bdag gir byed pa khonar 'dod la/_tshangs bad la sogs 

ba_@#_/_/_
pa'i gnas thob na de'i mnga' ris dang longs spyod de la mi dbang bar gzhanau zhig gi brnab sems kyi rjes su 'gro yang 'gro ba rnam 'byed kyi 'grel pa las
/thos pa sogs la khro bas brtsub sems pa dang /_phan par mi dga' bas 
a khro ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_chos dad /_5zhan la bskur ba 'dibs pa ni de'i phyogs mthun ba'o//
zhes gzhan gyi yo byad la sogs pa la rang gi yin na ci ma rung snyam sa 'khusems gyis bdag gir byed pan brnab sems yin
Al pha rol gyi rdzas dang /_thos pa la sogs pa lami bzod bzhin du bdag gi dbang du gyur na snyam pa ni phyogs mthun no/_/gnod semasazhi yan lag gnyis kyi tshogs par 'gyur te/_gzhi semasacan yin pa dang /_de 'dra kun nas mnar sems pa'i/[ 129]
sku_'i khyad par zhib tu bshad na/_sems can gzhan la zhe sdang ba'am/_khong khro ba ste de la kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu yinate/_bdag la gnod pa byas so//khyodado//byed par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_gang zag gi bshes su gyur pa yid  
[#]du 'od ba phan par 'dod pa gud yin pa de la gnod par byas so//_byed do//byed par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_bdag dang mi 'dza'ug_yid du mi 'ong ba/_gnod par 'dod pa/_phan par mi 'dod pa gdayin pa de la phan par byas so/_/_byed do//byed par 'khyil/
[1/2 ]ro zhis sdonagyi 'khon dang 'brel ba las/_'das pa dang /_da lta ba dang ma 'das pa gsum gyi rnam par rtog pas rtson bsu rjes dpyod kyi khyad paralas/_gnod byedal shinatumasdug pa zhe sdadagi sems/_'khon 'dzin yang yang dran/

khad khro'i sems/_de la shin tu mi bzod pa nga rgyal gyi sems/_bsadan dang brdeg naci ma rung snyamapa 'khu ba'i sems/_do tsha dang nyisadamigs b+hil gyis non pa gtimug gi semasate chos la dad ldan pa nyid yinano/_/phyogs mthunani/_phan par mi dga' zhing 
ngan pa 'du ba dang /_bzad po dang 'bral bar bsgom ba'o//log par blta ba ni yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur to/gzhi phyin ci ma log pa rgyu 'bras kyitshos nges par mi bslu banyid la/_bsam pa phyin ci log dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu nemed da    
snyam du nges par sems ba'i log lta dang /_rtag chad du blta ba'o//phyogs mthun banichos dang gang zag khyad pa can la zhe sdang ba dang /_rmongs pa gang dag dge sdig gi 'bras bumathong chos su ma smin/_las stobs po che bsags pa'i gad zag la la re [13o]
zhig bde 'gror skyes so zer de lta bus las 'bras la 'den namami bden nam snyam pa byed ba mang ba de'ang rgyu 'bras la log par blta ba'i phyogs mthun du 'gyur ro
//dazhi de dag gi 'bras bu bshad pa/_kun la 'bras bu bzhi bzhir smin pa'i tshul/_/
rnam smin rgyu mthun dbang dang byed pa las//_zhes yul mi dge ba dang /_kun slong mi dge ba dang /_bsam sbyor mi dag pas bskyed pasanarnam bar smin pa dang /_rgyumathun pa dang /_dbang dam bdag po'i 'bras bu ste gsum po'i steng du/_man dag gis byed 
ba'i 'bras bu bsnan te bzhi yod pa las/_phyogs dang po bshad pa'i phyir/_rnamasmin 'bras buchos lnga ldan namamin//kun slong gsum gyi chud dus dud 'gro dang //'phred gi yi dwagasachinapos dmyal bar 'phen//'di ltar yi dge ba'i las de dag 

[#| ]@#/_/kun nas slong ba'i sems dang /rjesasu spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang /sbyor ba'i gzhi bsam ba de nyid dang /_sbyor ba'i 'bras bu dngos gzhi nyid spyad pa dang /_mjug rjes su yi rab ste chos lda'i yan lag dang ldanan mi dge ba'i las de mthar phyin pa 
Ardzogs pa yin la/_de'ang chu ba'i nyinamos gsum gyi kun slong drug gis de dang rjes sumathun pa'i las lam bcu po rdzogs par byed pa'i tshulachos mdon ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa las/_gsod dang gnod sems tshig rtsub dag/_zhe sdang gis ni mtharaphyin 
byed//log g.yem brnab sems ma byin len//chags pa yis ni mthar phyin byed//log par blta ba gti mug gas//lhag ma gsum gyisadzugs par 'dod/tsasos//dol kun slong gi sgo nas bzhugan zhe sdod la brten pa rnamasakyis ni dmyal [13|]

go/'bring gis ni yi dwags rnams su skye'o

nyi_dpasu log par khu yi'a'i nang nam nus pa'o//

@#/_yid/[j]21po g.yog nganazhinga'adums par dka' ba dang[\]\]]tshig bzungami'o[w]yid chesazhin pa dang*/_mi snyanamang thos 'khrubamo'i tshig tu 'dul//chog mi shes dang 'dod pas gdung pa dang /_gnod pa 2du zhing yanapa 'grul ba dang//

gu pa sbyong[s]phudad /_mchims ma bcas pa dag[.y]yang //'khor lo'i daphyonani mi 'byung ngo /_/_zhes so//de bzhin*nyan thos rang lam nas nyon mongs pa'i dgra sde mtha' dag bcom pa'idagra bcomapa yada'atshoba'i yul du ngomi thogs /_bden pa

@#/_/dbang gis mkhas pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang /phrag dog gi dbang gis bden pa'i tshig lasmyud pa/_phyogs sa kyi dbang gis chos la dgag bsgrub bgyis parnams so//mchims med lnga'i nang nas khrag 'byin pa dang /_mi dge bcu'i 
nang nas log lta dang /_mnyam ba'i chos la khyad du gsod pa/rang bzhin med ba la gal 'dzugs pa ste/bzhitshan re re bzhin log pa dang/_nyams pa dang /_smadapa da /_skur ba'i lci bzhes rim bzhin sbyar ro//log pa brgyudani/_dge ba lasmad pa/_sdig
[# ]pa la bstod pa dge ba can dkrugs pa/dad pa can gyi tshogs bcag pa/_bla ma dang /_yi dam dang /mtsho lcam spangs pa/_dkyil 'khor gnyan po 'bral ba rnams so//_khyad por byang chub sems dpa' la brten pa'i nyis pa nibazod par dka' ste/dad stob/[ 137]
bskyed ba phyag rgya'i mdo las/_phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad btson du bcug pa las/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i gang zag la khros te rgyab bstan ba sdig pache'o/_/_chu bo gang+ga'i bye ma'i rdul grangs dang mtshungs pa'i mchod rten bshig 
ba bas/_byang chubasems dpa' la gnodasems dang khong khro ba dang /_tshig nad skur pa btab pa rnams sdig pa lce'o/_/zhes dang /rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi mdo las kyang /_'dzamaM bu'i gling gi sems can thams cadakyisrog gcad dam/_kacha 
'phrog pa las/_byang chub semasaba'adud 'gro'i rigs la zan changs gcigastor ba'i bar chad bgyis pa'i sdig pa stobasache'o gsungs/_de bzhin du tshogs kyi sgos kyad sems can thams cad btson nas bton to 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_chos

pa'i bde ba la bkod pa bsakyang /_byang chub sems dpa' la bsngags pa cung zad cig brjod pa bsod nams tshe zhes gsus/_nyi[p]'ang 'jug pa las/_nyan thos sangasargyas 'bring rnams thub dbang skyes/_/sangasargyas byang chubasems dpa' las 
yang /_skangajo'asems dang gnyis su med blo dang /_/byang chubasems ni rgyal sras rnamasakyi rgyu/_/zhes nyan rang gnyis sas rgyas la brten nas byung zhing /_/sangs rgyas byang chub kyi sems las byung ba dang /_snyidarje dang /_stong nyid dang /_byang chub kyi sems 
mtha' dag de'i rgyu yin par bstan pas so/_/de'ang rten gyi sgronas byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa las byang chub sems pa rab byung 'phags pa rin po phung po'i mdor/_byang sems khyim pasemar khu rgya mtsho tsam la sdong bu ri rab tsam btsugs nas [138]
mar me phul ba saM/_byang sems rab byung gis mar me'i snying po 'bru mar gyis bskus pa mchod par phul ba phan yon che zhes gsungs/_rgyu des gang gi spobs pa sasargyas kyis ma gtogs gzhan gang gisakyang zil gyis mi non pa'i byang chubasems 
dpa' sems dpa' chen po li tsa ba   dri med grags pas kyang bstan pa latshe ba bzhago pa'i phyir nyan thos rnams la thog mar phyag byas nas gdod phyir mi ldog pa'i chosakyi 'khor lo'i gtam gyis nyan thos chen pornams dang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig
gis thogs pa byams pa lta bu'i yang spobs pa zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta na'ang sdom pa gsumaka rdzogs shing mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa'i skyes bu dam pa rtagasakyimangon rtogs rang bzhin med par zhig pa rnams la ni dpyad par bya [ |]

[1|| ]@#/_ba'i gnas du ma yod do//de'i phyir yul dgonamachog dang /_pha ma la brten pa dang /_bsam pa nyonamos pa drag pos kun nas bslas pa dang /bsod nams ma yin pa la rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_'gyod tshangs kyi gnyen po medapa 
thal sogs pa 'di dag ni las 'dag tshul bzhi yod pa'i nang nas thachadapamyong bas 'dag pa kho na yin te/_de'ang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis/_mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la//myong 'gyur lasogs nges rnam gsum//_zhes dgo slong lhas 
phyin sangs rgyas la khong 'khrugs bzhin par sa gzhigs pa me dpud du 'bar ba'i rum du lhung nas dmyal bar song ba'i mthong chos myong gyur dang /_tsana'i yul du bstan pa thog mar byung ba'i ngos las 'bras la skur pa btab pas skyes bu de nyidamal 
[\] 39]
na nyal bzhin par sbrul du song ba'i gtam rgyud dang sngon byung du dge 'dun la bud med yin zhes byas pas der mtshan 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i mthong chos myong spyi dang*
/_gnyid skye ba brgyar bud med kyi lus blangs paM/_lan grangs gzhan la myong 'gyur 
ya_gnyis ka tshang ba dang ngan song du skye nges kyi los yodanatsho de la sbyor lam bzod pa tsam yang 'thob mi nus/_'dod khams su skye nges kyi las yodazhachags bral gyi 'bras bu mi thob 'khor bar skye nges kyi las shig yidan tsho der 'khor ba las 
grol mi nus par bshad pas/_soms nyid rtogs pasachog las 'bras mi dgos so zhesanam yang smra b.ram byed cig rtogs so snyam pa de kam rtogs pa'i rtags yinato/_sems nyid ma rtogs pas las 'brasami dgas sa snyam ba'i tshad 

la skyes pa'o//rin chen phreng ba las/_las kyi 'bras bu med ces pa//mdor named par blta ba nyid/_/bsod nams ma yin nganasongab//_zhes bshad pa ltar ro//dge sdig gnyis kyi 'bras bu smin pa snga phyi'ang /_stobs gang che ba de sngon la smin pa nyid 
la _bsam na 'chi khar dag sgrig gi sems gang dang nye ba de thog mar sminano/_/de gnyis ka mnyamanargyun du gang la goms shugasache ba de sngon la smin/_goms shugs kyang 'dran bsags pa'i snga phyi ltar smin pa yin te/mdzod las/_las kyi 
'khor bar me gang dang //ra ba gang dang gang goms pa/_/ston pas gang yin de dag las/_/_snga ma snga ma smin par 'gyur //_zhes so//mdor bstun/_mtha' gcig tu dkar ba'i las dang /
ga[ g ,]mtha' gcig tu gnag pa'i las dang /_
ན་གང་མས་ད་མཐའགཉིསཀ་ལམ་ཐུག་བ་ མཐའ་གཞིས་ཀ་ལ་མ་ཐག་
T 145
མཐར་ཐུག་གི་བར་ཐམས་ཅད་དགེ་སེམས་ཁས་མིག་ནི་མདམ 
འཛེས་སྨཞིའས་ཏེ་གསུམ་དུ་གནས་པ་ལས། དང་པོ་ནི། གཞི།བསམ་པ།སྦྱོར་བ།
sems 'da'azhig gis zin cing dge ba dang ma 'dres pa'o//_gsum pa la mu gnyis te/_las dkaralarnamasmin gzhag pa dang*/_las gnag la rnam smin dkar ba'o//dang po ni/gzhan 'byor phun tshogs lami bzod cing /_bdag gi phyogos 'ba' zhig rgyal 
ba'i gnas thob mang po'i sreg 'gags pa la'ang ji mi snyam pas g.yul sprod pa'i jus rom lta bur mchod sbyin gyi rim pa chen po gtong ba la bu ste/_dolani rnam smin dang bdag babs gnyis ka spug bsngal du 'byin zhing /_rgyu mthun gyi 'bras buratsho 

za[ | ]@#/_/thung ba dang longs spyod che ba'i 'bras bu da'adzag 'dres marasminano/_/gnyis pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba la sbyaran/_dadapon snying chen posatshod ba brgya phrag duma'i srog skyob pa'i phyir minag mdung thung can bsad pam rnam smin gyi 'bras

'thad par sbyod pani rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drimad 'od kyis legs par bkag zin to[i]/yongs grub la gnyis te/_'gyur ba med bang /_phyin ci ma log pa'o/_/dang po ni/_'diltar 'khrul pa'o/_/'di ltar ma 'khrul ba'o zhes pa'i gnas skabs gnyis su 
med par chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid rang chas su ldan pa'i stong pa nyid de/_dus gsum snga phyi med par mi 'gyur ba gshisakyiganas lugs dam ba'o/_/de la dgosastod pa dang /_gzhan gyis stong ba dang /_gnyis kas stod pa rnam pa 
gsum gzhag ste/_rang gis stong bzhi chos gang dang gang yin ba de'i 'dabazhin 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/gzhan gyis stong ba tshos dol chos gzhan med pa'i chanas btags pa'o/_/gnyis kas stong ba ni chos gang la gnyis su med pa'o/_/_gnyis pa ni/_ji lta [1146]

!_tshor ba myong bde ba 'dod pa'i mi dang /'bring gis 'dod pa'i khams kyi lhar skye ba yin la/dge ba'i lam bcu po shin tu stebs chenades 'then khyad byasanas/_ra skye ba'i rgyu chos pa'i gnas pa gzhidangs de pa'i tidad 'dzin goms pa las khams gongam gnyis su

1la du yod pas gnyid 'thug po leg pa'i gnas skabs lta bu las dge ba byed pa yang med la/_mi dge ba yang dngos su byed pa med kyang rang sa'i gti mug gisams bskyed pa'i phyir/_da gis gti mug ni stobs chen po gsog pa yinano/_/_'i phyir bsam 
lcagatan gzugs med kyisems de snga ma'i dge 'bras yin kyang bsod namasacha mthunakyi dgab yinapa'i phyir 'dasazhi tsha 'pho la/ngob lung ma bstan yin pa'i phyir ro/_/_mi'i lus rten las shadapa nga thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob pasan lha bas lhag pa'i

de nyid thur ba mthun gyi dge ba dang 'brel pas nges par legs pa la sbyor ba'i tshul yang spyir rigs yod pa la dge rtsa phra mos bon

da /
ngan 'gro la sogs sdug bsngal gyi yul dang sprod pa'i mi dge ba gnyis rang bzhin med par shes pa las srid pa'i rgyu zag pa dang bcas bkun las rnam par grol ba'i dge ba ni thar pa'i rgyur gyur ba kho na ste

za /_/gzugs med sbyin sogs drug_/tshogs sbyor mthong sgrom mi slob lam lngas bsdus/_/'di ltarakun rdzob bden pa'i phyogs bsod nams kyi tshogs dge ba'achung /_

pa'i she ba bcu nga /_bsam gtan bzhi dang/

//_//_zhes gsungs so//_'ang bdag med rtogs pa'i shes ba dang /thabs snying rje chen po kho na la 
ba 'jig rten 'das pa'i dge ba yin/_/_thabs shes zunga'abrel dge ba gser 'gyur rtsis
srid ngazhibar 'gal ba'i lcags khams la
thebs bas mi gnas ye shes rgyal ba'i khams
[\[So\] ]
'di ltar nyan rang gi lugs ltar gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med la dmigs pa tshan ma yin par nang du byed pa'i skyes bu sbrul bas yul ru bzhin med par shes pa'i gzung ba chos kyi bdag med dang //thub 
གསུམ་དང་བྲལ་བའི་སྟོང་བ་ཉིད་དུ་བྱང་ཤར་པའི་འཛིན་པ་ཆོས་ཀྱི་བདག་མེད་ཀྱི་ཐབས་ཀྱི་ཆ་ཐམས་ཅད་ལ་རྒྱས་ཐེབས་པས་ཐ་དད་པའམ
། shes bya skye 'gag gnas 
bsod nams ma yin pa'i blo las grol pas
གཉིས་པམ་ཡིན་པའི་ཐབས་ཤེས་ཟུང་འབྲེལ་གྱི་དགེ་བ་ནི་གསེར་འགྱུར་གྱི་རྩི་ལྟ་བུ་སྟེ་དགེ་བ་སྤྱོད་དུས་ཉིད་ནས་བསེད་མས་དང་
dngos po dang rang mtshan du 'dzin pa'i cha nas srid pa dang zhi bar 'gal ba'i lcags khams la thebs pas
'jig rten las 'das ba'ig ba yin te/_khri brgyad stod pa las/_/_
mi gnas pa'i ye shes rnam ba thums cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer gser gling nas rdomi rnyed pa lta bur 'jug pa ni 
pha rol tu phyin pa pha po'ang rnam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas zin pa de'i tshornam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen po 'jug par 'gyur te

ka_
@#/ _/_da_ga thamasacad//thub pas shes rab don du gsungs//_zhes pa ltar ro//de lta bu'i tshogs gnyis zung du 'brel ba'i sa bon las thung ba'i 'bras bu bslu ba med pa ni/_lam dus dmigs par bcas pa bsod namasatshogs//dmigs 
med ye shes tshogs te zung 'jug gis/_/_sgrib pa gnyis sbyang sku gnyis mngon du 'thob/_/dag pa'i rgyu 'bras zab mo'i tshon 'khril lags//'di ltar thag pa dang bcas pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam pa lnga dang /_zag pa med pa'/

shadrug
[1 #/]thams cad kyi byed las dang rten gzhi ni/_thar pa cha mthun gyi dge ba'i ngo bo lam bden bral rgyus bcas pa yin pas bag chags snatshogs pa'i kun gzhi la brten bang /_bral 'bras ni/_dbazhin med babam/_snying po'i steng na brten pas 'pho 'gyur med pa'i

ka _@#/_/byAste brten pa byar med pa'i mi skye ba shes pa dang /_zhes bden pa bzhi lan gsum du bzlos te gsungs ba las/_de la sdug bsngal shes pa bya bani[》]gnas rigs drug bodama' 'amamatho yang rung /_/sdug bsngal 'gyur dang khyab pa 'du byed

zos pasasrin yo bar la sa pa lta bu'o/_/gsum pa ni/_'jam dug bod du song na phyisad 'du byed cing /_btsan po dang/_gdonachen po sogs la gnod pa byas bas sa gnod lan 'du byed par gdon mi za ba ltar/_rnam ba kun tu nyon mos btsan gyi yid

thar pa'i goskabasadang shul ma rgyal pa'i khri mun lta bu'o//yang nas yang du 'byung bas rgya mtsho'i rlabs lta bu'o/_/bde 'gro'i srog 'joms pas dug ha laha la lta bu'o/_/zhesas/_de'ang 'dod pa dang yul gnyis phan tshun rten dang brtenab lta bur 'brel nas bslu ba'i

gyur pa bad du thogs/_pho nya ru gyur pa bza' zhingamur/_ma khyir skyes nas lta rus 'cha' ba la 'jog pa gzigs pas/_pha sha bza' zhing ma la brdeg_/_las ngan dgra bo pad du khur/_/chung mas khyo yi rus pa 'cha'/_/'khor ba'i chos la gdamo_//zhes 
dge slong dag dperan skyes bu 'ga' zhig spyis chen po 'di la rgya shug gi tshigu tshamagyi ri lu thogs te/_'di ni bdag gi ma'o/_/'di'i bdag gim de'i[ 16o]
nas yang du nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sdug bsngalakyang /_/bcom ldan 'dasakyis/_
yang ma'o zhes 'dor bar byed na/_dge slong dag sa chen po 'di'i 'dzi bani/_chos sdur zad par 'gyur gyis/_mi rnams kyim brgyud pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes nga smra'o/_/zhes gsungs pa'i don slob dpon 'bags bsama'i thug mtha' la sogs ba tshogs 
su bcad pa ltar ro/_/rnam pa tha dad pa'i lus yang dang yang du 'dor ba'i nyes pa'i dbang du byas nas spyir bstan pa/_rdul phran lta bu'i lus kyi bdag gcig bu'i/_/srog rten gags su gyurd 'dod pa'i phyir/_/mgo dang yan lag gcadagatsugamachis so 
cog_/spungs na lhun po'i tshe thang nyams par gyur/_dmyal gnas zangs zhun kholam 'thungs ba dang /_/_yi gas lusagyur rnag khrag/_mi gtsang zos/_/kunatu sdug bsngal rgyu las_chimazags/_/_phyogs mtha' gtugs pa'i chu klung dag las mang /

ka _@#/_/de skad du dran pa nyer gzhag gis gsal bar ston te/_dge slong dag srid pa'i khams laskyo bar gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba gang gi tshe/_/grog sbur du skyes te ra ba'i lus kyang gcig tu bsngo 
late phung por byasan ri'i rgyal po ri rab bsakyangaches mtho zhing /_sa pa'i mtshima'ang rgya mtshobazhi'ichu bas lhag go_/ngamyal ba dang yi dwags su gyur ba de'i tshe lan gros med dpag med pa zhig 'thungs pa'i zangs zhun khol ma dang /_khrag dang /
bded gdirta _chuser dang*/_rnag dang*/_bar skabs kyang 'di ltar gling bzhi'i nang nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung bzhi las mang zhing /_'dod padag gi phyir mgo dang /_mig dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag bcad pa'ang gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi khams nas dang /[ 161]
[# ]chu dang*/_me dang /_rlung gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad las 'das pa'i grangs dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/zhes so//da nyi 'gro drug so so'i ngas pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i nyes pa bstan pa'i phyir dmyal banas rim par bshad pa/_khyad par 
wangamyal ba'i sdug bsngal tshad med do/_/_phan tshun gcig gis gcig gsod yangasas la//thig nag sog les gshog 'byor rgyun mi 'chad/[_\u0f7c]bsdus 'joms mgo brtan ni dang tho bas 'thug_/_du 'bod lcags zhun bskol bar 'tshod cing dbang //
kyi _
rnag 'bod sgrog chen po lags khyim 'bar bar bsreg_/_tsho ba gsalashing 'bar bas lus la 'bigs//rab tu tsha ba mdung thudatse gsum pas/_/_lus kyi gzhung 'bigs phyi nas lcags bsregs dkri_/_khro chu khol mar 'tshad dang mnar med ni_/lcags 

lcags kyi mdag me 'bar ba'i steng du phan tshun dgra mi sha bo mthong ba bzhin las las byung ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs pas yan lag dang nying lag gtsodacing brdeg
khyim 'bar bar me dang gnyis med bsreg_/ces 'dems te/de la dmyal ba yang sos zhes bya ba ni/
a byedapas shi ba dang /_rnamakha' nas yang es par gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra gragam thag sos nas sngar bzhin sdug bsngal lo/_/_'tsho tshad dran pa nyer gzhag las/_sems can dmyal ba yang sos pa dag gi mi rnams kyi lo bye ba phrag 'bum dang /_yang drag 
khri dang /_stong phrag gnyis kyi bar du thub ste/_zhes dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhug pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las/_mi gang yi ni gsad pa dang /_/gzhan yang bskyed nas gsad byed pa/_/_de dag nges bar yang sos 'gro_/gang gi phyir na lo steng phrag_/_mang por yangani [\[i62]
denayod pa'i skyes bu gnod pa byed pa rnamasakyis re dbyibs sna tshogs ba dag gi gsebatu bcug 
da dgatu/_/btags shing brtags shing yang 'tsho bas/_/de phyir yang sos yin par bshad/_/ces so/_/wiganag ni gcod pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis mnar bste/_
nas lus la thig drangs te shing bzhin du gshegacid brko bar byed/_pral nas yad 'byar bar byed do/_tsho tshad mi la bye ba phrag sa ya nyis 'bum dang /_yang dgu khri/_drug stong rtsa bcu gnyis so/_/deskad du sngam las/_bam dang ni grogasangaganyen//bshes 
gtan lani 'alu byed dang /_bramadzun ni smra ba'i mi/_/thig nagartani 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang phyir de la de bzhin du/_/thig nag btab nas sog le dang /_/'bar ba yis ni gshag byed de/_/de phyir thogazhag yin par bshad/_/ces so/_/bsdus 'jomasani

@#_/_/'thag pa'i 'khrul 'khor can te/_brag ri srog chags mgo brnyan can sna tshogs pa'i gseb tu 'chir ba dang /_de bzhin du lcags kyi 'tshor du padachen pos 'chir zhing /_steng nas rdo chen po'i ljid kyis de'i lus sa gzhi la gdungs par

dang |/blama'i rdzas 'phrog sdug bsngal byas/_/gang dag gtams pa 'phrog byed pa/_/de dag du 'bodachen por 'gro//mes bsreg bani dag phyird/_ngu 'bod pa ya che phyir dang /_/_lci zhing chab nyid kyi phyir//deningu 'dachen po yin//ces so//che ba ni/_lcags kyi gsal
shing 'bar bas lus kyi gzhung 'bigs shing klad par thal 'byin la/_dbang po'i sgo dang ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me 'byung ba'o/_/yang sla nga rab tu 'bar bar bsreg pa dang //lcags ky-igazhikun nas 'bar ba la gan rgyal du bsnyal nas lcags kyi tho ba 'bar 
bas brdung ba'o/_/_tsho tshad ni mi lo bye ba phrags ya brgyad dang /_yang bzhi 'bum dang /_bye ba phrag khrig phrag drug stong lnga brgya dang sum cu'i bar ro/_/rab tu tsha ba ni/_mdung rtse gsum pas rgyab rol nas btab pas rtse dbus ma klad par thal 'byin la/_lhagam [ 1 164]
gnyis po ni phrag gong gnyis su 'then pa dang /_yang lcagasakyi lebam me 'bar bas lus thams cad la dkri ba dang _/_lcags zas kun tu 'bar bang tsha sgo'i chu bskol ba'i nad du khaspubatu 'dzud par byed pas pags pa du sha khrag 'thor nas rus gong dkar

[% ]pa bzhin/_sha dang /_chu rgyus dang /rus pa dang /_rkang gi bar du zhen nas mar mesnying bo la zhen pa'am/_lcags bsreg dasol ma mi byed pa bzhin 'di dag ni sems can no//'di dag ni me'o zhes dbye bar mi nus pa mo'i phung bo gcig gi klong nas 'o dod 'bod

@#/_/_po bcong rongami bzod pa can gyi ltos//khachar dang rlung thubs pa'i bu yug gis rab tu sbres pa'i gnas mun nag 'thibs par/_mes mimatshon pa'i lhags pa'i rig byarnonatan gyis sbrus pa'i gting phug par phyin pas lus kum kum par gyur te 
བསྒུལ་བསྐྱོད་ཀྱི་གནས་སྐབས་ལས་ཐལཀྱང་། ད་དུང་སྡུག་བསྔལ་གྱི་ཚོརབ་ལརྣམ་བར་ཤེས་པ་འཐོགསནས་གསོན་པའི་གནས་སྐབསུ་ལས་མི་ཡོལ་བའོ།jསོ་སོའི་ཁྱད་པར་དབྱེ་བནི་ཚཅནས་ཆུ་བུར་བརྡོལ་བང༌།།མཆུའི་སྨྲེ་སྔགས་ཀྱི་ཤུདས་འཐམསརྙན།
ut+pa la ltar pags pa drug tshol 'gas//pad+ma dang ni pad+machen po ltar//brgyad dang bcu drug gras med gas pa'i rma//srog chags mchunon can gyis 'jigs shing bza'//zhes 'doms pa las chu bur cananiha cang grang ches pas lusachu bur gyis gang ba dang /_de [73]

zhing /_kha cigasmon gyi dge baphra mos longs spyod dang ldan yang /_mi brtan zhing dus tshogs log pa dang /_yul yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_'tsho ba dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_bkres skom dang tshod mdangs 'phrog pa la brtson zhing pha rol 'ba' zhig la gnod 
pa bsgrub pas slad kyi sdug bsngal 'du byed pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis song yang lam 'phrang du bsrung bar snang ba dang /_

ba dang /_
rang yang gnad 'chad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba desartag par gdung bas dend pa gzhan la sbe ba'i bsam sbyor ngan ba dang 
/_rang tshan gyi lus sgo lta bu dang /_sa ga lta bu dang /mgal dum lta bu nye tshe ba'i sdug bsngalangamatshungs ba'am/_khyi dang bya 

ka _bya@#/_/_la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs par yod la/_bzhin gyi bde ba dang longs spyod de la sdug bsal du 'char ba dang*/_sngar bshad pa'i phyin ci log bzhi'i snang ba thun mong du 'char ba'ang yod pas gshin rje'i 'jig rten du song nas sdug 
bsngal ba zhes bya'o/_/dazhi dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal bstan pa'i phyir/_bshes spring las/_dud 'gro'i skye gnasanayang gsod pa dang*/_/bcings dang brdeg sogs sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/_/_zhi gyur dge ba spang pa rnams la ni//gcig la gcig za shin tumi 
bton gsashing rto_'bad pa//zhes pa la spyir bstanapa dang /_khyad par gyi sdug bsngal gnyis su dbye pa las/dang po ni dranapa nyer bzhag las dbye bsumacu rtsa bzhir bstan kyang kha 'thor dang /_bying gnas gnyis su bsdu ba'i kha 'thor ba la'adami dang mi yin pas byas pa'i[ 15]
[# ]dbang du byas na/_spyir gsod pa nyid du gcig kyang gsod lugasakyi sdug bsngalache chung kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa na bsari dwags mtha' la gzur ba dang /_kla klo'i sde rigs kyis gsen par pags pa bshubadad /mes bsreg pa dang /_dngul chul

[# ]mnar zhing spyod pa dang /_thag pa la sogs pas 'tshir dad med ltar 'phrod pa dang /_lcags dang dbyug pa la sos pas khrims pazhin du brdeg pa dang /_de bzhin du sna dbug ba dang /_bya gcod pa dang /_khal 'gel ba dang /_bzhon par spyod pa dang [1\]]rma 

zhing bkol ba dang /_gson khrag 'byin pa dad/_bal 'thog ba dang /_'dod pa bsrung ba la sogs ba'i sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba'o/_/rang gi rigs las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du byasan/_las brgya par chu srin dpag tshad nyis stong bdun brgya ba'i 
lus su bshad pa la chung ba rnams kyis 'jigs shing sa mtha' dag za bas mtshon nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba spangs parnams ni gcig la gcig za zhing /_/_tsha grang bkres skom 'tshopa 'ba' zhig gis 'jigs shing nyam thag pas gling bar mun 
nag gi rgya mtshor gnas pa dang*/_chu gter bzhi'i khyon la gnas_pa'i byis gnas kyi dud 'gro rnams kyi sdug bsngalakyang bzod par dka' ba nyid do/_/gnyis pa ni snga ma las/_khacig mu tig bal dang rus pa dang //_sha dang pags pa'i ched du gsod par 'gyur/[ 186]
dbang med gzhan dag rdog pa lag pa dang/_/_lcag dang lcags kyu btab pas btab ste bkolo/_/zhes mu tig gi phyir 'tshib nyawishes da /_rus pa'i phyir 'chi ba blad po che dang /_sha'i phyir 'chib ri dgas dad ra lug la sogs pa dang /_pags pa'i phyir 'chi 
ba gcan gzan rnams dang /_dbang med du rtog pas bkol brta la sogs pa dang lag bas btab ste bkol ba ma he la sogs pa dang /_lcag gis bkol ba bod bu la sogs dang /_lcags kyus bkol ba glang po che la sogs gzhan dbang 'ba' zhig gi

[\[]sbyin byed mi/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klur skye'o/_(gtong zhing khro dang dregs pa yis//namamakha' lding gi dbang phyugache/_/rang gi lus dang ngag yid kyi//sdig pa'i lasan gang byas pa//de ni dud 'gror skye pasan/_/de nichud yang ma byed cig_/ces so//de

tshang ba'i lus rten lta bas lhag pa 'di yang /_'babachuganod pa can gyis chu lon bshig pa bzhin du glo bur du med par gyur nas yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal la spyod pa'i phyir skyeb bzlog pa'i thabs 'ba' zhig bsam pa'i tshul de

@#/_/_la sogs pa rags parnams med kyang /gzugs med pa'i gnas skabs kyi bde ba zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin de las zad pa dang sad pa'i gnas skabs thob nas 'chi 'pho ban yang srid pa phyi ma'i spug bsngal 'du byed pas skye ba dang /_/
mtshas ris la sogs gzugs khams 'bras bu che ba'i bar gyi lha rnams kyang 'chi ba'itshe bsam gtan las thob pa'i 'de ba de 'gyur nas srid pa phyi ma la 'jug pa'i sdug bsngal la spyod pa'i phyir klu'i dbang pos/_tshangs ris la sogs bsam gtan

gnyis shitarta _
ba chen po'i gnasaskabs 'thob par 'gyur//zhes riganya' shing 'dzin gyi sa zlar gdugs lta bur gyur nas gling bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad kyi mun ba gsal bar zhus ba'i snang byed chen po nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis po'i rten gzhal med khang ba'i 'od kyis cizhig

ka [ P ]@#/_/'jig rten thams cad bde ba kham 'ga' la sred srid par byed/_/ces so//lha'i gnas rigs de dag gi rgyu 'bras kyang /_/dran pa nyer bzhag las btus par//gang zhig bdag med mi 'dod cing //yos su bzung la mi dga' ba/[j]di ni zab rnamasadag/

go brgyud 
lag gtubs pasalhamin mnar//'di ltar lham yinarnams la niyong bzhin gyis snyems pa'i nga rgyal yod pas na nyonamos pas kunanas nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_khyad par lta'i dpal la sdang ba'i phrag dog gis yid gdung zhing lha dang 

g.yul 'gyed pa'i sdug bsngal yod do//rgyugang gisan dran pa nyer gzhaganas ni 'dzam bu'i gling brnamasakyis bsod nams ma yin pa'i las stobs chen po bsags pa dang /_sa sde las nelharnams lha min gyi bumo la blta ba'i phrag dog dang /_lha min 
rnams kyis lha'i bdud rtsi la chags pa'i dbang gis dad/_mdo gzhan dag lasani'i dpag bsam gyi shing me tog dang 'bras bus brgyan pamathong nas khros te/_nga ba'i dbal phun sumatshogs pa'i lha'i dbang du gyuran/_rtsa ba bdag cag gi gnas su donamed 
do zhes sta res gcod par byed pa las rtsod pa 'byung bar ston to//de la dad por srid sngas sor bcad nas 'thab pa'i dga' bo dang nyor dga' la sogs dkar bo'i phyogasakyi klu brgyad dang /_hu lud [\] ]hu lukachen po segasanag phyogs pa brgyud 'thab cing rtsod pa [ 196]
las gang rung gcig bam ba arang rang gi phyogs la gnas pa'i bar snang gi lhadag \u0f97no/_/_sbrun nas 'thabs pa de'atshonag phyogasakyiklu mnachumatshamasakyi sgra gcan yang sbrunas 'thub bo//gdadu sgra gcan rgyal bar gyuran gar phyogs kyi klad 
bar snang gi lhas rgyalachen rigs bzhi'i dpung rnams sbran te/_de dag gi sde ris thams cad chasra ba gyon nas 'grub pa las/_lham yin gyi dbu rnams pham par gyur ba tshe/_dka' phreng gi gnasasamagul phreng can yong lham yin gyi dbung dod 
phyogs gcig 'thag labakyad khams thags bzas ris la sgronano/[\] @]tsho thags bzangasaris khrosanas gser gyi sa gzhi la rkang pa brdabs pas sachen po 'di g.yo zhing rig khyad 'khul la/_lha'i dbang po'i stan ya g.yo'o//der dbang pos bsam

/bsed namasam yib rlabs po che'i las mthun pa'am/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po 
ka _@#/_/_pa/_ci 'di kharas g.yo ba'i rgyu ni byang chub sems dpa' sa nas sar 'phagasasam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul bas 'jig rten du cho 'phrul mdzod dam
lha gang dgache'i lhag mar gyur cing 'tshe ba'i las bdag gis byed pa'i dus la bab pa rnams rang gnas

su 'jug cig/de las gzhan ba rnams g.yul gyi bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/

_ba'i sdug bsngal dang /'du byed kyi sdug bsngal to rtsa ba'i sdugo bsngalachen po gsum/_skyob dang rga ba dang /na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /ngag+gami sdug pa dang phrad pa dang |_gnyen sdug pa dang bral ba dang*/'dod pa thog tum_phyin pa dang /_nye bar len pa'i phung po lhas

sdug bsngal gyi mchen nyid 'dzinabasarnam pa brgyad kyis rtagatumanarab las/sdugabasngal gyi sdug bsngal bshad pa'i phyir/'tsho ba chu bur lta bur g.yo ba yi//mi dge yid mi bde dang 'khrugs pa sogs//_sdug bsngal snga mas phyis nye bar len/_/mdzicanathol 
gyi thog turmas gtugs bzhin/_/'diltar skyes bu shes ldan dag ni sngon bskal pa bzang por gyur pa dang*/_sgra mi snyan la sogs pa'i mi'i 'gro ba gzhan la ltos nalho gling 'di'i da lta ba'i gnas skabs 7rma'i snyigs ma chu'i sbrul ltar mi rtag pa dala'ang 
rang bzhin gyi skyo ba'iphrag bsngal dang mi 'bral ba'i steng /_glo bur du nad dang /_gdon dang /_dgra dang /_'byung ba'i gnod pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal du mas brtsegs pachos can/de lta na'ang phal cher ma brtags pa nyid kyi phye phyima'i gnas skabs mthong ba la [202]

dugacan gyi/_/bza' bsarnam parasmra bab dka' thub lus/_/mig 'phrul lta bur thob 'du 'gyur ba can//skyes bu gang zhig skyed mos tshal lam/_khang bzangs la sogs pa'i nang du rtsed 'jo dang glu gar gyis bag phebs pad ba'i mod la gyur pa'am/_spyir ba las

khadon gnyam par
_དག་པའི་གནོད་པས་གཟིར་བའི་སྡུག་བསྔལ་མྱོང་།།ཞུགས་པའི་བདུན་ཕྲག་དང་པོ་ནམེར་མེར་གྱི་རྒྱུ་བ་དཨཆུའི་རྣམ་པ་ལྟ་བུའོ།།གཉིས་པར་ནུར་ནུར་བོ་བལ་སྣབས་ཀྱི་རྣམ་པ་ལྟ་བུའོ།།གསུམ་པར་ལྟར་ལྟར་པོ་མཛུབ་མོའི་རྣམ་བ་ལྟ་བུའོ།།བཞི་པརམཁྲུང་གྱུར་སྒོ་ pos

gcong bcer bas 'gags/_/rab tu dog pa'i mun nag 'khrigs par 'jug pa yi/_/mal gnas dmyal blta bu'i nang du de 'gasanas/_/lus yos bskyems la sdug bsngal chen po mnag dgos so//ces so/_/de'ang khye'u rnams nima'i glo g.yams kha nang du

E% ༄༅། །རམབརྟནཆམི་བྱེད་པ་ཙམ་དུ་སྡུག་བསྔལ་བའི་ལངས་སྤྱོད་དང་ལྡན་བ་ཉིད་དེ། ཤི་ཀླུ་ལེ་ཁར།དེ་ནི་རིམ་གྱིས་ཏིལ་མར་བཅིར་དཔྱདསྲ་བ་ཡིས།། ཙིར་བ་ལྟར་བྱས་དེགས་ཇི་ཞིག་ལྟ་སྟེ་བཙས། འོན་ཀྱང་དེ་སྲོག་ཡོད་ལམི་འདོར་གང་ཡིན་པ།
ga _
[I ]sdug bsngal nye bar spyad pa'i rnam par mtho btsam med//ces so//de nas mngal gnas rlon pa dkris pa'i sran mi bzod ba de la regam thag pags pa bshus pa lta bu'i sdug bsngal dang /_khrus byas dus sha rjen zug rngu'i tshor ba shin tu gtsong ba la mtho

brgya _
bzhin du rmos dngam[a]nyams bar[)]/'du shes 'khrugs pa'i mal du shin tu 'khyam//gzhon nu'i lang tsho dani rim bzhin rgas shing 'khogs pa'i mthus bcom/_lus kyi stobs nyams pas tshor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khung bab/lhutshigs/
pa

nyams pas 'grobar yinus/zas kyang mi 'ju/dbang po rgud pas mig 'gribs/rnab zho/_lce ldis/dran barmongs/_sa ying brag pas zasakyi ro lce lami'apho 'dod pa'i yon tan dang /_yul gyi longs spyod la nyams mi dga' zhing /_dga' na'ang mngon du spyod
pa'i mthu med pas yid gdu /_gzhan gyis bsashing sun 'byin pa'i skye banyams sumyong /_cho grang gang yang mi bzod cingablosras pas tshor ba yid du mi 'odaba'i spug bsngal snatshogs la spyod pas na/_rgan la bkur sti byas ba la'adaban yon chabar 
[tu]nga bsngags pa/_slob dpon chen pom titsis/_skye brtan la des pa ni/rgas dang 'chi dadamachisan/dam bgres ma bskyungasam 'gros zhes//legs smon gsol yang ci la ban/_zhes dang /_'di ltar gang zhig mi'achol ba/_/de nyid kyis ni sdug [1208]

[# ]spyod*[1]snyid mi dga' bzhin pa'i ngang la dran pa ni nyams/'dushesan 'khrul/dbugs ni chad/'gro ba rigs drug gang du'ang mi thuba'i bar mdo[j]mganang skyabs med ba/_gzugs kyi bud pas spangs pa ming bzhi 'dus ba'i phung bod tsid_/

de bzhinagashegs pa'i bstan pa 'ba' zhig labarten nas lus da (rigs pa dang /_gtan tshigs dang dpyad bzod pa dang /_lan pa dang mthun pa'imadangu thosapa/_nyams pa/_bcomapa phyung ba/_ma par gyur pa med cing /_de'angamya ngan las 'da' b.rayongs 
su bsde bas lhag pa'i tshul khrims so/_/_lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi rten bsam gtan bzhi pa'o//lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o//de ltar bslab pa gsum ka yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 
ni sde snod gsum ka la ltos pa yin yang /_'dir re zhig skyes bu 'bring gi rang lam cung zad rnamapar bzhagan dbyig gnyen gyis/_tshul gnas thos dngabasam ldan pas//sgom pa lani rab tu sbyor//zhes so so thar pa'i tshul khrims gzhirten du byas nas dam [218]
pa'i tshis 'dul ba la nges par 'byung ba/_nyan thos theg pa'i ngo bon 'khor pa las rang nyid gcig bu thar bar 'dod pa'i blo gang zag gibadag med rtogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur ba'o/_/gang zag gi bdag med ni/_nga med bag med kyi gzhi[g]pa/tsed pa'o/_/des chog ni
