zhe brgyad
7_pa dang /_rnam pa kun tubla ma'i yon tan brjod cing blo gros chen po'i phyogs nas chos kyi 'gros sam/_'jig rten gyi bya ba'i phyogs la mi rigs pa mngon pa dag la'ang dang por gsung ma khrid la/_phyinas don 'did 'di'i dgongs pa ji bzhin ma lon te/_rang gi blo'i 

'gal ba la 'diltar shar ba lags zhes khe nyen dang legs nyes brjod pas thugs dgongs ston par 'gyur la/_btsan thabs su bla ma'i de ma yin no zhes gdong bzlog pa la nyes pa chen po thob ste snga ma las/slob mar gyur namesaM ldan //da pa de la nyes byed gang //sangs kun la skye 
byas pas/_/_de dag rtag tu spyi'u chugs 'gro//zhes spyi'u tshugs su 'gro ba ni dmyal ba pa'o/_/_mdor na dad pa'i ngos nas zhal mthong bas snang ba 'gyur ba dang*/_spyi bor phyag gi reg pa la ba spu zing byed pa smos ci dgos/_mtshan thos pa dang*/_yid la dran pa dang /_mi_/
lam gyis mjal ba tsam la blo 'bol shig gi song nas khams gsonus pa tsam du gyur pa'i skabs dbang dang byin rlabs ma lus pa rgyud la 'jug pa'i dus yin te/_tshe'i dus byas kyang bar dor bla ma dang mjal nas lam sna 'khrid par gdon mi za'o/_/_de skad du [ 296]
sdong po bkod pa las/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba las don thams cad grub par 'gyur ro//zhes dang /_slob dpon klus/_ri dbang rtse nas 'ga' zhig lhung gyur na/_/_lhung bar mi 'gyur snyam yang lhung bar 'gyur/_/bla ma'i drin gyis 
phan pa'i lung thob na/_/grol bar mi 'gyur snyam yang grol bar 'gyur//zhes pa ste/_mdor na dad pa'i nye bar len pa gang la yod pa de la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis bon yod pa ni dbu ma la 'jug po las kyang /_so so skye bo'i dus na'ang stong pa nyid thos nas/_/nang du 
rab tu dga' ba yang dang yang du 'byung /_/_rab tu dga' ba las byung mchims mig brlan zhing /_/_lus kyi ba spu ldang bar gyur pa gang yin pa/_/de la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo yi sa bon yod//de nyid nye bar bstan pa'i snodan de yin te/_/de la dam pa'i don gyi bden pa 

rma_@#_/_/bstan par bya/_/ces so/_/_de'i don du dung go sla bar brjodan mchog gzigs kyi rnal 'byor sdom pa'i ka ma shI la la dam pa byin rlabs gcig zhu byas pas/_bu lhod pomos gus cig zhu dang gsungs/_de bzhin du jo bos/_theg chen gyi yon tan che skye 
[, ]chung skyes thams cad bla ma la bsten nas skye ba la khyed bod bla ma la thamal ba'i 'du shes las med pas gan skye/_zhes gsungs/_res gcig mtshan nas skad chen pos bos te gdams ngag thugs la gdags par zhu byas pas/_hohe kho ba la rna ba lta bzang 
ka bden gnyis shing rta _
pa bzang po bdog ste man ngag bya ba dad pa yin/_dad pa dad pa zhes gsungs skad mdor bstan byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las/_mdoran byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad thob cing yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa dang _/[ 237]
sa dang /_bzod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_gzungs dang /_spobs po dang /_bsngo ba dang /_smon lam dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob cing yongs su rdzogs pa ni bla ma la rag las pas/_blam rtsa bar gyur/_zla ma ma
rgya_
byung /_bla ma skye gnas dang skye mched du gyur/_bla mas bskyed/_blams spel/_bla ma la bsten/_bla ma rgyur gyur pa dag go zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/'jug pa'i spyod la nges par zhugs pa yi/_/dam pa mchog gi bsod nams ye shes tshogs/
zhe dgu
_'di ltar deg ba'i tshogs mtha' dag pa sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang ba de thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba las gzhan dum yin/
zhigang gi khrod du'ang don mthun spyod pa dang /_/_mngag gzhug bad phyin phyag dar tshun chod kyang //ngal ba 'brasaM btsas tshogs kyi lam mchog yin//

na/rang gis bgyis pa ni thabs dang shes rab mtha' dag gi zin pa re zhig dka' la/_de'i phyir dam pa'i bla ma pharol du phyin pa drug gi spyod pa la zhugs pa zhig gis dge la sbyor ba'i las dang /_tshogs gsog mdzod pa'i khrod du rang gi bdog pa'i dngos po dang /
lus ga gi las dang /_thos bsam bsgom pa'i bya ba mtha' dag de dang phrugs gcig tu spungs shing*/_than bdu phyin dang /_mngag gzhug pa'i las dang /_phyag dar tshun chod la 'bungs pas zla ma dam pa'i tshogs rnam pa gnyis ci tsem rdzogs pa de srid du rang gi tshogs 
kyang 'dum pa'i tshul sngags lam myur ba'i dbang du byas nas bla ma bsten zhing*/_bsnyen bkur dang /_bsag sbyangs la brtson pa tshogs lam gyi dod thub par bstananas/_dam pa'i byin rlabs las rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la sbyor ba dang /_chos nyid dngos su [298]
mthong ba dang /_mthong zin bsgom par bya ba dang*/_bslab bya mthar thug pas mi slob pa'i lam du 'gro ba'ang rgyud las/_bla ma bsnyen bkur yongasardzogs nas/_/dam pa'i drung na gnas pa ni/_/tshogs kyi lam zhes de la bya/_/bla ma dam pas don bshad cing /_/_gdams 
ngag gnyis kyang de la sbyor/_sbyor ba'i lam du nga yis bstan/_/_tshe 'dir nges pa'i bden pa mthong /_/mthong ba'i lam du nga yis bshad/_/bsgom du med pa'i sgom pa dang /_/bsgom du yod pa'i med pa gnyis/_/'du 'bral med bar gnas pa ni/_/bsgom pa'i lam du 
pa yis bstan/_/_mi gnas tshul gyis mthar phyin pas/_/mthar phyin lam du nga yis bshad/_/ces bstan pa bzhin no/_/rgyumatshan gang gis na/_ci phyir skyabs su 'gro dang tshogs kyi zhing /_bla ma bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor phyi nang gnyis/_/bskyed rdzogs bsgrub bya'i 

@#/_/_kho 'dir 'dus pas/_/_mdo rgyud kunanas sasargyas nyid du bstan//_gang du bstanan theg pachen po'i mdo sde thams cad nas ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed dgos par yang nas yang du bstan cing /_de skad du lag na rdo rje mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las/
gsang ba'i bdag po slob dpon la slob mas ji ltar blta bar bya zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar blta ba de bzhin du'o//_zhes dang /namakha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/_bla ma bsgoms na chos sku bsgom/_/_lha sku 'bum phrag steng bosgoms pos//bsod 
(nams de yi char mi phod/_/_de phyir dkar po'i chos spyod rnams//_mnyan bshad bsgom dang 'dzin pa dang*/_/mchod gtor la sogs gang byed kyang /_/_sngon du 'gro ba'i las yin pas/_/bla ma dus gsum sangs rgyas dbal//zhes gsungs pa yin la/mtshan nyid des [ \[ 299]
gzhal bas lam gyi thog ma skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshotshogs kyi zhing du gsal bani phyi ltar du bsgrub pa dang /_rgyud dag par byed pa'i slad du ni spyi bor sangs rgyas thams cad pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom pa nanang ltar bsgrub pa dang /_'bri rlabs gcig char du 'jug pas snying 
gar bsgom pa ni gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa dang /rang lus su bsgrub pa'am/_de bzhin du bskyed dam bsgomo pa'i chi'ang blam yi dam gyi rnam par bzhangs pa yang gsang ltar bsgrub parnams la go ba 'ol spyi tsamam yin pa chagasan dngos grub myur ba yin te/_ci'i phyir na/_thog 
[\[ ]lnga bcu mar dbang gi bya bamadzad pa'i tshadakyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid rdo rje slob dpon yin la/_gdan gsumaching ba'i dkyil 'khor yang de'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sprul pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/_khyad par rdzogs pa'i rim pa mthar thugazhi chos nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la rnal du 'byor pa ste/

don rtogs ba dang ldan pa'i slama'i thugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas zlum dang thugs yid 'dres ba las rtogs pa'i yon tan rgyud la skye bsanamanyam par bzhag pa'i sngon 'gro dang /_bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes thogs mu'ang bla ma dang thugs yid bsre ba la bslab pa 'di 
byung ba yin no/_/_de skad du skyes rabs las kyang /_dam pa rnams ni mus kyang mi bsrings te//dul ba'i tshul gyis dgo ba bsten par bya/_/de dang nyen de yi yon tan rdul/_/ched du ma bsgos par yang gos par 'gyur//_zhes so//'di ltar ma rtogs pa'i/_rmongs pa 
phal cher gzugs brnyan 'dri zhing bsgom/_/dngos su bzhugs la rim gro bgyi ba med//_gnas lugs bsgom zer bla ma'i thugs mi shes/_/bsgrub dang bsgrub bya 'gel pa nyon re ngas/_/_mos gus med bzhin bar dor mjal bamatshar//bod 'dir bla ma la sangs rgyas [Boo]
su mthong ba lta ci smos/_dge bshes bzang po tsam du'ang blta bam yin zhing /_kha cig de ltar blta ba'i rgyu mtshan gang yang med bzhin du 'jig rten gyi grags chod dang /_rmongs pa'i stes dbang las gzugs brnyan 'dri ba dang /_'dra'abag 'chos pa dang*/_bsgom pa'i tshul 
lugs ngag tu gdon pa dang /_ra gan dang /_gser dang /_dngul la sogs pa'i phyi rten byed pa phalamo che kun slong ngan pas grags pa bsrung ba don du gnyer ba kho namang ste/ ci'i phyir na dngos su bzhugs pa'i bsti stang dang phyogs shin tu 'dzol ba'i phyir ro//dkon mchog 
brtse_gas pa las/_chos rnams thams cad rkyen yin te/_/'dun pa'i rtse la rab tu gnas//zhes gsungs pas mos gus dang dag snang med par zang zing dang dngos po'i 'du shes bskyedanas 'dra 'bag la sogs byed ba bas/_sems can thams cad la rang bzhin gyis mthong 

@#/_/namimathun pa med pa'i sangs rgyas byang sems kyi snang brnyan byed pa nyid khebs che ba'o//de bzhin du dbang dang /man ngag dang /bden pa'i ngo sprod na bla ma las blang gis/_gzhan dun byin rlabs dang dngos grub ni phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas 'byung ngo snyam pa ni nor 
pachan pa yin te/_bar dor blam dang yi dam mthong ba'ang mos gus dang gsal snang gi rang gzugs yin te bla mas bar dor byon pa'i med pa'i phyir ro/[\] ]rgyamachan de dag gi phyir/_dang por bam brtag lamakhas pa dang //bar du bla ma bsten la mkhas pa dang //thamar dgas spyod 
[- , ]bslab lamakhas pa yi//_skyes bu de ni yang dag lam la 'gro/zhes smos nas/_deng song dus shin tu'ang rnyengs pas/_tshodang /_'byopa dang /_chos da /_'dren pa kun nas rmongs pa'i gnas skabs na thog mar blama'ang shin tu brtag pa gal che ba yin la/_de'ang dus kyi dbang las [ \[30\]]
yon tan thams cad tshang bar ma rnyedan/_dpung bzang gi zhus par/_de lta'i yon tan ma lus ldan pa dag_/rtsod pa'i dusan shin tu dkon pasan//_yon tan phyed dam bzhi cha brgyadam can/_/zhes grogs kyi mchon nyid la bshad pa 'dir blam la bsgre bar rung bas mdo rgyud nas 
gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid las byed ma/_bzhicha'am/_thana'ang bdacha dang ldan pa ni med thabasamamachis la/_de lta bu las ma rnyed pas slobamazlo gros chen po sdom pa gsum dang 'gal ba'i bya ba'am/_lamam yin pa'i gnas la 'khrid cing sbyor bar byed na ni re zhig thabs 
la mkhas pas lam de lasani bzlog par rung ste/_dkonamachog sprin las dge ba'i chos la dad mthun par spyada'/_mi dge ba la mimathun par spyod do//zhes dang /_'dul ba'i mdo las/_chosam yin pa sman bzlog par bya'o//_zhes dang /_bram zer skyes pa'i rabs las/

na  man bas slabamarnams kyi ngang tshul brtag pa'i phyir/_bram ze rgud che brkubachos su bshad/_/'jig rtenana'angan mi chad pa'i mchog_/de bas gzhan nor mthong byung bar bgyid/_/_zhes dngos su brkusan ni grags pa nyams par 'gyur gyis/_skag tu btu ban ma bar 
rnachas lugs te nyos pa med do zhes smras pas/_bram ze'i slob ma bal parnams me yi rigs par shes kyang slob dpon gyi dag bzlog par mi byed la/_byang chub sems dpa' ni de la rjes su yi rangs ba med pas/_'di skad du/_khyod ni da ltar na byang _ka
  _ gas _'bazha1[| ]/_kun dang yon tan khyabragashis gyur pa/_/suzhig nor phyir yon tan chud gson byed/_/_u dbad phyir yang ngo tshabor nasani_/_yid la chos dang 'gal ba byed pa bas/_/_gyo me'i snod thogs gos ngan gyon nas ni/_/dgra yi khyim du 'byor pa mthod yangasla[E302]
zhes smras pas mkhan pos rjes su yi rang ba byin pa bzhin no//de skad du/_brgya byin du skyes pa'i rabs 'dis kyang /_de lta bas na/_chos spyod pa rnams ni chos nyid bsrung bar byedado//zhes pa la sogs rgya cher gle du yod do/_/'on kyang de dag rgyu mtshan du byas nas phal pa bla mar 
thubadag la'ang brnyes shing bskur ba ni nam yang rigs pa ma yinate/_chos dang dam tshig gi 'brel yan chad bzang ngan gang yin yade bdag nyid la nyams pa chen po 'thob pas bsnyen pa la mkhas dgos te/_dgongs 'dus las/_ma par bzung bar gyur phan chad//dam par nges 
nga mi sakyang //bka' bcag lugs por ga la srid/_/gal te de yi rgya nyams na/_/rdo rje'i myal bar rab tu 'tshod/_/ces dang /_mdzod las/_'phags pa min yang bam dang /_nad pa dachomasgyur/_/skyematha'i byang chubasems pa' la//_yonani gzhal du med par gsungs//_zhes 

ka_@#/_/_pa ltar skyes rabs las/_/rgyal po tshangs byin la gnod sbyin mi gdug pa'i gzugs can gyis sdig pa las ldog pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bshad pa'i yon du bdag gi lus gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gtong bar dam bcas shing /_bu dang chung ma yang the tshom med 
par btang ba bzhigano//de'i phyir skyon gyi ngos nas ma brtags par chos kyi drin bsam zhing tshul khrims sam/_mang du thos pa'am/_snying rje che ba'am/dad pa dang /_gtong phod sogs cha ra las mi ldan kyang de'i yon tan gyi phyogs nas rtog pa 'ba' zhig la blo sbyang dgos te lag na rdo 
bden gnyis shing rta _
rje mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las/_slob dpon gyi ni yon tan bzung /_/skyon ni nam yang bzung mi bya//yon tan bzung na dngos grub thob//skyon rnams bzung na dngos mi 'grub//ces pa ste/_'di ltar blam yon tan dang ldan pa yin yang de'i skyon gyi rnam pa cung zad kyi ngos nas [303]
brtags na rang la das grub kyi gegs chen por 'gyur te/_slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la gdams ngag zhus te/_slar rang gi yul du 'khor mang po la chos ston pa na/_slob dpon rnal 'byor pa'i cha byad kyis byin pa la phyag byed pa ngotshanas ma 
brgya_
mthong ba ltar byas so//_mar 'khor rnams gyes pa dang phyag byed du phyin pas/da ci phyag mi byed pa ci yin gsungs mamathong lags zhes brdzun smras pas mig gnyis ka sa la bral lo//_slar bzod par gsol pas ye shes kyi spyan thob pa//_de bzhin bla ma'i skyon rtog sna re la ma dang /
ngaganyis pa'am/_the tshom zos pas mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub gnyis ka la sgrib pa'i gtan tshigasani shin tu mang ngo /_/gal te skyon shas che ba dag la'ang skyon gyi ngos nas rtog pa'i rgyun bcad la yon tan gyi phyogs nyag gcig la brtag cing /_gal te de la blo 'phrog par mi byed na 

gang zag dam pa 'di'i kyang sngon skye ba gong mas gong mar dam pa'i spyod pa spyad cing yon tan dang ldan pas de ltar bdag cag la sogs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'brel pa ste/bdag cag gi ston pas kyang sku tshe snga mar lhas byin la brten nas pharol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par mdzad pa 
bzhin no snyam du brtag ste/_dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las/bcom ldan 'das rgyal por gyur nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa las sems ldog par ma gyur te/_pharol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs pa'i slad du rgyal srid longs spyodamago dang yan lag kyang btang /_chos 'tshol ba la 
zhugs pa na dril bu brdungs te/_palasus chos ston pa po'i bran byed par khas blangs pas/_lhas byin drang srong du gyur pas dam pa'i chos pad+madakar po bstan te/_de la dga' mgu yi rang ba skyesanas drang srong gi byan rtswa dang /_shing chu tsa ba rdog gu 'bras bu la sogs len pa nas/_sgo bsrung ba'[T304]
ba yan tshang byas so//mtshon mo mal khri'i skang pa'ang bzung ngo*//deltar byas kyang lus dang sems pal ba med pa lo stong tsho bar 'das so//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lhas byin yang nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yinano//_lhas byin la bsnyen nas ngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po//
par byas so//_zhes pa nas byang chub phyogs kyi chos mtha' dag lhas byin la bsten nas rdzogs pa'i tshul rgyas par gsungs nas/_dge slong dag khyed mes pa bya'o//_khong du chud par bya'o/_/_zhes dang /_'jig rten gyi bams lhu'i them skas bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 
sangs rgyabar lung bstan pa bzhin no//de bas na thog mnas brtags pa'i dbang rang la yod la/_/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig yan chad kyi 'brel panas de'i skyon rtog pa'i gzhasamed de/dkon mchog sprin las/_bla ma bsten na dge ba 'phel zhing mi dge ba 'grib par rtogs pas mkhan po thos 

[2 ]@#_/_/patshaba'am/_chung ba'am/_shes pa'am/_mi shes pa'am/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_tshul khrims 'chal pa la'ang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed do/_/_ji ltar ston pa la dga' ba dang /_dad pa ltar mkhan po la yang dad pa dang dga' bar byed do//_slob dpon rnams la zhes

[']cha gcig 'grib pa dang /_yon tan sna gcigaskye ba yan chad bla ma bsnyen pa la rag las pas/_dang por blam 'chol zhing brtag pa mkhas pa dang /_bar du rnyed pa tsam gyis mi chog par bsten pa'i tshul lugs la mkhas pa dang /_tha mar rang bzhin du tsimi snyam par 'grogs pas 

mi chog par skyes bu dam pa'i mdzad spyod dang /_rnam par thar pa'i rjes su slob pa ni/_zam tog bkod pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs grangs med gsum gyi skabs na dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal ba'i ched du/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nyul bas rkang ba dpyi la thug par zad

dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang*/_bstan pa'i slad du 'bangs la stangs bskur ba ltar dka' ba mtha' dag bzod par bya ste/chos bzhi pa'i mdo las/_dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi btang ngo /_/_zhes gsungs so//de ltar dge ba'i [\[306]

pa'i blo gros blun po bdud sdes bcom/_/'di ltar sdig pa'i grogs po ni skyes bu'i gzugs su 'jug kyang de'i bsam pa ni lha ma yin gyi 'jug pa can nyid kyi phyir dngos sam brgyud nas sbyor ba nye bar ma zhi ba kho na la brten pa dag dang /_g.yo sgyu'i phyogs 'dzin pa'i khan ma tho [1307]

pa ni sgrig pa'i grogs po ste/_de ni dug gi sdong po lta bu'o//_zhes dang*/_dkon mchog brtsegs pa las/_sdig pa'i grogs po gang zhe na/_dge ba 'grib cing mi dge ba la sbyor ba gang yin pa ste/_de bsten par mi bya/_bsnyen par mi bya/_mthong bar yang mi bya'o//zhes dang /de'i

nga dus
/3_pa'i skyes bu la bsten pas phyi ma ngan 'gro myong ba'i las yod kyang /_da res lus sems la gnod pa phra mo tsam byung ba'am/_than rmi lamatsam du myong bas kyang las de zadapar 'gyur ba dang /_bla ma la bsnyen bkur snga dro gcig byas pa'i phan yon gyis sangs

rgyudu/_/dpal ldan bla ma bsam par bya/_zhes dang /_'khor lo bcu pa las/_bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba las ni yon tan gyi ches bsam gyisami khyab pa rnams yongs su 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyaso kyi yon tan dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyang 'di las 'byung bar [ 313]
shitaM_
blta'o/_/ces pa ste/_mdor bsdu na sdong po bkod pa las/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan dang bsngags pa brjod pa ni/_rgyas par bskal pa brjod kyang zad mi shes pa dang ldan pas de'i phyir rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par bya'o/_/_zhes gsungs 
ba
_so//zhar lam bsten pa'i nyes dmigs bshad pa ni/_'khor ba la bde bar 'jin pas sdug bsngal gyi 'phrang nas mi thar/_las dang las kyi 'bras bu la rmongs pas mi dge ba'i phyogs 'dzin/_mang du thos pa dang bral bas yon tan gyi tshogs dang mi 
legs pa'i chos las nyams shing ltar snang 'khrul pas bslu ba'i nyes pa kun nas ldang ste/_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum pa las/_bla ma la ma bstan zhing ma gus pa rnams kyis ni yon tan gyi chos 
[#| ]phrad/_bstan pa la zhugs kyang thar pa'i lam sna zlon_/_

thob pa'ang nyams par 'gyur na/_ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_de ci'i phyir zhen/_chos 'dzin pa ni chos la tha mi dad pas na/_des dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_chos spong ba'i sdig pa'i las shin tu lci ba bsags pa'i phyir/_ngan song gsum du yun ring ma lan 
mang du 'khor bas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing gal te de dag las thar nas brgya la mir skyes na'ang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi grags pa'i zhing du/_dmus long dang*/_'onapa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_dbang po ma tshang bar skye bar 'gyur ro//zhes so//khyad par dge ba'i 
bshes gnyen la bzos pa'i nyes dmigs ni/_lag na rdorje mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag slob dpon la brtas bar bgyid pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje/_lha dang [\[ 314]
bcas pa'i 'jig rten skrag par 'gyur gyis de skad ma smra zhig_/'on kyang chung zhig brjod par bya yis/_dpa' bo bsgrims te nyon cig_/mtshams med la sogasami bzad pa/_/dmyal ba gang dag ngas bshad pa/_/de rnams kyi ni gnas su brjod/_/der ni bskal pa mtha' 
ra_da red//de la bas rtsa rnam kun tu/_do_de la nam yang brjos mi bya/_/_zhes dang /_bla ma lnga bcu par/_slob dpon la ni smod pa de/_/yams dang mdze dang nad rnams dang /_/gdon dang rims dang dug rnams kyis/_/_rmongs chenade ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/_rgyal po me dang sbrul gdug 
dang*/_/_chu dang mkha' 'gro rkun po dang /_/gdon dang leg 'dren rnams kyis kyang /_/bsadanas sems can dmyal bar 'gro zhes bshad do/_/da ni legs smon gyi don bshad pa'i phyir/_/dam chos bdud rtsi'i chu klung dpag med mdzod//_rgyud la 'drongs pa'i dmigs

[: ]/_@#/_/_pa bzang po rnams//_ston pa'i bla ma bzang par rten cing 'brel/_/thabs bzang ba lasaan ngag 'khyams mi 'gyur//nges 'byung bzang po'i rig sngags nus pa can/_/'khor bar skyo ba med _pa'i gdon la thebs/_/_bzang po bzhi dang ldan pa'i legs smon

bden gnyisashing+garta _

9_ltar ro/_/_mngon par 'dod pa'i don gang yin pa chogs chen po lam ltos par bde blag nyid du 'grub par byedapa ni man ga gi lam yin kyang /_de'i grogs su thabs kyi cho ga'i rim pa mtha' yas pa med na man ngag kyang rnam par 'khyam par 'gyur te/_dper na 
nga brgyad
[# ]sbyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod phyogs lnga'i thabs la ma bsten na man ngag gi ngo bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro//_de skad du spyod 'jug las kyang /_yan lag 'di dag thams cad ni/_/thub pas shes rab don du gsungs/_/zhes 

gsungs pa bzhin no/_/de thams cad kyi grogs su gyur pa ni nges 'byung gi blo bzang po yin te/_nges 'byung med na dang po 'khor ba la blo mi ldog_/des dad pa'i gses nyams pas bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen la stangs mi bskur/_thamar dang pa dang /_brtson 'grus la 
sogs pa'i lam srol mtha' dag las nyams par gyur pas srid pa'i phra rgyas kyi rtsa ba mi 'byin pa shing gi yal ga bcad pa lta bu'i lam ni thar pa'i rgyur mi rung ste bla ma la spring par/_dper na ljon shing rtsa nas ma btonan/_/_bcad kyang phyir zhing skye ba kho nar zad//de 
bzhin srid pa'i phra rgyas ma bton na//_yang dang yang du sdug bsngal 'di mi ldog/ces dang*/_khyad par rab byung gi bslab pa blangs pa rnams ni rang rgyud las 'byung nam skyes pa na se thar mtshan nyid par 'gyur shing /_de phan chad ni sdom pa'i gzugs brnyan tsam du [ \[ 316]
sngon gyi mkhan po dag gis kyang bshad pa bzhin no/_/legs smon de'i ldog phyogs ni/_chos sgor zhugs kyang mod la sun pa dang /_/kun slong drug can 'dres pa'i thos bsam bsgom/_/chos las blo nyams bsrung sdom khur du song /_/chos brgyad dmod pas theg chen 
brtul zhugs 'khyam//legs smon dga' thub bshig pa'i rtog pa yin/_/'di ltar gang zag la la dga'i gnyen bshes kyi phyogs nas chos sgor bcug kyang /_bdag nyid kyi sngon bsod nams ma bsags shing legs smon ma btab bas/_chos sgor zhugs ma thagacas 
chos kyis sun te/_rgyal po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_blon po dang khyim bdag la sogs pa'i bran du 'khel zhing /_de dag dang bsam sbyor mthun par 'jug pa dang /_gal te thos bsam cung zad byas kyang /_tshe 'di 'ba' zhig yid la bzhag pa'i kun slong ngan pas

ka _@#_/_/dang por chos ma lobs kyi dogs pa/_bar du dus rnyed pam grub kyi dogs pa/_thamar gzhan dang phrag dog gi gal 'dzin pas slar 'khor ba'i rgyu 'ba' zhig tu 'gro ba las thar pa'i lam dang /_phyogs 'gal ba dang*/_blo chos su ma chud pas chos la dang

bden gnyis shing rta _
mi shes shing*/_ltar snang chos ltar bcos pa'i chos brgyud kyis la bzla ba rnams ni legs smon gyi dka' thub ston ka'i zla ba la rtog mar byed pa'i sgra gcan lta bu'o/_/de'i phyir de dag spangs nas/_thad ka thad ka'i nyon mongs dug chen lnga'i/_/gnyen por che ba skyes bu [\[317]

brgya _གང་དག་ཉམས་སུ་བླངས་ཀྱང་རང་རང་གི་ཐད་ཀ་ཐདཀའི་ཉོན་མོངས་པའི་གཉེན་པོར་འགྲོ་བ་དང་། ཕྱོགས་ཆར་འཛིན་པ་མེད་ཅིང་། དེ་དག་གི་དོན་ཉམས་སུ་ལེན་པ་ལ་དཀའ་བ་བཟོད་པའི་སྙིང་སྟོབས་བསྐྱེད་ནས་དུས་བཞིར་སྐྱོ་ངལ་མེད་པར་བྱ་བའོ། །དེ་ལ་དུས་བཞི་
nga dgu ni mdo sde nyid nas gsal por bstan pas gzu lum dang /_mtho ba chung ba'i mngon rtogs mi ngom ste/_khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa las/_sngon gyi mtha' dben pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'bo kha dang /_da ltar 'byung ba 'jig par shes 

pa dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid de bzhi po de dag go_/zhes so//de'i phyir dus gsumamanyam pa nyid kyi don rtogs pa'i tshe/_zab mo stong pa nyid la nang byan chud/_snang ba mtha' dag chos dang bla mar shar bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyur song ba la legs 
smon grub pa zhes bya'o/_/da ni 'khor lo bzhi pa bsod nams kyi skyabs la 'dun pa nyid sten pa'i phyir/_mtho ris yon tan bdun pa'i dga' ba dang /_/_la bas yang dag mtho la nadamecing /_/_ting nge 'dzin dang rnam 'byed shes rab lnga/_/sngon chad bsod namu 
la gus mngon rtags yin/_'di ltar gnas skabs sumangon par mtho ba dang /_mthar thug nges par legs pa 'grub pa'i rgyu thams cadani bamedanams gcig po la rag las pa ste/_sngon bsod nams rgya chen po bar ma chad pa 'du byas pa dag ni da res [318]
kyi srid pa 'di la rigs gzugs dang*/_'byor ba dang /dbang phyug dang /_shes rab dang /_tshe ring ba dang*/_nad med pa dang /bdaskyid dang ldan pa ste mtho ris kyi yon tan bdun dang ldan pa'i dal ba'i rten khyad par can thob par 'gyur pa'i tshul dbyig gnyen 
gyis _sna tshogs yon tan 'dod pa yis/_/'bad byas bonamed par ni//_myu gu skye ba yod ma yin/_/nyes pa dag ni gcig bu yi/_/_yon tan mang po 'joms par byed//_tshe ring de bzhin nadamed dang*/_/gzugs nga skal pa bzang dang rigs/_/nor dang shes rab

ka [ 2 @]/_/dal bar skye ba dang*/_/nad med pa dang ting 'dzin dang /_/rnam par 'byed pa'i 'byed rgyud ni/_/_sngon tshe bsod nams bsags pa yin/_/ces so/_/dpe don gyi sgo nas rgyas par bshadan 'khor 'das kyi legs tshogs mtha' dag 'phel ba dang 'grib par

rdzo/cing /_rgyal chen rigs bzhi pa'i dpung las kyang rnam par rgyal nas sum cu rtsa gsum du sku'i dbang po dang stan byed par bya ba'i dbang phyug thob kyang /_'jig rtenan sdig pas dkrugs pa'i blo gros kyis rnam par dkar ba'i 'bras bu nyamo chung ngur byed pa'i chos [319]
[# ]nyid yin pa'i phyir/_lha'i dbang po la 'khu ba'isems skyes ma thag tuganas rigs de nas skar mda' ltung ba bzhin du gyur pa las kyang slar ldog pas na/_dpag bsam 'khri shing las/_ma goms pa yis rig pa 'joms/_/rgyugs pa rgyas pas dpal _/

drug cu
_su ni mun bros pa lta bul/_chos ma yin pa'i phyogs la phra rgyas mtha' dag tshogs pas ni rig pa 'joms shing 'ong ngo*/_/_la la dad pa cung zad yod kyang nad dang /_gnod pa la sogs pa'i 'gal rkyen ldang zhing*/_nye du dang*/_khrel pa can dang /_sdig grogs dang /

sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyis bslad nas tshe 'di'i 'dod pa'i phyogs su sbyor mdor na nor dang longs spyod la shin tu gus pa dang /_chos dang 'gal ba'i las gtso bor byed cing /_de la 'gyod pa med pas ni yang dag mtho ba 'joms shing 'ong ngo*/_/_phrag go dang/_'gran 
sems che ba dang /_nga rgyal gyi rgyud rengs pa dang /_rigs gzugs dang*/_dbang phyug gis rgyags pas ni dpal 'byor 'joms shing 'ong ngo*/_/bsam pa bzang po rnal du mi gnas pas kun la mnar sems pa dang ldan zhing bya dang ri dgas yan chad la gnod pa byed pa ni 
bsod nams nyams pa'i rgyu mnar ba yin pas legs tshogs thams cad 'joms shing 'od ngo*/_/_mdor na thos bsam bsgom gsum byas kyang nyon mongs pa'i grogs su song ba dang /_tshogs gsog bag re tsam byed kyang grags pa la gtso bor brten pa'am rkyen bzlog [320]
'ba' zhig la dmigs pa dang /_zhi bde dang /_lha mi'i bde 'bras la dmigs pa dang*/_sdig pa'i g.yos dang 'dres pa dang /_yang na zhing ma dag pa sdig spyod kyi rgyal po dang /_log lta can dang /_sems can mnar zhing sde 'khrug byed pa'i gnas brtan gyi phyogs su gtong 
bal dga' ba rnams ni sngon bsod nams ma bsags pa'i rtags te/_de las log nas las dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdig pa'i sems kyis rnam par ma dkrugs shing /_/_phyi nang gi bar chad nyung ba/_dge ba byed kyang rnam par dpyod pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas blo 
bkol du btub pa rnams bsod nams bsags pa'i rtags yin no//_zhes ston pa'i phyir/_ma bsgoms pas ni rig pa 'joms shing 'od //rgyags pa rgyas pas dpal 'byor 'joms shing 'ong*//rnam par ldang bas legs tshogs 'joms shing 'od /_/chags pas/

ka_
@#/_/_yang dag mtho ba 'joms shing 'ong /_/gang phyir las dang nyon mongs sdig pa yis/_/rnam par dkrugs pa ma yin blo gros ni//_shes rab mthu dang skal bas bkol btub pa/_/bsod nams bsags pa'i rtags su rgyan las bshad/_/ces lung gi 
khungs dang bcas mu sbrel ba'o/_/de la bsod nams dag gis rgyamathun pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang khyad chos yin na sems can gang dag go 'phang khyad par can don du gnyer ba rnams la smos ci 'tshal/_de'ang 'di ltar skyes rab 
den gnyis shing
_las/_rgyal po gsal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba la bu gzugs stobs dang /_brtson 'grus ldan dang /_bzo ldan dang /_shes rab ldan dang /_bsod nams stobs zhes rang rang gi yon tan gyi cha las ming btags pa lnga yod pa las/_lnga ga so so'i yon tan gyi phyogs [ \[32\]]
'dzin cing bsngags pa brjod do/_/de'i tshe thu chung bsod nams stobs kyis smras pa/_shes rab dang bral ba'i gzugs dang /_bzo dang /_brtson 'gras thams cad ni nyams su phan pa ma yin la/_shes rab kyis zin pa ni yongs su phan pas bden med kyis 
9[# ]'on kyang shes rab de yang bsod nams med par thob pa ma yin te/_de bas na bsod nams ban pa yinano/_/_zhes dang /bsod nams kyis ni byad gzugs theb//bsod nams kyis ni tshul khrims ldan/_/bsod nams dag gis dpal thob cing /_/de 
bzhin los spyod du 'gyur/_/bsod nams dag gis shes rab thob/_/bsod nams dag gis yid gzhungs thob/_/bsod nams dag gis bzang 'phro theb/_/zhes pa la sogs 'khor 'das kyi lags tshogs thams cad bsod nams kyi mthur brjod 

kyang mched zla rnams rang rang gi phyogs 'dzin pa las de de ltar khas mi len to/_/de nas de dag rang rang gi yon tan gyi stangs phyed pa'i phyir rgyal bu'i tshalugs mi mngon par byas nas yul khams gzhan du dong ba las/_gzhon nu gzugs dang ldan pa ni mthong na yid du 
'ong bas bsdus pa'i skye bo dag gis longs spyodatsam gyis 'tsho'o/_/brtson 'grus ldan ni chu klung shugs drag pos tsan dan gyi shing khyer ba gzhan dag gis blang bar mi nus pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen pos drangs ba las byung ba'i longs spyod tsam gyis 'tsho'o//
bzo dang ldan pa ni de las gla rngan thob pa'i las spyodatsam gyis 'tsho'i/_/_shes rab ldan gyis ni tshong dpon gnyis 'khon pa thubs la mkhas pas 'dums par byas pa'i rnyed pa tsam gyis so/_/bsod nams stobs ni dbul po zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa na/_de'i [ \]322]
bsedanams kyi mthu las khyim der non dang /_'bru dang /_gser dang*/_dngul mang po byung bas/_dbul po'i bsam pa la 'di ni sngon ma 'dres pa'i skyes bu 'di bdag gi khyim du 'os pa'i mthur gdon mi za'o snyam nas gzhon nu la gus par bltas shing bkur 
ste rgya chen po yang byas so/_/de dag la sogs pa'i grags pas kun tu khyab pa'i dus re zhig na yul de'i rgyal po la bu med nas rabs chad du nye ba na/_btsun mo dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams 'dus nas gang bsod nams kyis che ba zhig rgyal por dbang 
bskur ro zhes bgros pa na/_de'i de nyid du rig nas rgyal por dbang bskur ro/_/_de'i bsod nams dang byed palhan cig pasamanga' ris de bde ba'i gnas la yang reg ge/de rang gi brgyal pos kyang thosanam de'i yang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhon nu bsod nams stobs 

ka _@#/_/bzhag go_/_rgyu des na 'jig rten na bsod nams las nyams su phan pa gang yang med pas yul khyad par can la bsten nas bsod nams bsag pa la brtson par bya ste/_mthong ba'i chos la 'bras bu smin pa'i phyir ro//de gang zhe na/_sten paspyi 
ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na/_grong khyer pa ta li pu trar/_rgyal po mya ngan med ces bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bzhi cha la dbang byed pa/dang por bsod nams ma yin pa'i las la dga' zhing /_phyi nas bsad nams la gum pa lhur byed pa zhig
bden gnyis shing rta _
byung ngo*/_/des nor gyi den du tshong pa lnga brgya rgya mtshor nor bu len pa la mngagasaso//de dag gis kyang rgya mtshor phyin nas rin po che dang*/_gser dang /_dal dang /_rdo rje dang /_bi zur+ya dang /_shang ka shi la dang /_bye ru la segs pas gru bo che ba_kang te 'dzam bu'i[323]
gling gi phyogs suchas pa dang /_rgyamatsho'i dkyil du klus gru ba cha bcom te tshong pa de dag ni srog gi lhag ma tsam dang bcas te 'ong ngo*/_/_rgyal po ni 'dod pa'i rgyus skyed mos tshal byi dor byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan/_nor bu'i rigs rnams dgram pa'i gnas rgya chen po 
sta gon byed cing grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyang nor bu blta ba la 'dus so//de'i tsho tshong pa rnams ni stod g.yogs gcig pu las mi ldan pas nyam thag pa'i rang bzhin du 'os nas rgyal pa la dre'i rgyasmra/_/der dge slongadabang po zhes bya bas/rgyal 
brgyaro gnyis 
po la bslabs pa bzhin zangs ma'i byang bu la/_sa 'di rgya mtshos gtugs par skyong /_/rgyal po stobs ldanamya nganamed/_/rab tu drag cing btsan pa yi//nor khyer mtshor gnas gang yin pa/_/de dag 'dir myuro b.ru//_nga yi drung du bskyal bar gyis//zhes 

yi ger bris te rgya mtshol bskyar bas klu ni rgyal po'i tshig la ma rangs nas byang bu de slar 'dzam bu'i gling du bskyur ro/_/der pho nyas rgyal po la skabs de bsnyad pa dang /rgyal po mya ngan med sems khong du chud nas thabs bsam par byed do/_/de'i tshe nam mkha'i _ste
las/_lha mi'i mchod sdong de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas na des bsod nams 'phel nas khyed kyi dgos pa 'grub par 'gyur gyis/_gzhan rig sngags dang sman sbyor gang gis kyang nus pas ma yin no/_/zhes pa'i don tshigs su bcad de 
smras pas rgyal po skra bkrus/_gos dkar po bgos/_dri dang*/_me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa thogs nas phyogs bcu'i rdzu 'phrul thab pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa dang spyan 'dren pa'i gdung dbyas chen pa byed pa na/_de ma thag tu phyogs phyogs nas [324]
dgra bcom pa stong phrag drug cu 'dus par gyur to/_/der rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la spos dang /_ma tog dang /_dri dang /_byug pa lasegs pas mchod pa rgya chen po dang /_bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa byas shing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 
la'ang gdugs tshod drangs nas mchod do/_/de'i tshe rgyal po la tshodang ldan pa dbang pos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po dang po ni khyod kyi _ gzugs/_/gnyis pa ni klu'i gzugs kyi/_gzugs legs pa gnyis mdzod la gser gyi snod chen po_nang du de gnyisaMzhogacig 
dang*/_bsodonams kyi khyad par mngon sum du gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du byas te re zhig nas bltas pa dang /_klu'i gzugs ni 'dug_/rgyal po'i gzugasanaklu la phyag byed par mthong ngo /_/de tsho dang ldan pa dbang pos smras pa/_rgyal po 

[1:| ]@#/_/chen po da dung bsod nams kyi rgyu la 'bad par mdzod cig dang /_nyi ma re re bzhin khyad par gzigs par 'gyur ro//_zhes smras pas/rgyal pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la sngar bzhin du mchod pa rgya 
[#|]chen po bstabs/chos kyang gus par nyan pa de lta de ltar rgyal po'i gzugs langs pa la klu'i gzugs phyag byed par gyur to//mthar klu'i gzugs de yan lag thams cad kyis rgyal po'i gzugs la phyag byed par gyur pas rgyal po yid rab tu dga' nas 
ka bden gnyis shing rta _
smras pa/_kyi ma dkon mchog gsumamachod pa'i/_/'bras bu ci 'dra 'di la gzigs/_/rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa'i klu/_/bdag gis btul zhing 'di dbang bgyis//blo gros chung ba'i mi rnams kyang /_/_su zhig sangs rgyas mchod mi bgyid/_/gang zhig 'bras bu [ 325]
'phral bskyed la//_su zhig yid kyis semasam bgyid/_/bdag nyid chab thob 'dod pa'i/_/_khyu rnams dang zhi mi rnams kyis/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag mchod/_/_skye ba zad cing yang srid med/_/ces smra'o//der tshe dang ldan pa dbang pos rgyal po'i bsod 
brgyu _
namasastobs su gyur pas skabs la bab par shes nas rgyal po chen po/_dani bus ma'i yi ge klu la spring ba'i dus la bab po zhes bskul bas/_rgyal bos smrar bzhin du spring yig rgya mtsho la bsgyur ba'i pho nya mngags pa dang*/_klu'i rgyal pos yi ge de spyi bos zlas/
re gsum shing*/_sngar gyi rin po charnams bskur bar khas blangs so/_/der rgyal pos tshong pa rnams gtong por bsdogs pa na/_gnas brtan dbang pos bsgos pa bzhin/_zangs ma'i byang bu la/_'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug dam pa'i bka' bcag pa'i chadapar rang rang gi 

phrag pa la khur la 'dir skyol cig bya ba bris nas springs pas/_yi ge mthong ma thag klu'i rgyal po skrag par gyur nas/_lha de ltan gdugs bdunan 'chil lamachi'o//zhes khas blangs te grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs mtha' dag 'dus pa'i dbus su rgyal po seng ge'i khri 
la 'dug pa la/_klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa mi'i cha byad du sprul te/_nor bu rnams phrag pa la bkal pa'i khur thog rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas so//_de la bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa/_bsod nams me yis mi 'chi ka 
[\[ ]ste_/rlung gos 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/_bsod nams chu yis 'ju mi 'gyur/_/_sa bzhin du ni khyer mi 'gyur/_/rgyal po dang ni chom rkun gyis/_/'phreg tu med par bsod nams gnas//_skyes pa dang ni bud med kyis/_/'brog par nus pa ma yinano/_/bsod [ \[326]
nams bde ba bskyed pa'i gter/_/'di'i ni lus par mi 'gyur te/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa ru/_/da dang der rjes su 'brang /_/zhes so/_/de lta bsod nams 'ba' zhig la gus par blta ba'ang gnas skabs kyi bde skyid la dmigs pa can ma yin par chos la semA 
pa'i snying stobs rgya chen po bskyed dgos pa'i tshul/_/_chos la sems pa'i go cha rnam par su//zab rgyas chos khams rgya mtsho dbang po'i mtshon/_/bdudA par blo yi spobs sam mi spobs kun/_/_snying stobs gnyen po'i dbang du gtong ba rnams//_lam mi 'chag par 
phyin drug stong du 'gro/_bdag cag gi ston pas kyang byang chub chen po'i lam la thugs bskyed bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsag pa'i slad du dka' ba spyad de ye shes dam pa'i tshogs kyi pha rol du phyin nas mngon par sangs rgyas te sems can thams cad/

@#/_/kyimagon por gyur pa yin na/_bdag cag kyang go 'phang de bsgrub pa la donamathun pa'i phyir/_bde sdug dang*/_rkyen bzang ngan ci byung yang /_'chi ba srog la bab kyang /_mi rgod dang gcan gzan gyis gtugs kyang /_tshong pa yul ngan la mi 'dzems 
pa'am/_ded dpon rgya mtsho la zhugs pa bzhin rkyen thog tum 'chor ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha gyon nas/_zab pa'i chos rgya mtsho lta bu'am rgya che ba'ichos nam mkha' lta bu gang yang rung ste/_gnyis ka'i phyogs la sems zhum pa dang*/_brtul zhugs dman pa'i 
nyes dmigs mtha' dag bkag nas/_'di ltar lha'i dbang po'i gzhani gling bzhi pa'i khyad stobs po ches kyang bdud par spobs pa ma yin kyang minus so snyam pas sems zil gyis non pa cher bcad de snying stobs kyi gnyen po bsten pa dper na ded dpon [ \[327]
slong ldan gyisanor bu'i slad du rgya mtshoskems par 'dod nas snyim pa'i chu phyags 'debs pa la brtan pa mi lhod pa'i snying stobs la rgyu mtsho'i glu yang sgrog nas nor bu byin pa lta bu'i gang zag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi steng du lamami 'chag tu 'gro ba 
yin no/_/_de yi mthun phyogs yan lag bdun pa dang*/_/_chu gtor la sogs bsag sbyang mtha' dag yin/_/_mi mthun phyogs kyis de la mi brdzi zhing /_/_lam du 'gro ba bsod nams dag la bsten/_/'din skyes bu chen po'i lam stegs yin//de la pha 
rol phyinapa drug na thog pachen po'i gzhung lam yin la/_phyogs bgrod par byed pa la'ang bza' btung dang /_khams gso ba'i thabs dang /_dgra rkun gyi 'tsho ba skyeb pa'i cho ga dum 'du byed pa bzhin/_'dir bsod nams kyi bya ba'i yan lag skyabs su 'gro 

ba dang//yan lag bdun pa dang /maN+Dal dang /_chu gtor la sogs pa bsag sbyang rgya chen po mngon par 'du byed dgos/_de la bsod nams bsog pa'i blo la skyes shing*/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu bslu ba med pa la yid chesan/_'byor pa dpalongs spyod kyi nyon mongs 
so zer ba dag la'ang mir gyur pa'i lus rten yod cing*/_de'i 'du 'god las bod 'dir chu gtsang ma gcig pu la brten nas zhing dag pa la bsam pa rgya chen pos mchod sbyin bgyis pa'i bsedanyams gcig pus kyang chog ste/_rgya gar sogs su sa drod bdo bas murtog 
pacan 'ba' zhig las gtsang mar gyur pa gang rung rung rnyed pa ma yinano/_/des na rdzas dang yo byad lam thogs rang gi dad pa dang brtson 'grus la thogs pa 'di skyon can du bltas nas/_gzhan gyi dge ba la rjes su yi rang ba bskyed pa dang /_bdag pos ma bzung ba'i me [B28]
tog dang*/_'bras bu la sogs pasamachod pa dang*/_lus bkol nas mchod yon 'bul ba dang /_me tog dang /gtsug lag khang gi skyed tshal gsos gdab pa dang*/_skam sar nyams nyes pa'i nya lachu sbreng ba dang*/_rdzing bu dang*/_steng ka la sogs pa gnod ba'i yul du 
gyur nas srog chags phramo srog gi 'jigs pas brtabs shing skrag pa la mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa bstsal ba dang /_rgyud las/_mo dz+hAn a ba lo ki te na mas man h+pha ra Na rasmi b+ha ba sa ma ya/_mahAm Ni/_du ru du ru hrid ya nga la na hUM/_'bab chu'am rgya mcho'i 'gro 
du 'jug ste lag pa g.yas pa'i khyor bar chu blugs la/_ye shes skar mda'i snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas te/_chu khyor ba bdun 'bab chur gtor nasangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i yi dgas ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i zhal zas kyi rodang /_btung /

@#/_/ba'i mchog dang ldan pa thob cing /_yi dwags re re'ang kha zas dang btung ba yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bdun bdun gyi 'tsho bar byas par 'gyur zhing /_chu de 'thungs pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad yi dwags kyi skye gnas las thar zhing bde 'gro mtho 
ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/bumo'am/_gzhan yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa/_yi dwags sam/bya'am/_chu la gnas pa la sogs pa gang gis chu de 'thungs pa de dag thams cad sdig pa dang /
sgrib pa thams cad byang nas bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro//_zhes dang /_de bzhin du zan 'khrul la brten cing yongs su grags pa/_gzugs legs zhes bya ba'i gzungs su ba dang /_grong khyer ser skyar kun dga' bo la gsungs pa rgya chen shug [329]
ldan dang gcung dga' bo la gsungs pa kha la me 'barama'i gzungasamatshan bzhi'i phan yon dang 'khril ba dang /_mchog zung la gsungs pa 'jur gegasakyi gzungs la sogs mdor na 'bad pa dang rgyu tshogs chung du la brten pa bgrang gis mi ldang ba dang*/
de bzhin du zag pa lus sbyin dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_lam srang la byi dor byed pa sogs/_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang mgonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyag daramadzadan/_bdag cag gi blo bkol du ma btub pas bsadanamasakyi

@#/_/_skyob par yang mi nus shing /_gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa dang /_rang 'dod med pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes sangs rgyas kyi yon tanamathonganas bstod pa/_bdag ni stonab 
gzhan spangs nas/_/_khyed la skyabs sumachilags kyis//ci yi slad du zhen khyed//_skyon mi mnga' la yon tan rdzogs/_/zhes pa la sogs bas bstod pa yin no//de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spang bya ma lus pa spangs pas rang nyid 'jigs 
pa med pa'i gnas thob pa dang /_rtogs par bya ba mtha' dag rtogs shing yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas gzhan 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i nus pa dang thabs la mkhas pa gnyis ka da ldan/_kun la nye ring med pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas skyabs su [\[33\]]
[g]'os pa'o//de skad du bstod pa brgya lnga bcu pa las/_gang zhig gang la nyes pa kun/_/gtananas yong ye mi mnga' zhing /_/gang la rnam pa thams cad du//_yon tan thams cad gnas gyur ba/_/_gal te sems shig yod na/_/de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing /_/
de bstod de ni bkur ba dang /_/de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs/_/zhesas/_/de'i phyir ston pa sangs rgyas dang /_de'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos dang /_de nyams su len pa nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su songan bslu ba med pas 
na skyabs 'gro bdun cu pa las kyang /_sangasargyas chos dang dge 'dunani/_/thar pa 'dod pa rnamasakyi skyabs//_zhes so//'di lam gyi thog mar nges pa'ang /_bstan pa la thod rgal du zhugs na lam 'og ma'i yon tan ma skyes par gong ma 'thob par mi nus pa'i

rgyas nyid kyis bsgrubs zin kyang /_nang gi yan lag de la blo rtse gcig tu bkal nas skyabs su 'dzin pa'i stobs ma tshang bas byis parnams sdug bsngal ba yin te/_bsngags 'os bstod pa las/_phyi yi yan lag stobs kun ni/_khyod kyis yang dag bsgrub lags 
kyang //nang gi stobs dgam tshong bas/_/_byis brnams ni sdug bsngal bsten/_/_zhes so/_/don de ston phyir/_thar par 'gro ba'i lam dang yon tan gyi/_/rten dang snod du dam bca' mi bslu ba/_/skyabs su 'gro ba nyid de de'i sngon du/_/ston dang bstan pa'i yon tan shes pa gany+tse/[1332]
zhes 'ams nas/_'diltar ston ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas thar par 'gro ba'i lam bslab pa gsum dang /_spangs rtogs kyi yon tan ma lus pa'i skyon dang snod lta bu mtshang ba med pa sngon du bsgrub par mdzad nas skyabs kyi yul du 'os pa'i dam bca' bslu ba med pa

@#/_/gnas skabs 'ar/_srog la bab kyang phyir mi ldog pa dgos//de la bde legs thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni dadapa yin te dkon mchog ta la'i mdo las/_da pa sngon 'grom ltar bskyedapa ste/_yon tan thams cad bsrung zhing 'phel b.rabyed//

[7 ]nang 'di ltar mthong na mimathun pamed pa bdagacag gi ston pa'am/_de'i zhal skyin dang /_de bzhin du sangasargyas dang byang chub sems pa'i snang brnyan mthong ba dang /_yinatan thos pa dang /_sde snod bklag pa la sogs 
pas dad pa'i gsos byedapa yin te/_ma skyes dgra'i glang po che nor skyong gis btsem ldan 'das mthong ba'i mod la/_khro gtum gyi sems zhi ba dang /_yul gan d+ha'i tshod pas grong khyer btsim brlag tu phyin pa na/_bram ze rnams kyis 'di dag ni nad pa'i dge

grub mtha' la zhugs/_ngaltar mi byed na khyed gsad do zhes bsdigs pas dge bsnyenanare/_chig tsam du ni khyod kyi 'dod pa bsgrub/_snying thag pa nasani mi gtong byas pas/_de srog dang bral bar byas so//de'i phyir dang po gnyis ni las dang po ba'i dad pa ste rkyen /
gyis 'phrog par gdon mi za la/_phyi ma gnyis ni smon par bya ba'i gnas ma nor ba yin no//_yang dad pa skye ba'i rgyu ni bzhi yin te//dam pa bsten dang dam pa'i grogs dang 'grogs//dkon mchog rjes su dran dang 'khor ba la//_snying po med pa'i sa _ 
dmigs bsams las skye//dam pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa zhig la brten phyin chad de'i rang bzhinAni gzhan la bsten pa'ilam de la rang nyid kyang gnas pas don mthun pa dang /_gzhan yang thabs ji lta bus lam la 'arjod pa'i don spyod pas mdzod spyod dad phyag [336]
gzhes thams cad mang du thos pa dang /_dad pa 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gro bas na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las//dad pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yul gong ma la dad pa mang ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang*/_'phags pa la blta bar 'dod pa dang /

bzhin du dad pa can gyi gang zag dang grogs su 'grogs na'ang de'i spyod pa shugs kyis 'go ba chos nyid yin te/_'tsho byed gzhon nu'i gsos kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la stonapa'i yon tan bsgrugs nas dad par byas pa ltar gzu bor gnas pa'i yid ni phan pa

@#/_/dang /_ngag ni bden pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas so/_/de skad du chos bcu pa'i mdo las/_gang gis 'dren pa des 'byung ba/_/dad pa theg pa'i mchog yin te//de phyir blo dang ldan pa'i mis//dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bsten//zhes gsungaso//_kon

bden gsangato_
rnams la ni dad pa'i mi mthun phyogs chen po gcig yod de/_gang zhin/_ring po mi thogs paratsho'i mthas gtugasanas phung po dur khrod du nyam nyes par 'gyur ba mi dran pa dag ni lasakyi zhags pas bsdams pa yin te/_de skad du/_las kyi zhags pas [ 537]
bcings pa yi/_/lus can rnams la bya bzhin du/_/'chi ba bsgom pa'i nus pa dag_/gshog pa ldan yang yodam yin//ces so//de las log na 'khor ba spyi dang bye brag gi nyes dmigs dung /_khyad par ngan song gi sdug bsngal bzod mi bod pa'i rang 
[j]kyi_
bzhin la 'jigs pa dang /_nges 'byung gi sna khrid nas dkon mchog gi yon tan dran zhing dad pa skye ba'i sgo 'byed pa yin te/_rgyamatshos zhus pa las/_dad pa chogs pa'i sgo lachags pa med/_/_mi khom spong zhing dad pa'i mchog gcig yin//dad pa 
bod*
7rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob byed yin/_/gang dag 'di 'dra'i chos la dad byed pa/_/de dag so so skye bo'i tshogasan dkono/_/zhes dang*/_byang sa las/dad pa ni dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod pa dang*/_/las dang rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang /_de la brten par byed/

mnyes par byed pa'o//zhes so/_/de'i phyir dad pa skye ba'i rgyu bzhi pon_rnam pa kun tu rgyud la brten dgos pa yin te/_dad pa medan skyabs 'gro dang gsol 'debs 'bum ther la 'bad kyang gti mug gis 'gro ba ga 'khyal khegs pa'i rgyu tsam dang /_shes rab 
che bas skyabs 'gro'i rnam par bzhag pa la mkhas kyang 'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba tsamam/_/_rgyu des na chos bcu pa dang dkon mchog brtsegs pa phyogs mthun par/_dad pa med pa'i mirnams la/_/dkar po'i chos rnams mi 'byung ste/_/_sa 
bon me yis 'tshig pa la/_/_myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no/_/_zhes sa//phan yon ni/_dkon mchog sgron ma'i mdo las/_sangasargyasarnams dang chos la dad gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dad byed pa/_/byang chub bla na med pa dad gyur na/_/skyes bu chen pa [ B38]
rnams kyi sems skye'o/_/ces gsungs sa/_/de la dkon mchog gi yon tan bshad pa'i phyir/_/_thub pa rnams kyi yon tanamatha' yas te/_/_spangs pa gnyis kyis nyon shes sgrib pa bcom/_/spyan dang mngon shes dbang 'acu gzungs kyi sgo/_/_stobs bcu mi 'jigs 
bzhi dang sa se rig_/_ma 'dres bco brgyad rdzogs pa sangs rgyas te/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan chos kyi sku/_/_sa bcu'i 'khor la longs spyod rdzogs par ston/_/de lamatshan don gyi sgonas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par phyi ltar du 
bshadan/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das zhes 'jig rten na snyan par grags pa gang yin pa de ni/_'dod chags la sogs pa bcom pa nyid kyis sam/_byang chub snying po la bzhugs pa la bar du gcod par brtson pa'i bdud kyi sde bcom pas na bcom/bskal

[J]9
_sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi'i mthar thug pa yin te 'og tu 'chad bar 'gyur ro/_/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'phags pa stong phrag brgya par bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas yang dag par rdzogs [339]
9[#|]pa'i byang chub bo//zhes pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad yang dag par phyin tsam log par kun nas sangs rgyas bas na yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyus so/_/de skad du skyabs 'gro bdun cu pa las/_ma rig gnyid las sangs

[31 ]bdun cu 
_mi ldog pa'i gnas su gshegs pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa ni/_sems can gyi 'jig rten rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyi rnam par bzhag pa yongs sumakhyen la/_de bzhin du snod kyi 'jig rten gyi yang 

chogasa'ajig gnas steng tshod dang rang bzhin thams cad mnor bar mkhyen pa'o//rnam pa gcig tu 'jig rten gyi tha snyad bzang po yongs su mkhyenapa la grags kyis/_so so skye bo'i ring bzhin dang g.yo sgyu la sogs pa'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa dang phyogs 
'gal bar shes par bya'o//gangul bar rung ba skyes bu yin la/_dedag gdul zhing kha lo bsgyur bas na/_skyes bu gdul ba kha lo bsgyur ba'o//_nyan thos dang rang sangasargyas dag las khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir na bla na med pa ste 'phags pa'i lam thob 
par rig par bya'o/_/_lha dang mi rnams ni mtho ras kyi 'gro ba khyad par can 'phags pa'i lam gyi snyed kyang yin pas de dag la phyin sgog par ston pas na lha dang mirnams kyi ston pa de kho na nyid thugs su chud pas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes [340]
de bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid la tshig bla dgas su byas nas tshig mjug mi mngon par byas pa3 phyir ro//ngeba'i bzhugasatshul gyi sgo nas yon tan gyi khyad par nang ltar du bshad na/_'diltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad 
spangs pa ste mthong spangs dang bsgrom spangs kyis nyon mongs pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa mthu' dag spangs pa'o//yang rnam pa gcig tun/_legs par spangs pa/_slar mi ldog par spyas pa/_ma lus par spungs pas na spyas pa gsum gyi yon 
tan can te/rig pa'i dbang phyug gis/_rgyu spangs yon tan gsum bde gshegs/_/sogs rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no//_yon tan rdzogs pa'i cha nas spyan lnga dang /_mdon par shes pa drug dang /dbang bcu dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dad /_stobs bcu dang /

[$ ]'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'o/_/_sha'i spyan gyis dpag tshad brgya nas stong gsum tshun chod kyi gzugs phra rags thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'o/_/_mngon par shes pa drug las rdzu 'phrul kyimangon par shes pa'i sa g.yo ba dang [ 341]
gcig tu bsgyur zhing du mar sprul pa la sogs pa'o/_/_lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sgra che chung mtha' dag ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'o/_/gzhan sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ni/_gzhan rgyud nyon mongs pa 
brgya /_/_lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa_/_bskal pa dang ma bskal pa'i gzugs 
dang bral ma brol sogs mngon sum du gtan la phebs pa'o/_/_sngon gnas rjes dran kyi mngon par shes pa ni/_/rang gzhan gyi tshe rabs snga ma brgya stong la sogs pa'i bar shes pa'o
rgyuphra rags thams cadamangon sum gyis rtogs pa'o/_/zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa ni/_sgrib pa gnyis spong ba'i shubs dang /_spangs pa'i bral ba mngon du zhes pa'o/_/de dag bsam gtan bzhi la brten nas phan tshun rgyu 'bras grub pa'i tshul _/

gyis thob pa'ang mngon pa kun las btus las/_phyi rol pa'am/_nyan thos sam/_byang chubasems dpa' yang rung ste/_bsam gtan bzhi la brten nas tshad med pa rnams mngon par 'grub po/_/tshad med pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par shes pa lnga 
yang de bzhin no//_zhes bshad do/_dbang bcu ni/_bskal pa'i bar du 'tsho bar 'dod kyang gnas par zhus pas tshe la dbang ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo grangs med pa la dbang thob pas sems la dbang ba dang /_nam mkha' mdzod kyi rang bzhin zad mi shes pa la 
mnga' brnyas pas yo byad la dbang ba dang /_bzo dang sgyu rtsal gyi gnas la sogs las kyi 'bras bu ston pa la mnga' brnyas pas las la dbang ba dang /_gang dang gang du 'dod pa'i gnas su skya bar nus pas skye ba la dbang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams tham[ 342]
cad sangs rgyas kyi skus gang bar ston nus pa la sogis mos pa la dbang ba dang /_byang chub chen po'i sprul pa 'gyed nus pas smon lam la dbang ba dang /_gdul bya rnam pa sna tshogs la dusaN+Dig tu rdzu 'phrul mi 'dra ba du ma ston nus pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang 
ba dang /_shes bya thams cad thogs med du mkhyen pas ye shes la dbung ba dang /_chos kyi tshig don thams cad la mkhas pas chos la dbang ba ste/_dbang bcu 'di dag na dag pa'i sa gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa'i khyad chos su mdo sde chos kyi spyan la soT 
panas bshad pa yin no/_/gzungs kyi sgo ni rnam pa tha pa yod de/_de'i rang bzhin ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis/_gzungs zhes bya ba ni dran pa ma nyams pa/_rtog pa ma g.yengs pa/_blo gros ma rmis pa/_shes rab mngon du byed pa/_chos thams cad kyi 

)[ / ]/tshig rab tu tha dad pa shes pa la sogs rgya cher bstan pa'o/_/_stobs bcu ni/_zla ba grags pas/_gnas dang gnas min mkhyen stobs dang /_de bzhin las rnams smin blo dang /_/_mos pa sna tshogs thugs chud dang*/_/_sna tshogs khams kyi

mkhyen stobs dang*/_/de bzhin dbang mchog mchog ma yin/_/_mkhyen dang thams cad du 'gro dang /_/bsam gtanarnam thar ting 'dzin dang /_/snyoms par 'jug sogs mkhyen stobs dang /_/sngon gnas dran pa mkhyen pa dang /_/de bzhin 'chi 'pho skye blo dang /

zug rnams zad pa mkhyen stobs dang*/_/_stobs bcu po ni 'di dag go_/_zhes mdor bstan nas/_de'i rang bzhin dbye ba ni/_rgyu gang zhig las gang zhig nges par skye 'gyur ba/_/de ni de yi gnas su demakhyen rnams kyis gsungs/_/ba_shad pa las ldog gan [343]
min shes bya mtha' yas pa/_/mkhyen pa thogs pa spangs pa de ni stobs su bshad/_zhes pa la sogs pas bkral ba'i don 'di ltar dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang*/_'dres mar spyod pa'i rgyu gang las bde sdug b.rama'i 'bras bu'ang de de bzhin du bslu ba 
rgya _med pa ni gnas dang /_de las ldog pa gang yin pa ni gnas ma yin pa nyid du chags thogs med paramakhyen pa'i stobs dang /_de bzhin du 'dod pa dang /_mi 'dod pa dang /_gnyis ka lasaM ldag pa dang /_de pa'i dngos po ste zag bcas ma yin pa'i las dang/
don gnyis de'i rnam par smin pa dus gsum gyi dngos pas bsdus pa mtha' dag mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dang /_de las gzhan pa mos pa 'bring dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'dod pa la sogs pa dus gsum gyiso so 

skye bo dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs pa mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang mig la sogs pa gzugs can gyi dbang po lnga dang /_de dag gi rnam par shes pa ste gzugs can ma yin pa lnga/_de dag phan tshun yul dang yul :
can du 'brel ba 'dod pa'i la/_rang bzhin stong nyid bcu drug la sogs te khams rnams kyi dbye ba'i bye brag_/dus gsum gyi shes byar srid pa ji snyed pa thams cad dus gcig tu mkhyen pa ste khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_mig la sogs pa'i dbang po 
nyer gnyis 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang*/_desnon po dang*/_'bring dang /_rtul po'i bye brag gis phye ba'i dbang po'i rim pa mtha' dag ma lus par gzigs pa dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_'gro ba drug dang nyan rang /_sangs rgyas kyi _/[ 344]
lam la sogs te yang dag pa dang*/_phyin ci log gi 'gro ba'i rnam pa ji snyed pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_dus gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dgan bsam gtan bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis

[\[ ]pa bzhin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byadaba'i chos rnams kyi khams dang /_ming gi rnam gras bde blag tu mkhyen pasachos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_de dag gi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid lam 'khrul zhingam rmongs pa'i 

mkhyen pa chags thogs med par 'jug pas donaso so yang dag par rig pa dang /_gdul bya'i yul de dang mthun pa'i gsung rnam pa thams cad pa yin pas tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_rang gi ngo bo nyid dang rnam dbye'i bye brag thams cad mkhyen pachags 
thogs med par 'jug pas spangs ba so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/sas rgyas kyi chosam 'dres pa bco brgyadan/_mi pham mgon pos/_'khrul dang ca com mnga' ste//_ston la dran pa nyams mi mnga'//mnyam par ma bzhag thugs mi ma'//'du shes sna

bco brgyad 'dirang bzhin//_sten pa'i ma 'dres yon tan yin/_/ces rgyun chags dang sbrel bsarnam grol phyi ma'i don ni/_shes bya'i don kun gzigs pa grol pa'i ye shes las ni nyams mi mnga'//zhes bshad pa ltar_//de dag ni rnam pa kun tu gsal 
'grib spangs pa thugs kyi yon tan te/_'bras bu'i sangs rgyas bslu ba med pa'i yo shes dam pa'i ngo bo nyid yin la/de'i brten pa'am/_snod du gyur pan gzugs kyi sku gnyis yin pas nazhar la sku'i mtshan dpe dang /_gsung gi yon tan yodra 
bsnyad par 'os te/_drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/_'di lta ste/_zhabs kyi mthil mnyam zhing gang ba yin/_zhabs kyi mthil na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa yod pa yin/_phyag sor phral ring ba yin/_zhabs kyi rting pa zlum la gangab yin//

@#/_/phyag sor gyi bar drwa bar 'brel ba yin/_/phyug dang zhabs 'jam zhing mnyen pa yin/_zhabs byin pa ri dwags kyi rgyal po en la ltar zlum la shugs kyis gzhol ba yin//zhabs kyi lod bu phyir mi snang ba yin/_phyag pus

ka bden gnyis*shing rta_
ltar 'dug pa yin/_rtag pa'i 'od 'dom gang dang ldan pa yin/_lpags pa mnyen zhing 'jam la rdul dang drimasami gos pa yin/_gnas bdun yongs su gang ba yin/_sku'i stod seng+ge ltar 'dug pa yin/_phyag gi lag ngar zlum la shugs [\[347]
kyis gzhol ba yin/_sgrog rus mnyam par gang ba yin/_sku'i stod smad 'byas pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin/zhal gyi tshems bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yin/_tshomasakyi thags bzang zhing mnyam pa yin/tshems kyi mdog dkar ba yin/_'gram 
brgyu_tshapa ri dwags kyi rgyal po so rigangab yin/_ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin/_sha'i dkor gyi mtshan dang ldan pa yin/_ljags ring la yas pa yin/_tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/_spyan gyi mdog mthon mthing ltar 'dug 
don bzhi ba yin/_spyan khyu mchog gi rgyal po ltar 'dug pa yin/_smin mtshamasamadzod spu dkar po dang ldan pa yin/ces so/_/de la gnas bdunani/_phal chen las/_'dun shin tu mtho ba dang yang ldan par gyur te/_de'i rkang pa gnyis shin tu 

mtho ba dang /_zlum la shin tu legs pa dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_tshigs pa mi snang ba dang /_shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang /_blta na sdug pa gnyis par gyur to//lag pa gnyis/_thal gong gi lhun gnyis/_ltag pa gcig ste de ltar bdun no//zhes pa ltar 
phyag zhabs kyi rgyab bzhi/_phrag pa'i bar gnyis/_lag pa'i phyogs te gnas bdun sku shas gangabasan shin tu mtho ba la sogs pa'i khyad chos drug dang ldan pa'o//_sha'i do ker ni gtsug tor ltar mi mngon pa'o//_de dag kyang mdo de nyid las_/

ba ma yinano//_sbyad pa bcu gsum la gnas pa'i tshomatshan rnams kyang mngon gsal bar yongs su rdzogs so/_/zhes gsungs so_/_de ltar mtshan so gnyis 'di dag 'byung ba'i rgyu rkyen yang se ser bshad mod kyi/_mdor bstun mdo de nyid las/_de'i rgyu de'i 
rgyun yang dag pa ni tshul khrims dang brtson 'grus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhen/_gal te tshul khrims ma bsrungs brtson 'grusam spyan mi'i lus kyang thob paraminusan/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_zhes bshad do/_/de bzhin du da

_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /rnam dad /ser gdub dang /rnam byang phulatsan dang /_me tog bzang po dang /_/dpag bsam gyi zhidang/_'khor lo dang /_dbung gi seng+ge dang /'di rnamasani ri mo'i rjes kyimatshan brgyad cu yin te/_'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[7 ]don lnga
_pa'i phyag dang /_zhabs kyi mthil la 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal mtshan brgyad cu'i rimar gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsodanams kyi phung po de bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/_de bzhin gshegs  _  

        pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig tu 'gyur te/_de bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis re rer 'gyur ro//_zhes so//dpe byad brgyad cu ni/_mdo sde'i don/_sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bur dmar skya dang /_sen mo'i mdog snum pa dang /shang 
sheng med cing mtho ba dang /_zlum pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_byin gyis phra ba dang /_sku lus kyi rtsa mi mngon pa dang /_mdud pa med pa dang /_zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa dang /_ring thung med pa'i mnyam pa dang*/_mo zil gyis gnon pa la mkhas pa sa sgo stabs 
gshegs pa dang /_klu zil gyis gnon ba la mkhas pa glang po che lta bur gshegs pa dang /_nam mkha' la 'byon pa bya dang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa dang*/_sems can gyi sna 'dren pa la mkhas pa khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa dang /_skor phyogs kyi man 
dag dang mthun par g.yas su ldog cing gshegs pa dang /_bawan sdug cing mdzes par gshegs pa dang /_mi g.yo ba drang por gshegs pa dang /_sha rgyas shing 'gying legs pas 'khril bag chags par gshegs pa dang /_gtsang zhing dag pas sku byi dor byas 
pa lta bu dang /_sku ring thung dang sbom phra sogs thad kar ma 'chol bas romi par 'tsham pa dang /_sku chog pa zhi bas gtsang ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_rnam par dag pa dang /_mtshan yongs su rdzo gas pa dang /_sku'i khyon che bas kho lag yangs shing bzang ba dang /_ga
pa dal myur snyoms pa dang /_drim ra rimed pas spyan gnyis dag pa dang /_sku gzhon shachags pa dang /_sku zhum pamed pa dang /_sha tshul rgyas pa dang /_sku sha grims pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag rnam par 'byes pa dang /_glo bur gyi drim dang bral bas gza' 

@#/_/_pa rnam par dag pa dang /_sku'i phyal zlum pa dang sked skabs 'tsham pas skabs phyin pa dang*/rked pa tacad ring bas yin pas skum stongs pa dang /_sku'i phyal phyung nge bsamatho dman med pa dang /_lte ba zab cing g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba 
[N]6cha[b ]
dang*/_spyod lam kunanas bstan sprug pa dang*/_sku gsung thugs kun spyod gtsang ba dang /_sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med pa dang /_phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa dang /_phyag gi ri momadangs gsal ba dang /_rgyang ring menas gsal ba'i thub pa dang /_phyag 
gi ri mo ring ba dang*/_zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang /_zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang zhing mchu sgros bal ltar dmar bad _ljags ring zhingamaton pa dang /_srab pa dang /_yar ba dang /_gsung 'brug sgraltar sgrog pa dang /_snyan zhing 'jam pa dang*//[ 35|]

rdzogs pa dang*/_smig tshugs ring ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_snum pa dang /_spumanyam pa dang /_phyag ring zhing rgyas pa dang /_snyanamanyam pa dang /_de'i dbang po ma nyams pa dang /_skra mtshams yod pas dpral ba legs par 'byes pa dang /_dbyes che ba dang /_dbu

dad |de'i mtharasrin lag la sogs pa'i gsham du ri mo bdun g.yas su 'khyil ba'i g.yung drung 'khyil bas kyang brgyan pa'o//de dag ni/_mdo dang bstan bcos rnams las rgya cher grags pa'i dbang du byas pa ste/_gzhan du na dpe byad kho na'i rnam grangs kyang brjod 
bar mi nus te/_drin lan gsab pa las/_dpe byad bzad po re re la'ang dpe byad bzang po'i mchog dam pa brgya stong ji snyed yod de/zhes dang /_gzhan yang semasacan thams cad kyi bsod nams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad so se'i che khyad
kyi rnam par bzhag pa'ang mdo de nyid las/_semasacan thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed cig yod pa phyogs gcig tu bsdus te spungasan/_da bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu gcig gi mtshan dang mnyamam/_/ba spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed [ 352]
cig yod pa gcig tu bsdus te spungasan/_dpe byad bzang po gcig dang mnyamam/_/dpe byad bzang po tsam yod pa'i bsodonams ji snyed yod pa de las brgya 'gyur du byas namatshan gcig dang mnyam te/_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po'imatshan dang /
spyi gtsug bltar mi snang bo'i mtshon na ma gtogs so/_/de ma yin pa mtshan gzhan thams cad stong 'gyur du byas na/_mtshan gong ma gnyisasu 'gyur ro/_/mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis da /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu pa'i bsod nams ji snyed yod pa _ _

@#/_/rabaskyed du grags shing semasacan gyi don du byams pa dang snying rje chen po spyod pas drin shes ba dang /_drin gsab pa dang /'dini bsam gyis mi khyab po//zhes pa la sogs pa'i rnam gzhag gis mthar thug gsung gi dpe byad la mngon/

ka bden gnyis shing rta_gsungani 'gog lamagyi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa thams cadakyirang bzhin du gnas pas 'ching bamatha' dag gis bcings pa'i sos skye bo rnams kyang tshorabs gzhan du rang gi phamar shes pa'i byams pa

de ltar nges pa'i don gyi rgyamatshanani 'diyin te/_gsung sgratshig radamachan paramed la/_gdul bya'ims pa dang /_sas rgyas kyi byin rlabs dang /_dus su tshogs pa'i rkyen gsum 'dzom pa las skyes bu'i rnam rig la gsal ba ste/_gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab 
pa'i mdo_las/_zhi ba'i blo gros/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/_kod: lamig mi rtag go zhes bka' stsal 'chi/_sdug bsngal gyis 'dul brnams kyis ni/_mig sdug bsngal lo zhes thosaso//_bdag med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni/mig

lung ston pas kyang /rtog pa med cing 'khrug pa med/_/_yid 'od sde'i gsung gcig la/_/gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gisani/_/_bye bragamang por 'gyur ba yin/_/ces so//de lta mod kyi thun mong ba'i snang ngor sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku'i gsung gi yon 
tan gyi yan lag drug cur rdzogs ba yin te/_ti'i snang bar gsang ba bsam gyisami khyab pa'i don bstan pa'i rjes su 'brang na/_sems can gyi khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa'i phyir gsung mnyen pa dang /_mthong chos su bde ba la reg pa'i phyir 
'jam pa dang /_don bzang ba'i phyir yid du 'ong ba dang /_yi ge bzang ba'i phyir yid du 'thad pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa zla named pa'i rjes las 'thon pa'i phyir dag pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal gyi bag chags thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir [356]

bdang /_legs par sbyar ba'i skad la sogs pa sgra'i mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang*:_bsnyel te gsud bamama' ba'i phyir zur chag pa med pa dang /_gdul bya rnams kyi bya ba dus thams cad du nye bar gnas par mdzad pa'i [ \[358]
patshang bamed pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur ste lam brten pa'i phyir ma zhum pa dang /_bsnyes pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi zhan pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i phyir rab tu dga' ba dang /_rig pa'i gnas thamasacad lamakhas pa dang sprin pa'i phyir khyab pa dang /_sem/

brjod pa yin//ces khams kyi ye shes mngon du gyur pa'i rigacha leg pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'chad par 'gyur ba dang /_gzugs canA gzugs la blta ba'i rnam par thar ba de nang gzugs kyi snang bum 'gags pas phyi rol kyi gzugasaMsnang [ 360]
steng snumar blta bas smad ba'i bden zhen log pa'o/_/_gzugs can ma yin pa gzugasal blta ba'i rnam par thar pananang gzugs su mi mgis pas phyi rol gzugs la blta ba'i phyind gi bden zhen las thar pa'o/_/_gegs sel sdug pa'i 
rnam por thar pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ro gcig par blta bas 'dzin pa kun las thar ba'o//nam mkha' mtha' yas skyemached kyi rnam par thar pa ni sems nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i donamathong ba'o//rnam shesamatha' yas kyi mchod kyi

brgya _
rtogs pa ye shes kyi nyim la bu glo bur gyisgrib pa cha dngabacas pa spangs shing /_rtogs pa'i yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i chos nyid nges pa nyid du blos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin te rgyud bla ma las/_sangs rgyas nyid ni dbyer med pa//dag 
gyagacig 
sgro_pa'itshesakyirab dbye bar//nyi[t]kha' bzhin ti ye shes dang*/_/sbyangs rtogs gnyis kyi mtshan nyidad/_/'od gsal bya min dbyer med par//_'jugatsan gang+gA'i klung gi _ ni/_/rdul las 'das po'i sangs rgyas kyi/_/chos rnams kun dang ldan pa nyid//

'khor ba'i ma kun gzhi tshogs brgyad dang bcas pa dbyings dag mnyam chen po'i sbubs su nub pa'i stobs gyi cha nas bzhag pa'i gzhi'i gnas lugs kyi snang cha'i yon tan stong gzugs kyi skur yongs su rdzo[l]
ces se//_lengs spyod rdzogs sku na/_/

ka _@#/_/pa'i khams dang gzugs med du//sangs rgyas mngon par sangs mi rgya/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi 'ogamin du/_/'dod chags bral khyod dar sangasargya//_zhes pa dang 'gal lo snyaman de ni bdag cag gi ston pa'i dbang du byasan//

bden gnyim shing

 _བླ་ཉམས་དགའ་བར། ། ཡང་དག་སངས་རྒྱས་དེར་སངས་རྒྱས། ། སྤྲུལ་པ་པོ་གཅིག་འདིར་སངས་རྒྱས།། ཞེས་བསྟན་པ་ཡིནནོ།། སྟོན་པ་རྣམས་ཀྱིམཚན་དཔེའི་སྤྲུལ་པའི་སྐུ་དང་ཐུནམོང་བ་ཉིར་དུ། མངོན་རྟོགས་རྒྱན་ལས། མཚན་ནི་སུམཅུ་ l

brten gnyis[a ]

pa dang /_so so skye bo'i phongs pa dang rgud pa las grol ba'o//rtogs pa'i khyad par ni bsgom byung gi ye shes bdag med gnyis rtogs pa'o//_yon tan gyi khyad par ni tid de 'dzin dang /_spyan dang /_mngon shes dang /_rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa du ma dang ldan pa'o//tshogs

las bshad pas mthong lam yin la/_shin tu rnam par dag go zhes pa nas brgyad pa'i ye shesaso/_/_lus kyi rtenani 'gro ba lnga gang rung la/_bsam pa'i rten ni bsamaM gtan bzhi pa'o//de la tshes gang mngon du gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur /

[bla ]
pa'o//btang snyoms ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rnal du 'dug pa dang lhun gyis grub pa gang yin pa'o/_/chos bdun po 'di dag ni mthong ba'i lam byang chub zag pa med pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lagacasa'akhod
du gyur par bstan to/_/_ngo bani rang gi ngo skal du gyur chid kyimathong spangs nyon sgrib dang shes sgrib gnyis kyi cha las grol ba ste/_dbus mtha' las/_nyon mongs pa yi sgrib ba dang /_/_shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis su bstan//de yi sgrib pa thams [\[373]
[cºt ]
[g ]hud de/_/_de zad nas ni grol bar 'dod/_/ces so/_/de yang nyon shes gnyis kyi sgrib pa'i khyad par ni/_rgyud bla mar/_ser sna la sogs rnam rtog gang /_/nyon mongs pa yi sgrib par 'dod/_/'khor gsum rnam par rtog pa gang /_/_de ni shes bya'i

[phuc ]
gyi ngo bo gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa yul yul can du 'brel ba ni shesasgrib yin no/_/de'ang nyon sgrib kun brtags rnamasanamathong sprad yin la/_lhan skyes ni bsgom spang yin_/_/_de bzhin du shes sgrib gzung 'dzin gyirtog pa rags pa rnamasarnamakhrod /

spang yin la/_phra ba rnamasanibasgom spang yinano//rnam grangasani/_kun brtags gang zhig mthong lamagyogazhod byar gyur pa'i mthong spang kyi 'tshan nyid do/_/dbye na ngo bo'i sgo nas 'dodachags/_/khong khro/_nga rgyal/_ma rig pa/_the tshom mo/_/leg par 'jug tshul gyi sgo nas 
'jig tshogs la bltab|_mdab+bar 'dzinapa'i bltab/_log par blta ba/_lta ba la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i blta ba/_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i bltab ste lnga dang /_'dod chags khong khro/_nga rgyal/_ma rig pa/_the tshom ste lta min lngabasdoms pas 
ba min zas rjes ma[wax]par 'gas pa lasnyegs pa'i zam gzhag shes bar 'dod na[h7]
bcu'/_tshul sdudabargyadashargyu gnyis sa/_/_da'adabang pad
grubamatha' rin po cher blta'o/_/'dir ni de dag gi phra rgyas spus pa'i 'bras bu ye shes skye ba la ltos nas sa dang po'i nges pa rung zad bzhag na/_mdo sde rgyan las/_byang chub lan nye ba dang /_/sems can don grubamadzod ba la/_/rab tu dga' ba skye 'gyur te/_de phyir rab 
ngaga' zhes byar brjod/_/zhesapaltar/'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thog mar thob pa de'i cha spyad byas bon dang bcas pa 'gag pa dus mnyam/_so sor rtog pa'i shes rabakyis bdag med gnyis mngon sum du rtogs/_chos kyi dbyings de rang gzhan thams 
cad la kun tu 'gro ba dang /_khyadapa rtogs pas bdag gzhan mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi semasartogs/_sngon med pa'i dga' brgya chen po thob pas na sa dang po rab tu dab/'ab zhes bya ste/_sa skad cig ma gcig la sas rgyas brgyu'i zhal blta ba dang /_sas 

[: ]@#/_/rgya bas byin gyis brlabs par shes pa dang /_sbrul pa brgya 'gyed pa dang*/_su bskal ba brgyar sten pa dang*/_sngon dang phyi ma'i gnas brgyal ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'jug pa dang*/_ting nge 'dzin brgya la snyoms par 'jug cing ljang ba dang 
[, ]ses dun brgya smin par byed pa dang /_zhing khams brgya g.yo bar byed pa dang /_zhing khams brgya 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa dang /_chos kyi sgo brgya 'byed pa dang /_rang gi lus brgyar ston pa dang*/_las re re la 'khor phun sum tshogs pa brgya brgyas bskor bar ston pa 
tsaka_dang |_'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba'i lceb 'dzani nus so/_/bzhi ba ni/_de ltar yeshes kyi rang bzhin mthong zin bsgom par byed pas na bsgom pa'i lam ste/_de'i mtshan nyid ni theg chen gyi thong lam rdzogs pa'i phyi nas 'byung zhing theg chen gyi dge bas bsdus sa[375]
[# ]/gang zhig theg chen mi slob pa'i lam gyi skad cig ma dang po shes rgyud la skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o/_/_lus kyi rten ni gling gsum gyi skyes pa dang bud med 'dod gzugs kyi lha dang bcas pa la skye ba shas che zhing /_mdo sdergyan las/_bsams bzhin srid pa len pa 
bya[ |]dang*/_/zhes pas gzhan la'ang skye mi rung ba'i mtha'am bkag go_/bsam pa'itanani bsam gtan bzhi pa'o/_/de'ang mchin gzhi sa bcu'i rang bzhin gyi'akhor du gtogs pa'i dge ban 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yin te/_bshes spring las/
rgyud
_yang dag lta dang 'tsho dang rtsol ba dang*/_/dran dang ting 'dzan ga dang las mtha' dang /_/_yang dag rtog nyid lam gyi yan lag brgyad/_/_zhes pa las/_yang dag pa'i lta ba ni zag pa med pa'i shes rab po/_/_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni kha gsag dang log pa'i 

'tshob spangs pa'o/_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni brtson 'grus te/_da yang yang dag spong ba bzhi nyid do//yang dag pa'i dran pa'i dmigs pa ma brjed pa'o//'di yang dran pa nye bar gzhig pa bzhi dang mthun te/_dran pa nyid dran pa nye bar 'jog pa ni dran pa nyar 'jog 
pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de yang yang dag gi dran pa'i mtshan nyidamathar thug pa ni shes rab nyid yin te/_bshes spring gi 'grel par/_gang dag 'dis dran pa nye bar 'jog pa zhes 'chad pa de dag gi gzhung lugs kyis ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes rab yin no//
zhes bshad do/_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o//_yang dag pa'i ngag ni ngag la brten pa'i dge ba'i las lam bzhi'o//_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni lus kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi lam spong ba'i rang bzhin gsum/_yang dag pa'i [\] 376]
rtog pa'i gnod sems med pa dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_dge ba'i rtog pa rnam pa du ma rnyed yin no//de ltara'aphags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po 'di ni zhi ba'i gnas te/_mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bsgos pas na/'di ni zhib bgyi 
slang bsgo par bgyi/_/_zhes pa la sogs pa bstan to//de'angaser sna lasogasapa'i mi mthun phyogs bcu sel ba la ltos nas sa bcur nges pani/_phal po che las/_kye rgyal ba'isras dgas bcu po'adi dag la mimathun pa'i phyogs bcu dag par byaba'i phyir la 
rol tu phyin pa bcus lhag par phye ba yinano//_sa dang por ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshor spyod la/_lcogamarnams kyang cinusanus su mi bsgrub pa ni ma yinano/_/zhes panas ye shes kyi pha ro'o[r]tu phyin pa'i bar des 'gro bar gsuso/_de'i spang bya bcu

[# ]bsgyur bar 'gyur/_/_zhes pas 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang*/_/rtsol ba'i drim rnam par dag la/_/sngar bshad pa'i yon tan stong phrag bcu gnyis skad cig la 'thob cing /_gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khe las bsgyur ba'i skye ba 'dzin nus pa'o//_chung ngu'i 'bring 
'awa_sa gsuM pa 'od byed pa_/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las te/_rgyun las/_chos kyi snang ba chen po ni/_/byed pa'i phyiran 'od byed pa//_zhes dang /rin chen phreng ba las/_de yi rnam par smin pasan//_bzod dang btson 'grus lhag par spyod//lha yi dbang chen
mkhas pa ste/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags bzlog pa yin/_/zhesachos kyi snang ba chen po'am/_/ye shes zhi ba'i 'oda'abyung bas bsam gtan dang mngon shes bskyed cing /_yon tan 'bum phrag bcu gnyis yod la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi skyeb 'dzin pa yi/

nas pa canano//chung ngu'i chen po sa bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_rgyan las/_'di ltar byang chub phyogs mthun chos/_/rab tu sreg byed 'od lta bu/_/de dang ldan phyir sa de ni//gnyis pa bsregs pas 'od 'phro can//zhes dang /rin chen phreng ba 
sa de yi rnam par smin pas na//_rab mtha' dral nas lha rgyal 'gyur_/'jig tshogs lta ba ba 'byung ba/_/kun nas 'joms byedamakhas pa yin//_ces yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi 'od sreg byed lta bur rno bas 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ste/_yon tan sngar gyi de lta bubya ba 
gnad 'a[n]cing*/_mtsho ma'i rgyal por skye ba 'dzin to/_/'bring gi chung dus lnga pa sbyang dka' ba ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin paste/_rgyun las/sems can rnams yongs smin byed cing //rang gi sems kyang bsrung ba'i phyir//_blo ldan rnas _sbyang[ 378]

/_shes rab kyi pha rol ta
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_rgyun las/_shes rab pha rolaphyin brten 
//'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/_gnyis 'dir mngon du gyur pa'i phyir//_mngon du gyur pa'i sa zhes bshad/_/ces dang /_phreng ba las/_de yi rnam par smin pas ni/_/_lha yi rgyal po rab 'phrul 'gyur//_zhes sangs rgyas pa'i chos la mngon par phyogs 

b+ha/_@#/_/_phyir/_zhi lhagazung 'brel nyid 'doms pa las 'gog pa thob pa'i yon tan rgyas pa'i phyir te/_sngar gyi yon tan bye ba 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang /_'phrul dga'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'khring gi chen po sa bdun pa ring du song ba thab

dguwu'u 
[1 ]gi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur/_/_zhes mi g.yo ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa ste/_de bzhin du sgo gsum gyi spyod yul thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do/_/de'ang nyon mongs ba can gyi yid gnas 'gyur bas rnam par mi rtog pa la dbang thob pa dang /

'jin pa sgo la'i rnam shes gnas 'gyur bas zhing khams dag pa la dbang thob cing mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la dbang 'byor/_/_stong chen 'bum phrag gcig gi la dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal blta la lasogs byed cing /_tshongs pa'i go 'phang /
'dzin sa/chen po'i 'bring smon lam gyi bu rol tu khyen bu yos su rdzogs pa canas dgu pa legs pa'i blo grosani/_rgyun las/_so so yang dag rig blo bzang //_sa de legs pa'i blo gros yin/_/ces dang /_phreng ba las/_de yi rnam par smin pasazhi//_stong gnyis bdag 
poches chen 'gyur//sems can bsam pa dris pa la/_/dgra bcom sogs kyis 'phrog pa med//ces yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur bas so so yang dag rig pa bzhi la mnga' brnyes shing*/_phrin las phun sum tshogs pa la dbang thob pas sems [ Aa0]
na smin par byed pa'i thabs dang blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pas chos thamasacad kyi de nyid thogs pa med par rig par 'gyur brgyal cheb ma pham ba bzhin te/_de nyid las/_sadagu pani legs pa yi//_blo gros zhes byargyal tshab bzhin//_zhes_/_gzhan*

 brgya [ g]chags tshogs pa'ikun gzhi gnas 'gyur ma thagachosakyi dbyings kyi ye shes la dbang thob ste 'tshang rgya ba yin no/_/yonatan gyi cha nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'adzul gyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i rdul phra rab nyid kyisas 
དེའངས་དང་བོ་སེམས་ཉིད་རང་བཞིན་གྱི་འོད་གསལsའི་སྙིང་པོར་ཉིད་སེམས་ཅན་ཀུན་ལ་ཁྱབ་པརརྟོགས་པས་བདག་གཞོནམཉམ་པ་ཉིད་ཀྱི་བྱང་ཆུབ་ཀྱི་སེམསརྟོགས་སོ། ། ས་གཉིས་པར།
p:རྒྱས་བསྐྱེ་བ་ལ་སོགས་ས་བཅུ་གཉིས་སྐད་ཅིག་སྐདཅིག་ལ་བྱེད་དེ།།
ge gcig
_dziltar rtogs pa de nyidartogs bya rnams kyi mchog tu rtogs pas khams kyi rim spyong ba'i brtson 'grus dang lan no/_/_sa gsum par thos pa de chos kyi dbyings de'i rgya mthun par rtogs pas stong gsum me lce gcigatu gyur pa las kyang brgal nas chosamanyan to//

sa ka'i bar de la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa med par rtogs pasachos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la chags pa spang ngo //_sa la par rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud ldan gyi khams de gnyis mumed par rtogasabs sas rgyas thams cad bsam pa dgu pa bcus mnyam par 
rtogasaso//_de la dag pa bcu_/_yon tan dang /_bslab pa dang /lam dang /_lam ma yin pa shes padang /chos so bdun dang /semasacan smin par byed pa'o/_/de'ang yinatanadang bslab pa gnyis la sku gsung thugs kyi gsum gsum bgrangs pa'i bsamapadag pa 
chu'o//jug par khams de rang bzhin gyisam par dag ba'i rtogs pas 'khor 'das la blang dor du 'dzin pa thams cad bzlog go/_sa bdun bar khams du tha dad med par rtogs pas mtshan mar 'dzin pa thams cad bzlog go_/brgyad par ji lta bar gzigs [ \[382]
pa'i ye shes de nyid la skyon yon hrigang med par rtogs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'imachog shin tu rnam par dag go_/de'i rang bzhin ni nyi khri las/_rab 'byor chos gang la rdul tsam yang skye ba med pa de ni mi skye ba'o/_/de gang gis shes pa de ni 
bzod pa zhes bya ste/_shes pa desami skye ba'i chos la bzod ba thob bo//_zhes so//sa dgu par khams kyi rang gzhin la soso yig bzhi rang chas su yod par rtogs pas ye shes kyi rang bzhin ji snyed pa'i shes rab la dbang bar byed do//_sa bcu par khams de nyid
phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byung gnas su rtogs pas dbang bzhi la rang dbang thob pa'o/_/dbang bzhi'i mdosde rgyan las/_yid dang 'dzin dang rnam par rtog/gyur phyir rnam_paramirtog dang kazhing dang ye shes las dag la/_/dbang ninam po bzhi yin te//dbang
