go gnyis 
de'ang bsgom pa'i lam 'dir sa dgu'i drim spong ba'i gnyen po'i khyad par la ltos nas sbyor ba'i lam dang /_b.rachad med lam dang /_rnam grol gyi lam dang/_khyad par gyi lam zhes grangs sa bzhir gnas pa las/_snga ma gnyis ni spong ba'i gnyen pa'i //bar ba 

brten gyi gnyen po'o//thaman thag bsring gi gnyen po'o/_/lam gyi gdags gzhi'ang sa'i sngon rol rang rgyud pa de nyid/_sa desa'i spang bya gegs su gyur pa rags pa spong ba la ni sbyor ba'i lam zhes bya'o//_sa de dngos dang por skye bzhin pas drim ngoskal de'i sa bon dngos 
su spangs pa ni bar chad med lam mo//_sa de'i skad cig gnyis pa nas dngos gzhir gyur ba rnamasani rnam grol gyi lamamo//_sa'i mjug thogs su yon tan khyad par can thob nas sa gong mar 'gro bzhin pa ni khyad par gyi lamamo//_spangs pa'i khyad paranomathong pa 
ma lus pa spang ba/_sgom spang ngo skal gyirags parnams sbas/_phrab spong bzhin pa la 'jug pa'o/_/de ltar spungs pa las sa bcu'i khyad par la gnas gang du 'gro zhing /_lus 'dzin pa'i khyad par ni de dag gi skye ba 'dzin pa'i nus pa yod pa'i cha nas yin_/[\[384]
gnas rogs de dag gi rgyal po yin tshod byung chub sems dpa'i sa de dag la gnas pa ma khyabase/_so so skye bo bsodanams rlabs chen bsags pa dang /_kha cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de dang der snang bas sems can gyi don mdzod pa'ang yod do//de'angs ra_/
pa yan chad nasatsho la dbang thob pas/_skye 'chi rang mchon ba med kyang gzhan don du 'gyur na de ltar ston pa ni rgyud bla ma las/_'phags pas 'chi dang na ba dang*/_/_rga ba'i sdug bsngalastsad nas spung//las dang nyon mongs dbang gi skye/_/de la do med sbyor de med/_/dza
bzhin yang dag mthong ba'i phyir/_/_skye sogs rnams las 'das gyur kyang //snying rje'i bdag nyid skye ba dang //'chidang nad rga bar khyon//ces so//_lnga ba mi slob pa'i lamani bslab bya mthar thug nas slob du med pa'i don te/_lus kyit+tenAthunamong ba nyan thos sde paltaran _ 

ka _
@#/_/'dzam bu'i gling pa'i rgyal rigs sam bum [8]rigs las sas rgyabar 'dod cing /_srid pa tha ma'i dus dang po'i tsho 'daso so skye bar 'dod pa'i tshul mdzod las/_'phags pa min yang pha ma dang /_nad pa dang ni ches smra dang //_skye mtha'i byung chub sems 
bden gnyis shing rta _dpa' la//_zhes pas bstan kyang sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin la/_mdo sde dag las/_rdzogs sangs rgyasarnams 'og min gyi//_pho brang dgyes pa sdig ba kun/_/rnam sbangasaderani 'tshad rgya zhing /_/sbrul pa dag gis 'dir 'tshad rgyu//zhes gsus pa ltar thog pachen po'i lugs 
su 'og min du saargya ba'i rten gang yin pa ste/_'jug pa'i 'grel par yang /_gang gi don du 'bad pa 'di brtsams pa bla na med pa'i ye shes de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'og min gyi gnas kho nar brtes so/_/_zhes bshad pa ltar ro/_/bsam pa'i rten ni bsam [ B85]
gtsang ma'i gnas rnams las 'as pa na dbang phyug chen po'i gzhas yod par bshad pa de yanyan thos 'phags pa rnams skye bar nus pa'i 'og min las 'das ba'i shog min gnyis pa la 'dod do/_/de la mi slob pa'i 
9_ rgya/gtan bzhi pa ste/_de'ang sa'i dngos gzhi las/_
lam de'i ngo bon sku gsum ye shes lnga dang bcas pa'i bdag nyid de 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su'ang 'chad par 'gyur la/_/_sa'i sa nas brjodan slob pa'i sa bcu las bzal bas bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyis ste rgyu'i thig pa'i rtse mo sprul pa'i sku'i sa mthar thug 
[I ]
sku gsum 
pa'o//de'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la de'i tshe sngar gyi khams byang chub tu gyur te/_chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes nyag gcig gis bsdus pa'i tshul/_sku gsum grub pa las/_dri med de bzhin nyid dang ni//

mi rtog ye shes ma gtogs pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams la chos gzhan ni/_/'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no//_zhesaso/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pas bskal pa grangs med pas thob par bya ba'i sas rgyas de la'ang nye ba la dgos nas btags pa bar bshad pa'i sangs rgyas 
sa bcu pa dang /_bcu gcig kun tu 'od dngos bstan gyis gnyis su 'dod pa'i dang po ni mngon rtogs rgyan las/_sa dgu 'das nas ye shes ni/_/gang gi sangs rgyas sar gnas pa/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa//bcu pa yin par shes par bya//zhes so//_phyi ma ni/sto[n]
bcu la sogs pa thog med kyi yon tan brgya zhe bzhi la ma' dbang 'byor pa bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa'o/_/de'ang rang lamakyi spes rtogs mthar phyin pa'i cha nas gzhal te rdo thog pa'i thabs dang ldan pa rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi lamanas tsho gcig la dka' ba med [ \[386]
par 'thob bu de 'thob pa'i myur khyad las 'bras bu'i ngo bo la mchog dman du mi 'dzin cing /_derje 'chang gis dang bye bsdu'i khyad par du 'dod pa dang /_yang slob dpon zhi ba 'tsho'i gzhung de nyid grub pa khungs su byas nas phar phyin rang lam gyis kyang sngagasakyi rdo rje 'dzin pa thob 
par 'dod pa ni spyi don yin no/_/de la dpyad par bya ba'i gnas mang du grags pa ni mdo sngags kyi sas rgyas de gnyis rnam pa'i cha nas mimatshungs pa dang /_gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs dang /_phrin las dang*/_zhing dang /_spyod yul dang /_sa lam gyi rnam par gzhag pas khyad 
par byas zin pa nyid la dpags na'ang chos kyi dbyings ni thams cad kyi bya_ba byed las mi 2yo'o/_/de la re zhig de theg pa'i sa'i khyad par ni/_rdo rje'i skyid po rgyan las/_kun tu 'od dang*/_bdud rtsi 'od dang /_nam mkha' 'od dang /_rdo'i 'od dang /rin 'od dang /_pad+mo'achang dang /las

gyi 'od dad /dpe med padang /_dpe dang bral ba dang /_shes rab 'od dang /_thums cadamakhyen pa dang /_so so'i bdag nyid dag pa'i sa ste bduganyis su bshad pa'i shogs lha nga /_ye shes lnga dang /thubs shes gnyis la grags pa'o//_khyad 
par du 'bras bu'i theg pa la grags pa shin tu brtan pa ni bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas kyang bra gas te grangs sa kyi sgo nas brjod na mngon brjod blamar/_dpe med pa dang ye shes ldan//rdordza'i sa ste bcu gsum pa//zhes rab dga' la 
ka bsteshaganyis shidarta _
sogs pa bcu'i steng du khyad par gyi lam dang /_rgyun mtha'i lam gnyis po rnam pa gsum du phye ba'itshul/_khyad par gyi lam la dpe med ba'i sa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar chad med lam la yi shes ldan dang lhan cig bzhugasum pa ni rdo rje'i sa'o//de bzhin [387]
du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba/_thabs dang shes rab thabs kyi mchog/_shes rab mchog gi mchog gyur pa//_sa yikhyad par bcu dang gsum//_zhes ba'i rkang pa dang po'i don/_/bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyis ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang sa bcu thabs dang /
ba _
shes rab bsdus pa yin pos sa dudag gi thabs kyi 'bras bu la bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyis zhes thun mong du grags pa ste/_de las g.yos pa med bzhin du mchags ba'i shes rab dang /_tshe dmigs pa'i thugs rjedang ldan pa ni shes rab mchog ces bya ba ma chags 
go bzhi pad+ma can gyis dang /_mchog gyur pa zhes pa ni thabs dad shes rab mchog gi sa ste/_de'i byin rlabasaM las rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas brtsol ba med par lhun grub du 'byung bas yi ge 'khor la tshogs chen gyi sa gnyis bsnan pas bcu gsumam/_/'di 

bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus par/_'dun pa sems pa dang /_rigs chen 'byed pa nga /_dbugs chen 'byin pa dang /_lud chen thob pa dang /_rtsal chen rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi rnam par dbye ba dang /_rig pa tshango_ra sgom 
theg pa'i dad po bcu drug mgon//zhes/_snang ba dang /_mched pa dang /_thub pa dang /_nyer thob re rer bzhi bzhir dbye bas sa bcu drug tu bzhag pa dang /_de bzhin du nyi shu gcig tu dbye ba la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa dpag tu med pa yod dechog khyimatshanamaglas pa'i rnam par gzhag pa dpag tu med pa yod de brgyud las/_de dag gi bzhin 
dang ye shes kyi yon tan gyi bdag nyid la gsungs pa las/_theg pa 'og ma ltar bgrod cing bsags pas thob pa'i rim pa mtho dman gyi bye brag la ma gsungs te/_/_chos kyi skumatshanAm med pa'i dpyidas yanas dag mnyam chen po'i lad bzhin ye shes kyi dkyi_00
'bras bu la bye brag yod ga ma mtho dman gyi bye brag la ma gsungs te
'khor rtsol ba med pa'i bdag nyid la bshad do/_/de skad du paN+Dita yod pas/_/_'bras bu la bya brag yodanani/_theg pa gsum du bsdu rung ngo /_/zhes bshad do//dewana'ang g+ho ga la'i paN+Ditas/_lam la nye ring byung na 'bras bu la bzang nganatsi nas kyang yod dgos pa 
de skad du paN+Dita rod pas
nang pa sangs rgyas pa la bshad da
yin
yin/_/_nang pa sangs rgyas pa'i chos thamasacang rgyu 'bras go ma log pa dgos zhes bshad pa'i phyir re zhig snga rabs kyi slob dpon rnams gyi 'dod pa'ang 'god par nam tri pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang lam nas sangs rgyas mi thob par kha tshon bcad nas phar phyin bstan 
pa'i dgos pa ldags kyi lam stegs su bshad pa dang /_nA ro pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i sgorazhugs pasakhyad sangs rgyas thob ni thob ste/_gsang sngags dad gnyis kyi khyadaparan bde bar skyob ba dang /_myur skyob kyi byed pa yin no//zhes pa 'di drangs nas kun tu/

ka _
zla_@#/_/'od kyi sa bas da dung sngags lam la zhugs nas myur lam gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas gdod bsgrub dgos par 'chad de/_lung de'i don ni de tsam du 'grel bar mi mngonano/_/de la mdo sngags gnyis rimaganyis la sogs pa'i rgyal _ 
khyadapar yod na/_'bras bu la khyad par zhugs pa chos nyid de/_chu dang 'oms bcus pa'i skyur ro bzhin no/_/zhes brtags nas mdonus sa bcu pa sangasargyas su bshad ba nyob nyid la dgongs nas btags pa b.rabashad pa dang mtshungs bar/_sngags kyi 'bras bu rdo/
bdon gnyis shing rta _
rje 'dzin pa la ltos nas bcu gcig pa yang nye ba nyid la gos nas btags pa bar 'dod ba bzhin du/_bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa de ni bla na yod pa'i sas rgyas nyi tshe ba dang /_bcu gsumadorda 'dzin pa'i go 'phang ni bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab[389]
par 'dodapa' rgyud bde gshegs snying po la zer na sems can kyi khams thams cad la khyab byed des khyab pa
brgyu _
par ra ras na snangang //da lnga'ad ltar bshad par bya ste/_nges pa'i don du rgyu la khyad par yod pa'ang 'dod dka' 
kyang gcig shos ni thabs gcig shos ni shes rab yin pas parol tu phyin pa drug po la thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi'id bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir sngags thabs myur zhing /_shes rab zab pa'i khyad par las/_bsamagatan dang shes rab kyi ngang du bskyed rdzoT 
go lnga 
1_kyi ngo bo rdzas 'gal ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi byings su gcig pas ngo bo gcig pa'idon la ye shesakyi nang du 'gol bami 'du'o//rasa'i lam nas mtshon nga pe byad kyi skur byang chub pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa tha 

dad pa dang /_gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs dang phrin las kyi snang chamado dang sngags kyi gdul byasoso'i khams dang /_dbang po dang /_rnam par rig pa nyid dang mtshungs par shar ba'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i bdag nyid chen po/_kun tu 'gro ba can yin pas rnam rig gi don tha dad ba'ang mi 
'gal ba'i tshul sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgras rtogs par bya ste 'di ltar b+ha ga wan zhes bya ban bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i don te/_nyon mongs pa la sogs pa bcom pa'i yon tan nga ldan pas na de skad du grags pa dang /_rnam pa gcig tun b+ha ga ni skal pa ste wan ni ldan pa la'ang 
'jug bas sangs rgyas rnams dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pasan legs ldananam/_skal ldan zhes bshad do/_/de bzhin du sgra 'jug pa'i yul tha dad kyang /_mdor bsdu na/_'du 'bralamed pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i phyir b+ha ga wan no//de'i phyir dang[ 390]
po'i chas chags bral gyi sangs rgyas dang /_gnyis pa'i cha nas dbang phyug phun sum tshogs ba sngags kyi sangs rgyasadang*/_gsum pa'i cha nas du ma ro gcig 'du 'bral med pa chos nyid gang du'angam phyi ba'i don la sangs rgyu_tshig bla dgas su byas ba'i don to/_saM 
skad la rkyen byin pas don rnam pa gsum bsgrubanus pa'i phyir ro//'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gang yin ba ni byang chub kyi sems yin la/_de ni rigs kyi sems dang /_rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi sems dang /_'bras bu'i sems 
kyi bar du dbyer med par byang chub kyi rang bzhin so so ma yin tha mi dad pa nyid yin pas chos nyid kun tu 'gro ba rigs par bya'o/_/de lta na'ang rnam snang mngon byang las/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang /_/de ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'gro la phan phyir 

ka_
/bzhugs pa gang //de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/_/cho ga bzad po 'dimakhyenanas/_/dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du//thams cad mkhyen pa tshod med brnyes/_/zhes bstan pa 'di brjod bya 'di dag gi don gyi chings chen po nyid bas/
thun mong ba'i lam ston du song ba'am/_ma sod yod rung ste/_sdugs lam las dang po pa'i tsho kun tu bzad po'i spyod ba khrel bag yod pa nyid la brten nas sngags la mos pas spyod pa'i lam brtul zhugs brtan par gnas 'gyur nas rang lam gyi cho ga sgra ji 
bden gnyis shing rta
bzhin par nyams su len nus pa'i tsho/_khams gsum pa'i mthong ba dang bsgom pas bsdus pa'i 'dod chags chen pa ma yin kyang /_snyoms 'jug gi sgrib bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa cha phra mo zhig mdo lam la yod pa de/_sngags mu pho nya'i lam dpa' bo [ \[39l]
byang chub sems kyi ljon pa'ishing /_a wa d+hu ti tsanang du thabs kyi cho ga zab mos sbyangs nas/_sngags kyis lam nye rgyu'i sbyor bas bgrod pa'i zhor la mdo lugasakyisa'am kyang gud du bcad pa med phyir/_phan tshun ring lhung bsgyur ba lta bu'i dosanas bgrod pa'o zhes 
rgya _
brjod parami nus kyang /_ngo bo la bzung nganamed por bgrod nas dag pa gnyis ldan gyi dad du phyin pa ni/_pen rta dad bod bu bgrod pa la myur bul yod kyang dal stegs su gcig pa bzhin mdo sngags gnyis ka'i mthar thug gi thob bya gang yin pa de sdugs kyi cho ga dang 
godrug lam zab mos grub kyis/_gzhan gyis ma yin no zhes pa 'didon la gnas pa'o/_/de las gzhan du 'bras bu lamachog dman yod med 'didag ni so sor rtog pa'i shes rab las byung ba'i tshig bla dgas su gyur pa gang zhig rang rang gi rnam bar shes ba'i yul du 

'jug tu rung bar bus pa sasangs rgyas kyi nang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas su mi rung pa'i tshul mgonabo byams pas/_sangs rgyas khams dadasangs rgyas byang chub nga /_sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas phrin las te/_/dag pa'i sems can kyis spyod bsam bya 
min_/'di ni 'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/_/_zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro//de ltar chos dkon mchog gi yon tan gang gis shes pa des sangasargyas kyi bstan pa shes shing /_bstan ba shes ba des grub pa'i mtha' yang shes la/_'khor ba las gang gis skyob ba'i mtshon nyid

ya brgyad rgyal sras sar gnasamatha' dub pa radus nga la rgya'apar 'ag[u]paN 
pa'i deb dam pa'i chos/_/_chos ni_rtan gnas dag la /
par skyabs su 'gro ba'i yul theg chen po'i dge 'dun yin te/_byamasamagon gyis/_ji lta ji snyed nang gi ni/_/_ye shes gzigs ba dag pa'i phyir/_/_blo ldan phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs/_/bla med yon tan dang ldan nyid/_/ces ji lta b.rig pa'i yon tan ji snyed pa rig pa'i 
yonatan/_nad ye shes gzigs pa'i rig pa'i yon tan dang gsum/_de nyid thob byed kyi thabs su gyur pa'i bar chad med lam gyi ngo skal spang bya chags sgrib las grol ba'iyon tan/_der gyur pa'i thogs sgrib las grol ba'i yon ton/_der gyur pa'i dman sgrib 

/_las grol ba'i yon tan te drug_/de la dbye gzhi rig pa'i yon tan dang /_srol ba'i yonatan bsnan pas brgyad do/_/de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun yin pas na 
dge 'dun gyi ngo bo nyid du smos pa'o/_/nyan rang gi dge 'dun ni rig grol gyi phyogs las dman pas de'i yan lag lta bu ste/_de la phyogs dang po nyan thos ni/_'phags pa stong phrag brgya par bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzin kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas rgyun du zhugs 
ts+tso_pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems srubs pas lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/'og ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba la spyangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid [,393]
bden gnyis shing rta brgya gobangun_ka[a**]
bdaman dar gcig la brgyud de/_de ltar rgyun zhugs zhus pa dang /_rgyun zhugs 'bras bu la banas_bzhin du phyir 'ongazhugs[ WI) ]'dazhugs gnam gnyis/
bang po rtul rnon gyis mthong spangs kun la gsum spangs pa'i khyad par gyi dbye ba nyid yod dkunardzob kyi dge 'dun/[ a]pas 'di_ma skyes so/_/_de ltared_namachog rjes dran las/_legs 
par zhugs pa la sogs pa bzhis ni bsgrub pa'i yon tan bshad do/_/_kun tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa la sogs pas mchod par 'os pa'i yon tan bshad do/_/_de bzhin du gtod pa dang tshul khrims kyi yon tan kyang bgrang ngo*/_/rang sangs rgyas la'ang zhugs 
pa

gnas brgyad yod de/_don gyi nyan thos las 'phags pa'i khyad par ni sdu ma'i 'phror/_gang ci yang skye kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub bo//_zhes gsungs ba ste/_dayan chad ni phyi'i dge 'dun yinano//nang gi dag 
rapa _

ra 'dzin gyi tshogs rna 'og min bgro_las kyi rigs kyis bsdus pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshogs dang

skas su bstan zin to/_da kaMron chog /
bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ltar dkon pa dang*/_sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar brtse ba'i thugs rjes rang nyid kyang rang dbang med par btings bas stod smadabanyaring gi phyogs su lhung ba'i 'gyur ba sna tshogs med pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dri ma med pa dang /

@#/_/ba med pa'i phyir te/_rgyud bla ma las/_'byung ba dkon phyir dri med phyir/_/mthu ldan phyir dang 'jig rten gyi/_/rgyan gyur nyid dang mchog nyid phyir/_/'gyur ba med phyir dkonamachog nyid//cesaso//de'ang mya ngan las 'dar ba'i lam dang /_'khor ba'i

chos yang dag par sdud pa las/_/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni yon tan mtha' yasamumed pa ste/_de dag ni chos las skyes pa/_chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_chos kyis sprul pa/_chos bdag por gyur pa/_chos las byung ba/_chos spyod yul/_chos la [395]

9[ /]po'i rkyen las gzhan du mi 'byung ba'i phyir de gnyis phan tshan tan dang brten pa lta bur gyur bo'ang drin lan gsab pa'i mdor/_gsol ba songasargyas kyi ston ba chos lagasan ci'i slad du dkon mchog gsum las chos sngarami smos/_bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas kyi 
go brgyad
_ston pa chos yin modi/_chos kyang sangs rgyasam yin pa gzhan gyis mi ston te lam zhes bya ba yang mis bsgrub dgos pas de bas sangs rgyas sngar smos so/_/zhes so/_/de'i phyir de las de byung gi 'brel ba bsgrub pa'i phyir mtshan gyi go rim kyang shes 

bzhin dunor par smras na nyes pa yod la/_ma shes pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/
gnyis ka'i yon tan rjes su bsgrub ba ni dge 'dun yin pas de la lam bsgrub pa'i grogs su tha snyad btags kyang don la bslab pa gsum po'i brten gnas su shes 
pas skyabs su 'gro dgos pa yin no/_/de skad du skyabs 'gro bdun cu pa las/_sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dunani/_/_thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs/_/zhesaso/_/de la 'dir theg pa che chung gi gzhung bzos pa dang /rnam par ma phyed pa'i lam la khyogs pa ma yin kyang gang 
zug rnams ni log par blta ba dang /_the tshom la sogs te sgrib pa lnga'i rang bzhin la goms pa mang bas skyabs su 'gro ba'i desatshig dang /_yul dang /_bsam pa'i khyad par dang /_de'i rgyu 'bras la rmongs par mi 'gyur ba'i dpe don 'brel pa dang ldan pas blo bcos [\]396]
pa'i thabs ma bkral yang lung gis rtogs pa theg dman ltar bshad par bya ste/_drin lan gsab pa'i mdo las/_skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba nimagon skyabs sam dpung gnyen gyi don te/_dper na mi zhig la nyes pa chen po byung ba las yul gzhan du 'phos pa 
las/_rgyal po pha rol po la par skyabs btsalan/_
yul pharol gyi rgyal pos de la khyod mi 'jigs par 'dodan pa'i yul 'di nas mi 'gro zhing ngas bstan pa nyananamagon skyabs bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang 'dra bar so soskye bo yang de dang 'dra ste/_bdud kyi dbang du gyur la skye 
shing 'khor ba'i nyes pa yod pas/_dkon mchog gsum la phyogs te skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o/_/gal te dkon mchog gsum la rtse gcig tu phyogs shing skyabs su song la/_sangasargyas kyi bstan pa las 'gal bar ma byasan/_bdud kyi rgyal po sdig pacan gyi ci byar yod 

@#/_/_med do/_/_sngon phug ron gcig khas nyenanas shA ri'i bu'i phag gribamar song ba las/_'on kyang skrag cing sdangs pa bzhin no/_/denas sangs rgyas kyi grib ma'i phag tu yod ba dang /_'jigs pa med de 'dar ba sa da med do/_/de bsan sangs rgyas byams 
ka yen gnyis shin+ti_pa chen po dang /_thugs rje chen por ldan gyis/_shA ri'i bu lan byams pa dang snying rje chen po med do/_/_sangs rgyas la ni bag chags med kyis/_A'i bu la ni bag chags ma zad do/_/sangs rgyas ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i 
spyod pa spyad kyi/_/_shA ri'i bu ni _'di sangs rgyas la yazhashA ri'i bu'i byamasapa dang snying rje'i byung ba tsamanyis dman pa lamedapa'i dgag sgra sbyar ba yin gyi shA ri'i bu la byams pa dang snying rje med lam yin pa yangago dgos/_/bskal pa drug cu'i bar du dka' thub spyad de/_de bsan phug ron yang sha [ \[397]
[cg ]rgyu
_ri'i bu'i grib marasong ba na/_'on kyang skrag cing 'jigs kyi sangs rgyus kyi grib mar song ba na 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_gal te dkonamachog gsum la skyabs su song bas sdig pa mi dge ba byadazhing 'jigs par mi 'gyur na/_ci'i slad du lhas byin lta bu/
dkon mchog gsum la skyobs su gsol/_dad pas khyim nas rab tu byung ste tshul khrims kyang rdzogs pa las/_mtshams med gsum bgyis nas/_mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur/_bka' bstsal pa/_mgon skyabs bya ba yang /_skyabs bya bar 
go dag
_'os pa la skyabs bya ba yin te/_lhas byin lta bu ni mi dge ba'i sdig pa chen po byas la/_gdon mi za bar myong ba'i las dang bcas pas/_de'i phyir lad mgon skyabs byar yang dka' 'o//gsol pa/_gal te sdig pa chen po bgyis pa la/_sangs rgyas kyi mgon skyabasamamadzadan_/

sdig pa'i las mamachis pa la sangs rgyas kyi mgon skyabs bgyi yad rtsi'achal/_gon mchog gsum la mgon skyabs ma'o zhes kyang ji skadabakyi/_bka' bstsal pa/_lhas byin gyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba yang dag pa'i sems kyis ma yinate/skyabs su 
'gro ba gsum ma rdzogs so/_/de ni rgyun du skyod ba dang /_bkur sti dang /_grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir bgan thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes canano/_/_zhes sangs rgyas la'ang bdo bsan/_de'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la mthu stobs chen po yongamod kyi mgon skyabs sumi 'gyur ro//
dper na rgyal po ma skyes dgu lta bu la/_mtshams med pa'i sdig pa yodade/_mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar lhung bar rigasapa la/_yang dag ba'i sems rtse gcig pas sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol bas mchoms med pa'i sdig pa byang nas/_thig nag po'i sems/[\[398]
can dmyal bar ltung nas/_mi'i zhing nas sdig partsi pa dang 'dra bar/_zhag bdun myong tsam gyis sgrig pa kun byangabasan/_dgi dkon mchog gsum gyi mgon skyabs kyi mthu zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_lhas byinagyi sdig pa bgyis pa'i mgon skyabs byar mi rung ngo zhes 'gyis pa/_mdo 
sde'anadanas gdosu yadarung /_sangs rgyas la skyabs suyod na nganasod gsum dumi ltud do zhes bgyi bar don ji lta bu lags/_bka' bstsal ba/_lhas byin gyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs sulong bas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar song med kyis/_sdug 
bsngal myong ba yang zhu chung la bsu ba'i dus skabs yod do/_/dper na mi zhig rim/_nagasaMtshal lam/_'brog dgon pa 'jigs pa'i gnas su phyin pa las|_gal tesangs rgyas yid la byas shing bsams na de'i yon tan gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa zhi bar 'gyur te/_de bas na 

ka_
 _/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba yang mirdzun no zhes so//tshul de lta bus blo sbyangs nas rgyu 'bus kyi skyabs 'gro'i mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis bstan pa'i phyir/_de la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i skyabs 'gro yi/_/dam bca' gnyis las dus gzhan _/
bgrab 'dod rgyu/_/de ltar 'grub pa rang sems 'bras bu'i skyabs/_/rdo rje theg pa dag gi khyad chos yin/_/_rgyu yi yul ni dkon mchog rnam pa gsum/_/sngags su de yi ngo bo bla mar 'dus/_/de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pas dus gzhan bskal pa grangs med pa 
bden gnyis shing rta_
gsum la sogs pa'i mthar sas rgyas thob par dmigs nas gzhan rgyud la byon zin pa'i dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song bas sangs rgyas 'thob pa'i rgyu byed pas na rgyu'i skyabs 'gro zhes bya ste/_dkon mchog brtsegs pa las/_dge slong dag khyed kyis rang[399]
ngam gzhan gyi phyir yang rung ste 'jigs pa dang /_'chor ba las thar ba'i phyir skyabs su song zhig dang /_khyed kyi 'dod pa'i re ba de dang de dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes so/_/skyabs yul de dag gi spangs rtogs kyi ye shes ma 'ongs pa na rang rgyud la 'khrung 
par 'dod pa ni 'bras bu'i skyabs 'gro yin par/_khyim bdag drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_sas rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba zhesangasargyas thob par 'dod pa'o/_/ces pa dang mthun_bar chos dang dge 'dun la'ang gsungs so/_/khyad par rdo rje theg pa'i lugs su ni 
3tis brtsatham pa 
rang la yod pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid rang chas su gnas pa mngon du mthong bar 'dod nas/_dkon mchog gsum gzhan nas mi 'tshol bar rig pa sku gsum gyi bdag nyid gsal gdab pa'i tshul du skyabs su 'gro zhing /_sa yun ring bo la ltos mi 'cha' bar rang 

byung gi ye shes gdod mnas skye ba med par rtogs pa'i ngang du mnyam par 'jog pa ni 'bras bu'i skyabs 'gro mthar thug pa'o/_yul gyi dbang du byas na/_rgya'i 'ganas skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg parasangs rgyas gtso bo yin la/_sngags bla na med pa'i theg pa 
ltar na blam nyid gtso bor gyur shing*/_bstan pa spyi'i dkon mchog gsum dang /_dkyil 'khor so so'i dkon mchog gsum kyang rten du 'dod kyang /mthur thug gi dbang du byas pa'i yul ni de dag kyang gzugs sku kun rdzob pa 'pho 'gyur can yin pa dang /_chosagrang las 
bdenarnams gong nas gong marasod dusa'og ma'i rang bzhin dri bcas su 'dor bas kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /_nyan rang gi rgyud kyi 'gog pa gnyis ni bag la nyal gyi sgrib pa dang bcas pas 'jigs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyang rang sa_'i sgrib pa [400]
spangs rtogs mthar mthug pas da dung sangs rgyas kyi lam la brten shing skyabs su 'gro dgos pa'i phyir na rgyu'i skyabs gsum de dag kyang 'bras bu la reg paji'amagyi skyel ma lta bu skyabs su 'dzin pa las mthar thug gi skyabs gnas su mi rung ba'i 
dang btsas shing*/_
tshul/_drin lan gsab pa'i mdo las/_gsol pa/_cal skyabs sumachin sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba zhes bgyi/_bka' bstsal pa/_skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ban ngag gi 'khor lo ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa slob pa med pa'i yon tan la skyabs su song ba'o/_/gsel 
pa/_gzugs kyi sku la skyabs su mchi 'am/_chosakyi sku la skyabs su mchi_/_bka' bstsal ba/_chos kyi sku la skyabs su 'gro yi/_gzugs kyi sku la skyabs su 'gro ba ma yin te/_gzugs kyi sku sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_gzugasakyi sku sas 

[1]rgyasam yinalagasan/_ci'i sladadu sangs rgyas kyi sku la khrag phyung bas mchimasam mchis pa'i las bgyis par 'gyur/_bka' bstsal pa/_gzugs kyi sku ni chos kyi sku'i snod yin te/_chos kyi sku'i gnas so/_/de bsan gzugs/
kyi sku la gnod pas mtshams med pa'i las su gyur gyi/_gzugs kyiskus sa rgyas yin pas mchoms med pa'i las su gyur panam yinano/_/zhes dang /_de bzhin du chos dang dge 'dun la 'ad gsus nasamathur dogs pa'i gnas bsal phyir/_gsol 
rgyu[” ]pa _gal te don dam pa'i dge 'dun la skyasasumachinani/_sngonas sa rgyas yi ri dang /_sa ril skyabs su 'gro ba gsum log pa'i tshe/_phyisadage 'dun zhes bya ba yod par 'gyur gyis de la skyabs su song zhig ces gsungs pa mi rigs pa'i phyir te/_don [ 401]
!_dam pa'i dge 'dunani rtag tu 'jig rtenan mchis pa lags/_bka' bstsal pa/_kun rdzobakyi dge 'dun ni don dam pa'i dge 'dun gyi brten pa'i gnas yin pas/_phyis dge 'dun yod par 'gyur gyis/_de la skyabs su sod shig ces gsungs pa yin no/_/
zhes so/_/_spyir theg pa gsum[W]sol 'bras bu'i skyabs gnas re re yod de/_thogachenapas sku gsum kon mchog gi rang bzhin du do po ba tshig bar 'dod pa dang /_nyan rang gnyis rang lugs kyi 'gog pa rang lugs kyi byang chub tu'adod pa nyid de chos dang dge 'dunaso 
[# ]sor ris chad pa'i lugs mi bzhed do/_/'dir kun rdzob pa'i dkon mchog gsum dang don dam pa'i dkonachog gnyis shan tshunasnyen dang brten pa lta bur shesanas skyabs su 'gro bar theg dman gyisde snod las gsungs pa'i rtog pas bzang ngan du bltas nas 'dor len 

gyi gnyen po dgongs pa'o//_de ltar yang mthar thug chos kyiskunyag gcig lamabartenan de dag gis su zhing bslabar 'gyur ba'i tshul/_rgyud blam las/_spang phyir bslu ba'i chos can phyir/_/med phyir 'jigs dang bcas pa'i phyir/_chos rnam gnyis dngaphags pa'i 
tshogs/_/_gtan gyi skyas gnas ma yin no/_/skyabs nisangasargyasanyag gcig nyid/_/_skyob pa chos kye skrun phyir/_/tshogs kyang de yi mthar thug yin//ces pasarkang pa phyin gsum gyi don/_/rang snang don gyi 'og min na chos nyid dang tha dad med par bzhugs pa'i 
sangasargyus de'i skudage 'duzhu/_bsung dmachos/_thugs sas rgyas chos kyi skur gnas pas sku gsum dkon mchog gi rang bzhin du do be gcig par 'dod pa ste/_de skad du ye shes grub pa las kyang /_dag theb bral ba'i sems sasas/_/_mi 'gyur dri med chos[402]
dang ni/_/_yon tan lhun rdzogs dge 'dun skyid/_/_yin phyir rang gi sems nyid mchog_/ces so//de la skyabs su 'gro ba porten gyi gang zag rigs can gsum ston pa'i phyir/_nyitshemachog dang bla na med pa yi//kun slong gsum las skyes bu chung ngu ni/_/ngan 'gro 
la 'jigs mngon mtho'i bar du 'gro_/'bring gnyis srid pas 'jigs nas thar paganyer/_/bganas skabs ji srid 'tsho dang mthar thug ni/_/nyan rang babras bu thob pa'i bar du 'gro/chen po gzhan don sprad pa'i zhi bdes 'jigs/_/'khor ba dbugs 'byin chen po la 
bsgral phyir/_/byang chub bar 'gro de yang rang gi sems/_/bral thob bslab spus pa 'asabu'i skyabs/_/_de la skyes bu'i blo rigs gsum ste tha ma'i tha shal nyi tshe ba'i skyabs gnas la ra ba dag ni gnas skabs sargyad gnas skabs su gyur pa'i 'jigasapaphra

@#//_/_mos sgrug nas rang rang gi lhu'am/_ri dang nags tshal la sogs par skyabs su re ba yod de/_mdo sde rgyal mtshan dam pa las/_'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni//phal cher re dang nags tshal dang /_/kun dga' ra bamachod rten

gsungs pa'i lam la gus pas/_tshi'adi pa'i gnas la che thad du mi byed kyang phyi ma'i 'jig rten gyi mdon mtho'i bde 'bras la don gnyer gyi kun slong 'ba' zhig dang du len pa'i skyes bu chud du yin te/_lam sgron las/_gang zhig thabs ni de dag gis/_/'khor ba'i bde 
nyis brgya _
ba tsam dag la/_/rang nyid don du gnyer byed pa/_/_skyes bu de ni thamar 'os/_/_zhes bshad pa ltar ro/_/don de'i phyir du dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba dag ni skyes buchung ngu'i nang tshan nam nung zad khyad par du byas pa ste/_don la ngan song gi 'jigs pa tsam 
gyis sgrig pa las gnas skabs kyi 'bras bumasgo ris la dmigs shing /_dus kyang mngon mtho'i bde 'bras thob pa'i bar du skyabs su 'gro ba ni bzang po ma lags bar/_'dul ba lung las/_kun dga' bos bram ze'i bumo la mtho ris kyi yon tan skyabs su 'gro ba 
gnyis

[I]khor ba las grol tsam pa'i nges legs gyon pa yin no/_/
skyes bu 'bring gi lamani skyen pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te gsungs pa'i ches mtha' dag ste

bskyed cing /_rang don du de las grol ba'i thar pa 'thob byar dmigs pa'i sngon du skyabs su 'gro zhing /_de'ang gnas skabs ji srid 'tsho'i bar dang /_mthar thug nyin rang gi 'bras bu thob pa'i bar du 'gro ba'o/_/de skad du mdo rgyal mtshan las/_gang zhig gang tshosangs rgyas dang [404]
chos dang dge 'dun skyabs song ste/_/'phags pa yin bden pa bzhi/_/sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang /_/sdug bsngal yang dag 'dus pa dang /_/_mya ngan 'das der 'gro ba yi/_/'phags lam yan lag brgyad po dag_/_shes rab mig gis blta byedan//_skyabs de dag 
ni gtso yin zhing /_/_skyabs de dganamachog yin te/_/_skyabs de dag la brten nas ni/_/sdug bsngal kun las btur//_zhes so//_skyes bu chen po'i lam_/_rnam mkhyen bsgrub pa'i thabs rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa chen po rnam gnyis te sngags dang ba rel tu phyin pa'o/_/

zla_@#/_/paradamigs pa'i sngon du dkon mchogagasum la skyabs su 'gro ba ste/_thar pa chen bo las/_gang rnams srid pa'i chu bor lhung ba de dag gi phyir rang nyid zhi ba'i 'jigs pa yongs su spangs te skyabs su 'gro ba ni skyes bu mchog rab ces bya'o/red/
rgyudazho dam pa zhes bya'o//_zhes so/_/dus kyang byang chub snying po lamachis kyi bar ma/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gzhal du med pa rang rgyud la grub nas bral thob dang bslu ba spangs pa 'bras bu'i skyabs gnas la reg pa'i bar du'o/_/de ltar rten gyi gang zag gsum du 
ban gnyis shadi rta _
bzhag pa yang 'bras bubasgrub pa'i bsam pa tha dad pa gsum gyi 'bras ming rgyul btags pa ste/_de'ang skyes bu chung ngu'i blo can dag ni phyi rol pa'i gtsang spyi dang /_'tshob spang ba dang /_chos spyod pas mtho ris su 'gro ba ni yod de/_gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal pa [ 405]
7_gtum po rab snang lami dge ba bcu las ldog pa'i gtam byas pas shes la/_nang pa'i dkon mchog la skyabs su song nas dge ba cung zad kyi mtho ris su 'gro ba ni phag tu skye bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i bus skyabs 'gro byas pas ngan 'gro'i rgyu dag par gyur ba bzhin te/_de 
nyis brgya _
tshoskad du/_gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs song ba/_/de dag dan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur//_mi yi lus ni spangs nas su/_/de dag lha yi lus thob po/_/_zhes gsungs pas mtshon no/_/gnyis ka'ang bsod nams cha mthun gyi dge ba bcu dang bsam gtan gzugs medal 
gsum brten dgos te/_de med na mtho ris sum bgrod pa'i phyir ro/_/spyir grangs can pa'i lugs ni thar pa'ang dngos dang phyogs 'du rung ba tsam yod pas paN+Di ta sa'i snying bo tsam yang phyi nang gnyis ka la zhugs pas mgo rmongs par gyur na/_skye bo grub mtha' la ma zhugs  

parnamasa'i phyugs dngamatshungs la/_gal te zhugs kyang rmongs pas zil gyis non pa dang /_las dang las kyi 'bras bu la cang mi sems pa'i las mar log pa dag ni tsho phyi maphan chad kyi bde 'bras kyang nyams par byed pas grangs can pa las tha shal ba'o//
skyes bu 'bring ni nyan rang dang /_theg pa chen po'i lam nas nges par 'byung ba nyid do/_/_de ltar kun slong gsum gyi dbye ba bzhin lam gyi rim pa la'ang de bzhin du 'jug gos pa ni ma yin mod/_gzhan du chung 'bring gnyisakyi gnas skabs kyi mngon mtho dang /_nges leT 
tsam po pa'i phan yon la dmigs pasachen po'i lam stegs su 'dod pa'ang yod mod kyi/_'dir ni dman lam gyi nyes dmigs dang theg pa chen po'i khyad par gyi yon tan shes nas de la 'jug pa'i dgos dbang gi bstan pa nyid du rigs par bya'o/_/lam dus sa[p406]
rgyas rnamasani sems can gyi/_/khams la thugs rje dus las yol ba med/_/baspu'i khung bu gcig gi yon tan kyang /_/mtha' dag brjod pas ma thug nam mkha' lding /_bya lam grub mtha' ma stogs slar 'bab 'dra/_/zhes smos nas de la rmi lam gyi lam/
bag chags kyi lam/_las kyi mtha'i lam/_'khrul 'khor ma nges pa'i lam/_rgyudang 'bras buso soram nges pa'i lam ste rgyud lngas bsdus pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag la ma bcol yang snying rje chen po 'ba' zhig gi thugs drangs pa'i grogs mdzod ba la le lo dang 
bsnyel ba mi mnga' zhing /_rgyun chad pamed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las kyi yin tan yin te/_slob dpon dpa' bos/_de namagon med khyed rnams kyi/_/_grogs su gyur pa zhes sgrogs shing*/_/thugs rje chen bos 'gro ba ni/_/mtha' dag 'khyud pa bzhin du 

@#/_/bzhugs//ston pa thugs rje che mnga' ba/_/brtse bar ldan zhing thugs brtse ra mdzad/_/der brtson le la mi ma' ba/_/_khyod dang 'dra ba gzhan sumachis/_/khyod ni sems can kun gyi mgon/_/_spyi yi rtsa lag bzang po lags//_mgon 
du khyod bzhugs ma 'chol bas/_/da slad skye ba byang bar gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa ste/_mdor bsdu na/_shes bya'i lta ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad la mkhyen pa'i ye shes chags thogs med par 'jug pas shes bya rgyu tshal shes pa rgya chung ba'i skyon gyis 
kyi ma gos pas snga ma las/_byed 'ba' zhig gi ye shes kyis/_/_shes bya mtha' dag khyab lags kyi//khyod las gzhan pa thams cad kyi/_/_shes bya kho na lhag pa lags/_/_zhes dang*/_brtse ba'i yon tan gyi cha nas/_sems can rnams nyon [407]
mongs_pa'i zhags pas rang dbang dang bral bar bcings pa bzhin du/_thub pa'i snying rje chen pos 'gro ba rnams sdug bsngal bar gzigs pa'i thugs rje chen po rgyun chad med pas btsas pa'i tshul/_bstod pa brgya lnga bcu pa las/_'grog 'di dag thams 
c@ ཅད་ནི། ། ཁྱད་མེད་ཉོན་མོངས་རྣམས་ཀྱིས་བཅིངས། ། ཁྱོད་ནི་འགྲོབའི་ཉོན་མོངས་དག། །དགྲོལ་སླད་ཡུན་རིང་ཐུགས་རྗེས་བསྡམས།། ཞེས་སོ། །དེ་ལྟར་མཁྱེན་པའི་ཡེ་ཤེས་དང༌། བརྩེ་བའི་ཐུགས་རྗེ་དང་། མཛད་པའི་ཕྲིན་ལས་གསུམནི་སེམས་ཅན་གྱི་
zla1_khams la phan pa rgyun chags mu 'brel bsanam yang bslu ba med pa yin la/_yon tan rgya che ba'i cha nas gzhal na ngag gi rang bzhin la spobs pa'i gter chen po grol ba 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes dang /_dran pa dang /gzungs 

la dbang thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs gzhan sus kyang spobs pa'i rgyun gcod mi nus ba dge bsnyen byang chub sems dpa' li tsa byi dri med grags pa lta bus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig gi yon tan mtha' dag brjod pa la zhugs 
na|_nam mkha' lding dar la babs pa'i lang tshos dregasapa zhiganamamakha'i pha mtha' gzhal ba la zhugs pa bzhin/_rang nyid la la zhing dub pa'imathab rnam pa gnyis thob nas slar 'bab pa dang 'dra ba yin pasan yab sras mjal ba'i mdo las/_bya lam namakha' 
dpag par nus kyang srid/_/_rgya mtsho bum pas gzhal du rung yang srid/_/sangs rgyas yon tan pha mtha' rtogs mi nus/_/zhes so//_yang /_'din 'khor ba'i 'khor lor yang nas yang /_/brgyud de las ngan bsags pa'i mtshang can rnams//'khor los bsgyur [ 1408]
dang dbang phyug la sogs pa/_/_skyabs gzhan gang gis bslu bar mthong nas ni/_/_'jigs dang dad dang snying rje rnam gsum gyis/_/gzhan don sems pa skyes bu chen po'i blos/_/dkon mchog rjes su dran pas skyabs su 'gro_/de la bdag cag ninyis can khri mun 
las yang ba'i phyi mtha' thams cad gnod pa can gyis bskor nas yod pa ltar 'khor ba'i rang bzhin nyon mes pa dang /_nyes pa brgya phrag du ma'i 'dam rdzab chen por yang nas yang du kha brgyud cing /_dmyal bar 'gro ba dang /_yi dwags su 'gro ba dang /_dud 'gror 
'gro ba dang /_lha ma yin du 'gro ba dang /_mi dbul po dang /_nyam thag ba dang /_srog gi 'jigs pas skrag ba la sogs sdug bsngal dang gnod pa du ma'inang du nges par 'gro dgos pa'i las ngan rgya che la gting zab pa sha stag byas shing bsags pa'i mtshad

ka_
/_chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/_'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_'jig rten gyi mes po tshangs pa dang /_lha dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnod sbyin ma rungs pa'i sde tshogs rang nyid kyang 'khor ba na 'khor ba/_don dam pa'i 
/bden pa mamathong ba/_'jigs pa'i g.yang sa la rgyab/_gnas skabs tsam du'ang phan pa dang gnod pa 'dres mar sbyin pa'i rang bzhin dag gisani skyob parami nus shing bsla ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas na skyabs su 'os pa ni gcig las gnyis pa med 
nenaganyis shing rta _
dmado las/_rkang gnyis dam pa ma gtogs pa/_/'jig rten dag na skyabs gzhan med/_/ces so/_/rgyagang gis na/_sangs rgyasani rang nyid 'jigs pa med pa'i go 'phang thob pas gang gis skyabs su song ba de 'khri shing ljon pa la brten pa lta bu dang _/[ 409]
spyan/_gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pas skyabs su sod tshod kyi dgos don 'grub pa dang*/_thugs rje la kaM ring mi mnga' zhing /_dad pa dang bsgrub pa'i mchod pasams pa khen las zang zing gi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro/_/_de ltar yin pas des bstan pa'i 
nyis brgya _
chos dang /_de'i bstan pa la zhugs shing 'phags bslob pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyang skyabs su 'os pa'o/_/_ji ltar skyabasasu 'gron/_tha mal pa rnams ni ngan song gi sdug bsngal la 'jigs shing*/_mtho ris la sogs pa'i yon tan la 'dod pa dang bcas pa'o/_/
3[2 ]nyan rang gnyis ni de'i steng du srid pa'i rang bzhin skye rgan 'chi'i 'khrul 'khor la 'jigs nas dad pa gsum bskyed pa'o/_/theg pa chen po pani/_bdag nyid kyi blo snying chen po'i gzhan dbang du gyur pas rang don yal bar dor nas sems can gyi khams su 

gyur to cog 'khor ba las skyob pa'i phyir du skye/_de'i phyir dang po gnyis kyi cha las log ste gzhan don 'ba' zhig la dmigs pa skyes bu chen po'i blos dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan la nges pa stobs su gyur pa'i blo ltos rtse gcig pa snying thag pa nas 
'cha' bas skyabs su 'gro ba ste/_de la re zhig dmigs pa'i rten thun mong gi dbang du byasanas sangs rgyas sam/_khyad par gyi dbang du byas na rdo rje phreng ba las/_dri med sems ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/chos ni ngag tu yang dag gsung /_/_sku ne dge 'dun zhes bya 
ste _/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi gnas/_/_zhes dkon mchog gsum 'dus kyi ngo bo bla ma nyid gtso bor bzhugs pa la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sprin phud gtibs pa lta bus bskor ba gang nas kyang byon pa med/_gang du'ang gshegs pa med/_rtag [\] 4I0]
chags kyi dngos por med/_mos pa dang 'dun pa'i rang gzugs la chu las chu bur skyes pa ltar mdunamakhar gsal btab la/_das dang yid kyi mchod pa'itshogasargya chen bos mtshod cing*/_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_sdig pa bshags pa dang /_gus pa 'dul ba 
rnams kyis sna drangs/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'dun pa gcig gis thal mo sbyaranas skyabs su 'gro bar dmigs nas nges par 'byung ba'i dbyangs dang ldan pas/_bdag las phung por grub gyur cing /_/gzugs las mi 'du chags pa yi/_/_gting mthar 
med pa'i 'khor ba na/_/sdug bsngal zhags pas bcings pa bdag_/deng nas snying po byang chub bar/_/sems can kun gyi don slad du/_/blamamachog dang rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/thog pa phyinang chos dge 'dun/_/skyabs su 'os pa mtha' dag la/_/'dun pa tsam dang rmongs 

@#/_/pas min//de bzhin mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang*//nyitsho'i slad du ma yin par//_mkhyen brtsi nus pa'i zhags pa yis//'gro 'di 'khyud pa ltar gyur pa'i//dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan ni/_yang dag dran pas skyabasasumachi//zhes pa 
la sogs pas snying thag pa nas skyabs su 'gro ba lan gsumagyis mtha' brten par 'o//da ni tshe ga'am/_brda las thob pa zhes bya ste/drani lanagasab pa las/_skyabs su 'gro ba gsumanodapa'i tsho/pusamo btsugs la thal mo sbyar te skyabs su 'gro ba gsu/
khazhas tshig tu brjod pa ni/_lus dang ngag gi tshig bstan pa'o//zhes dang /_tshogaram ltos pani sems rtse gcig pas gsum laskyabs su 'gro ba ste/_de nyid las/gal tosemasartse gcig tu byasan/_lus dang ngag yodakyang tshogs bstan pa med de/de ni [41|]
ka bden gnyis shing rta nyis brgya 
chog bstan pa med pa zhes bya'o//zhes gsungs so//ji lta na'ang rjes la dmigs pamed pa'i shes rab bod du chud pa'i dad du mnyam par gzhag pa ni don dam pa'i skyabs 'gro ste/_chos nyid kyis thob pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs 'gro'i rgyu ma nor ba 
yin no//rgyu'i skyabs 'gro'i phan yon bshad pa'i phyir/_jiltaranamamakha'atshad gzung medapa ltar//dkon mchog la brtanadakar nag las 'bras kyi//lamatha' mi dpogs skyabs so gzugasagyuran//namamakha'isnodakyis brtan par zhusam yin//
eg ནང་པའི་ཁྱུར་འགྲོ་སྡོམ་པ་མཐའདག་བརྟེན།།སྡིག་སྒྲིབ་འཛོད་ཅིང་གནོད་པའི་ཚོགས་ཀྱིས་སྤྲོད།།ངན་འགྲོའི་གཡང་བསྲུང་དཀོནམཆོག་གསུམམི་འབྲལ།།ཕུན་སུམ་ཚོགས་པམཐོང་བའི་ཆོས་ལ་འོང་།།བསོདནམསཚོགས་རྫོགས་གཟུགས་ཀྱི་སྐུ་གཉིས་

'grub//'di ltar nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni bla 'og dang phyogasachasamatshon par mi nus pa ltar/_
spyir dkon mchog la brten pa'i dkar nag gi las 'bras ni blos thug pa med pa dngos shugs gnyis kasayang yang myes zin la de skad du sde snod las kyang
/jiltar/
namamakha'amathar thug med pa la//_'dom gyis gzhal bas tshad bzung med pa ltar//de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la brten pa yi//yon tan dang ni sdig pa'i mtha'ami dpogs//zhes bshad labye brag tu skyabs su song ba'i phan yon ni/_dri ma medapa'i 
mdo las/_skyabs su song ba'i bsod nams gang //gal te de la gzugs maN+Din//nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang na//de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur//_zhes dang /_phar phyin bsdus pa las/_skyabs song bsodanams gzugs yodan//_khams [2]
gsum 'di yang snod duchung //rgyamatshon po chu yi gter//yul gyis btsal bar gzhal minus//zhes dang /_khye'u rin pos byin pas zhus pa'i mdo las khyad /gang dag sangasargyaso la skyabs susong ba dedag gi dge ba'i tshos thamasacad mngon par 
'phel ba yin no//de tshe shes pa yin no//khrel yod pa yin no//_chos la skyabs su song ba de dag ni bag yod pa yin no//_yon tan gyi tshogasam nga ba yinano//rtag tutshe rabs dran pa yin no//tshes kyi bgo skal gyi tshogs dang ldan pa yin no//dge 'dun 
la skyabs su song ba de dag gi sems las su rung ba yin no//_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgomang ba yinano//rtag tu rigasabatsun pa yin no_/_rmi lam du'ang sangs rgyas dang //_chos dang /dge 'dun dang mi 'bral ba yin no//gzhan yang dkar po la mngon par

[# ]skye ba la dgongs pas so//_mdzod 'grel las kyang /_skyabs su 'gro ba rnams ni sdom pa yang dag par blang ba thams cad la sgor gyur pa yin no/_/_zhes bshad do//_gzhan yang dkon mchog la skyabs su med bas sngon bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang sdug

[I]nges par skye ba'i pha rol 'gro/_/_zhes so/_/_gnod pa dang nyabar 'chi ba las thar ba'ang /_mdo sde rgyal mtshan dam pa las/_dge slong dag_/_khyod dgon pa dang*/_dur khrod dang*/_'brog stong pa la sogs pa na 'dug kyang rung /_/gsum la skyabs su song zhig dang*/_/'jig 
pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_spu zing zhes byed pa de dag med par 'gyur ro//_zhes dang /_don 'di dag la ni skye bo mos pa dag yid ches ba'i gtamargyud kyang 'chi ste/_sngon rkun po zhig la dbyig pas lan gsum brtog padang bstun nas rdeg pa pos/sas rgyas la

shams brtas pa'i myur tham pa'i pha rol nas mi ma yin mang po 'dir gyis 'ong bas mthong ste/_'din dkon mchog la skyabs 'gro byed pa zhig snapango zhes bros par gyur skad/_de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mapar rtog pa canala'ang dkon mchog gi rang bzhin 
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i grub 'brasami bslan/_nyonamongs pa dang /_'ching bas kun nas dkrisabang /_srid par 'khor ba 'jig tshogs la blta bdang*/_zhi ba phyogs gcigabatheg padaman pa'i lamadu gal 'dang /_'khor ba dang ngan song la sogs pami mthun

2_gsungs pa ltar zla ba sgronam dang /_'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa las gsungs pa bzhin gsum po rjes su dran patshig gis legs par gsal btab cing /_'di'adra ba'i skyabasagasumal brtan du yod pa bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do

brgyud _

@#/_/_spros pa dang bral bani sas rgyas/_'gyur ba medacing drimasam gos pa'i dmatshos/_yon tan gyi cha thams cad rang bzhin lhun grub tudzogs pa dge 'dun zhes tha snyad tsam dusbyar te/_ngo bo'i cha nasarnam thar sgo gsum gyi bzhugs tshul 
chen po la yul dkon mchog dang /_yul can bdag dang sems can zhesaskyabs \u0f74 'gro bya 'gro byed kyi tha snyathams cadasmon pa med pa'i dbyings su rnam par byang ba'i 'bras bu'i skyabs 'gro nyid de yi shes grub pa las/_dag thob bral ba'i sems sangs 
bden gnyis shing rta _
rgyas/_mi 'gyur drimedachos dngani/_yon tan lhun rdzogs dge 'dun nyid_/_yin phyir rang gi sems nyid mchog/ces gsus ba ltar ro//'di ltarasangasargyas pa'i chos thams cadani kun rdzob bden pas tshig gi mtha' lcam  _ klas par gzhal yang mthar [417]
thug don dam pa'i bden pa nyag gcig tu 'bab pa'i phyir na/lam gyi sgo dang po skyabs 'gro'i gnadamathar thug pa rig pa dang rtogs pa'i yon tan khong du chud pa dusamanyam pa 'di yal gyi rig go/'an lam gyi gnasaskabs su las bu'i skyabs 'gro smos pa la 
\u0f72sa brgya dgu [# ]dgos paci yod zhen/_rgyu'i skyabs 'gro'irjes thob thams cad du 'bras bu'i skyabs 'gro khros mthun pa'i skyod pa nyid kyis rgyas gdab dgos pa yinato/de las ye shes kyi tshogasazhogasapa'i tshul bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i mdo las/_'jam dpal bsodanam 
'i_kyi tshogs kyis ni gzugasaM kyi sku thob la/_ye shes kyitshogasakyis ni chos kyi sku dam pa mngon du byedapa yinano//zhesaso//de nas/bslab bya rgyu 'bras gnyis las dang poni/_mnga' ris bya dga'i slad du smos ci dgos/_srogagi phyir yang dkonamag gtong 

pamin//de yi do bo brumar skyabasaso nas//dam pa bslu dang mi snyan sgrogs spang //de la phyogs dad pa rgyu'i bslab bya la//'di ltarama' ris dang /_longs spyod ni tshogacig gi stod smad la sogs parayang g.yo zhing mi brtanapasmosaci dgos/de dag la bdag 
dadabadag gi bar 'dzin pa'i rten lus dang srog giradabazhin yadagadonami za bar 'bral bar 'gyur bas snyid bomed la/_dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro bsazhimadon par mtho ba dngangs par legs pa'i bde ba thams cad 'phral yun kun tu 'grub pa nyidad/galato 
mos pa'i dbang gis dman pa dadamachog gi khyad par nor nasagon mchog btang par gyurananatsho rabs kun tu sdug bsngal brgyudamar 'khyud bsan/_tha na bzhad gad kyi byin ram/_srog la babs kyang dkemachogamibatang ba'i dam bca' brtan pa la yangayang [ 4J8]
bslababar bya ste/'dul ba lung las/_khyod kyis srog dang rgyal srid dang /_tha na bzhad gdegyi phyir yang dkon mchog gsum srung bar mi bya'o//zhes so//khyad par sdugasakyilam la nad gzhamachog gsumaka'i ngo bamatshan ldanagyi bla ma la skyabs su song nas dam 
par gyur pa'i skyes bu rnams bslu ba dang /_mi snyan pa brjod pa yodas su slang bar bya ba ni/_snod po bkod ba las dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas mdapar 'os bami bsgrub dang /_skyes bu dam pa rnams lamasnyan pa sgrub yongs su spang bar bya
zhing dam pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'gro bar bya'o//_zhes so//de'ang skyabs gsum so so'i bsladematshams kyi sgonas bshad pa'i phyir/_de bzhin sangasargyasachos dang dge 'dun la//_skyabs su song nas rim bzhin bdag nyid ni/'khor bar 'khor ba'i 

ka _
/_lha la phyag mi 'tshal/_/gzhan lami 'tshamu stegs can mi 'grogs/_/'di ni man ngag las byung ba'i bslab bya zhes bya ste/_de la gnyis las/_dang po dgag pa'i bslab bya gsum ni mdo sde myang 'das las/_gang zhig sangs rgyas 
spyabs 'gro ba/_/deni yang dag dge bsnyen te/_/nam du'ang lha ni gzhan dag la/_/_skyabs su song bam yinano/_/_dam pa'i chos la skyabs 'gro ba/_/'tshe zhing gnod pa'i sems dang bral/_/dge 'dun la yang skyabs 'gro ba/_/_mu stegs can dang 'grogs pa _/
rgyu_min/_/_zhes gsungs pas/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song nas rang nyid 'khor ba na 'khor ba 'jig rten pa'i lha chen po drug po dang*/_khyab 'jug la sogs par yang skyabs su 'dzinan/_mkha' la rgyu ba'i yi dgas rdzu 'phrul dang mngon shes cung zad yod pa [419]
bden gnyis shing rta nyis brgya_
la ltartsi smos/_de ltanamagon po bdun curtsa lnga lasogs pachos skyong ngumi rung ngam snyam na/_skyabs gsum la yidamachis pa'am/_de las lhag par bltas nas blo gtong na mi rung ba yin gyi/_gnas skabs chos ldan kyi bya ba bsgrub pa'i grog 
subasten tsing mchod pa la dgag bya med do/_dper na sman pa la skyabs su 'dzin pam yin kyang nad las gso ba'i ltos 'cha' ba bzhin no/_/_chos la skyabs su song nas/_sems can gang dag 'ching zhing brdeg pa dang /_go rar 'ad pa dang /_rna dbug
[M2]
thucu [a]cing bya'adral pa dang*/_mi theg pa'i khal gyis mnar ba dang /_lamached las pags te bzhon pa la sogs 'didag rmongs pa'i dbang gis nyes byas su mi rig pa mang ste sems can la 'tsho ba chen po yin pas spung bar bya ste_/_dper na bya dang ri dwags/

la sogs brtsed 'jo dang /_domatshar gyi slad du/_ched du gnyer gdamasakyi bdag gir byed pa ni go rar 'ching ba'i sde tshan te/_de dag bag yangs su rgya ba bkag pa'i sdug bsngal dang 'tsho ba ji ltar thob rang nyid la rjes su dpags pas shes par 'gyur ro/_/dge 
'dun la skyabs su song nas/_dkon mtshig la yid ma ches shing bskur ba'i gad zag dang nye bar mi byed cing /_than dkon mchog latshe thad du mi 'dzin pa de la'ong blo phyogs par mi byed do/_/de'i mthun phyogs bsgrub pa'i bslab bya gsumazhi[\] ]rgyal 
ba'i sku gzugs bris 'bur gyi rnam pa bzo sgros ci 'dra yang /_dbyas mi gdags/_sri zhu yod pa'i gnas su mi bzhag gta' mar mi 'jug pa la sogs brnyas thabs thams cad spang dgos te/_dam pa'i saM pad+ma dkar po las sku gzugs [1420]
rnam pa mang po de 
mang pa dar sprul nas/_'gro ba dge ba spyod pa'i don byed do/_/_zhes bzo sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/_/_rgyu des dkon mchog la dadapadang bcas pa'i rgyu 'bras smin tshul blosami 'khyud par gsungs pa'i lung mang ngo*/_/_chos tshigs 
su bcad pa bzhi panasaM gan+d+rig pa'i bar yan chad la ma gus pa mi bya ste/_'dul ba lung las[ ” ]sdig pa ci yam buzhing*/_/dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad/_/rang gi semasaMni yongs su 'dul/_/'di sangasargyas bstan pa yin/_/ces pa la'ang ston 
pa'i lung rtogs kyi bstan pa'i rnam gzhag tshang ba'i phyir na/_glegs bam thod du byed pa dang /_sa rjen par tsami gal du 'dor ba dang /_sri zhus ma chung bar byed pa dang /_'gom yugs dang /_gta2mar 'jug pa sogs spang bar bya ste/_dkon mchog la dad pa'i 

ka _
@#/_/_gang zag dam parnams gsung rab gdan drangs pa mtho yang ldang zhing /_thal mo sbyor ba dang /_bzhon pa las gzhol ba dang /_'bru bsnon du so dreg skud pa la'ang ya nga ba'i gnas su mdzad pa de ngo mtshar che'o/_/da lta chos kyi 
tshig don la banal brtag byedacing*/_sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan lartsedamodang /_brnyas thabs 'ba' zhig byed pa ni shes rab 'chal barmos pa'i rgyu gsog pa nyid yin no/_/ci'i phyir na snyan go las/_lnga brgya'i tha mar gyur pa na/_/nga ni yi ge'i gzugs 
bden gnyis shing rta _
rtisu gnas/_/nga yin snyam du yid byos la/_/de tshe de la gus par gyis/_/zhes gsungs pas so/_/de bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dunanam/_rab tu byung ba dge sbyong gi rtags tsam 'dzin pa yan chad la brnyas par mi bya ste/_skyabs 'gro'i bslab bya [ #21]
lagatong bar ma zad tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun la brnyas pa'i khanam tho bani mthu che ste/_shod bu ser [》 ]sa slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge 'dun rnams la glang po'imago can khyed cag gis chos sam chos ma yin pa ci shes/_ces pa la sogs pa'i 
ngan smra ba bca brgyad byas pas/_de chu srin nya'i yi sa can mgo brnyan mi 'dra ba bco brgyad yod par skyes nas/_ston pa 'od srung nas shAkya thub pa'i bar du dud 'gro'i 'gro bar bsdad pa'i tshul lung rnam 'byed las gsal bar gsungs pa'i phyir 'di ni 'di 
nyis brgya bcug 
'a'o zhis dpyas gdags pa dang /_bla gas dpyang ba'i nyes pa mi bzad pa yin la/_than tshul khrims 'chal partags dang mi bral ba yin yang /_khyu mchog shi ba'i ro la bsi waM dang /_gla ba'i ro la rtsi ma gi ta yod pa ltar sngon legs par spyad pa'i 'bras 

bucung zad dang ldan pa yin pas brnyas shing khrims la sbyar bar mi rung ba'i tshul sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa'i mdo las rgyas par bstan_/_bdag cag gi ston pa dkon mchog la gus pa brtas pa'i blo dud 'gro'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa'i dus kyang ma nyams pa seng _/
ge'i rgyal po yi dam brtan pas rang nyid kyi srog 'phrog pa'i rtson pa rab tu byung ba'i rtags su tshul 'chos pa la'ang blo gtad cing gusapam spyod pa dper byas nas pha rol gyi skyon lameg pa yin no/_/_spyir na slob dpon dpa' bos/_log pas 'thab gcugs byed pa 
dang //bkren la dman par blta ba dang /_/_tshul khrims ldan rnamasami dga' dang _/dka' bsdom pa 'khrul byed pa/_/bzhi po 'di dag 'dod min te/_/rtsa ba 'joms par bgyid pa lags/_/_zhes bshad pa yin no/_/don bsdu na rang nyid dkon mchog la jitsam du gus pa [\]422]
de tsam du 'gro ba gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang bdag nyid la de ltar blta ba las 'brasami bslu ba'i 'bras bu yin te/_ted nge 'dzin rgyal po las/_ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa/_/'bras bu de 'dra thob par 'gyur/_/_zhes gsungs pasan gus pa yod pa'i mngon rtogs 'dis gsal 
gdab pa zhes ston pa'i phyir/_dkon mchog rten la dad pas bsnyen bkur zhing /_/_nyin mtshan brjod pa spangs nas skyabs su 'gro_/zhes smos pa ste/_dad pa'i rgyu ni sngon ston pa 'jig rten du ma byon pa'i dus na skyabs ma yin pa la skyabs dang /_lam ma yin pa lam du 'khrul 
[\[]nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ston pa dang /_bstan pa'i lam srol la zhugs nas dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pa bsnyen pa byung na/_da ni bdag gzhan gyi ston pa dang bstan pa'i khyad par shesanas dad pa la 'jug pa'i sgo ci'i phyir mi dbye/_de skad du khyad par 'phags 

/bstod las/_mu stegs gzhan gyi gzhung lugs la/_/_ji lta jiltar rnam bsams pa/_/de lta de ltar mgon khyod la/_/bdag gi sems 'di dad par gyur/_/de ltar thams cad khyenamen pa'i/_/grub mtha'i skyon gyis brlag sems ldan//
bsam brlag rnams kyis skyon med pa'i/_/_ston pa khyod kyang mi mthong ngo*/_/zhes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ni lam bde bas 'bras bu yang bde ba 'thob pa dang /_'khor ba'i rgyun gcod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnam par byung bar byed pa dang*/_nyes pa'i tshogs 'dag pa 
ka lenaganyis shing rta nyis brgya _tshu_dang*/_mtha'agacig tu dge ba la sogs pa'i yonatanazad mi shes pa yin la/_phyi rol pa'i bstan pa ni de las gzhan du gyur pa'i phyir/_dpa' bo'i zhabs kyis/_gang slad khyod kyi bstan pa ni/_/bde bas bde ba 'thob 'gyid pa/_/de slad smra ba'i seng khyod [ 423]
kyi/_/_gzhung lugs la zhi 'gro 'di dad/_/ces pa la sogs pasu bskyed chogs_gnyis su rgya cher bsngags pa yinano/_/de'i phyir bka' yi rjes su dran pa'i dad pa chen po bskyed nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang*/_mchod rten dang /_gsung rab la 
sogs pa mngon sum du mchis pa'am/_ma mchis kyang rung ste de dag 'ba' zhig gi slad du mchod pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhaganas bsnyen bkur zhing dmigs pa'i rkyen gcig las med kyang thams cad chos nyid dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin shes na thams cad 
bcus
_lamachod bar 'gyur zhing*/_de yang le lo dang skom las dang bag la nyal gyi dbangagis gzhan byed dum 'jug par bdag nyid 'ba' zhig gis lag bdar nas byed pa ni 'du byed dang ldan pa'i lus la snying po len zhing bsod nams rgya che la/_yasems can 

bsod nams kyi bsags pa man zhing sdug bsngal la/_nus pa'i mthu chung ba mthong nas 'didag gis mchod pa byas na khong nyid bde ba'i 'bras bu la reg par 'gyur ro snyam nas gzhan la bgyid du bstsalan/_snyid rje dang sems bskyed kyi 'phen pas bsod nams snga 
ma las rgya che ba thob la/_khyad par bsam pa de ldan gyis gzhan yang bskul nas rang gzhan gnyis kas byed pa ni de bas kyang rgyu che ba'i bsod nams 'thob pa yin te/_dbu ma snying po las/_su zhig chu shing lbu ba ltar/_/_snying po med pa'i lus 'di dag_/gzhan phan 
rkyen du 'asgrub byed pas/_/lhun po snying por bsgrub mi byed/_/yar bas snying dzor ldan pas_/_/_skad cig re rer rga shi dang /_/nad kyi gzhir gyur lus dgani/_/gzhan la bde bskyed gzhir byed de/_dmachos sgron dang bcas pa la/_/_mi khom brgyad spangs khom pa 'di//[ 424]
skyes bu chen po'i spyod pa yis/_/_'bras bu yod par bya ba'i rigs/_zhes so/_/de'i phyir lus ngag gi sgo nas bkur sti'i mchod pa/_phyog 'tshol ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang*/_mngon du lpang ba dang /_bskor da pa dang /_gus par smra

kapaden gnyis shinge[t]
_ngumado ste dkon mchog sprin dang*/_dmatshig gsum la sogs pa nas gsungs pa'i bdag pos ma bzung ba'i mchod pa/_me tog dang /_bza' shing dang /_yul ljongs dang /_chu klungang /_rin po che'i gter la sogs pa dag gis kyang mchod cing /_de

brgyabacu gsum 
'bras bu dpag tu med pa 'byung ba'i bsamapa drug bskyed par bya ste/_dkon mchog ni yon gyi zhing god named pa'o snyam pa dang*/_u dum wA ra'i me tog ltar shin tu dkon ba'o snyam pa dang /sen thad kyi mchog go snyam pa dang /_phan 'dogos pa gong na med de snyam pa dang /stong 

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten na gcig kho na 'byung bas 'ba' zhig pa'o snyam pa dang /_'jigarten 'jigarten las 'das pa'i phun tshogs thad kyi gzhi yin no snyam nas mchod pa'o/_/de skad du mdo las/_dad pa'i zhings la bsed nams kyi zhing smod par gyur cig_/
ces gsungs pa 'di phyi'i bde phebs tha kyi zhing sa bla na med padang /_phrad dus dag tshogs rin po che'i sa bon mi 'debs shing bdeskyid thams cad dkon mchog gi bka' drin las byung ba'i byas pa gzo mi shes pa de ni byis pa tha shal gyi spyod pa yin te/_ting nge 'dzin rgyal po 'dus 
sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu yis zas rnyed kyang //de la byisapa byasapa gzo mi'agyur/_/zhesaso/_/de'i phyir rnam pa thad du bza' btung gi phud nas kyang kon mchog mchod cing /_chaklung ngam/_khyed ka dang phrad kyang mchod yonadabul ba la snying thag pa nas brtson par bya ste/_muge'i mthus [#26]
rgyal po'i bu mdzod sog bar gyi pan bre gangs pa de yang las rgyus la byin pas longs spyod kyi char babs pa rgyal po gser mdog can du skyes pa'i rabs bzhinano/_/de ltar mchod cing rjes su dran par byas nas nyin mtshan 'khor mo'am/dusadragag gam/_dunas gsum mam 
thana' nyinamatshan gyi cha der lan gcig re bran pas skyabs 'gro ba ste blo ni gang goms pa'i rjes su 'jug pa chos nyid yin phyir nyams len gzhan med kyang 'chi ba'ichosangs rgyasarjes sun par 'gyur la/_de ltar dran nas skyabs su song na don chen po dang ldan pa yin te/_skyid 
pa'adzin rgyal po las/_lus dang ngag dang yid rab dang ba yis/_/rtag dus samyasag gibasngagasapa brjod/_/de ltar des ni sems kyi rgyud bsgoms pas//nyin mtshan du yang 'jig rten mgon po 'ong*/_/nam zhig de nin zhing mi bde nas/_/_shi la thug pa'i sdug bsngal 

/tshor khyud na//sangs rgyas lan dran pami nyamasate//_sdug bsngalatshor bas 'phrog par yongs mi 'gyur//zhes gsungs te/_dperan ltasan dmyal me'itshor bsayongs su gdungs pa'i tsho/_sangasargyas la snying khong rus pa'i 
gted nas skyabs sumachi'o zhes smras pas/de'i mthus rang sangs rgyas rus pa can zhes bya bar 'tshong rgya bar lu bstan pa bzhin no//_de lta bu'i skyabasasu 'grotshul larebasubanas gsus pa'i yon tan shes pa dang /_khyad par shes pa dang /_khas blangs

rA ga uts+tshis+samib bam pa la bltas pa'imadzad spyod la bslabatsan sad nas
kyig_/_phyi rgya'i tshan dang /dmag das pud/dam gnas+sasu 'a spyadapag yod pa 'bul ba/_bsgom pa bsam 
tshigan pa mdo ste/_lta ba lkogatum gyur pa mngon pa dang mthun par nyams su len pa ni lamarjes su bsgrub pa'i skyabs 'gro yang dag pa'o//'as bu'i bslab bya thub pachos kyi sku//bral sogs spus pa'i nga blos labyadachub pas//_skyob dang bskyab byar mi 
[# ]'dzin tha snyad las//'das phyir gtong rgyu'ang brtags pa bla dgas yin//de lasems don gyi ngo domi long lta bur stobs kyi riganasadakon mchog gi rang bzhin rgyud gzhanagyis bsdus bamayinapa'i don rtogs pani'abras bu'i skyabs 'grodang /_sems byung don 

kyi khyad par de la gzugs brnyan sna tshogs su 'char ba'i rang bzhin shes pa lta bu ni rgyu'i skyabs 'gro ste/_dbus mtha' las/del donayong rnam par shes/_/de yi khyad par sems las byung //_zhes pa ltar sems dang sems byung nyi ma dad 'od zer bzhin du 
mtshungs par 'jug pa'i rtsal snang dbyings la thim ste spros pa 'bar zhi ba'i tsho skyob byed dkon mchog dang /bskyab bya bdag tu lta ba gnyis kamed pas tshogs blangs pa'i bslab bya gtang mtshams kyang tha snyad kyis gdags pa'i tshig bla dgas tsam du zad par 'gyur ro//
gnad 'di mgon don dam pa'i skyabs 'gro'i phyogs tsam yang rig par mi nus pas tha chad pa'iskyabs 'gro la gnas lugs do dza'i skyobs 'gor 'dod pa shin te'ang gti mug can no//de las 2ma gyis gnasaskabs/_rgyu yi gtong mtshams skyabs 'gro mtshan nyid pa/[ #28]
'gro ba'i yul la log lta skyes pas gtod/bslab pa nyamasan dmanapar ltungaba'i phyir/_ma yi lag bzhin bsgrims te bsrung bar bya/_/dal khacig mdo nas bshad pa'i bslab bya dang po gsum kyi steng /_rgyun chags pa'i skyabs 'gro dang /srog gi phyir yang
mi gtong ba dang /dkonamag mchod pa ste drug po dang 'galan gtong bar 'dodopa dang dol la de'i steng du sku gzugs lasogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprul pa gsum la brnyas pa lasogs bsnan te dgu potshadon gtong bar 'dodakyang /_skyabs su 'gro ba'i yul 
la log lta skyes te dkon mchog gsum spasapadang /_bsgrub par ma nus nas skyabs 'gro'i bslab pa phul bzhigatong pa'i mtshan nyid pa yin la/_gal te dkon mchogamabatang yang de'i ldog phyogs kyi ston pa la sogs pa gzhan la'ang 'ganyis 'dzin byed/

na phyinang gi ston pa dang bstan pa'i mchog dman dpung tshul bzhinam shes nas dkon mchog la blom khel pa'i rtags yin pas gzhi bsdu ba nas gzhan du mi smra bsaskyabs su song ba zhes pa'i rnam bzhag dang 'gal bas gtong

zhes bstan pa'i khyad par bla 'og 'jol ba lta bur dbye ba [1429]//_de nyid 
yi dgasamathu po chal skyabs su 'dzin pa la sogs te/_
bslab bya gzhan las nyams pa dag ni dman par phyogs pa zhes bya banyid do zhes ston pa'i phyir
pas skabs btsal rnams/_/chig don 'dzol pa'i yid gnyis snod ngan du/_/bslu ba med pa'i nges shes bri ba'i rtags/_/_yi dgas la brtenatsho 'di nyid la nyams/_/zhes smos te/_/_las kyi ce spyang gdug
bod 'dir kha skadatsam du dkon mchog gi mtshan 'dod rgyal du sgrog pa las
don la dkon mchog gi yon tan blor mi chud/_
snying thag pa nas blo khel ba'i gtan tshigs gcig kyang med pas tshogs gsog grags pa'i rjes su 'brang 
gzhan yang mdo sde dran pa nyer gzhag nas ji ltar bstan pa'i las dang las kyi 'bras bus 'bangasaba'i 

yidags mthu bo che dag gis bdag nyid dkon mchog yin par khas 'ches bsarmongs ba thos ba nyung zhing zhen pa'i 'ching ba can dag dang 
shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa dag gis 'gro ba drug tu mi gtogs pa'i 'dzig rten bdun pa'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 
ting mtshams sbyor ba'ang dag pa'i zhing khams su khungs phyungapas der srid pa phyi ma'i 'phen pa gtong ba dang 
khyim pa dang khyim pa'i bsam pa can kun dkon mchog las yi dwags la chathur du 'dzin pa ni ma rig pa'i nyer len ldog par dka' bas 
bsod nams la bsgribs pa ste/_dkon mchog ta la'i mdo las/_ji ltar dmus long nyemami mthong yang /_/demedam yin 'jig rten kun la 'chor/_/_mig dang ldan pas snang bar shes gyur nas/_/kun kyang so so rang gi las la 'jug_/_ces so/[ 430]
[1]reg las bslab bya nyams shing dman par ltung ba'i nyis pani/_bahunapoche rogs lod pa ltar dkon mchog gi skyabs 'og nas yar ba dang*/_ringagasalarma srol btod pa ltar 'tsho bas myur du brje ba dang /_grwa pa mnyan pas bslus pa ltar pha rol pa 
gu ba'i nges pa med pa dang /_mtsho la kha ba babs pa ltar sdom pa'i rten gzhimi gnas pa dang /_dge ba'i rten gzhi nyams pas phyimangan song du 'gro ba la sogs nyosab du ma yo do/_/de'i phyir gal te nyams na de'i nyis dmigs la 'jigs par blta sa to

rten cha ba
gyod pa chen pos bshags shing phyin chad sdom sems kyis blangasanas rachud par 'gyur te/_sems kyadag bskyasabad do'i gnyen po yin pasaso//_'disadadinamamakha' ri rab rnams/_/_yanaman gnas 'gyur nyi zla thang lhung srid_/dkon mchog gsuM/[ |]

/gyis bslu bar misrid ba'i//nges shes brtan pa kunatu don yod yin//_'di ltar snod kyi 'jig rten 'di zhig pa'i tshe thamasacad skyed par 'gyur pas sa gzhi dang ri rab la sogs pa'i gnas sunanamamakha' 'ong la/_yatshags pa'i
[| ]mgo btsumapa nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sanamakha'i gnas su sa gzhi brten pa sa_nasashinatu 'tshol zhing /_gza' skar gyi rten gzhi go la'i rlung gi 'khrul 'khor zhig bas nye bla 5paso na mi gnas pas thapal lhung ba'i tha snyad grubal//de bzhin 
p:|གསིགས་པའི་ཐུགས་རྗེ་དང་བདེན་པའི་གསུང་ལནི་ནམ་ཡང་བསླུ་བ་དང་།འགྱུར་པའི་གོ་སྐབས་སྲིད་པས་ཡིན་པས་ཡིད་རྟོན་དུ་རུང་བ་གཅིག་ལས་གཉིས་པོ་མེད་པ་ནི་དཀོན་མཆོག་ཁོ་ན་ཡིན་ཡདོལས། ། མ /༢༢་ས་གཞི་འགྱུར་པའམ། ། ས་གཞི་ནམ་པང་[43|
ka bden gnyis shi rta nyis bcu bungug
_'gyur yang srid/_/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la//_nam yang 'gyur bam mchis so//_ri rab gnas nas 'pho ba'am//_nyi zla zung la lhad yang srid//_de bzhin gshegs pas ['']ba/sungs pa la/_/gzhan du 'gyur ba[ %E]sa so//_zhes so//_da rter sbyor
dngos rjes gsum tshang ba'i skyabs 'gro'i phan yon sa'aphel dang bcas pa'imajug bsduba'i phyir//_mna'ang dkon mchog mthong ba dang /_/bag 4dan[8]zhing*donatan kun gyis 'byor//_tshorasanacing bar de la sprod paslu/_/_lu[N\u0f7c]na kun gyi dpung dang 
[# ]gnyen du 'gyur//deltar 'diphyi bar do'i gnas skabasathams cad du bde zhing phun sumatshogs pa'iyonatanade dag kyang rang sgo nas byung bar mi bsam par dkon mchog 'bakazhig gi thugs rje'as byung bar shes dgos te/_ci'i phyir na rnam pa thamasacad du semA

can kho na'i don la dgongs pa de thugs rje'i mthu yin pa'i phyir tebaden pa po'i le'ur/gtemug munanag gis rtag tu//sesani sgribs par gyur pa'i skye dgu dang /_/'bar ba'i btson rar chud pa rnams gzigs na/_/drang srong dam pa de ni thugs rje skye/_/zhes dang*/
thub pa'i thugs rje chen po rtagatubyung ste//de mi 'byung ba nam yang sridami 'gyur//'gro ba kun gyibasam par gnas paste//debasasangasargyas de la skyon mi mnga'//zhes so/_/de lta med kyi thos pa nyung ba dag dkon mchog gi thugs rjes rang gi las ngan slongs pa mi 
shes bar/_skyabs 'gro'i rgyu 'bras la the tshom 'cha' ba srid de/_spyod 'jug las/_gsod pa'i mi gcig lag 'chad do/_/gal te tharan cis ma legs/_/_mi yi sdug bsdal chung ngu yi_/_/dmyal ba bralanacis mi legs//_zhes pa ltar/dkon mchog la dadapa'imi la [1432]
nad dang sdug bsngal byung na tshom yanatshodakyi nganasong gi sdug bsngal myong rgyu 'dapa'i rtags yin te/_sher phyin gcod pa las/_rab 'byor rigs kyibu'amarigs kyi bu mo gang dga' de lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig 'di dag yin pa dang /'dzin ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub bar byed

/sas rgyas 
kyi byang chubakyang thob bar 'gyur ro/_/zhesagasungs paltar ro//yang 'di ltar dkon mchogayid la mi dran zhing*/_mtshams med dang /_sde bakhrug gi las dang /_semasacan la gnod ba snatshogasabyed pas mtshon sdig pa 'ba' zhigabyed pa dgatshe 'di la longs spyod sogs 

/decher 'phel ba yod de/_skye ba rnamar b+hasakyisamazin pa'i dge ba bag re byas pa'i 'bras bulhagamamed par 'dunas shim thag nasodachen por 'gro ba'i ltas yin te/sngon nyi 'og gi yul sdig can tshan gcig gi 'jig rten du/dang po 
ka'an gnyis shaderta _zhag bdun du nas kyi char bab/denas babasakyi char bab/de nasarinapo 'char bab/de nas byetshan gyi char bab nas thams cad tshig/denas ri thams cad thugachom du khur nas sa gcig tu brlag par byas pa bzhin no//_spyir sdig can la rgyu med par tshomajug

nyis brgya bcu bdun 
man dzing bur byang chub semasakyi khams//regs las[”]mas pa nyan rang skyes bu'i sems//_stod nyid skyid sde'i dpon mthums nas//thegachen rgya mtsho kunamakhyen glid du 'gro/_de la srid pamatha'agamo'i 'obasaltaramathong nas sdug bsngal dang /nyonamos/

banye b.razhiba'i thar pa thob 'dod kyi blos bskul nasabaslab pa gsum gyi lamanas mtho ris kyi bde dpal ltar slarayog pam yin pa'i zhi ba'i thar pa tsam nyin rang gi mal yod kyang skyon zad pa dang yon tan thob pa'i phyogs re ba yin pas rang gi don ya [ |]
mthar thug pamadzo gsan/gzhan don rlabs po 'grub pa lta ci smos/_glu des theg dman gyi lam gzhan phan gyi yur ba lam phyogs pa'i rdzing bu'am leka'i chu phran lta bu'i zhi bde'i duman byang chub semasakyimathu nyams pa de/_mthar sangs rgyas rnams kyis

shing //thub rgyal thug pa snying rjes bstan pa la//_gzhan phan ro gcig rang bzhin de dag 'jug/ces so//_rgyu gang gisan/rang don tsam la dmigs pa ni shin tu rmos pa'i dud 'gro dang yar thun mong gi spyod pa yinal/_skyes bu chen po'i ngang tshulanisems can 
gzhan gyi phan bad (khon lamatha' gcig tu gzhol ba yinate slob dponatsin goms/[-]shin tu rnyed s+sa'i ra khams 'ga' taphyugs kyang rang nyid bza'//_shin tu skom pas gdungs pa'i chu zhig rnyed na dga' mgur 'thung //'din skyes bu gzhan don byed par brtson/

ka_
@#/_/_de nyid kyis/_'jig rten ma rig du sprin 'khrigs pas 'gro ba 'khrugs gyur pa/_/sdug bsngal me rab 'bar ba'i nang du dbad med lhud mthong nas/_/thod la mechen mched pa lta bur yid brel brtson pa gang /_/'di na de dag skyes bu yin te ma 
pa'ang de dag yin/_/ces bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/_sbyin sogs pha rol phyin pa rnam pa lnga'i/_/_do bo lung du ma bstan lcags khams su/_/rnam par nyams pa thabs shes gser 'gyur rtsis/_/thebs pa'i med la rin thang chen por byed/_/'di ltar sbyin pa la sogs 
bden gnyis shade rta nyis brgya_pa'i thabs kyi cha lnga po yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma zin pa'i san byang chub chen por lung du ma bstan pa'i lcags khams lta bu nyid do/_/de theg pa chen po'i thabs kyi gtso bo khyadachub kyi sems dang /_shes rab kyi gtso bo stong pa nyid zung du 'brel [435]
ba gser 'gyur gyi rtsi lta bus thebs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyumanor ba yin la/_'jug sgo'i cha nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po dang /_gsang sngags kyi theg pa chen po gnyis gsus kyi/_gnyis ka'i ngo bo byad chub kyi sems rgyud la nam skyes pa na theg pa 
chen po'i gad thog yin la/_de med na stong chad bsgom pa dang /_tshul khrims la sogs pa dang /_lhar snang gi nga rgyal brtan pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gang yodakyang dman pa'i lam nyid de/_theg pa chen po dang phyogs 'dzol bo yin no//de bsan chos theg 
bcobargyad pa chen po yin pas mi chog ste/_gang zag gi rgyud theg pa chen po'i 'gro dgos pa ni gal po che yin pas byang chub kyi sems nyid go yul du rgyas 'debs par mi bya'o/_/de skad du sdong po bkod pa las/_rigs kyi bu byad chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 

cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o/_/_zhes gsungs pas so/_/gang phyir snying rje'i thabs dang stong nyid kyi/_/_shes rab zung du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems/_/_sbyor bam dmed bzhi pa'i samalan gyi/_/_smon 'jug gnyis dang bslab bya bslabs las skye/_/de la snying rjes ni zhiba'i mthar lhung ba 
'gog la/_shes rab kyis srid pa'i mthar lhung ba 'gog pa'i khyadachosazhi byang chubasems dpa'i lam yin te/_ma pham pas/_shes pas srid lami gnas shing /_/snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang /_/_mya ngan 'das dang 'khor mi gnas/_/zhes so/_/de'i phyir dogs 
zung du 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems med na/_gshog pa gcig shosachag pa'i 'dab chags la 'phur ba'i nus pa med pa ltar lamamachod pa'i tshul/_do ha mdzod las/_snying rje dang bral skyopa nyid zhugs gang /_/des ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin te/_/'on te snyed rje[ 436]
'ba' zhig sgomana'ang //'khor ba 'di nas thar pa thob mi 'gyur/_/gang yang gnyis po sbyor bar nus pa de/_/'khor bar mi gnas mya ngan 'das mi gnas//zhes dang /_'phags ba blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa las/_de la byang chub sems dpa'i thabs ni gang /_shes

/_shes la sogs rkyen bzhi las skye bar 'dod pa yodakyang /_'dir las dang po la tshod med bzhis sngon du 'gro ba'i samakhan lta bu byasanas smon 'jug gnyis dang bslab bya bslabs pa las skye ba'o/_/_de skad du yum bar ma las/_rab 'byor/_/

sa pa la sogs pa dang /_
'a_gyur pa ste/_byams pa la sogs pa tshos bzhi po de dag gi ngobor gnas pa'o/_/_de las byams pa'i dmigs zlum bshad pa'i phyir/_/_byams pa'i ngo bo gzhan bde 'dod pa yin/_/_sdug pa'i ma [u] sa bu la ji bzhin du/_/_lus dang longs spyod dge ba kun 
spusanas/_/_gzhan la phan 'dogs gnod pa bzod la bslab/_/de la byams pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa nges 'byed cha bzhil gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon shes kyi dbang po'i spyod yul du/_lha dang mi la sogs pa dang /_ngan song gi gnas do dang

/_/_byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad la 
dag la chos kyi phan gdags nas chos nyid rtogs par shog cig snyam du smon lam 'debs pa ni chos kyi de kho na nyid mngon sum du rtogs pa'i sgo nas sems can la byams pa skye bas na chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o
yan chadanas sangasargyas kyis brnyes pa man chad ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ste/_rtog med lhun gyi grub pa'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams la byams pa skye zhing phan 'dogs par mdzad de/_dper na yid bzhin nor bu dang dpag bsam gyi shing la rnam rtog med kyang ji 
ltar gsol ba btab pa bzhin du sems can la phan 'dogs pa ste/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khong las sems can gyi khams la byams pa chen po rang bzhin lhun grub du 'byung bas na dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o/_/de dag la khyad 

/_sa las/_sems can la dmigs panamu stegs can dang thun mong ba yin no/_/_chos la dmigs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dad thun mong ba yin no/_/dmigs pa med pa ni nyams cad dadathun mong ma yinano/
zhesabashadado/_/de ltamod kyi theg pa chen po'i khur 'khyer ba'i rtsa ba snying rje chen po yin te blo gros mi zad pas 'astan pa las/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po mi zad do/_/de'i phyir zhe na sngon du 'grob yin 
go bden gnyis shing rta nyis 'gyi
_pa'i phyir ro/_/btsunab shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na dbugs phyi nang du rgya ba ni mi'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no/_/de bzhind byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni theg pa chen po yad dag par 'grub pa'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no/_/[ 439]
ces dang /_'phags pa chos yang dag par spud pa las/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos rab tu mad po la bslab par mi bgyi'o/_/_btsem ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'achos gcig rab tu bzung zhing rtogs par bgyis nasangs rgyas 
[# ]kyichos thams cad de'i lag tu mchis pa lags so/_/_chos gcig po gang zhen/_'dilta ste/_snying rje chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad byang chub sems dba' rnams kyi lag mthil du mchis pa lagasaso/_/
