nyi shu

thams cad mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'dus dper bgyis nasrog gi dbang po mchis na dbang po gzhanarnams 'byung bar 'gyuraro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du skyid rdzachen po mchis na byang chub sems dpa'i chos gzhan rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
zhes so/_/_de ltar skyod rje'i sems de lan cig nyams su myong yang thams cad nas thams cad du 'gyur b.rosla zhing /_sems can gyi khams dang mos pa tha datsed byed pa dan pas bslab par bya ba'i gnas la bya dka' ba dang zhum pa thob pa mang dumachis 
nas thog pa dman par ltung ba yod de/_slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi don dam byang chub kyi sems bsgom ba rin poma'i sgron ma las/_kha cig dge ba'i las byed kyang /_/rnam par dbenangonam shes pas/_/_rmi lam yul gyi bde ba bzhin/_/_re zhig thob kyang slar [ 440]
nyams 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/de'i phyir snying rje'i sems de lan cig thob pa la'ang spro ba bskyed nus je 'phel du goms pa'i thabs la 'bad pa du mas 'jug dgos pa yin te/_ci'i phyir na byang chubakyi sems de gzhan gyis yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa 
las kyang skye zhing*/_byang chub sems dpa'i mi tsam 'thob mod kyis bsgrim mi dgos par snying rje chen po'i mthus bdag nyid kyi sems zil gyis non pa las byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nyid khyad par che bar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
yeshes gyi phyag rgya'i ting ngo 'dzin las bka' bstsal to/_/de'i phyir slob dpon dpa' bos/_khyod kyi thugs ni rin po che/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon te/_/dpa' khyod kho nas snying por mkhyen/_/_de gzhan skye 'os 'olami byi/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar ro//

/de ltar snying rje chen po rgyud la ldan pa'i gang zag gis byams pa'i dmigs rnams la bslab pa ni/_bdag nyid dang por skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'phrang las btsos ma thag pa/_dbang po yul la sad pas bde sdug gi tshor ba phra mo 
ka bden gnyis shing rta [ : ]tshun chad nyams su myong yang blang dor gang yang mi shes shing /_'bu srin lta bu'i lus mi gtsang ljan ljin gyis gtums pa/_dring la yid du mi 'ong ba do mas pang du blangs/_khrus dang byi dor byas/_sha'i drod la sbyar/_nu zhos bskyed bsrings/_mig byams 
rgyu par bltas/_mi gtsang ba lag pas dor/_gnodapa bzod par byas/_spyod lam mi mthun pa yang snying du sdug par bzhes/_che ste shi yis dogs/_'bring ste na yis dogs/_chung ste ltogs kyis dogs/_skoms kyis dogs/_'khyags kyis dogs nas mi mthun [ 441]
phyogs spangs/_mthun pa'i phyogs don du gnyer nas cher bskyed pa'i tshe/_nor yod dgu byin/_brtse gdungs la brjod pa spangs nas bu'i don du sdig pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang*/_gtam ngan la khyad du gsad/_lus dang srog kyang ci mi snyam par bltas pa yin 
nyis brgya _
na/_de lta bu'i byas pa shes shing drin du mi gzo ba su zhig byed/_de skad du slob spring las/_byis pa pang na btsa' ba ci yang mi nus pas/_/_gang gi nu zho byams pa'i shugs kyis gzags 'thungs pa/_/_la ba mang bsten byams pa bsten pa de dag 'dir//_shin 
nye ragacig_
gtum rabs zhig na'ang spong bar su zhig spro/_/gang gi khong na 'di skabs rnyed nas gzhes gnas shing*/_/gang gis brtse bag sems kyis zon byas 'di blangs ba/_/nyon mongs de dag sdug bsngal skyabs med 'di bor nas/_/'gro ba ma rabs tha shal zhigana'ang su zhig spro//

zhes gsungs pa ltar rang re dang po mi'i byad la skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa dang mi ldan pa/_nus pa dang mthu zhan pa/_smra lce dang bde lag med pa/_'bu skyogs skam la 'thon pa la bu de nas sgo du ma nas bskyangs/_brda' dang bshes gnyen bslabs pas da lta bya phrug 
tshanas thar ba bzhin durang mgo rang gis 'thon pa de ma'i drin yin/_de ltar da res kyis mas bskyangs pa bzhin du khams gsum gyi sems can gzhanadang gzhan dag rnams kyang thogam med pa'i dus nas bdag gi ma dang gnyen bshes su ma gyur pa gcig kyang medapa 
slob dpon 'phags pas/_ma'i thug mtha' rgya shug tshig gu tsam/_/zhes sngar drangs pa bzhin dang*/_slob spring las/_gang dag lhan cig 'dus nas bgad cing tshes pa dang /_/_glu blangs dga' 'dun byas shing gcig tu zos 'thungs dang /_/dus kyi rim pas me tog rna [42]
rgyun dngos byas dang /_/gnas skabs ci zhig ltar mnyam mi mnyam byas pa yi/_/_nye du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i khongasasu chud gyur ba/_/_klong gi nang du lhung ba lta bur snang bzhin du_/_/_skye shis 'thos pas pos shes pa de bor nas/_/gal te gcig thar byedan de las 
khrel bor med/_/_ces gsungs pa ltar ro/_/_ma byas shing gnyen bshes su gyuranges da lta'i ma dang gnyen bshes bzhin du phan pa rgya chen po btags pa'i drin can sha stag yin pas lus rten dang sgrung rgyal gzhan du 'phos pa la rmongs pa'i dbang gis phyogs 
sa su mi gcod par byas pa shes shing drin du gatho bas phan gdags shing byams pa'i sems gyis blta dgos pa yin te/_yum bar ma las/_sems can bde ba dang mi ldan pa mthong ba de'i cho 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_sems can 'di dag ni  _ 

/_lha yul ba'i lha'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa thob par gyur cig snyam du yid la bya'o/_/_zhes so/_/_de la snying du mi sdug pa la sdang ba dang /_gzhan 'byor phun tshogs la mi bzod pa dang*/_bar ma yal bar 'dor ba gsumani 
[1:| ]byams pa'i mi mthun phyogs yin pas de'i gnyen por tshe rabs snga ma'i byas pa shes pa drin du gzo ba 'di nus pa che ba nyid do/_/_de yang blo bcos pa'i bsgom rgol gyi go rim ni/_tshad med bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel las/_sems can snying du sdug pa dang /
kyi tha mal pa dang*/_snying du mi sdug pa yin pa'i rnam pa 'di gsum yod pa las/_sems can skyid du sdug pa la yang gsum du dbye ste/_rab 'bring tha ma gsum du'o/_/sems can tha mal ba dang mi sdug pa la yang gsum du dbye ste/_rab 'bring tha ma steng 
[z]bdun du dbye ba byas la thog mar 'khriditsam du sdug pa de pha ma la sogs par rab tu bsgom mo/_/de goms pa dang tha mal pa kun rab dang 'dra bar bsgomamo/_/de nas cung zad mi sdug pa rab dang 'dra bar bsgomamo/_/de goms pa dang mi sdug pa 'bring sdug pa 
[# ]rab dang 'dra bar bsgom/_de nas shin tu mi sdug pa la yang pha ma dang 'dra bar bya ste/_de ltar goms pa'i dmigs pa yang sems can thams cad thog ma med pa'i dus nas pha ma la sogs pa gnyen du ma gyur pa med pa dang*/_de ltar bsgom pa yang thog mar 
khyimagang gi mi tsam la bsgom ba nas rim gyis te/_des ni mtha' yas par bsgom mo/_/_zhes pa ltar ro//_goms pa'i tshad ni sems can gangamathong yang yid du 'ong zhing gnodapa gzod la/_phan 'dogs pa'i blo skye ba dang /_phun sumatshogs pa mthong yang 

de la 'gran sems dang phrag dog mi skye bar 'di'i 'di bas kyang tsho ring ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_chos kyi 'byor bar shog cig snyam du 'ong zhing phan pa 'ba' zhig blo la 'char ba'i tshul/_brgyad stong pa las/_byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems mang du bsgoms shing brtan 
par byas pas 'gro ba mthong na yid du 'ong ba yin/_khong khro ba med pa yin/_ces dang /_de'i phan yonani/_thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo las/_gang zhig 'jig rten rnam dag na/_/_bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu/_/tshul khrims dag ni bsus pa las/
skyes bu'i skad cig dga' ba tsam/_/_de bas byams pa spyad pa mchog_/gang gis 'jig rten khams 'dir/_/lus dang ngag yid sdig spyad de/_/ngan song gsum du khyud nges kyang /_/byams pa de yis 'phral du 'byas/_/zhes dang*/_mdo gzhan dag las/_rigs kyi bu [ \]]
byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa stan las ma langs pa la yon 'bul bar byed pa ni bsod nams dpag tu med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/_zhes dang /_gzhan yang yon tan chen po brgyad yod de/_slob dpon 'phags pas/_lhami dga' bar gyur pa dang /_/_de 
dag kyang ni bsrung ba dang /_/dug dang mtshon gyis mi gnod dang //_yid bde ba dang bde mang dang /_/'bad pa med pa don thob dang /_/rnam par grol bar ma gyur kyang /_/tshas pa'i 'jig rten skye 'gyur te/_/_byams chos yon tan brgyadapo 'thob/_/ces so/_/_snying rje'i 
dmigs rnam bshad ba'i phyir/_/snying rje'i ngo bo gzhan gyi sdug bsngal la/_/bzod mi yod pa'i sems stobs drag po dang /_/'gro drug mtha' dag sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras kyi/_/mtha' la gtur mthong mchi ma slong ba yin/_/_de la dbye na gsum/_sdug bsngal 

[E]ka_
| ༄༅། །བའི་སེམསཅན་ལ་དམིགས་པའི་སྟེང་རྗེ་ནི་སྤྱ །་བུསྔལ་གྱི་རངkཞིན་གསུམམ། བརྒྱད་ཀྱིས་མནར་བའི་སེམས་ཅན་འདི་དག་གི་སྡུག་བསྒྲལ་སྙི་རྗེ་ཆེན་པོའི་བློས་སེལ་བ་དང་། ཉེས་པ་བྱེད་པའི་སེམས་ཅན་ལ་
bsngal 'asum mam brgya po de dag gi skye gzhi yi dge ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad snying rjes phul ba dang*/_rkyen dang mi ldan pas rnam par grol ba med pa'i ses can la dmigs 
dmigs pa'i snying+garje nyisdud/
'dzen ga)kyis sheng _
pa'i snying rje ni se de ga dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma phrad/_chos ma thos/_blang dor mi shes pa'i skad bzhin la snying rjes phan gdags nas grol 'du byed pa'o/_/_de la gsum las thog ma ni las dang po pa'i 'jug sgo lan_te/_dmigs pa'i rnam pa 
gyur ma phye na sems can sdug bsngal dang bral zhim rung bde ba dang 'dazhare dga' snyam pa'i byas pa dang snying rje ni nyan rang la'ang yod pas 'dir snying nyebs/ gyis khyadapar byas
sems can sdug bsngal dang bral par 'dodazhas 'khur 'khyer ba'o/_/
nyis brgyu_
[# | ]pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed 'os te/_de theg chen pa'i khyad chos yin pas so/_/_blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa las/_blo gros rgya mtsho dper na tshong dpon nam/_khyim bdag cig la bu gcig bu/_/'dod pa/_sdug pa/_2yangs pa/_yid du 'ong ba_/
nyor:
_/_/de nas khye'u de ma dang gnyen gyis khye'u de mi 'deng ba'i dod du lhung de mgo la/_mthong nas kyang cho nge chen pos 'debasashing mya ngan byed la smre sngags 
mthong nami mthun pa med pa zhig yod la khye'u de yangag dbyed pas mi gtsang lu'i dod du lhung bar gyur to
[1 ]
ma

'don te/_mi gtsang ba'i dong der zhugs nas khye'u de'adon par ni mi byed do/_/_de nas khye'u de'i ka phyogs der song ste rjes bu gcig bu de mi gtsang ba'i rang der lhung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang nges pa yangs par babs pa'i tshul gyis bu gcig po de 'don pa'i blos sred par 
byas te skyug bro ba med par mi gtsang ba'i dong der 'bus te bu gcig bu byung bar gyur to/_/_zhes mi gtong bu'i dong ni khams gsum la/_bu gcig pu ni sems can rnams dang ma dang gnyen bshes ni dod ki khar skye sngags 'don kyang /_nang du 'gro mi nus pa'i dpes 
nyan shos dang /_rang sangs rgyas la snying rje nyi tshe ba yod kyang sems can gyi sdug bsngal sel 5la minas la/_byang chub sems dbu'i ming stobs ni de'i yang 'du ste/_lhag bsam gyi stobs kyis gzhan don la bdag nyid mi bsrung bar 'jug nus pa bzhin no/_/[ 446]
de'iphyir bdag cag ni theg pa chen po'i lam du zhugs pa yin na/_'di la sems can thams cad ni 'brog dgon pa 'jigs pa can du 'khyams pa'i dmus long lta bu/_blang dor gyi 'gazhi yong /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khong khrid dang ni brel/_sbyin pa'i 
bza' btung ni med/_tshul khrims kyi skyel masani bor/_bzod pa'i g.yang lugs ni la/_brtson 'grus kyi gom pa ni 'chor/_bsam gtan gyi ngal stegs dang ni bul/_shes rab kyi 'khor bas spangs pa 'ba' zhig pas la la ni sems can 
dmyal ba chen por 'tsho zhing bsreg go_/_la la ni yi dwags kyi grong khyer du bkres shing nyam thag go_/_la la ni dud 'gro'i 'jig rten na mnar zhing spyod do/_/_la la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'thab cing rtsod do/_/_la la ni lta'i grong khyer nas 'pho zhing ltung

_/_ngo //_la lanami'i 'gro ba na skye rga na 'chi'i sdug sngal la spyod do/_/de ltar drug bo kun kyang mya ngan 'as 'as pa ma yin pa/_2ra gyi phyi bzhin 'badal/_rtson mongs pa drug pos kazir ba/_dngos su ma  rgyud nas dan song gi 'jigs

nyesargya nyer ba'i ri dwags dang /_bshas rar khrid pa'i dud 'gro dang /_btson dong du chud pa dang /_jo bo'il gyis mnar ba dang /_yul yongs kyis gtugs pa dang /_bzhes med kyi yod ba dang /mgon skyabs dang bral ba'i srog chags la sogs mdor na sdug bsngal shin tu 
[LE]sa drag pasagatsas pa la dmigs pa'i rnam pa thog mer gtad de shas mi bzod pa'i snyed rje chen po skyed sla ba la brtson par bya'o/_/de la goms nas rim gyis sems can thams cad la dmigs par bya ste/_de ltar dzamigs pa'i snying rje la brten_/

nas gzhan la phan bdags pa'i lhag bsam gyi khur 'khyer bar nus te/_ri dwags kr-it+tas ra rjen pas gtugs pa tsho/_'gros lamanayod pa'i srog chags phramatshig ba'i 'og tugazhar gyis dogs nas snas 'bud kyin 'phros pa de snyid rje goms pa'i mthu brtas 
pa yin no//de lta bus rgyud ma sbyangs pa'i skyidarjen 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i byams pa la snying rje 'khrul pa ste/_phyogs ris kyi byams pa khri dang spyang ki la'ang yod de rang gi bu smad la brtse zhing baspyad do/_/de'i phyir bu brgyad stod pa las/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i 
sems dangs ba tshadam nges pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dad thunamong ma yin pa bsgom par bya'o/_/_zhes gsungs pa ltar semasacan 'di dag ga bsdub gyi mi la 'bur ba'i nang du zhugs pa yin yang /_de las thar pa'i thabs mi shes/
'dod chags la sogs pa rten mes pa brgya phrag gis kun nas dkris shing/_gang dag lta ba dan pa rnam pa sna tshob sa kyis gzir bar gyur kyang /_lam ston gyi bla ma mtshan nyid dad ldan pa dang phradapa ni u dum wA ra'i me tog lta bur dkon la/_gal tedage ba'i 
bshes gnyen dang phrad kyang rang rang gi las nganadad 'gal rkyen sna tshogs pas par du gcod pas thar pa'i lam rnal mar 'gro ba shin tu dka'aba'i phyir/_da dung mtha' med pa'i 'khor bar 'bor zhing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho lta bu'i dral g.yeng ba 'di dag sngon chad bdag 
gi pha ma dang gnyen bshes su ma gyur ba gcig kyang medan/_skyabs dadamagon gyis spungs pa/_log pa'i lam la rigs pa bzhin du 'jug pa 'di las bdag gis gdon par shog cig/_'di dag sdug bsngal las thar nas bde ba tshad medapal rtag pargyun du 

[24]@#//_/_spyod par shog cig snyam du snying thag pa nas bsam ste/_de'i tsho ba rol la 'byung ba de'i khur rang nyid la babs nas mchim slongs shing skyi bud byed pa'i snying rje shas mi bzod pa skye ba dang /_lus ngag dang zad bring gi sgo nas bshol

T #|ཕྱོགས་ཉིད་དོ། བཏང་སྙོམས་ཀྱི་ཡུལ་ལ་སྙིང་རྗེ་སྐྱེས་བའི་གང་ཟག་དག་གསསྤྱོད་པ་མི་བསུན་པའི་རིགས་ཅན་ལ་མཐོང་ཆོས་མྱོང་གྱུར་མངོན་དུ་གྱུར་ན། དེ་ནི་སྐྱིད་ཚེཏི་ཡུལ་དུ་མི་འགྲུབ་བོ་ཆེས་སྣང་ཞེན་དུ་བལྟ་བ་ཤིན་ཏུམ་སྟེ།དེཞན་ཉིད་སྐྱེ་བའི་རྒྱུ་འབྲས་འཇིག །

par 'gyur to/_dmyal bar lhung ba'i semasacan de dag gis kyang de'i rgyubasgrub pa mthong na snying rje skye ba'i yul du ga la zhig ste/_stes dbang gi der phyung ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'osan snying rje'i shan yon la brod pa bskyed nas phyogs risamed pa'i snying rje la blo sbyang bar bya'o//de ltar 
sbyangs pas gnod sems dang chags sdang med ba'i sems las su ru par 'gyur te//snying pomachog las/_snying rje chen pos sems las su rung ba dang /_'tsho ba medapa dang /_dga' bas brgyan pa'i mchog thob par byed do//zhes so//duga' ba'i dmigs rnam bshad pa'i

ni sems can de dag zang zing gi 'byor pa dang /_chos kyi 'byor pa dang /_bde bde 'byor pa dang ldan pas dga' ba'o/_ba dag gi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa la dmigs pa'i dga' ba ni bdag nyid dge ba'i tshogs che ba la dmigs nas dga' ba'i don no/_/dam pa'i

gdags pas gnyen du 'dzin na da lta'i dgras kyang tshorabs snga mar res 'ga' ni phams/_res 'ga'ani gnyen bshes byas/res 'ga'ani dal yongs bsal/res 'ga' ni srog las skyabs pas drin chenapo dang ldanan/_da res kyi dgrwa dang grwar 'dzin gyi rnam/
rtogani phanatshun gnyis ka thabar dalami mkhas pa'i rkyen phran bus 'khon dang byon du bcos pa kho namad/_spyir yang klu gnyan gyi phyogasarisachen po'i ljon shis pa'i yal ga la 'ju ba bzhin bdag nyid lhung zhing pharol brlag pa'i rgyu bon yin/sems 
kyi khur du chags sdang las lci ba yod pa min pas tshor ba btang snyoms kyi gang zag la bdeb dbag medapa yod/_khyad par thos pa nyung shing /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i sems cana'adi dag ni gtamug la goms pa/_naparnal du mi gnas pa/shes[as]
pa rang dbang canam yin pa sha stag pas/_de la dgru zin gyi rnam par rtog pa spangs te thugs la mkhas pas bstunan gnyen du bshes ba'ang mngon suman/_dgraganyinaganyis ka bar ma'i rang bzhin du btang snyomasanas/_rang nyid brten dga' ba bzhin du 
'di dag kyang bden dga'/_rang sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa bzhin du de dag kyang sdug bsngal mi 'dod/_'dodab bde ba 'od kyang bsgrub ba sdug bsngal gyiny+tsami dge ba'i las la spyod pa 'di dag la chos dang zang zing gi sgonas phan 'dogs snyam pa nyid du bya'o snyam 
pa snying thag pa nas bsgom par bya ba dang chabs cig 'grog 'di dal chags sdang gi mi tshogs gtum bos dge ba'i ljon shing srog ba'i sems nye bar zhis/_phan tshun gcig la gcig khong khro ba med cing /_btang snyomasachenapo'i blo lasasu rung bar shog 

/cig snyam du smon lam rgya chen po gdab par bya ste/_'dulab lud las/_yunapa'i lanadu phan pa mchog/_gnod pa'am bar ma rigasapa min//_zhes pas btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid phan mi 'dogs gnod mi byed pa'i bar mar 
'du dpar/_phan pa 'ba' zhig bsgrub pa'i yul la nye ring medapa btang snyoms pa nyidad//_de ltar bsgoms pa'i phan yonagyis chagasasdadage phyogs su semasarnam paramigayeng bas/_blo las su rung la mthar thug chos thams cad 
po pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i tshul/_yo shes snang ba rgyan gyi mdo las/_chos thamasacad kyi mtshan nyid dmigs su medapa gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yinano//zhis so//_de ltar tshad med bzhi po'ang yul so sor phye na rim can du [ 455]
bden gnyis gang rta nyis brgya lnga brgyud 
bsgom pa ni/_samangon pa'i sde snod gyi rjes su 'bras pa'i lugs yin par myong ba thon pa la gnad shin tutshol/_rnam pa spyi la mig nas ma 'dabs _sachod ltar snang ma bzhal gcig la'ang ngos pami skye ba byis pa'imadun du za'og
yaM_khaphyob lta bu'o//de'i phyir sa sde las/_sems can dang chos nyid la brten nas dmigs pa dang bcas pa dad [\[]dmigs pa med pa'i tshad med pa rnamapa bzhi nyid skye ste/_zhes pa ltar dmigs yul 'gro ba la dmigs pa'i rnam pare re nas myong 
[# ]/_ba shin tu brtan par byas pas/_byang chub kyi sems gnyis rgyud la skye ba'i rgyur 'gro zhing bsam pa bzang po de las bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher 'phel la/_rjes la bsgom par bya ba'i yul sems can dang /_sgom par byed pa'i dmigs pa 

la bdag tu blta ba thamasacad sgyum dang /_rmi lamalta bu/gsog dang /_gsob dang /_yam bar ba rang bzhin gyisarnam padag pa'isanyid dranaparabs pas ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/_'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo
pa'i byams paser sna'i snying rje dang //_da rgyal dga' ba gtimug btang _/
snyoms dang //bar pa'i lamamin tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i/_/_phyogs dang nye ba dmigs bsarnam paraspa_/_/de la sems yang dag par ma ba decing /_rab 'dod pa'i sems kyis*dmanyin/_blo'i rnam pa kun rdzob pa 'ba'azhig gi rang [ 456]
gyi bu dang /_
skyed mdza' bshes la sogs pa'i phyogs la thams shing gzhal cung mi rims pa rnam pa thams par shar khyadab 'dod chags dbazhin du 'dag bdag garabazung ba'i stang dmanye
_/_ba glel sogs pa lta bur nyid 
rje nas 'khel du mi 'jug cing /_srogachags gzhan dag la de las ldog pa ni snying rjer brdzus pa'i ser sna'o//rang dang rang gi phyogs phun sumatshogs pa dang bde zhing skyid bu la dga' ba bsgom la bar mal sogs de las ldog pa'i nga rgyal 
lam phrag dog dang nye'o//_tshorab lud mabastan yanaganodakyi yul g.yadam rig pa'i btang snyomasan gtimug gi phyogasadang 'brel te/dadag ni srid par man par 'du byed pa'i thar pa'i lam dang ma 'brelab ste/_ston pa thugs rje chen pos 

/_nyinapo mchog las/_wA ri'i bu/_'di lase[ws]yang dag par ma bskyed/_rjes su gla bskyed pa'i[g]mas nA dang /_snying rje /_'ab dang /_gtadaskyes zhizhi sa ya'i gnas bzhi ste/_srid pa mngon par[ (]2
byed pa dang bcas pa'o/_/sems yang dag par bskyed/_rjes su bskyed pa'i [ggAu]pa dang /_snyid rjedad /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms pazhin tshad med pa bzhi ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'du byed pa'i phyir ro/_/_zhes so//thur pa'i 
sems kyi ma zin pa'i tshod med dazhi las gzhan du gyur pa tshos pa'i gnas pa bzhi pa la'ang gnas skabs kyi 'bras bumed pa ni ma yin te/_ston bud med bu chung khur bas chu bo gang+gA padal dus gnyisaka gcig la gcig[g]mas pa'i sems kyis[457]

[# ]lasogs pa ni chags pa yin la/_de bzhin du nyon mo yagazhan gyis gzir ba'i sku rje lasogs pa'ang mdoste rgyan las/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pas//nyes pa rnam pamang lareg/ces pa ltar 'dod pa'i pur skye ba 'dod pa'i

can rgyas pa'i lo ma log pa can yin pasaso//'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshayid bzhi po ni[?]nor 3sogs pa la'ang med_/_so so skye bo'i ris la lta ci smos te/_mdo sde rgyan las/_'jig rten byang chub rang sangs rgyas kyi 
khrag bcom du 'dun pa de med na//ye las gzhan la smos kyang ce dges pa/_/_ji la'adzin/ na 'khas ma yin_/_/_/_zhes so/_/_'o na 'dzer rten sa 2 pa'i lam dang 'brel pa dad zhen 'dzin zhi ba'i lam du 'khyer na[1je]

zla_@#_/_/nam mkha' 'dra/_/rten 'brel tsam las byung ba'i phyir/_/_shin tumed pa'ang ma yin te/_/dper na rmi lamargyu 'bras bzhin/_/bden pa ga grub rdzun mi ldog_/ces so/_/_de lta bu'i tshad med bzhipo'ang /_bsgom tshul go rim_/

_'gog/_/snying rje[ ? ]tsho ba skyes kyang nyes pa'i tshacan phyogs ris kyi rnam par shar na mi mthun pa'i yul gyi bde 'byor la dga' ba bsgoms pas dman semasamatha' dag gi gnyen por 'gyur ba'o/_/dga' bas sems rgod spros pa'i yul gyuran/

la_rje bsgom zhing /_de nas byams pa bsgom pa na tshud du/_byams pa nas dga' ba bsgom pa ni 'bring /btang snyomasanas mas pa bsgom ban chen po skye/_yum bar ma las/_'di ltar byams pa bsgom_/_dga' ba bsgomamo/_/snying rje lamanyam bar 
sha ta[3]ngosashargyu sa

sen_/can la phan pa'o/_/_ji ltar dmigs pa 'dug na/_bde ba dang mi ldan pa tsam btang snyoms kyi yul/_sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa dang /_tshags sad tsanasdug bsngal rgyu 'bras la gnas pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi phul/_dga' ba ni skyid pa ste bde ba'i

gas/_/_rgyu mthun byed pa de 'dra myong bas ni/_/_mi mthun phyogs dang bral zhing bde ba 'thob/_/dbang gis yid 'ong ba de ga'i yul la spyod/_/byed pa bzhi bo stobasazhu gyur pa yi/_/donaganyis 'bri ba'i yon tan 'thob 'gyur te/_de'ang rnam par smin pa'i

ka bdon gnyis shing rta _

long*sa spyod rdzogs pa 'thob/_/_/_/

'gro 'tshab bral ba'i sems [11]'dachags dang bral stong nyid snying rjed 'phel/_/_sor rtog ye shesachosakyi sku ru bgrub/_gang gAtshosnying du sdug pa'i buchud du la rimasan drag pos btab pa'imanadadang rjes su mthun pa'i sems kyis sdug

@#/_gang
par zhugs pa'i tsho snying rje chen po ming thob pa yin no/_/_de'i tshe 'tsho ba'i sems rnam par dag pos 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa'i rgyusasemasacan la gnod cing mnar sems pa mtha' dag gi rtsa bachod cing /_snying rje'i ngo bo' stong pa nyid dang zung du 'brel 
bas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes chos kyi sku ru grub pa yin te/_snying rjes 'dod chags gnas su dag_/kun rtog ye shes chos kyi sku/_/_zhes so//dga'ag 'byongs pas phrag dog bachod/_/_'byor pa brtan cing zhi bde rgyun mi 'chad//bsam gtan dga' ba dmiT [465]
pa med pa dang /_/_bya grub ye shes sprul pa'i sku mchog thob/_/dga' ba ni sems la zug med pa'i tshad yin te/_rang gi rgyud nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas 'gyod pa med pa dang /_khyad par thob par bya ba mtha' dag mngon sum du thob pas sa dang po thob pa'i ming 
la'ang de skad du grags shing*/_rang gisems phrag dog dang ldan pa'i tsho/_'byor pa longs spyod phun sumatshogs ba dang ldan par gyur kyang /_gzhan gyi dpal la mi bzod pa'i dga' ba thad cig kyang nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur la/_'dir sems can thams cad bde 
zhing skyid pa dang*/_chos kyi rang bzhin la dngos dang rgyud nas spyod pa mtha' dag la dga' ba khyad par can 'byongs pas rang gi 'byor pa brtanacing /_zhi bde'i blo rgyanami 'chad pas bsam gtan la'ang tshong ma med par gyur nas de las skyes pa'i dga' ba khyad

par can nyamasasu myong zhing /_
ba lhun grub dam pa'o/_/_zhesaso/_/bang snyoms 'byongs pas bdag gzhanadagu gnyon mnyam/_/dargyalaM med cing zab zhi'i rtogs pa skye/_/mos pa med cing chos dbyings ye shes dang /_/_ngo bo nyid sku mdon du 'thob par 'gyur/_/_btang snyoms mthar phyin 
pas la lor rjes su chags/_la lar khong khro bos sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par mi 'gyur bas/_dgra gnyon dad bar ma 'dzinapa'i phyogs rnam pa gsum po phan pa 'ba' zhig gi yul la mnyam zhing /_de ltar mnyam pas [466]
bdag nyid gzengs bstod pa'i nga rgyal kyang rang bzhin du bag la zhir 'gyur ba dang /_dngos por 'dzin pa'am/_dngos med la zhin pa'i mtha' gnyis su lhung nas sems kyi chos nyid dbu mar mi snyoms pa'ang /_rang bzhin du zab pa/_zhi ba spros pa med pa'i

chen po yis/_/nga rgyal gti mug gnas su dag_/_mnyam nyid chos dbyings ye shes bdag_/_byang chub rdo rje'i sku nyid do/_/zhes parnams pad+ma rtse mo las bshadado/_/_da ni tshad med bzhi'i yon la rang gzhung gi grub mtha'acu'abras 

@#/_/mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs par bsngags nas mjug bsdu ba ni/_de lta'i tshad med bzhi yi yon tan ni//rgyu 'bras bzhin du mtha' yas bslu ba med//lam ngan gzhan gyi grub mtha' srid pa'i rgyu//_stong nyid snying rjer 'gal la mi bsten par/_/
thar pa dri med rgyal sras dam pa'i lam//rtog pa zhi ba'i dge la goms 'tshal lo/_/'di ni rgyal ba mtha' dag gi gshegs shul rgyu 'bras gnyis ka do ba nyid mnyam pa'i thar lam khyad par can te/_dpal phreng gi mdo las/_gang gis tshod tshod bzhi bsgom/
ba[ii]de ni bde gshegs kun gyis dgos/_kun tu yonatanAtshod med de//nam mkha'i lam las rab 'das pa'o//zhes so//'di ltar rgyu'i thog pa phal mo chos sku gnyis skyed byed kyi rgyabams bon ni tshogs gnyis su 'dod pa dang /_sngags gu dag bya'i sgrib pa gnyis [467]
ka'aden gnyis shing rta nyis brgya _
mgar gyi dbanags shes mos 'gyur ba de rgyan du 'dod bas don stong nyid yi 'isnying po can bsgrub pa la mdomathun cing /_khyad par 'khor lo tha ma'i don khams rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ye ldan yin pa'i phyir lam dus kyi 
[@ ]yon tan ltar snang ba yin bas gsar byung mi 'dod la/_de dang sngags kyi sde snod las grol kun kyang rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i chos nyid du gnas pa gnyis gzhi'i ngang du gcig cing lam yang tshogs gnyis dang thabs shes ngo bo gcig la/_gsa'u 
[1 ]yang sku dang ye shes su tha mi dad pas na sngon gyi dus na byon pa'i mchog sazigs dam pa rnams[©]bshad ba phyi nang dumadzadab yin no//de skad dusa'i stod 'grel las/tshadamed pa 'di bzhi ni thar par 'gro ba'i lam ste/gzhan du na lam log pa'ozhes bshadadoji ltar log_/
so bzhi

//_de sgyur yin pas de la thar pa medade/_nyan thos rnams 
'diltaramu stegs can rnams kyi lam gyi lta ba bdag la sogs pa phyin cileg dang ldan pas rnam pa thams cad ngu shes rab dang bral ba'i lam yin no
ti can dang /_nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'di ltamayin te/_
de bas na de dag mtha' gcig pa'i khyad 'das la gzhol bar 'gyur ro//'dir shar pa dri ma medapa byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis kar ldan pas rtog pa zhi ba'i rang 
nasnying dzatshan ba dang mi ldan pas thabs dang bral ba'i lam yin te/_
bzhinatsanan//de bas na de dag mi gnas pa'i mya nganalas 'dus pa la gzhol bar 'gyur ro//'di ltar shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni 'khor bar mi ltung la/_las kyi stobs kyis ni mya nalas 'das par mi ltung ngo //de skad du chos yang dag par sdud pa las/[ 468]
yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go de yang 'di snyam du bdag gis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di sems can thams cad la bsgrub par bya'o snyam du sem
/zhesu so/_/[《]'i phyir byang chub so
lhug pa'i shes rabakyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs ba du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o
man pa ngas bskul bas lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_phyug pa'i sems dang /_
yon tan rin po che'i mdzod dga' ba'i char zhes bya ba las/tshomed bzhi tshoms te rab byed 'dun pa'i 'grol ba'o//
kun rdzob ma bcad bas snying rje chen bo sngon du 'gro bas sems can kyi zhi byedab la 'jug go_
pa' rnams ni don dam pa mthong yang kun rdzob mi gcod la/

@#/_/_de ltar smon pa'i rang bzhin tshad med bzhis semasakyi rgyud las su rung bar byas nas/_'jug pa'i ngo bo byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i don gtso bor stonaba'i phyir/_rnyed pa gang gi don la yon gyi mchog/_tshad med rnam bzhis thob pa'i byang chub /
ka bshaganyis shing rta _
sgyu sems/_/_smon 'jug shing rta'i sgyu thabs la drangs pas//_zhi bde'i lta ba ngan pa nyams par byed//ces tshig gi rgyan skyed byed grub pa'i rgyu 'bras spang gnyen gyi tshul du bshad pa ste/_rnyed pa don du gnyer bas de la dmigs pa'i yon stob pa bzhin/_tshod med brnyam pa bzhis rgyu 
[# ]byas pa'i 'bras bu ni byang chub kyi soms rin po che lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/_thub pa'i dbang pos bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dgongs shing dpyad par mdzod pas kyang theg pa chen po'i tshos gcig po 'di las ma gzigs te/_byams pas zhus pa'i mdolas/_byams[469]
pa byang chub sems pa'achos gcig dang ldan na/_ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/_myur du sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ste/_chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam 
nyis brgya se 3
_sems yin te/_byams pa/_chos de dang ldan nan mo thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya'o/_zhes so//'phags pa nyan rang gi lam rang nyid zhi bde'i blo dang bcas pas re zhig la gso'i 
7_bsti gnas la chags pa'i lta ba ngan pa can nyid de/_sa ra sa/_snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid zhugs gang //_sa ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yinano//_zhes so//de'i phyir nga don la migs pa'i g.yo dang sgyu med pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las 

myur du sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lhag pa'i bsam pa byang chub kyi sems la bslab par bya'o//zhes gsuso//sdug sdug 'khor ba'i btson rar bcing   rnams kyang //byang chusems skyes yod la rgyal sras kyi//_ming gi cod pan 'thob la rag 
nas//'jig rten lha mir bcas kyang bsti stang byed//'di ltar gnas skabs kyi phan yon la dmigs nas kyang sems bskyed par 'os te/_zhe sdang la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang /_des bskyed ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs shin tu rnam pa mang pos 'khor ba'i btson ra lte gled pas 'ching  ba'i 
khyim na nyon mongs padag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mod skad cig ma de la bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sras kyi ming thob par 'gyur zhig_lha dang bcas ba'i 'dzig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'os pa ni sdong bo bkod ba las/_sems bskyod pa de dang ldan pa ni [47o]
lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyimachod sdong chen po'o//zhes bsngags pa yin no//yon byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po rab tu dga' bar byang chub kyi sems skye bar bdan 'ching bas kun nas dgis ba'i so so skye bo la ji ltar skye bar rung snyam na/_de ni chos la 
dmigs pa can yin la/_'di ni yang dag par blangs ba brda'acan la dgongs pa yin pas de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa la'ang skye bar zab mo'i mdo sde rnams las bshad pa rig par bya'o/de mi mthun phyogs//las nyon mun nag 'khrigs pa'i sprin dbar nas gtum 
po'i glog 'od 'khyug lta'i dge ba la//skabs 'gar goms pa'i bsod nams tsam po pa/_/chu shing bzhin du 'bras bus: basmad//'di ltar byang chub kyi sems dam pas mazin pa'i dge ba nib+ha mi'am/nyan thos sam/_rang sa a myas kyi 'bras bu tsam zhig 'thog 

sa
@#/_/nas slar nus pa gtan zad du 'gro ste dper na chu shing dang 'dam bu dang smyogam rnams rang gi 'bras bu smin pa dang rtsa khams la dad 'gyur te ma'ong chos su snyug ma'ildemakhu bzhin no//de skad du ched du brjod pa'i tshoms las/_dre'u mo rang gi mngal gyis [1]
/dang*/[j]'dam bu skyigam 'bras bu dang //_chu shing 'bras bus phudapa ltar/zhes bstan to//dbazhin du thabs des ma zin pa'i sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i spyod phyogs dag gis kyang sa bcad pa med de zo ba brtul bas smyug ma 'dreg pa bzhin no//bskyed 
rim bsgom pa'ang byis pa lha khang blta ba dang 'dra/_tsa chung dang rdzogs rim bsgom pa'ang nam dus las 'og tu 'gro ba'isrog chags dang mtshungs/_thabs kyis ma zin pa'i gsang sngags dang dge ba mu stegs byed la'ang yod/_bskyed rim bsgoms pas yi dwagasu 'phangs[47|]
bal ltos/_khyad par byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas kyang las dpanyon mongs pa'i char 'bab cing rlom sems la mngon par rtog pa yod de yu rol tu phyin pa las/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' la bdud 'diskad du smra ste/_khyod mngon par rdzogs 
tshugs par sangs rgyas panameng 'di'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes byas ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de'i rjes su rtog par 'gyur ta/_de la phyir mi ldog ba'i ltas gang yin pa de dag med par yang nges bdag lung bstan to snyam du ma semasasu byed de/_de des 
rlom sems su byedacing byang chub sems dpa' gzhanal yang brnyas par 'gyur ro//de babasamims shing shes rab dang bralatage ba'i bshes gnyan gyis ma zinacing sdig pa'igrogs po'i lag tu song bas nyanashos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 

ltung bar 'gyurate/_rlom sems dang bcas pa'isems bskyed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pas kyang ches mi ste/_'di yang byang chub sems dpas bdud kyi lasasu rig par bya'o zhes gsu so//_ge ba'i phan yon gyi sgonas spro ba bskyedapa/_sagazhi bzung bos bsten pa'i zhing 
sa la|/dgo ba'ilo tog khunasumatshogs pa ltar//_byang chub sems kyi ljon shing srid pan//_bras bu mang zhing zhi ba'i bar du 'phel//_sa gzhibazang por sa bon dzilta bu btab kyang rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur ro//khyad par pag bsam gyi ljon pa ni bskalapa ma zhig gi 
bar du 'bras bu thug pa med par je 'phel du 'gro bar za ma tog bkod ba las bshad pa ltar byang chub kyi sems dam pa'i ljon shing ni skad cig ma re rezhing _
mthun pa'i khrus bu rtag par 'byin zhing byang chub ma thob kyi bar du 'phel bar byed pa ste/   [-- - - 472]
[“ ]byams pas zhus par/_byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyamatsho chen por chu gang ji snyed cig 'bab pa de dag bskal pa'i bar du bdapar mi 'gyur ro/_/byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems bskyed pas zin pa'i dge ba yang blan med pa'i byang chub tu sangs

ka_
@#/_/gnyis//khaslab pa gsum la ltos pa'i sems bskyed gsum//khyad par tshogs sbyor laman mos pas spyod//dang po'as nas bdun par lhag bsam dag/dgus gsum na rnam par smin pa dang /_/sangs rgyas sa zhu sgrib pa spangs to bzhi/_/
/de bzhin lam lnga'i rjes 'gro sems bskyed lnga//_pha rol phyin pa drug ltos de snyed grangs//_sa mtshams dbye ba nyi shu rtsa gnyis sogs//bsam pas smon dang 'jug pas khyab la 'du[j]/deltar smon 'jug tu grags pa'i sems bskyod gas pa da'8kyis

dmigs pa dang /_nang sems nyid la dmigs pa'i dbye bas te//byang chub tu sems bskyed pa chen po'i mdo las/_chos thams cad namamakha' ltar mtshan nyid med cing ye nas 'od gsal ba rnam par dag pa de lani byang chub ces bya'o//_de dang mthun pa'i

zhi'an[#l]sems dang dge ba'i tshos spud pa'i sems dang /_sems can smin par byed pa'i sems te sems bskyedab 'di gsum la nan tan du bya'o//_zhes tshul khrims rin po che rnam pa gsum dad du blangaba'i sems bskyed pa'o//bzhi tshan gyis bye ba'i tshogs sbyor gyi 

latshal thos bas spyod pa dang /_sa dang po nas bdun pa'i bar lhag bsam dag ba dang /_dgu bsagasumanarnam par smin pa dang /_sangs rgyasakyi sar sgrib bslasu ba'i sems bskyed de/mdosde'i rgyun las/sems bskyed de rjes rnams la//mos dang lhag bsam dag pa 
dang*/rnam par sminob gzhan du 'dod//de bzhin sgrib pa spangs pa'o//zhes/_tshogs sbyor du kun gzhi dang /tshogs brgyad bag chags dang bcas paso/_rang yi khams nyi ma lta bur sgribs nas mi mthong ste/_chog ga la yid ches pa ngus su'adzin pas don spyi'i tshul du 
'al la dad pas mos pa spyod yul du byed pa'i phyir ro//sa dang bo nas bdun pa'i bar du nyon mongs pa can gyi yid log pas/_zhing khams dung yon tan bcu phrag bdu la sogs pa mngon du gzigasashing /_khamasakyi sgrib pa phyogs gcig dag pas sprin/[ 480]
dar gyi nyi zerabazhin ye shes kyi mthong ba gsal bas lhag bsam dag pazhes brjod do//_ga pa'i sa gsum du sgo lnga dang kunagazhi'i rnam shes log tshul ni/_sa brgyad parayid shes log pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang /dgu par sgo lnga 'i rnam 
shesalog pas zhing khams dgu pa dang /_bcu par kun gzhi'i rnam shes log pas ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang /_smon lamadang yon tan rgya che ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i sems bskyed ces bya'o//_rgyunamatharasems sems byung gi bag chags
kun gzhi dang bcas pa log bas sgrib paspangs pa'i sems bskyed da/_'dasangs rgyas kyisar slobagam pa ltar tshogalas byudabang 'khor ba'i shes pa can dgazod thob bya'isimasabaskyedadu med kyang /khams de'i yonatanatsayod pa dmangon du gyur nas 

@#/_/thugasarje chen po'imadzod bdus las mi yol ba'i sems bskyed dang /_don dam semakhaskyedadu/de yad shob la nyams byed kyiny+tsamed dador ba med ba'i stodapa nyid dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir ro/_/de ltar gnas skabs bzhir ming 'gyur ba'ang cha'i sgo nas 
bzhag pa'o//de bzhin du lam lnga dngus su mthun pa'ang /_nyi khri las/_las dang po pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_yongs bu sbyar ba byas pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_chos mthong ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i sems bskyod pa dang /bsam gyis 
ka bden gnyis shing rta_
mikhyab pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/_rab 'byor/_'di lam zhugs pa gzhug par bya'o//zhugs pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o//_ mig bskyed par bya'o//'phags pa'i lam bdenasgom par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib ba   ** med ba thob par bya'o//zhes tshogs [ 481]
dang/_sbyor ba dang /_mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang /_mi slob pa'i lam lnga'i go rim _dang sbyar nas bstan pa'o//ba rol tu phyin pa drug la ltosanas rnam pa drug tu phye ba ni/_snga ma las/_yarol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'isems yasu gachod med pa nyan thos dang rang 
nyis brgya_
stangs rgyas thams cad thun mong du ma gyur pa ste/_zhes nyan ba gi sems rimathu chung bas theg pa chen po'i lamanas mya ngan las mi 'da' bas byang chub dam pa'i gegs su tsha ba'i tshul/_myal bar 'gro ba byang chub la/_/gtan gyi gegs byed ma yin te//nyan thos dang 
nirang sangs rgyas/_/'di gnyis gtan gyi gegs su 'gyur/_zhes bshadapa ltar thun mong ma yin pas lam khyad dpagasapa'i khyad par dang bcas bstan ba'o//_sha rol tu phyin pa bcu la bltos nasas mtshams 'gyur dbye ba dang /'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyod 
zhwa tshig

pa las/_thabs la mkhas pa gang zhen//gangachos thams cad kyi basprub shes ba la mkhas ba'og mkhas ba'o
///shes rab gapazhenag chos thams cad dbyer med pa shes bal mkhas ba'o//zhis thabs shes gnyis su 'du wA'i sha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni byang chub sems 
zhes gsum bsagasasarab kyi cha'ang thabasaM su 'gyur ba'i tshul 'draba'i tha rol tu phyin pa bdun bya dachub sems
de gnyis bzhatshun gcig la gcig ltos kyi rgyu'adas su 'brel bas ye shes kyi rol tu phyin pa la sogs shesarab kyi cha'ang thabs su 'gyur ba'i tshul 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud 
dpa' sa bcu pas kyang /kun tu spyad par gsungs na/_

na_
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di ni snying rjechen po'i rtsa ba can/_byang chub kyi rgyudang ldanab thabs kyi mthar phyin pa yin////zhes gsungasabaltar/dge ba'i lhas/shes rab la brtenugawarayatu phyin pa la sogs shes yod ranang du yang dag 'jog pa'i nyamagatum glu tshul lo mdzod dam_
de ltar nang du yadadag 'jog pa'i bsam gtan gyis byang chub kyi sems rnamabatubasgoms nas/[ 482]
 shes 'dzin snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba canabyang chub kyi rgyud nas las yas gser zla ba me'abags pan gsakhamathar phyin pa yin no
zhesaskyed byed 'grub pa'i rgyu bstan to//samatshamasakyi dbye bas nyi shu lhaganyis nims bye bas nyi shuny+tsa gnyis ni_/_'ashags ba byams pas/re yas gser blu ba me///gter dang rin chenab byung gnas mtsho/dzo ri sman bshes gnyen dang //yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma [\[]rgyal po mdzod dang lam po che//bzhon pa

bkod ma'i chu dang ni////sgra san na sa_
sgra snyanachu bo sprinarnams kyis//rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyisaso//zhes ye de dag gi don dpal ye shes grags pa'i 'grel pa ltarabashadunasmonapa'isomasarnam pa gsum dang //'jug pa'i sems rnam ba bdu dgar 'dod pa las/_smonapa'i sems ni 'dun pa
bkod me'ichudang ni_
jug pa'isims rnam bdu ma nyid de 'gyur bamed pa'i phyir gser 
dang*/bsam pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa gsumamo//del 'dun pa dang lhan cig 'dres pa'i chos thams cadamangon par byang chub par 'dod ba'i mtshan nyid can zhis lta bu yin no//de bzhin du bsam pa dang 'dres bani phyin drug gi mtshonanyid de 'gyur bzhed pa'i phyir gser 

ka_@#/_/_khazad po lta bu'o//_lhag pa'isems dang 'dres pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu bdun bsgom par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid des dkarapo'i phyogs thams cad 'phel bar 'dod pas zla ba tshes pa lta bu'o//_'jug pa'i semasarnam pa bcu dgu ni/_/
sbyor ba 'dres ba gcig dang*/_sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyinab 'du dang /_de'i steng du/_mngon par shes pa dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes ldan pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs dad ldan pa dang /_zhiganas lhag mthodadang /_gzungs dang spobs pa dang /_chos kyi skyed mos 
bden gnyis shing rta _
tshol dang /_bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam dang /_chos kyi sku dang ldan ba'o/_/de la smon pa'i gsumani tshogs lam chung 'bring che gsumagyi sems bskyed las dang po pa'i gnas skabs lagazhag go/'dir 'jug pa'i dang bo spyod ba me lta bu'i sbyor lam bzhi'i sems bskyed do//[ \[483]
da bzhin du sbyin pa gter lta bu dang /_tshul khrimasarin po tsho'i 'byung gnas lta bu dang /_bzod pa mtsho lta bu dang /_brtson 'grus rdo rje lta bu dang /_bsam gtan re lta bu dang /_shes rab sman lta bu dang /_thabs la mkhas pa bshes gnyen lta bu dang*/_smon lam yid bzhin 
nyis brgya
_gyi nor bu lta bu dang /_stobs nyi ma lta bu dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyinapa glu dbyangs lta bu ni rgyu'i gnas skabs te mthong ba dang sgom ba'i lam gyi spyod yul canas dang bo nas bcu ba'i bar la rim pa bzhin no//_mdon shes rgyal pot+ta bu dang /_tshogs gnyis mdzod khang 
lta bu dang /_khyad chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'ichos lam po che lta bu dang /_snying rje dang nya mthong pa zhon pa bzang po lta bu dang /_gzus dad spos ba bko ma'i chu mig lta bu ni khyadabar gyi lam gyi bsdus pas dag pa'i sa gsum ka la khyad bo//_chos kyi dga' ston 
zhe gnyis

sgra snyan lta bu dang /bgrod ba gcig pa'i lam chu bo lta bu dang /_chos kyi sku dang mtshungs par ldan pasprin lta bu gsum nas bcu ba khon la yod de ye shes dang waphrin las bsam gyis mi khyab bsasems can gyi zhabyed ba'i phyir/de ltar man par shes pa la sogs lhan cig 
gnas pa brgyad po ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs thams cad la khyab pa yin no//zhes grags*dmado sde'i rgyan las/rgyalasras rnams kyisims bskyedab//_sprind 'drabar bstan pa yin//zhes bsanyi shurtsa gnyis po tshogs lams sa cupa'i bar du gsus pas/bcu gcig
kun tu 'od kyi 'bras bu dang mi sbyor/sas rgyas kyi sa la chos nyid kyis thob pa'i don ma sems bskyedalas/_'jug pa'am/_dkarimatha' mi dmigs ba'i phyir_/_de ltar mtshams kyi rnam par dbye ba bstanAnas dani smon 'jug so so'i yon tan la sa bar 'dren pa'i phyir/[ 484]
gang zhigarang nyid legs pa don gnyer nas/_/rtag tugaNod ba med pa'i sgo 'baranang //slong ba'i yid la 'khrugs ba mi ster gdel gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin zhes bsngags par 'osanamatha' dag soms canadon//ban pa'i smon sems thang ga skyes pas kyang //ngan 
'di ltar na don la dmigs pa'i bsam ba nyi tsho bsakhyim ba gamagon med zas sbyin ltar sbyin ba don du sko la gtanapa mi bar byas nas slod ba yi 'dodapa dang 'gal bar mi byedapagang 
[1]song sgo gcodalha mi'i gnas rigs su//bde ba bsnyen pa'i yon tan zad mi shes//
su dag kyang spyi bos bkur ba yin te spyod 'jug las/_spro ba chud zad nang ma'i bas sbyor ba//skad cig zas tsam sbyin par byed ba dang //kharnyas bcas nyin phyed phyed 'grangs byed po yang //_gob byed ba yin zhes skye bos bkur//zhes sa res 'ga' ba'i bsod nams chung du dag/

@#/_/_kyang 'jig rtenanubasngags par byed cing /gtanabamed pa'i mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod khams kyi dbang phyug tugyuran/_snyed rje goms pa'i stobs kyisasgrim mi dgos par lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can re re'imi bde ba'i sdug bsngal grangs dad 
mtha'amegatshugs pa bsal ba'i sems rgya chen bon lta ci smos/_thanakladanadatsam gsal lo snyam du phan 'dogs pa'i bsam pa can de nitshad med pa'i bsod nams dang 'grogs nas nasong gi sgo 'gegs shing /_lhung ba khyad par can gyi gnas rigs su bde ba'i

stebagamed gnyid log kyang //bsod nams rgyun chags nyid du 'brel 'gyur ba/_/spyod pa'i sa las 'thadapa nga bcas bshad//'di ltar smonapa la 'khor ba'i tsho 'bras bu chen bo 'byung ba yin modakyang/_/daltar 'jug pa'i sems kyi ji ltar 'jug pa bzhin du bsod nams

'dir 'jug ba'i sems ni snga ma las khyad par yod de spyod 'jug las/_byang chub smon pa'i sems las ni/_/'khor tshe 'bras bu cher 'byung yang //ji ltar 'jug pa'i sems bzhin du/_/bsod nams rgyun chags 'byung ba min//zhes dang /_'jug pa'i sems [ 486]
las bsodanamasargyun mi 'chad pa ni/_byang chub semasadapa'i rigs dang ldan pa dag snying rje chen po'i gzhan dbang du 'gyur bas gsol ba ma btabacu zin kyang gzhan don la 'jug ba ste/_de nyid las/_gang nas bzung ste sems can khams//mtha' yasarab

/_zla[ | ]@#/_par gyur gyapami dge ba las ldog pa dang /_dge ba la 'jug pa dang /_'gro ba rnams kyi don bya ba 'khyams dang snying rje chen po'i bsodanams kyi shugs las dge ba'i rgyun bar mi 'chadapani sdong po bkod pa las/_rigs kyi bu/byadachu

zin kyang /_thob la ma nyams pa'i sems bskyed des thog mar zin pa'i rgyus chu thigs chu bo chen po la 'dres pa bzhin thar ba cha mthun gyi dge ba'i rgyun de'i sems la rgyun chags su 'bral pa yin la zab mo'i de kho na nyidal lhag bar mos pa'i dbang gis [437]
zad mi shes ba'i bsod namasakyi rgyunanamakha' dang mnyam par 'byung ba ni dpal sbyin gyi zhus pa las/_byang chub sems dba'i bsodanams gang /_/gal ting la gzugasaM yodan/_/namakha'i khams ni kun bkang ste/_/de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/de 
nyis pa rgya [ d ]la 'jug pa'i kunatu spyod pa phyin drug gi tsho sbyin pa la sogs pa lda ni kun rmongs pas bde ba'i rgyu yin la/_shes rab ni thar ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro de lta bu'i blo stobs can theg pa chen po'i lam latshogs pa zlums pa'i tshul bshadapa/_bskal pa mang po'i tshigs 
kyang 'dums par 'gyur/_/phyugs dang glang po'i shing rta nyi zla sogs//bgrod pa'i brtul zhugs myur bul mtha' yas ltar//blo stobasaM chen bo'i thabs brtson shis par gyis/_/grasamed gsum gyi dam bzhag 'jig pa yin//de la byang chub sems dpa' dbang po 
zhu ba'i 

shin tu tshul po rnams ni glangs med sum cu rtsa gsum ste tshogs sbyor gnyis thugasum sa bcu po re re la'ang gsum gsum mo//'bring posani bdun bdun te/_tshogs sbyor gnyis la gnyis gnyis/_mthong lam du gcig/bsgom pa'i lam du gnyis so/_/rnon pos ni gsum mo//
de skad du dbumarin chen smon mar/_dbapapo chen po ni bskal pa grangasamed pa gsum[©]samangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyal/_dbang po 'bring ni bskal pa grangs medapa bdun gyis so/_/dbang po rtul po na bskal pa grangs medapa sum cu rtsa gsum gyisaso//zhes rnan pa'amatha'ayang /
grangs med pa gsum du bzhag go_/theg pa chen pa'i sems dang po bskyod ba nas dbang po rtul bas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dres mar bstan pa dang /_cung zad bstan pa dang /_cung zad kyang mi brtanapa dang /_srog gi phyir yang theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig la brtan cing gus pa dang /[ 488]
byang chub kyi sems dang*/_snying rje dang /_phyin drug dang /_rton ba bzhi dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po la brtson pa'i blo stobs kyi khyad bar lasatshogs gnyis agyis snyoms par gsog pang*/_sems stobs chen pos dus skad cigare re la yang tshogs bskul pa mang po 'dums pas 
grangs med ba gsum gyi dam bca' 'jig pa'i tshul bgrod pa myur bul gyidape lngas bstan te/_sa pa dang ma nges ba la 'jug ba'i phyag rgyu'i mdo las/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'diwa te/_wa gang zhen/_'di lta ste/_phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang //
glang po'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang*/_nyim dang zla ba lta bus 'gro ba dang /_nyan thos kyi phyu 'phrul lta bus 'gro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'irdzu 'phrul lta bus 'gro ba'o/_/phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dag_glangapo che'i shing rta lta lus 'gro ba'i bya chub sems

zla[: ]@#/_dpa' rnams ni byang chubalas phyir ldog go/_nyi ma dang zla ba lta bu'agro ba dang /_nyan thos[g] 'phul lta bus 'gro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu 'phrul lta bur 'gro ba'i byang chubasems dpa'arnams ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog bdo_/de la phyugs
dperan skyes tshul la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rjel grwarab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar 'dod nas de phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te lam du zhugs nas de yun ring zhig len nas dpog 
kyi shing rtalta sa 'gro ba'i byangachub sems dpa' gang zhe na/_
bden gnyis shing rta 
tshadabargyur phyin pas_//de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos bzlog nas dpag tshad brgyad cur ded de phyir bul na/_skyes bu de phyugs kyi shing rtas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba'am/_bskal pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par yang [489]
'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'da' bar numasam/_gsol pa/bcomaldana'angs dezhimalags te/_go skabs ma mchis so//'tshol ldan 'das kyis bka'al pa/_de bzhin du gang la la zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyedal theg pa chen po mi 'dzin me klog kha ton 
du mi byed[\] ]tshul bzhin du yidalami byed par nyan thos kyi theg pa rnamasal bsnyen cing /_dedag dang lhanacig tu bsnyen par byed/_2naso gyi theg pa klog cing kha nang byedal/_byed cing kun chub bar byed la/gzhan yang klog tu 'jug pa nas/_khong du chud pa'i bar byed/
/_shes rab kyi mig gang yin ba de yang la por 
na/_de ni shes rabatul por 'gyur te/de ni blan med pa ye shes kyi lam lasaslar drangs nas phyir ldeg go_/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byud bzhi shesarab kyi dbang po dang 

'gyur zhing nyams par byed de/'di ni phyugasakyi shing rtalta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_del glang po che'ishi lta bus 'gro ba'i byang nusems dpa'agang zhen/_per na g.yul zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid 'dzad par 'dod de/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
glang po'i shing rta la zhon nas lam du zhugs te/_des lo brgyas dpag tshad nyis stod du sonapa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen posalam de las phyir ded de ldog pa nas go skabasamamachis pa'i bar du ste/_de bzhin du gang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/theg pachen 
po yang 'chang zhing klog la kha ton byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed la nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams la yang brten pa nas nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing shis par byed pa'i par de ni glang bo'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems pa'o//khyom dang zla ba lta bus [\[490]
'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyen/_dperanalal zhig de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar da de/de ma dang zla ba lta bus 'gro ban lam bzhugs na des 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad las 'da' bar musasam/_gsol pa_/bcom ldan 'das ngus
ridimozhig na 'da' bar rngo thogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa/_de bzhin du gangal lazhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed de nyan thos kyi theg parnams la ma brten pa nas khong du chud par byedapam yin pa'i bar du_/nyanas kyi thog pa'i tshigs bcad 
gcig tsam yang ma klog par theg pa chen po nyid khong du chud par byed pa'i bar 'di ba dang nyim lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems pa'o//nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul lta bus 'gro ba'i bya chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/_dperan la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed 'da' 

ka_zla[| ]@#/_/bar 'dod na/_nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrulakyiso 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'dzul bar nus sam/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rdo gas te myur du ma 'a'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin dug pa lal zhig byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_/
theg pa chen po pa lamos pa/theg pa chen po klog pa/_theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pa dang bcas/zhes dang bcas par de la gzhol zhing del 'bad de/_de dgad bsten cing theg pa chen po yosasu 'tshol ba dang /_kun 'dzin 
bden gnyis shing rta_
cing 'chang ba yin te/srog gi phyir yang theg pa chen po mi gtong zhing rab tu gus pas me tog dang gdan gyi bar gyis mchod par byed pa dang /bya tshubasems dpa'am lobs pa rnams la mi bams pa 'di ni nyanas kyi sgyu 'phrul lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chubasems dpa'o//[ 491]
de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhe na/_dper nal la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed 'da' bar 'dod de/_des de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khamasarnams su 'gro na/_de bzhin gshegs 
nyis brgya_
[# ]pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag da' bar musasam/gsol pa/_bcomaldan 'das rdo thogs te/sems kyi skad cig tsam gyis 'a'o//bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka'astsal pa/_de bzhin du gang la la byang chub tu sems bskyedade/rab tu zab cing rgya 
[\[ ]
zhedrug [% ]tshibal mos pa theg pa chen po'i don la mkhas pa rtag tu semasacan thams cad kyi skyabs bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang*/rton pa bzhi dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po la brtson pa yin te/gzhan yang de la rab tu 'god 

pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa'ozhes gsungs//del phyugs dang glang po'i shing rta lta bus 'phro ba sos skye bomi brtanapa'o//zla pang nyimalta bus 'gro bzhisoso skye bo brtan pa'o//nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul lta bus 'gro banis dang po 
nas bdun pa'i bar ro//de bzhinagashegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bus 'gro bzhirnam par smin pa'i sas bsdus pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa na spyod pa la bshad do//de'i 'thad pa dgod pa'i phyir//ji ltaras bonasalalhung ba bzhin//sems mchog bskyed pa mi gtso skyes pa gtso//
zhes bstan nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa tsam niso so'i skye bo'i rgyud la byang chub dam pa'i sa bon bzhag pa tsam yin kyis/_de mi nyams shing gong 'phel du sbyang ba la theg*dman pa'i lam gegasasu che bas 'di ltar nyan rang gi lamani nyon mos pa bye brag pa'i gnyen po [ 492]
tsamadu 'gro ba dper na sman gyi bye brag tha dad pa resand bye brag pa re sol ba bzhinano//byang chub kyi sems ni lha'i bdud rtsi dang mtshus te/_anadamatha' dag pa drung nas 'byin pa ltar nyonamos ba mtha' dag gi gnyen por 'gro zhing sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i rgyu mnor ba
de'i phyir snying stobs chung zhing thabs la mi mkhas pa theg dman gyi lam las ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i don zab cing rgya che ba la mkhas pa rnams ni ded dpon snying rjechen posaminag mdung thung can bsad pas bskal pa bzhi khri'i tshogs 'dums/
yin pasaso/_/
bram ze'i khye'u skar ma la dga' bsatshong dpon gyi bu mo 'dod pas nyen pa la snying rje chen po kun slong gis de srog las skyob pa'i phyir tshangs spyod btang bsatshogs bskal pa nyi khrib mas pa bzhin grangs med gsum ji ltab gsog mi dgos pa yin no//de skad du dri ma med bar/
padang*/_

@#/_/grags pas bstanapa las/_mnishes rab sharol phyin//yani thabs la mkhas pa ste//mgon po rnamasani de las skyes//chos la dga' bas chung ma ste//byams dang snying rje bu mo yin//chos dang bdenaganyis de yi bu//stong pa'i don sems khyim yin no/_de [ }]
[Tem ]
bzhin nyon mongs thams cadani/_ji dgar dbang byed slab ma'//mdza' bo byang chub yan lag ste//sems ni byang chub mchog rigs 'gyur//degrogs rtag tu 'grogs pa ni//_pha rol phyin pa drug rnams so/_/mngon shes de yi bzhon paste//theg pa chen po bla named//kha 
(lo bsgyur ba byang chub sems//lam ni zhi ba'i yan lag brgyad/_/ces pas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi lus ma tshad gamed pa bstan pa yin no//de la re zhig ga las skye ba'i stobs kyi khyad par bshad pa/_stobs gsum las ni byang chub sems skye bas/snying rje [493]
[58 ]spel ba la shin tu brtan par bya ba'i tshul 'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa'i mdo dang*/_klu'i rgyal 
bsam dang sbyor ba rgyuyi skyebs su bshad//del thagamaraskye ba'i tshul mkhas par bya ste/_de nas gzur ba dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_sbyang ba dang*/_
che dang tshogs bsag skyabs su 'gro/_

[% @ ]po rgya mtshos zhus pa dang /bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i mdo dang gnamamakha' mdzod kyis zhus pa lasakhastan cing 
[và ]
de la snying rje chen po ni byang chubakyi sems dmapa'i rtsa bar gyur pa'i tshulayangayang smosazinal/_deskad du rnam snang mngon byang las kyang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyuni byang chub kyi sems so//_rtsa bani snying rje chen po'o/_/
[# ]khyad par can byas pa las skye ba yin te/_/
[53]

zhes gsungs pas/_semasakyi skad cig re re la'ang dran pa dang shes bzhin rgyun mi 'chad pas sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i byams pa la brten nas snying rje chen bo'i blo sbyang bar bya ste/_de ltaram sbyaan dbang po rtul po las dang po pa snying rje la goms pa 
chung ba rnams la sems bskyedarnal ma mi skye la/_de ma skyes na stong pa nyid kyi shes rab zab mo dang yang 'brel chad par 'gyur te/_in+d+ra b+hU tis/_lus can kun la mnyamanyid kyi//yang dag sems ni bskyed par bya/_/gang yang mamanyam nyid gnasan//thog ma dbus mtha' 
las grol ba'i/_/_ye shes de ni skye mi 'gyur//zhes so//de'i phyir las dang po pa ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa can yin pas snying rje chen po'i sems lan cig skyes kyang 'gro ba'i khams ni shin tami bsrunazhing byedapa ngan pas bslab pa'i chos mtha' dag la bar du gcod pa [494]
thamal gyi skye bo dang lhan cig tu miganas shing tshe 'di la ltos pa med par bya/_bzod pa'i go khyen/_bri mo'i gtam mi_/_ba rol mgu bar bya ba dang /_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dul ba dang /_chos brgyad mgo gnon pa dang /_dngos po la 
mgon po klu sgrub kyis 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs bdun gabus pa sogs dran par byas nas/_rtag tu sems 
ma chags pa dang /_gzhan mi spyod pa dang /_gzhan gyi sdig rkyen mi bya ba dang /_rtsod pa yod pa'i phyogs nas dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol tu 'gro ba dang*/
kyi hud 'di rnams sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba snying re rje snyam du dran par bya ste/_sdud pa las/_sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la ngesapar 'byung 'dod gang //_na 
can 'balazhig gi don la bsam zhing /_em ho'adi rnams 'khor banasanam zhig gdan zhus par 'gyur/_

@#/_/kun la sems snyoms shama'i 'du shes dang /_phan pa'i sems dang byams pa'i sems kyis gnas par bya//thub med cing drangal tshig 'jam smra bar bya//_zhes dang*/_yum las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' pha rol pos nyes pa chenapo 
byasakyang /_da dung rtsodapa mi byed par de la gnod pa dang sems 'khrug par mi bya'o_/gal te gsod na yang de la zhe sdang bar mi bya'o/_/sems can su la'ang zhe sdang bar mi bya'o//_byang chub sems dpa' rnams lan brtan par 'du shes bskyod par bya'o/_/
ka len gnyis shingata_
zhes dang*/_spobs pa'i blo gros kyi mdor/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du blta bar bya'o//_rang gi lus bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/zhes so//_de bzhin du bsod nams gyi tshogs la brtananas theg pa chen po'i sems skye ba'i [ 495]
[| ]phyir bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong las de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa thag par gyur pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba la ras kyi kha tshar dang/_bde gshegs 'od 'phro can sprang por gyurapa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha'

nyis brgya_
[@ ]yas de la rtsi'i sgron me phul nas tshogs bsag pa sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis thugs bskyed la/_de skad du/_dbu ma'i mnangag rin po che'i za ma tog kha phye ba las/_de la sbyor ba'i rkyen tshogs bsag pa dang /_rgyud sbyang ba dang /_skyabs su 'gro ba khyad bar can bya/
zhes [1|]ba'o//_tshogs bsag pa yang nyin lan gsumamatshan lan gsum du yan lag bdun pa bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo zab modon pa dang /_bklags pa dang*/_gzungs gdon pa dang /_dkonamachog la mchod pa rgyas pa bya ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi 

mchod ston yinadang bcas pa bya ba dang /_byis pa'i ston mo dang*/_mgon med pa rnams la sbyin pa rgya chen po btang ba dang*/_mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams la gtor ma rgya chenapo btang ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/_rgyud sbyang ba yang snga ma bzhin du mdo sde zab mo gdon pa dang /_bklags pa dang 
gangs bzlas pa dang*/_yan lag bdun pa bya ba dang /_phung po gsum pa gdon pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa dang /_gser 'od dam pa rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa'i gzhung gis sdig pa bshags pa bya'o//zhes so//_skyabs su 'gro banisdig_/
pa zil gyis gnon pa'i rten gyi stobs bla na med pa ste/_spyir sdig ldan pa byang chub kyi sems skye dka' bas de'i gnyen por che ba'i tshul chos bzhi ba'i mdo las_sdig pa byas shing bsags pa rnams rten gyi stobs kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro//del [496]
rten gyi stobs ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'o/_/zhes gsungasaso//_de la skyabs 'gro'i khyad bar yang /_byang chub snying bo mchis kyi bar//_zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to//_gzhan yang mdo sde rgyan las 
stobs lngar bshad de/_grogs stobs rgyu stobs rtsa ba'i stobs//thos stobs dge ba goms pa'istobs/_/_mi brtan pa dang bstan 'byung ba//zhes dang /_dbazhin du slob dpon thogs med kyis snyid rje bdadakar dang /_tshos bcu pa'i mdo'i rjes su 'brasanas 
rgyan bzhi dang*/_stobs bzhi las skye ba'ang gsungs te/_rkyen bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sumatshogs pamathong nas sems bskyed pa dang /_na yon mthong nas sems bskyed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 'jigu ba'i nyes dmigs mthong nas sems bskyed

zla_ka_
@#_/_/_pa dang /_sems can sdug pa mthong nas sems bskyed pa'o/_/stobs bzhin/_rgyu'i stobs dang /_sbyong ba'i stobs dang /_rang gi stobs dang /_gzhan gyi stobs so//de la dang po ni/_sngon theg chen la goms pa'i rigs sad pas nga lta sangs rgyas

len gnyis shing rta_
mthus rdzogs byed 'dod pa rang stobs dang /_bzhi pa ni/_gzhan gyis bskul ba'i mthus rdzogs byang 'dod pa gzhan stobs te/_rgyu rkyen brgyad po'ang /_rang dang rgyu'i stobs las skyes nas 'jug sems kyi rgyu brtan la/_gzhan dang sbyor ba'i stobs las skyes na [ 497]

nyis brgya_
khazhanor ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/_de lta bu'i sems bskyed len pa'i rten gyi gang zag rnam pa gnyis bstan te/_so thar rigs bdun gang rung sdom ldan nam/_/dkon mchog tA lar bsam pa'i rten gtso ba'i/_/rjes phyogs dbu ma'i lam srol 'jug pa

zhe dgu yangs/_/

[\[]tsam pa dang /_dbu ma pa'i lugs gnyis su grags pa las/_dang po ltar na so so thar pa rigs bdun gang rung gi rten la skye b.ra'adod de/_lam sgron las/_so so thar pa rigs bdun gyi/_/rtag tu sdom gzhan ldan pa la/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yi_//_skal 
pa yod kyis gzhan du min/_/zhes bshad bus dbu ma'i lugs dang 'di gnyis ngo bo tha dad bam yin kyang /_lta ba dang /_chog dang /_ltung ba phyir bcos dang /_bslab bya mtha'adag so sor yod pas su rung nga la bya bar mi rung bar byang chub sems dpa'i sa la 
kyang bshad cing lhag bar sdig can la miskye bas bkagaba'i phyir ro_/dbu ma'i lugs 'dir rtenam nges pa ni/_/sdong po bkod pa dang /_bskal bzang_/_namakha'i snying po'i mdo la sogs par bstan cing/_de skad du dkon mchog brtsegs pa las kyang /de'i [498]

'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rten dang bsam baphun sum tshogs pa dang ldanabs/_

zla_@#_/_/pas bsdus kyang rung ste/_rgyal ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas nyinagacig gisrogagacod kyi sdom pa blangs pa la'ang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed mdzad pa'i don dad pa dang /_snying rje la sogs bsod nams kyi blo khyadapar can gyi bas/
lta[!]pa'i rten gtso che ba'i tshul/_kon mchog tula'i mdo las/_rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos la dad gyuracing/_/byang chub bla med la'ang dad gyural//rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod la dad byed na/_blo dang ldan pa rnams kyi sems skye'o/_/zhes so/_/gnas pa'i tshad kyang gang las 
rgyaskyes pa'i rten la nyams pa'i rgyu ma byung gi bar du yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bas na semasacan gyi rgyud la sangs rgyas kyi sa bonatsam 'jog pa la sdig ba yodamed kun la skye rung ba dbu ma ba'i lugs srol gyi cho ga 'khrul pa med pa nyid lam yangs par [ 499]
da bzung ngo /_/de lta mod kyi spyod 'jug lasogs pa'i rgya gzhung chen po dag gi 'jug sdom blang ba'i tshig gi sbyor ba chos spyod mchibanyid kyad las dang po pas kha ton du byas na rtsa lhung gi zham yin pa la sbyor ba'i thal 'gyur 'god pa snang ste/_dachogs 'dzin pa'i 
tshu_chig tu snang yang cho ga'i rgyu rkyen mtha' dag ma tshang bas re zhig dam bca'i tshig tsam du 'gyur bas 'gal ba med la/_sgra 'dod rgyal ba dag kyang cho gar 'gyuran gang zag las dang po bas theg pa che chung gi sde snod gang bklagasakyang nyes dmigs du ma 'du ba'i zug 
med du 'gyur ba yin no//dani kun rdzob brda' can cho ga las thob pa de'i sbyor ba ston pa'i phyir/_tshogs bsag pa ni lhag par skye ba'i thabs/_rgyun kun kyang bde gshegs snying po can/_/rkyen ni dge ba'i bshes la rababasten pas//yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i bla 

ma mchog_/_byang chub sems kyi thugs rgyudag ba des/_de la spyir dge tshul gyi sdom pa mkhan slob las skye/_dge slong gi sdom pa dadapa'i dge 'dun las skye/_theg pa chen po'i[g]nga chub kyi sems rin po che tshogs bsags pa kho na las skye bas bshad ma thag pa 
khazhin tshogs bsog gi rim pa mu med pa la 'jug cing /_khyad par nus pa yod tshad kyis dkon mchog mchod pa gzhan gyi blor mi shong ba tsam g.yo sgyu med par bsham dgos te/_sngon dgi slong rnal 'byor spyod pa   dwapo ka ra lamar yul dang chos 'kha'atshan 
parasems bskyodazhu dus bod kyi mchod pa la ma mnyes par/_mchodapa dran/_sems bskyed mi skye gsungs nas lan gnyis kyi bar du gnas khang sagashegs mthazhus pa yod tshad sprugs pas/_de la rten du rung tsam yin gsu gad pas na bdog pa['' 500]
btang ba'i tshod rang gi longs spyod lacha gsum du bcad pa'i gsum cha ni dkon mchog/_gsumacha ni bla ma/_gsum cha rang gi 'tsho ba'i cha rkyen du bdag gi dbye bar bshad do//del sems bskyed skye ba'i rgyu thun mong ma yinAbani/_sems can gyi 
khams bde gshegs snying po'i khyab byed can yin pas na sa bon las myu gu bzhin du cho ga'am/_bab can gyi sgo nas kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas/_mthar thug don dam pa'isems bskyod mtshan nyid bsgom stobs kyis 'thob pa'i tshul sgrub 
[\[]/sgron ma'i mdo las/_bde gshegs snying pos 'gro ba yongs la khyab/_/sems ni rgya chen mchog tu rab bskyed de/_/'gro ba 'di dag ma lus sangs rgyas rgyu/_/zhes so/_/_rgyu de nyid las kyang khams kyi drim bral stobs che chung gi rigs phun sumatshags ba'i 

ka_ga_/rtags dang ldan pa ni/_'phags pa bden par sgrub lung bstan pa'i mdo las/_de la rgya che la mas padaman pa la mos pa med pa yin/_de rang bzhin gyis snying rje chen po dang ldanabs dkarapo'i yon tan dang lhun pa yin/_de sdig pa'i grog 
pospangs pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyis yongs su bzung ba yin/_ji skad sma ba bzhin byed pas mi bslu ba yin/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten du grub mnyes par byas pas dga'akhadang ldan pa yin/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ban ma tho ba med pas 
སྡིག་པ་སྤངས་པ་ཡིན། ལྷག་པའི་བསམཔ་སྐྱོན་མེད་པས་ཡི་དམ་ལ་བརྟན་པ་ཡིན། རོ་བྲོ་བ་ལ་མ་ཆགས་པས་ཐམས་ཅད་འགྱེད་པའི་དད་ཚུལ་ཅན་ཡིན། བདུད་ཀྱིས་བྱིན་གྱིས་བརླབས་པ་དང་བྲལ་བ་ཡིན། དགེ་བའི་རྩ་བ་བསགས་པས་སྤྱོད་ག་ལག་ sol
par spyod pa yin/_snying rje chen po'i spyod yul yin pas sems can thad la brtsi ba yin/_yo byad lhug par gtong bas thams cad la chags zhen chung ba yi_//ces so//de yang gnyid du song ba'i rnam par shes ba bzhinasemasarapo che bgo la nyal du 
bden gnyis shi na shiwa'argyang gcig
[# ]mchis pa de brda' la brten nas sad par byed pa'i bdag po'i rkyen yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pa ste/_'di ltarayid bzhin gyi nor bu las 'dod pa'i don bde blag tu rnyed pa bzhin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen theg pa chen po'i don la mkhas shing sdom 
pa dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa'i nus pa rdzogs pa las blang bar bya ste/_sdom pa nyeshu pa las/_blam sdom la gnas shing ma bas//nus pa ldan las blang bar bya//zhes dang /dpal ye shes grags pas/_sdom pa yang /_bla ma sdom pa la  

gnas shing mkhas pa nus pa dang ldan pa las blang bar bya'o//de medan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du bzhugs par yid la byas la blang bar bya'o//zhes pa ltar blang ba'i yul dang po la yang spyir sdom pa zhes pa'i sgra tsam zhig pa dman mchog[ |]
gnyis ka la 'jug kyang /_rnam ba'i cha nas de gnyis thabs dang bsam pa'i bye brag las cig shos kyi dge bcig shes kyi sdig par go ldog pa'ang yodapas 'di byang sdom rang sa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rdzogs pa gtso bor bzung ba'i skyes bu dam pa theg 
པ་ཆེན་པོའི་རིགས་སད་ཅིང་བྱང་ཆུབ་ཀྱི་སེམས་རིན་པོ་ཆེས་ཐུགས་རྒྱུད་གཔབ་རྙེད་ན་དེ་ཁོ་ན་ལས་བླང་སྟེ་རྒྱུ་ལ་འབྲས་བུ་འགྲུབ་པ་ཆོས་ཉིད་ཡིན་པས་ན་སློབ་དཔོན་དཔའ་བོས་ཀྱང་། ཐོག་མར་དག་བཤེས་བསྟེན་པ་ཡིས། ། ཕྱི་ནང་ཆོས་ཀུན་སློབ་དཔོན་ཡིན། lso?
ces so/_/gal te de ltar ma rnyed na rang stobs kyi nus pa can dag ni tsa nas kyang slob dpon nam/_chen por grogs pa'i sdig can zhig la rten midagos te/_'jam dpal zhingag yon tan bkod pa'i mdo'i don lam sgron du bkod pa las//gal te bla ma ma_/
rnyed ma//_de la gzhan sdom nod pa yi/_/_cho ga yang dag bshadapar bya//de la ston tsho 'jam pa'i dpal//_am rU dzar gyur ba yis//_ji ltar byang chub thugs bskyed pa_/_'jam dpal gyi misangs rgyas zhing /_/rgyan gyi mdo las bshad pa ltar//_de bzhin   
'dir ni rab gsal bro//_zhes/_lo rgyus bkod nas cho ga'i tshul//mgon po rnams kyi spyan snga ru//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed cing /_/'gro ba thams cad mgron du gnyer//_de dag 'khor ba las bsgral te/_/_gnod sems khro bo'i sems nyid dang ser 

zla[ | ]@#/_sna dang ni phrag dog nyid//_deng nas bzung ste byang chub mchog thob kyi bar du mi bya'o//tshangs par spyod pa spyad bya zhing/_/sdig dang 'dod pa spung bar bya/_/tshul khrims sdom pa la dga' bas/_/sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya//bdag nyid myur 
kluba'i tshul gyis ni/_/byang chub thob par mi spro zhing /_/sems can gcig gi phyir yang ni//_phyi ma'i mu mthar gnas par bgyi/_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/_zhing dag rnam par sbyang bar bya/_/ming nas bzudab byas pa dag/_phyogs bcu dag tu rnam 
rdzopar gnas/_/bdag gi lus dang ngag gi las//thams cad du ni dag bya ste/_/_mi dge'i las rnams mi bya'o/zhes pa ltar mchod pa'i sprin rgya chen po 'du byas la mdun gyi nam mkhar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa bzhugs par [503]
[# ]mos la len pa'o/_/gang gi tshe'ang kun slong 'chos pa ni gal che bas/_/thog mtha' bar du dge ba'i chos rnams dang/_/rgyan dang sdong po bkodalas legs gsungs pa'i//byang chub sems kyi yon tan dpag yas brjod//de la spyir thog ma dang /_bar dang/_thu
mar dge ba ni dam pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid ma nor ba yin pa sngar bshad zin la/_'dir blo sbyang ba'i phyir thog mar dge ba 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs la skyo ba/_bar du dge ba thar pa'i phan yon la spro ba/_thamar dge ba thams cad mkhyen pU yis stong nyid snying rje'i
snying po can gyis rgyud legs par sbyangs shing gnas skabs su byang chub sems kyi phan yon la spro ba bskyed pa'i tshul yang 'dir rizhig sdong po bkod pa las gsungs pa'i tshul/_gang dag 'jig rten na bla na medapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 

sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni shin tu rnyed par dga' ba'o/_/byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi sa bon lta bu'o//'aglo ba thams cad kyi chos dkar po rnam bar 'phel zer byed pas zhing sa lta bu'o/_/nyes pa thams cad bsreg pas bskal pa'i me lta bu'o/_/_mi 
dge ba'i tshos thams cad zad par byed pa'i phyiras 'og lta bu'o//don thams cad yongs su bsgrub pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu'o/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byedapas bum pa bzung po lta bu'o/_/'khor ba'i chu la rtsub 'don pas lcags 
kyu lta bu'o//khyu dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas ba'i 'jig rten la mchod rten lta bu ste/_mdor nasangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyiyon tan thams cad ji snyed yod pa byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan dang phan yon kyang de nyid yod do//de ci'i[bo4]
phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang 'di las byung ba ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'di las skyes so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na dngul chu'i rigs 
gser du snang bzhes bya ba yod de/_da ni srung gracig gis kyangalcagasasrang stong gser du 'gyur ro//dngul chu srang gcig po de ni lcags srang stong po des zad par bya ba'am/_lcags su bsgyur bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

@#/[ \]]tanagyi mtha' mi 'tshol ba'i bsod nams kyi zung bo la gcig tu 'dun cing phan yon gyi sgo nas spro ba'i shing rta la nyin mtshan 'khor yug tu 'jog bzhin pas kyang sems bskyed pa su zhig mi byed/ci'i phyir nasems can gyi khams zung mi shes pa de

rgyu[,| ]gyi tshogasani/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bskal pa ba/d+ma'i klung gi byemasnyed du brjod kyang brjod par mi nus so//de ci'i phyirazhin/_de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can ji snyed tsam sems can/[\[509]
gdu bslu bar bsdus pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang mi ldan pa'isems gcig kyang ma skyes so/_/sems can gyi khams tshod med de/sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nasems bskyed
zlob re re las bsod nams kyi phung po de skyed skye'o//de ci'i phyir na/_dge slong dag sems can gyi khamasani mi zad pa ste/_ji ltar sems can gyi khams mi zad pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_sems bskyed pa 
ri ralas kyang bsodazhams kyi phung po mi zad ba skye'o//zhes gsungs//_tshogs gsogapa'i sngon 'gro'i sbyor ba ston phyir/rkyang tshul mdzes sdug dom pa'i gnas khang yang //gur gum spos chus bran bcas gdong bkru zhib/dkon mchog 'ba' zhig yid la sems 

pa yi//mchod tshogs phru ma 'debs ladaga' zhing dgod//mes dbon gsum gyi gtsug lag khang dang /_mchog gzigs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsgrub gnas la sogs pa'i dri gtsang khang ngam/sdig can gyi skye bos rnam par dben pa'i gnas khang la phyi

gzhan dor grags 'dodadang /_rlom sems kyis ma yin par kye ma ho//zhing gi rab dad phul du gyur pa dkon mchog la bsnyen bkur du yod pa'i bsod nams 'di ni gya nom pa'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi bra bo//rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du dran pa nyebs[sIo]
bzhag nas/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_bla bre dang /_dru ba dang /_dwa ba byed pa dang /_phye ma phurapa dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i tog can dang /_lha sde dang /_yol ba la sogs pa byang zhing /_mchod yonang /_zhabs bsil dang /_zhal bsil dang /

ka_
@#/_/_mo/dam tshig gzugs brnyenamatha' dag der bos nas//_ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhugachog ni//mdza'agajugs dam bca' dran pa las myur bas//rgyal rnams zhing khams gzhan du gzigs g.yol//zhes bshad pa ni gnas khang de nyid 
bden gnyis shing rta _du sku gsung thugs kyi rten dgramazhing tshogs zhing sprul pa'i don te/rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i snang brnyan rab gnas can dang/_theg ba chen po'i sde snodakyi glegs bam lasogs ji ltar 'byor pa bsti stang chen po dang bcas bzhugasugasol nas/_sa gzhi byin gyis rlobs pa 
དང་། ཁྲུས་ཁང་བསྐྱེད་པ་ལ་སོགས་སྤྱོད་འཇུག་ལས་བྱུང་བ་ལྟར་རམ་འོག་ནམཀྱང་སྟོན་ཏོ།།གནས་དེ་ཉིད་སྟོང་གསུམ་གྱི་སྟོད་ཆེན་པོའི་ཞིང་ཁམས་ལས་ཆེསརྒྱ་ཆེ་བའི་གཞལ་མེད་ཁང་པ་བལྟ་ནསྡུག་པར་བསམས་ལ། པདྨཏི་བླ་དར་ཟབ་ཀྱི་ཁྲི་ལ་སྤྱན་དྲང་བའི་ཚིག་ཟླ་བ་སྒྲོན་ EI|
ma'i mdo las 'byung ba/_bzhengs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha_/zhes pa la sogs dang /rig pa mchog las 'byung ba/_ma lus sems can la sogs pas ye shesasems dpa' spyan drangs zhing spos dad rol mo'i bye brag gis bsu ba'i stang ka bya'o//de
nyis brgya
_lta na gang nas byon/_gad du bzhugs snyaman gang nas byon pa yang med de rang bzhin gyi gnas nas so//gad du bzhugs pa yang med de yid kyisprul pa'i gnas de nyid 'o//de skad du dkon cog brtsegs pa las/_gang zhig rgyal ba yid byed ba//de yi mdun na de bzhugs te_//
nga drug
_rtag par byin gyis brlab par byed/nyes pa kun las rnam par grol//zhes pa ltar mos pa can gyis gsol ba btab cing spyan drangs ba desas rgyas laM mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma' bas dgongs/brtse ba'i thugs rjesmyanami  chang bas gzigs/_mdzadab 'phrin las thams cad 

gzhan phan 'ba' zhig tu char bas chos kyi byings nas gzugs kyi skur bzhengs te 'byon pa'i 'thad pa ni chos nyid kyi bden pa gzigs brnams la mngon sum_//'dir re zhig spyan drangs zhing khrus gsol ba'i rim pa dus mkhyen rgyal po'i sau slob phyir gang zhig lus pa med/
pa'isems can gyi//mgonadang dpung gnyenagyur kyang bdud sde'i dgra/jil ji snyed mkhyen cing gzigs pa yi//bcom ldan bdag gi sdum par mchis su gsol//las kyi sprul pam yin 'byon pa'i shul//khrus kyi khang bu brtsegs pa dri bsung can//_shel dang nor bu'is gzhi ka
b.raldan//g.yudamar mu tig bla bre dbyas pa der/_/bde gshegs rigs kyi bu mchog bcas pa la//spos chus gang ba'i nor bu'i bum banas//khrus kyi rim gro bgyid pa'i smin legs ma//_glu dang rol mo'i gyuraga'agran la brtson/_nye regachog mkhas pa'i gas[s]
mig/_la phyis bsku mnye'i sri zhus g.yad ba'ang //_kha dog gcig tu mi gnas dbang bo'i mtshon//thags su btags pa med pa'i lha rdzas nyo//dpag bsam ljon pas btsong ba'ipany+tsali//skyid kyis non sbas grab 'jam yad pa'i gos//dridad spos chus bgos 
shing byugs pa dang*//rin thad brjod la khrel ba'i rinachen rgyan//gdu bu dpung rgyan snyan cha cod panasogs//'dod pa'i yonatanaspangs ba'i thub dbangakyang*//bkrinaldan bsod nams slad du bdag gir bzhes//'jig rten dbang phyug lasogs nye ba'ibs//_nasod kun 
drenal sogs bskal bzagi/sems dpa' bcu drug dang ni khyim pa'i tshul//chos 'phags ga tu dudad li tsa bI//drimamed par grags la'ang dbul bar bgyi//stong gsumagacig car khyab pa'i phyi'i bzhon par//'khyud pa'itsan+dan spos kyi bsung zhimadris//bsod nams bye ba'i 

@#/_/'byung gnas mtshon dpo'i bya//gsar sbyangs brtan pa 'phrog la byug par bgyi//btang snyoms yas pa'i shel gyi sa gzhi la//byams pa'i pad+ma ge sar stong brdal bar//snying rje'i nyizla bkrag tu 'chor ba bstar//dga' chen bcom ldan sras bcas bzhugs 
gsol//zhis brjod la/_dad pa'i mngon rtogs ngom pa'i rnam 'gyur bshad pa/_'ab col goms pa med pa'i lus btud kyi//_snying gar gus bcas mngon rtogs ngom pa la//_me tog dog pas rab bzung snyim pa'i snod//_ga bu chung gi brtul zhugs 'dzin pa yin//rang bzhin du

kabaden gnyis shiparta nyis brgya _lus kyi rnam 'gyur sa sems kyi mngon rtogs gsal ba'i phyir//bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar mchen/_sgeg chos dang /_ngo 'dzum gnag pa dang /_ji mi snyam pa'i bab col gyis 'dug par rigs pa ma yin no snyam pas gcom skyungs ti[11]
mig 'phang smad la/_lag pa'i snyim pa me tog dang bcas pa snying gar khra sbyar te_/_gus pa dang bcas pa/_'jigs pa dang bcas pa/_bag yod pa khrel dang ngo tshar ldanapa'isems kyis gnas pa ste spyod 'jug las/_sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag_/kunotu thog 
tshemed gzigs par ldan//de dag thams cad spyan snga na//rtag par bdag ni gnas so zhes//de ltar bsams nas do dang /_/gas dang 'jigs ldan de bzhin mnos//zhes so//rig dang zhabs su ldan sogs bde gshegs kyi//yon tan mtha' dag gnas kyis bskal 
pa bzhin/dad pa'i skyed mos tshal du 'ongs pa'i mod//_skyo ba min pa'i ba spu gcig tu zing//de lta bu'i lus kyi brdas sems dad pa'i rang bzhin la bskul bas/_rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa la sogs sngar bshad pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tanamatha' klas pa dang /
nga bdun

thugs rje'i gzigs pa zhing khams gzhanadu dus las yol ba ltar gyur nas bdag cag 'ba' zhig gi dad pa'i mgron du khug pa la dbugs bsdus shing /_lus kyang ba spu zing byed pa tsam du dad pa'i gdung shugs gis bskyed pa'o//de skad du bzang skyong gis zhus pa las/de/
nas bzang spyod spu zing zhes byed de bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ngo*//zhes pas mtshon no//de ltar dad pa bskyed nas yan lagabadun pa dbul bar bya ste/_'phags pa thogs med kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyabar 'dadabs//
nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa 'bul ba dang /_sdig pa bshags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /_mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /byang chub tubasngo ba rnams khyal//zhes gas[5IA]
pa ltar bla na yod pa'i mchod pa ni bsag sbyang gi mchog yan lag bdun pa ste/_de la dang po phyag 'tshal ba'i yan lag ni/_zla gzhon lus la 'jug pa'i rdzing bu'i nang //rmabya'ib mo 'jo sgrig rol pa lta'i//lang tsho'i grangs snyed rdul gyi rnam gras dang //_shin tu 'khrul

nyis brgya_
//zhesamanamatho'i 
du tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la khong khro ba ma skyes pa de srid du dbang chen gser gyis gzhi la thug gi bar gyi rdul phra rab kyigs dang mnyam pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bde ba myong zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du phyin par 'gyur ro
 bskyod bde'abras gnyer ba'i bsam pa can la'ang phan yon de ltan/byangachub sems bskyed pa'i don du 'tshol ba'i 'bod nams nibasamacis mi khyab stemathar thugazhi ba'i go 'ob la sbyor ba'i phyir ro//gnyis pa mchod pa'i yan lag_gtong ba'i yonalag rdzoT ba'i dngos 

dang//des kyang mtshon par dpe med yod kyis sprul//blanamachis pa ma yin mtsho ba'i sprin/kun tu bzang bo'i yonal phrag dog bgyid/_de la glan yod pa'i mchod pa dngos su bsham pa nibashadam thag pa'i tshul gdamaltos pa yongasu bzung ba med pa'i mchod ba sman 
su gtogs pa dang /rin po che'i rnam pa dang gtsang ma yang yin la yi gar 'ong ba'i chu gtsang ma dag gser dang nor bu'i rigs 'byung ba'is 'dzin dang /_ben zhing nyas dga' ba'i 'broganas dang /_bya skyibs yid du 'thad pa dang brag ri'i khang bu brtseT pa dang sman ljos dang /_nags tshal dang 
gal ba dang thag thug can dang /_tshor mtshanam yinapa'i ljon shing dang /_chu las skyes pa'i me tog pad+madang /thabalas skyas pa'i ut+paladang /_sa la 'byung ba'i u dum wA ra pa lha yul na yod pa'i maN+Da ra ba dang /snam dang /tsam pa ka dang /_nA ga ge sar la soDa me tog gi tshal dang /[ sis]
'bab chu lhung lhung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_bza' shing me tog dang 'bras bu dudaching lo 'dab bzang ba dang /_su garu dang /_tsan+dan dkar dmar dang /bzang drug dang /_ga bur dang/_si h+pha dang /_ri daDa dang /_bya la sogs pa'i srog bstan sdugaNingaskad snyan pa dang /mtshodang /dzing bu dang /_lteng ka dang

sku@#/_/yid las byung banime tog gi phreng ba spel legs par bkod pa dang /_tshamanyam par sbyar ba'ispros phyir phud gser gyi pad+ma la chodadu dar nas gnas pa'i rin po che'i sgron ma dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /_nyi zla lasogs gsal zhing snang bar

bden gnyis shing rta_
རྒྱུ་ཐམས་ཅད་སྟོབས་བཞིའི་ཚོགས་རྩབནས་དག་པརམ་བྱས་ན། རོ་ཞིག་ཅིག་དགེ་བའི་ལས་ཉིཚོ་བས་ཧྲིལ་གྱིས་ནོན་ནས་གཞན་དུ་བྲོས་པ་བཞིན་དུ་བལྟར་མིམདོན་ཡང་། ལས་དེའི་འབྲས་ཁུ་ཚོགས་ཞིང་དུས་ལ་མ་བབ་པ་དེ་སྲིད་དུ་བར་མ་དོརིནམ་ཡང་ཆུ་ si;
'dza' ba med pas srid pa'i mun nag stug por 'chab bzhes bstan la/_de skad du las ba pa las/_lus can dag gis las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyad yang chud mi za//tshogs zhing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par gyur//_zhes pa ltar ro//de la 
nyis brgya _
