drug cu _
las theg drag po dang /sgramed pa'i sa gzhi las rlung chen po glo bur du 'ong ba dang 'dra bar gnod pa chen po 'byung ngo//de lta bum shes pa'am/_shes kyang las dang de 'bras mi bslu bar khyad du gsod pa rnams ni mdza' ba dang mimadza' ba'i don du sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs 

byed par 'gyur te/_shi ba'i dusan ni bdag kyang med par 'gyur dang /_dag[z]med ba'agyur la/_sems kyi rgyun rje 'gag bamed bas de dag gi don du byas pa'i sdig pa mi bzad cing rnam par smin pa yid du mi'od pas ni bdag nyid 'ba' zhig la skrag bsngal bar byed cing/

ngo tsha dang masaM pas 'gyod pa'i gnas chen po la sbyar ba ni rnam par sun 'byin pa'i stobs dang /_nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa cung zad thal ba dang /_rang dbang ma 'du ba'i gnas skabs byung kyang slar dag ba'i las de bas brgya 'gyur du spyad 
པ་གཉེན་པོ་ཀུན་ཏུ་སྤྱོད་པའི་སྟོབས་དང་འདི་ནི་བཟང་པོ་མ་ལགས་པས།།སླན་ཆད་བདག་གིས་ཡོངས་མི་བགྱིད།། ཡང་དང་ཡང་དུ་མི་བགྱིད་དོ།།ཞེས་པ་ལྟར། སྔར་མི་དགེ་བ་བྱས་པ་ལ་ཤིན་ཏུ་འགྱོད་པས་སླར་སྡོམ་པ་བླས་ནསསྡིག་པ་ནམ་ཡང་མི་བྱེད་པསོར་ཆུད་པའི་

gzhan dang gzhan gyis mngon mtho dang nges legs kyi rgyu bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa la bdag nyid las su 'phel ba'i lusasems 'khrugs pa chung bod med kyang

@#/_/rgyas rnams kyi rdzogs smin sbyas gsum gyi yonatanadang /_rgyal sras dad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon 'jug gi sgo nas thugs bskyed pa'i dge brgya mtsho mtha' dag la dga' bas rjes su yi rang bar bya'o//de'i phan yon ni gzhan gyi dge ba'i [gq]
ny+tsa/_bdag gos thogs pa med do/daN+Di'i tshig rgyan las thogs pa dpe zlar rung ba'i bsodanams thob tshul/sngon kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal kyis de bzhin gshegs pa slob mar bcas pa la nyin zhig sbrel nas bsnyen bkur ba'i_/_srang mdor 'khyams pa'i dbul 
[# ]pos de la rjes su yi rang babasgoms pas/_phyi dro bsde ba'i sa la bab pa na ston ba'i zhal nas/_rgyal po chen po de ring gi bsod nams kyi khyad par rgyal po khyod kyi ming nas bsngo'am/_khyod las gzhan pa'i bsod nams 'thob pa dag gi ming nas bsngo zhes [53]
bka' bstsal pas/bdag las bsod nams che ba mchin da'i ming nas bsngo bar zhus pas/_dbul po'i ming las smos te bsngo ba mdzadapa bzhin no//_skad du sdud pa las/_stong gsum re rab srang la gzhal ba rdzogasad bzung rung*/rjes su yi rang dge ba de ni 
É དེ་ལྟ་མིན།།ཞེས་སོ།། ལྔ་བ་ཆོས་ཀྱི་འཁོར་ལོ་བསྐོར་བའི་ཡན་ལག །ཐར་མེད་འཁོར་བའི་སྤྱོད་པས་མ་དུལ་ཞིང་།།རྣམ་པར་སྲ་མཁྲེགས་ཐུ་བ་གང་གིས་ཀྱང་།།གདུལ་ཐབས་བན་པ་བྲལ་ལ་ཆོས་འཁོར་གྱི།།རྩིབས་རྣོནམུ་ཁྱུད་འཛིན་དེ་བསྐོར་བར་
bskul//'di ltar 'khor ba ba rnams kyi spyod nim dul ba/_ma zhib/_ma bsdams pa/_sdig to mi dge ba dang /g.yo sgyus phyogs bsladapa/gtong ba'i don du ni lcags kyi pha gu bzhin du srab/_las ngan goms pa la ni rdo rje'i 'dag pa bzhin du mkhregs shing 

thun bzod pa/_nges 'byung dang dad pa'i phyogasasu rgyud tha ba res ba ltar gyur pa de/thabs gzhan gang gis kyapagadul bar nus pa ma yin pas drang don dang /nges don dang /_ldem dgos can du gsus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bsdu ba'i phyibs rnonapa 
mngon par mtho ba dang /_nges par legs pa'i mu khyud las 'da' ba med par bskor bar bskul ba'o//de skad du spyod 'jug las/_phyogs rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas la//thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni//sems can sdug bsngalamun 'thoms la//chos kyi sgron me spar 
ngu gsol//zhes pa ltar tshangs pa bzhin du smon lam dang snying stobs dang gtong phod ldan par bskul ba dang /_tsho dad ldan ba rab 'byor bzhin du 'drizhing lan ldon pa la mkhas pas bskal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dang /gsang ba'i bdag [ s24]
po bzhin du zab cing rgya cha ba'i gnas bskul ba la mkhas pa dang /'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa dang /_li tsa bI dri med grags pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyi spobs pas thabs la mkhas par bskul ba bzhin phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la dmigs shing 
dge ba'i bshas gnyen mtshan don dang ldan pa rnams la dngos su bskul bar bya'o/_sa chos spangs pa'i nyes pa 'dag cing cho rabs thams cad du dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ro//drug pa mya ngan las 'da' ston de dag la bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs 
pa ni /rgyal dang de sras rnams kyis spang 'gyur ba'i//'gro 'dis sdug bsngal gnas skabs bsten mthong nas/_/mya ngan 'da' ba min pa'i gdan khri la//dngos po kun gyi rin thang gcigachu spungs/_/gang dag ston pa slob mar bcas pa medapar gyur na de'i bstan bshad 

@#/_/nyams par 'gyural/_de med na las dang /_de 'bras kyi blang dor mi shes pas sdug bsngal 'ba'azhig gi sgyu 'bras lta spyodacing /_rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis spung bar 'gyur bas bde 'gro'i rten yod du zin kyang mi khom pa'i gnas tshigs 
nyag gcig chu rdzongs par bgyur ro//de ltar bsams nas bdag cagagi ston pa la dge bsnyenatsunas myang 'das bshol btab pa bzhin du_/'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa nabazhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dmigs shing*/_skyes bu dam par gyur 
kabartanaganyisashi _
tshul rnams ladangos su yon sbyar nas 'tsho zhing gzhes par gsol ba yang nas yang du gdab bo/_/de'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur bdag nyid kyang dus ma yin par 'chibar mi 'gyuraro//'dun pa bsngo ba'i yan lagazhi/_bag tu blta bas 'dar ba'i rnam [ 525]
kur yang //_srid par lan gcig mtho ba'i cho nge ste//_byang chub bsngo ba'i gser 'gyur rtsis thebs pa//'ani ston pa gzhan gyi lugs la med//'di ltar srid pa'i bde 'bras la dmigs pa can 'dag tu blta ba dang 'dres ba'i dge ba ni bsod nams cha mthun 
/_yum bar ma las/rab 'byor dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis kho nar bsngo ba bya yi_/
nyis brgya
_de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bsngo ba ni 'bras bu dman par rigs par byaste
zhes bya ste/_'bras bu lan gcig smin nas zad par 'gyur ro//

nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_de las gzhan gyi sar yang bsngo bar mi bya ste/

byed la sogs lami tsamadu yang ma grags pasaklu sgrub zhabs kyis bsod nams bya ba'i tshogs chen gad//sems can rnams yongs bsngo ba//thub dbang khyed kyis gang gsungs pa/_de gzhan bstan bcos lasam bshad//tshes so//de yang bsdorgyuni/phal po 
che las/_'gro kun dge ba ji snyed yod pa dang /byas dang byang 'gyur de bzhin byed pag/zhes sems can rnams kyi byas pa'i dge ba ji snyed yodapa dang /_panyid kyis sngon chad byas pa/_phyis byed 'gyur/_da lta byed bzhin pa ste dus gsum du gtogs pa'i dge ba yin 
modachad du bya ba nisems tshan thang kyi sangs rgyas thob pa'i don du ma migs natheg dman du lhung bar 'gyur te/_yum b.ram las dpangalen bod kyi ngodu bsngo yi rang gi yongs thob pa tsam gyi nang ma yin te/_nyan thos dang rangasasas kyi sar lhung bar gyur[526]
pa'i phyir ro//zhes dang*/rnam ba'i dmigs pa yang 'khrul snang bdenazhin can du ma yin pas mi dasnang sgyu ma lta bur bsngo ba'itshul/_snga ma las/_rab 'byor chos thad lamalta bu/sgyum lta bu/dge ba yang rmi lam lta bu/_spyaya lta bu'i tshul gyis yong su bsdobar 
bya ste/_zhes so//bsngo ba'i ngo bo ni dge rtsa byang chub tu 'dun pas bsgyur ba'i blo yinate/'jam b.lazhig yon tan bkod pa las/chos rnams khrod rkyen bzhinate//_na ba'i rtse la bzhugs/_/kangag smon lam ci btabapa_/de 'dra'i 'bras bu 'thob par gyur/
//deng sang bod kyis de mi shes pas tshig gi sbyor ba ma 
de dang rjes mthun pa'i tshig la sa dang po yanatshad 'phagaso lam gyi yon tan mngon du gyur pa'i bden tshig 'grub pa zhig gis gsungs ba'i rjes su 'brangab lasagar radu rung gis 'grub pa ma yin no

ka_
/'khrul pa tshom yang medapa'i gya tshom gyi rjes su rmongs pa'i mngon zhen gyis 'jugo/_'o na bsngo ba'i tshig shesan sbyin bdag gis gdon pa ma yinanamace na/_su gdon ba yin te tshig gi sbyor ba byas pa misnang la/_bden tshig 'grub pa'i 'phags 
pa rnams kyi gsung sbyin bdag gi tshig lam du drangs nas bla ma dang dge 'dun rnams kyis 'i rjes su sems phyogs nas 'grub bar gyur cig pa'i mthun 'gyur brjod pa yin no/da lta nga tshig gi sbyor ba dang mthun 'gyur byed pa po bden tshig 'grub pa yin na/_thabs 
la mkhas pa dang /_stobs gsum gyi nus pas de'i dge ba tshad med par 'gyur ba'i tshul/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snodalas/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni sbyin pa nyung du yangamang por byed de/_ye shesakyi stobs kyis lhag par byed do//shes rab kyi[527]

dang /_dge sdig las rnam par grol ba nyid kyi phyir na de la bsngo ba yod par mi 'dod do//de skad du yang dag sbyor ba'i rgyud las kyang //de yi sdig dang bsod nams kyi//cha gnyis rnam par rtog pa ste//mkhas pas 'di gnyis rnam par spang /_/zhes pa dang mthun par

zla_/_/bdud rtsi'i bcud bas ma ngomasan//skyes bu'iya la ma ba'u_mtsho sprin yang //tshig gi lha mthara'akhyams la skrag gyur nas//bdag lus stan du dbul la'ang do gal bgyid//_spyir mchod ba'i rnam pa du mas sems sbyabab mngonang bstan mor

@#/_/pas 'tsho ba/_lus dang srogal dbang byasanas bran du 'khol ba de dgagi 'bangs su gdong nas grub pa ma yin kya'amagrochen po bskyed nas 'jug pa'adi sumashong nas kyang skyo bar gyur tedabal ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas/_'di byanang paraslarayang

x? དག་ནི་དོན་ཆེན་པོ་དང་ལྡན་པ་ཉིད་དེ། བདགཅཞི་རྒྱུ་མེད་པར་སྐྱེ་བ་དང་།གཙོ་དེས་སྐྱེ་བ་འདོདཔ་ལ་བུ་ ga ltacan ma yinaparathogamamed ldanas 'khor bar 'khyams shing /_tshorabs 'di'i ma skye ba gzhanadabag tu med par gti mug mos mthusazil

ngag gis yang dag par blang bar bya'o//zhes so//zlang ba dngosan/_sdeb sbyor lhur len pas gzhung mdzes pa gtso bor byed pa ma yin par/_phan 'dogs pa lhur len pas sems 'dul ba gtso bor byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thad kyi lus mtsham
med pa slob dpon zhi ba lha'i lugs ltar na/_byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar//zhesapa'i sho lo kas thun mong ma yin pa'i skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas/_de la 'dir smon 'jug gisems bskyed dang sdom ba bla tshul so sor dbyen/slob dpon mkhas pa chen pokr-i_pa'i 
spyod 'jug gi dka' 'grel las/de nasasems bskyed pa 'dod pa zhig ni/_ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegasakyi/_byang chub thugs ni bskyod pa ltar//_zhes bya ba 'di lan gsum brjod do/_/denas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya zhing sngar bshad pa'i yon tan rnams

@#/_/dung ldan pa'o//gal te byang chub tu sems bskyed ba dang /_sdom pa gnyis ka len par 'dod pa zhig nA_/ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegasakyi//byang chub thugs bskyed pa dang*/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la//de dag rim bzhin gnas pa

_pamed bar dam 'cha' ba'i//byang chub sems nibaskyedapar bya//_zhes pa ltar sems can thams cad la dmigs nas sems bskyed pa de byang chub ma thob gyi bar du mi gtong ngo snyam du dma'acha' ba ni smonasems mtshan nyidapa yin pas/_de'i bslab bya la slob par

dang byang chub sems dpa'amathong bar 'gyur/_rmi lam bzang po gzhan dag kyang mi bar 'gyur/_lha rnams kyang yi rangs nas bsrung bakhyadapar 'gyur/_skad cig re re la'ang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsog par 'gyur/_nyon mos pa'i sgrib

/_@#/_/mtsho'i 'gram rnam par snang mdzad kyis brgyan pa'i snyid po can zhes bya ba'i khang bzung na byang chubasems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma latshos ston pa nor bzang gis dpag tshad lnga brgya'i rgyud nas mthong ste phyag byas pa gziT nas phyagayumapa brgyad+ma/
pa nor bzang gi spyi bor bzhag nas bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshul dang /_pe dang sbyar ba'i phan yon byedad sum brgyar ba gsungs ba la blta bar bya zhing /_debazhin du 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa dang /_sred mod gyi bus zhus pa dang /_gos pa

nges 'grel dang /_long kar gshegs pa dang /_ga ya go ri dang /dkon cog sprin dang /_sa bcu pa dang /_drim med par grags pas bstan pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u dang /_khyad 'das dang /_dad ba bsgom pa dang /_ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba dang/[ 545]

til brgya
_ti'i busems dang bo bskyedapa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ngan ngon tsam dang cud zad tsamam yin te/_de ltar bskal pa brgya'am bskal pa stong ngam/bskal pa 'bum gyis kyang brjod bar minusan/byang chubasems dpa'ams kyis sems bskyed pa'i bsod

byang chub tu sems bskyed par bsod nams che'o//zhes gsungs pa'i phyir na byang chub kyi sems de bsgrub pa dang mi ldan yang 'khor ba'i nang na 'bras bu che bar byams pa'i rnam par thar ba las bcom ldan 'dzas kyis bka' bstsal ba'i lung /_dper na rdo rjer po 
chegakyangagaser gyi rgyan khyad par du 'phags pa thad sgril gyis gtsonato_/zhes ba'i dpe dad 'brel bsngar smos zin pa la rnam parapyadams sems bskyed pa tsam gyi cho ga ni mtha' yas pa'i sems can la phran ba can yin par ston pas dngosu gsungs 
na de dgag pa ni bdud kyi las yin par rigs par byazhing /_de bzhin chos bcu pa las sems bskyed pa'i rgyu bzhi gsungs pa'i da po de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos la soT pas bsgug zhing skyob byas nas 'dzin du bcug ba dang /_gnyis pa byang chub sems[546]
kyi baspar ba thos nas 'dzin pa dang /_gsum pasen mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen med par mthong nas snying rje'i bsam par bskyed pa dang /bzhib de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam ba thad rdzogs pa mthong nas dga' ba skyes te bskyed pa rnams las kyang /badrag 
nyid snying rje chen pos sbrel gyis non nas sen la phan pa'i phyir sems bskyed ba khon khyad par che bar 'phags pa de bzhin gsheT pa'i ye shes phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin las bka' stsal ba yinano/debazhin 'jug pa'i phan yon ni/_sangasargyas kyi sku dang /_ye shes 
dang /_yon tan dang /_phrin las thad gzhan don 'ba' zhig mdzad pa las grub pa yin bar sngon gyisas rgyas rnamasardzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan thob pa'i gang yin pa desas la/deskad du 'phags pa klu'i dbang bos/_gzhan don phun sum tshogs bani/'bras bu'i gtso 

ka_@#_/_/_bo yin par 'dodago yin par 'dod///sangs rgyasamanyesasogs de las_/zhan//de dag zhar la 'gyur bar bzhed//ces gsungs pa ltar ro//_yon tan rin po che'i mdzod dga' ba'i char zhes bya ba las/_byung bkyi sems yongasu bzung bste rab byed brgyud pa'i 'grel 
sangasargyasamanyesasogs de las tha
bden ba
_pa'o/_/dani bslab pa'i gnas ston pa'i thog mar bag yod pa bstan ba/_sngon chad legs par ma brtags bab col gyir da lags bar ma brtags bab col gyi//dam btsa'agatong la'ang yid gnyis gnas mchin/_rgyal dang de sras rnams kyi shes rab mthus//gdon mi thu bar brtaT pa'i blang dor gnas//
btang na bdag gis sems can kun bslus pas/_/_mu mtha' med pa'i ngan 'gror 'khyams par 'gyur/_/de phyir sems can gcig gi bde ba'ang //dam btsapa'ang du bshig nas bdag nyid nyams pa'i las mi bsrong*bshig nas bdag nyid nyams pa'i las mi bgyid//'jig rten na gnas skabs kyi bya ba don du gnyer ba lhur lenapa [is47]
nyis shing rta _
lab gyi gnas dam bcas pa dag kyang yal bar 'dor ba la
slan chad kyi nyes dmigs bsam par mi 'gyur zhing /_ji ltar don du gnyer ba de'i las kyi mtha' gang yin pa'ang 'dod pa'am 'dod pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba rtags shing dpyad bu ma yin pa'i bab col gyi gnas dam bcas pa dag kyang yal bar 'dor ba la 
nyis brgya_yidaganyis pa ste the tshom du 'gyur ba yad na/_spyod 'jug las/_bskal pa du mar rab dgongs mdzad pa yi//thub dbang rnams kyis 'di nyid phan par gzigs//zhes pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med par sku nyamasasu bstarazhing /_byang chu 
don sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dang /byams pa la sogs pa rnams kyis legs par brtags shing dpyad nas gnas skabs dang mthar thug thad kyi bde legs dang yon tan dang /_'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid theg pa chen po'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid du bstan pa'i blang dor gyi gnas

bdag 7da kyis nus par gyur bzhin ngu btad bar gyur nasems can bslus par gyur te/ci'i phyir na/sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dba' rnams dang dge ba'i gshes gnyen dbang por byas nas de dag gi spyan sngar smon pa'am/'jug pa'i sems kyi dam bca' gang yin 
'badra dang de dag blangs bzhin du slang bya dka' ba'ispyod pa la 'jigs shidzi zhum nas sems bskyed kyi khur bor ba'i phyir ro//de skad du spyod 'jug las/_gal tede ltar dam bcas nas//las kyis bsgrub pa mabyasan//sems can de dag kun bsdus pas//bdag gi 'gro 
bca 'drar 'gyur//zhes dang /_blun med pa'i bde ba la//bsam pa thag pasamagron gnyeranas//'gro ba bladi baspu byas na//bde 'gro ji ga 'gro'agyur ram//zhes sems can bslus par gyur pa'i gang zag de la srid pa phyi mar bde 'ga' rtan yidalam yanas ngan[ 548]
sang gi 'gro bamu mtha' med par kha brgyud do//de bas na sems can gcig tsam ba'i bde ba la'ang lanam tho ba'i shom thog par bya ste/zla named ba'i bde ba nisangs rgyas kho na las gzhan du med la/_bar du bde ba yud tsam pa 'di 'gro ba'i ngal stegs yin pasan spyong 
'jug las kyang /_bar dubade la mgron du bos zin gyi/[\] ]zhes bstan la/_de bas na de bshis na ba dag nyid la nyams pa'i gnas chen po 'thob pa yin no/_ltung dang byang chub sems stobs gnyis kar lhan//'bo ra bar res kyi 'dri byed gang yin pa sa thob pa la yun ring 
'thigs 'gyuran//bslab bya gtong ba'i skyes bu smyon pa yin/de la ngan song gi da ltar ltung ba'i stobs ldan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byung chub sems stobs ldan pa gnyis/_ltung ba dang /_de las kun nas ldang ba dag gis 'khor ba na res kyi 'dre bar byed pa/

ka_

sa brgyadon lnga
_bzod pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas bshaN sdom yang yang byed cing /_de ma thag blang bar bya ste/sas rgyas pa'i 'dul ba ni nges par 'byin ba dang bcas pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas so//de yang klu de ba 'byung pa'i rgyu rigs med pa dang /_snyed rje chung ba dang /'khor ba'i 

sdug bsngal gyis mi 'jigs pa dang /sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa dang /_byang chub chen po thug da bar sems pa dang /_bdud kyis byin gyis babs pa dang /_theg pa dman pa'i gang zag bsten pa dang*/_theg pa chung pa'i gzhung la brtsam pa dang /_sems can blos gtong ba 
dang*/_byang chub sems dpa' latshag ngan brjod cing nganasems bskyedapa dang /_byang chub kyi sems dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs mi spong ba dang /_gzhan yang mi shes pa dang /_bag med pa dang/_mgus pa dang /_nyon mongs pa mang ba'o//_zhes thog la'i rnal 'byorapa nyid

rnam pa kun tu bdag la dgrar gyur pa'i//nyon mongs skyobs chen 'di dang g.yul sprad nas//'khon du bzung ba'i tshogamazhig par//bslab pa bsrung ba'i brtul zhugs su zhig gang //'jig rten na gnod pa'i chung duzhing gi mu lareg pa lta bu dang /_de'i 'bras bu

tis brgyu_

rogadug

ga la zhig/_de la nyon mongs pa dgan phyi rol gyi yul na'angami gnas/_nang du dbang bo'i tshogs la'ang ye gnas/bar dang bar zhes bya ba'i khams la'angami gnas te kun du rtog pa[ w]glo bur du rang byung la/_kun tu rtog pa de la'ang yul medan_nyon mongs pa gzugs 
can ma yin pas rten dang brten pa lta bur mi rung kyang /rang bzhin du sems can thad 'di'i btson rar chud pa 'balazhig pas gti mug la sogs pa'i rgyus rang gi tshod kyang rang gi rig par mi nus na//'gro ba gzhan dang gzhan dag de las sgrol zhing dbugs 'byin 
pa'i brtan pa ma nyams pa lta ga la zhig/_khyad bar sems can rnams ni byed pa ranAba'i tshul danases dusazham yang 'di dag gi donaminus so snyamaMnasazhi bde'i blo skyes pa ni btang ba'i tshad yin no/de pas na de'i gnyen por/_/bag yod shes bzhin ldan[ 552]
pa'is gzhil//byang chub sems kyi myu gu bskyed sla bas//_mi nyams bzung zhing drim sbyong ba dang /_spel pa'i thabs la nan tan bgyid 'tshol lo/_zhes mtshams sbyar nas bag yodapa dang _na pa dang /_shes bzhin rgyun chags su ldanapa ni ma gzhilta

do//_shes bzhin med pa'i sems ldan pa'i//thos dang bsam dang bsgom pa yang //klo rdol khum pa'i bzhin[5\] ]dran pa lani dmiganas//thos ldanadad ba canadang ni/_khartson pa lhur len du u yod //shes bzhin med pa'i skyon chag ba bas//_lhung ba'i rtog dang 

/bcam bar 'gyur/_/_shes bzhin med pa'i chom rkun dag/_dranapa nyamasala'i rjes 'bradabs//bsod nams dag ni la bsags kyang //rkun pos 'brogs bzhin ngan 'gror 'gro zhes dang :bag gi rnyed dang bkur[ @] dang //lus dpa'atshos med

dornabadun
_b.rablang bar bya'o//ces bshad pa ltar bya'o//da ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad pa las/_thog mar nyesaspyod sdom ba'i spang byatsha dang bcas bstonaba'i phyir/_khyad par lhung ba'i rab dbye nyi shu ni/dkon cog gor 'phrog la sogs rgyal po'i lnga

ste tshul khrims 'chal yang rung /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang rung /_do'i'o/sa dur smrig 'phrog gam/_khyim na gnas pa  byed du bcug gam/_lus kyi chad pa gzhu brdeg byed dam/_chad panor 'bul du 'jug gam/_btson rar 'jug gam/_srog dang

ka_
@#/_/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ngan sems kyis thuga'abyin pa ste/_mtshams med pa'i las lnga po 'dig las gang yang rung ba'i sa byad pa 'di ni lta ba'ilcab bzhi ba'o//rgyal rigs ga8yang rgya med par smra bar 'gyur la/'jig

[# ]na gaslu zhing /gnyis pa ni/_lung gi chos sde snod gsum dang*/_rtogs pa'i chos bslab pa gsum du gtogs pa'i bka'adangos sa_/_de'i don rnam par dbye ba'i bstanabacos la chos skyob kyi yon tan dang ldan pa rtag pa 'di ni thar pa thob pa'i thabaso ma [ l555]

nyis brgya don brgyad 
[# ]gang zhe na/_blon po gong mchod rten gyi rdzas sam/_dge 'dunagyi dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rjes 'brog pa 'di ni lta ba'i rtsa ba dang po'o//gang yang grong 'jomasapa dang /_ljongs 'joms pa dang /_grong khyer 'joms pa dang /_yaMl 'khor 'joms par byed/

pa 'di ni lhung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o//_yang blon po gang chos sbyong ba ste/_/nyan thos nges par 'byung ba bshad pa'am/_radabs rgyas nges par 'byung ba bshadaba'am/_mkhyen pa'i ye shes nges par 'byung ba bshad pa sbyong zhing 'gog la/_srubs par byed pa 'di ni ltung 
ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o//yang blon po gang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rab tu byung batshul khrims dang ldan yadarud/_tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung ba la 'tsho ste/_gos ngur smrig 'phrog gam/_khyimon gnas par byed du 'jug gam/_tson rar bcug gam/chad pas 
nor 'phrog gam/_srog dang 'bral bar byed du 'jug pa 'di ni lhung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o//yang blon po gar mtshamasamed pa lnga lam gang yang rung ba'i sdig pa la sogs pa 'di ni lta ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa'o//_yang blon po gang gis ltung ba'i rtsa gal po 'di dag las gang[556]
yang rung ba zhig byas na/_blon po de dge ba'i rtswa pa sngon bskyed pa h+phadi chud gzon pa yin no//zhes grongani khyim gcig pa dang*/_ljongasazhe mi rigs bzhi gnas pa dang /_grong khyer ni gzo sna bco brgyad yod pa dang /_grong rdal ni tshodapo mang po 'du ba dang /_yul 'khor_/
yul tsam pa ka zhes pa lta bu'i yul chen po rnams 'joms pa'o//bal pa lades pa brgyad ni blo ma sbyangs pa'i gang zag gam//_sbrangs pa tsam la'ang ma nges te/_stong pa nyid kyi dngos gnas tshig lam du 'khrul nas skyag pa skye ba'i rigs yod pas de dag 
la sgra jibazhin ston pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i rigs dang ldan pa dag lam de la zhugs pa na nyan thos kyi bcos pa na zugasacanal bsngags brjod nas theg dman gyi sde snod la sems bskyed du 'jug pa dang /_nyan thos kyi 'ogisacan rang gi blo la gdod nas grub 

@#/_/pa'iso so thar pa la mes shi de'i ched du sleb pa la don du mi 'gyur bzhin ngu theg chen gyi yon tan bsgrags nas gnyis ka ma yin par 'chos pa dad/_las dang po pa'i kun slong gi cha nas theg pa chen po la lung du ma bstan pa'i gang zag gi blo gzing 
kyi kha lo bzhin du bsgyur nas theg pa chen po la bstod nas nyan rang gi lam 'dor du 'jug pa dang /_skyid bar gyi don du bdag la 'astod cing phrag dog gi glos gzhan la smodapa dang /_gzhan dang gzhan gyis bdag yon gnas bzang por mthong du re nas bdag gis
ka ban gnyis shing rta_
kyi khyad par zab mo ma gas bzhin du rtogs so zhes michos bla ma'i rdzun gyis gzhan mgo bo bskor ba'i rigs dpa/_rgyal yol sogs dbang po che'i phyogs dadabashes par byas nas dge sbyong gzhan la 'phrog brdeg dang /_dkon cog gi sbyin bdag 'phrog cing _da[s7]
dkor la ji mi snyam par khos spyodapa da /_spong ba bsam gtan pa'i longs spyod las phra zhing phyogs nas kha ton pa'am/_klog pa dag la ster zhing chos bzhin spyodapa'i rnal 'byor 'dor du 'jug pa dang brgyad stebaslab btus las/_blo sbyangs ma byas sems

nyis rgya _
can la//stong pa nyid ni brjod pa dang /_/sas rgyas nyid la zhugs pa dang //_rdzogs pa'i bya dachub ldog pa dad//_so sor thar pa yongs spangs te//theg pa che la skyo ba dang*//slob pa'i theg pas chags la sogs//spyod par 'gyur ba min zhis 'dzin[za] rdzol dag
kyang 'dzin 'jug nga //rang gi yon tan brjod pa dang //rnyed pa dang ni pakur sti dag/_tshig bshadamyu yis gzhan smod dang //_dag ni zab mo bzod pa'o zhes//log pa nyid ni smra ba dang /dge sbyong chad pas gcod 'jug dang //dkon cog gsum gyi sbyin byed //sbyin/
nadagu

pa len par byed pa dang /_/_zhi gnas 'dor bar byed bu dang /_/yang dag 'jog pa'i longs spyod rnams//kha bton byed la sbyin pa rnams//de dag rtsa ba'i ltung ba ste//sems can dmyal ba chen po'i rgya//zhis so//de dag kyang lung du bco brgyad yong kyang a ma bcu bzhi 
gnas pa yin te/_rgyalapo'i rtsa ltung lnga pa dang /_blon po'i rtsa ltung gnyis pa tha dad pa las/_gzhan bzhi po rdzas su 'gal bo ma yin pasAso/_/deltar mi bco brgyadapo'i steng du smon 'jug gnyisAgatong ba bstan pas nye ba'i grangs su nges pa yin te_del smon pa 
gtong ba ni theg pa dman par sems bskyed nas sems can blosaM spas pa ste/_gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo las/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dad rangasas rgyas yid la byed pas gnas pa 'di byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i ltung pa [ 558]
lci ba'o//zhes dang /_de'i steng dudakon cog brtsegs pa las gsungs pa 'jug pa'i sems spangs te/_dge ba la mi sbyor ba dang nyi shu yinano/_/'jug sems spangs pa ni zla ba'i snying po'i mdo dang /_rnam pa'i snying po'i mngalang kyang lang byed du gsal lo//
yan lag gi nyes byas brgyad cu ni//bde sdug yal bar 'dor ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi bsgrub pa yal bar 'dor ba bcu drug/_de dag lasand gses brgyad nur 'gyur ba nibaslab pa kun las btus su blta bar bya'o//'dir ni bdag nyid chen pa_ mag zhabs kyi rjes

kya_
/_smon pa'i bslab bya rdzogs byad bar nges pa kho nar blang dgos kyang /_'jug pa'i bslab bya len pa po'i blo rim dang bstun nas ji tsam bsrung nus pa'i bar blangs nas2slab tu rung bar bshad cing /_de skad du bslawa btus las kyang /_bslab ba gcig

ji tshom blangasakyang skye bar bzhed pas nyams na 'chos pa'i thabs kyang rnam pa thams cad du ston pa'i phyir de'i rjes su 'brangs nas/_mdor rmi lam sdig pa mthongan yang//dem thag tu phung po gsum pas bshigs/_/rten gzhi smon sems shor dang 'gal zla [559]
byung //sprod rkyen bslab pa phul ba gsum dag las//thun tshod las nyams shor na 'gyod sems kyi/_/skya rengs mdunangu namakha'i steng po la/_/thos nus yan lag bdun pas ltung ba ldang /_/de la spyir rmi lam du sdig pa'i las byas pa mthong na yangasad dus

nyas yargyaban
[c ]pa phul ba gsum du 'du ba las/_rtsa ba'i ltung ba nyi shu po ni ltung mtshams legs par shes shing /_shas cher goms pa brtan ba rnams la dgongs kyis/_de las gzhan pa las dang po ba la sogs pas blo'i stobs jicher bskyed nas bslab blal 

goms su 'jug pa yin te/_dper na las dang po pas mdo gtang ba sogs nus pa med bzhin pa'i bslab pa bstan pa ni sangs rgyam pa'i 'dul ba thabs la mkhas pas blo'i nus pa je cherAbaskyed pa'i mthu bstan pa nyid de/_gzhan du dus 
tshod nga ma 'brel ba'i spyod pa dag kyang ltar bar bshad pas so/_/_'on kyang bsam pa'i cha nas nyams pa'i nyes migs la 'jigs pa dang bcas pa/_'gyod pa dang bcas pa/_bshags pa dang khaMcas jitsamanus pa de srid du 'bod dgos te/de ltaram 'badan 
ston pas bslab par bcas pa la phan gnod med par 'gyur ro_/del btang pa'i nyes dmigasazhi byang chub la ring zhing 'khor ba dang ngan song gi sdug bsngal mtha' mi gtugs pa myong ngo*/_/rtsa ltung gi nyes dmigs ni bslab btusalas/_dadagartsa ba'i [ 560]
ltung ba ste//sems can dmyal ba chen po'i rgyu/_/_zhes dang/_de bzhin du bslab pa phul ba la/_so thar gyi sdom pa bsrung minusan 'bul du rung b.reganang mod/_de la'ang sdom pa phul nyams tshu bzhir dpyad du yod kyang byed sngom phul na ni nyes pa shin tu
lta ba yin te/_spyir nad gzhan gyi phan bde bsgrub pa'i rgyu gcig pu chudagazon par ma zad/_dusakyang byang chub snying po'i bar dam bcas pa degang ba'i phyir/_spyod 'jug las/_bla na med pa'i bde ba la//bsam pa thag pas mgron gnyer nas//'gro ba thod 
bams byasan/bde 'gror jig 'gro 'gyur ramo/_/zhes sems can thams cad bslus pas de la bde 'gro'i rten yod pa ma yinano/_/rgyumatshan de ltar shes nas 'bad du zin kyang /_slob dpon thogs med kyis/_mi shes pa dang /_bag med pa dang /nyon [ |]

@#/_/_mongs pa mang ba dang /_ma gus pa ste lhung ba 'byung ba'i sgro bzhir bstan pa'i rgyus thunatshod de 'phags pa nye bar 'khor gyi zhus pa'i mdo las/_nye bar 'kho 'de la theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chubasems dpa' gal te snga dro'i dus

sngags spyi'i lha 'phags panamakha'i snying po la bshags par bya ste/_nyin mtshan gyi bar mchod pa'i nyin mtshan gyi bar mchod pa'i lha mtshams nas nyes lung 2chags pa kho na yid la byed cing 'gyod pa dang ldan pas/_tho rangs khar khrus dang gtsang sbra la gnas pas spos btul/

@#/_/bdun pa phul bas/_rangagi skal pa'i khyad par bas dngos sam brda'i sgo nas ltung ba las 'byin pa'i thabs ston pa yin no//gal te sa rtags ma mthong na/_tho rangs gtsang sbra dang khrus la sogs pa sngar bzhin pas/_kha shar phyogs su

nas de la stod pas rgyas 'debs pa ni lung de'i dbyings 'jalam shes te/_stong par bltas pas gan rgya 'phan pa'i gsang tshig la 'dun yodapa 'gyur ro//_de bas gnas lugs la myong ba brtan pas bshugs nyams gnyis ka med pa'i don nyamasu myong

_tshul khrims kyi sgra ni sdom pa la 'dod kyang de tshos pa'i spyod pa kho na yin pas ma khyab te/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid la gnang zhing bcas pa'i sdom pa de yang tshul khrims nyidayin no/_/de ltar yang khu ma'i lugs kyi sems bskyed ni so so thar pa'i 
[2]

rung las gcig zumatha'am bkag la/_thun yod ma yin pa ni bya dachub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims yin pas gzugs can gyi sdom pa la 'jugamernyam pa'am/_nus kyang dgos pa'i dbang gis gzhan la phan pa rgya chen po'ado([57|]

gtong mi gtong gi khyad par yod snyoman/rgyal bas gsungs bamamachig lamadud bgrolanan po 'jig pa ltar sems can mir phyi ma'i gsal ka med pa'i phyir gomadud bgrol na chun po 'jig pa ltar sems can yin no cog gi don sems bskyed ba 'jig ste/_'di lta sems can gcig pa dang /_gnyis pa dang /gnyis pa dang (ba sumab do ba'i ga_gsumab dor ba'i lhagamarnams kyi don dusems bskyed pa'ichog 
rgyal bas gsungs ba ma mchis so//de bas na sems bskyed pa'i mi mthun phyogs gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems 'jig pa'i rgyuyin par rnam 'grel las kyang /_mi mthun phyogs kyi gnod med na//sems la de bdag nyid du 'gyur//zhes bshad cing /

khyad par mchod 'os bslus pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' la zhesnang bas danaslabarjod pa'i las kyi sgrid pas byang chub sems kyi rtsa ba 'chad par ga cagakhyadanod par 'dug pa'i phyi 'o//'onamar memadzad kyis//'di ni skye ba la gzhan du dadran don du//ji skada'adab 

[8]
_/bslab pa yongs su bzung /_/_zhes bshad bsazer na'od srung chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_zhes pa la dmigs pas brjed pa ni skye ba 'di las/_gzhan gyi gnas skabs thams cad kyi thams cad du yod pa'i 
ku cana'
_phyir dang /_khyad par gzhan du 'apagi sgras 'di la ltos pa med pa'i rgyu mtshan yang ma yin la/_dngos bstan ni nag chos bzhi'i gnyen po dkar po'i chos bzhi la de ltar 'thad pa lung gis skabs dbye bar 'gyur ro//blang bya dkar chos bzhi ni/_gnyen por chab dkar 
rta[|]po'i chos bzhi ni_/srog la bab kyang bsams bzhin brdzun mi smra/_/rgyal sras rnams la skyon par gus shing bsngags//g.yo sgyu med pas sems can thams cad gter//_mtha' dag byang chub lam la dkri ba'o//zhes smos te/_dkar chos dang po brda'i 'phrod pa'i sems can[s83]
nyesashing rta nyis brgya _
yin no cog la shes bzhin pa'i spyanasrog la bab kyang misgra ste/_des yul khyad par can rdzun gyis mgo bskor ba'i gnas ma yin pa'i gnyen por yang 'gyur ro//des gzhan gsum la'ang rigs 'gre shes par bya'o//gnyis pa ni byung chub sems dpa' thadi la ston
9_pa dang mtshungs pa'i 'du shes bskyed cing /_de dag la don du gnas pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' ni ri'i sa dang rus kyis mi shes/_rmadang 'brang gis mi shes/_las dang rkyen gyis mi shes/_rtags dang cho gas mi shes pas/_gang zag la

ko nyis 

par byas la dag snang sbyong ba gnad yin par bzung ste/_bsod nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba byed ba'i _gcig byang chub sems dpa'i dang /_grogs chos mthun la bsnus shing sun phyung ba las byung ba 'di bshad kyis mi ldang do/_/gsum pa ni/_sems can thang la phan 'dod kyi lhag 
pa'i bsam pa dang ma bral bas rang gi gnyar bar bya ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pa ni g.yo dang sgyumed pas drang por spyod pa'o//bzhi pani/_rang gis smin par nasapa'isems can thams cad blo mthu chen por bskyed de sems dang bor bskyed pa la bskul nas snying thagapa 
nas rdzogs pa'i byung chub la 'god pa'i sems dang ldan bar bya ba'o//de skad du 'od srung gis zhus pas_/_'od srung /_chos bzhidang thunan/_byang chuba'i sems brjed par mi 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhen/_shes bzhin du rdzun mi smra ba dang /_byang chub sems pa'[sa]
la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_sems can la g.yo sgyu med par lhag pa'i bsam bas gnas pa dang /_sems can thad theg pachen po la yang dag par dgod pa'o/_zhes so//de ltar dkar po'i chos bzhi ni bsod nams_das pon pas/bsod smo
ma yin ba'i nag po'i chos bzhi'i gnyen por 'gyur la/_skye ba 'dir ma zad byang chub ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyayin par de nyid las/_'od sdud byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang man skye ba tha da nga sa[ a]ka[y]

/de ltar [ 585]

ཤེས་པར་བྱགོ་ཞེས་སོ།།དལར་ཡིན་པས་མན་ངག་གི་བསྒོམ་པའི་རིམ་པ་ཟབ་མོ་ཐམས་ཅད་ནས་ཀྱང་དང་པོར་སྐྱབས་སུ་འགྲོ་བ་དང་། བྱང་ཆུབ་ཏུ་སེམས་བསྐྱེད་པ་དང་།ཕྱག་དང་། ཡན་ལག་བདུན་པ་དང་།མཎྜལ་དང་། ཡི་གེ་བརྒྱབ་དང་། བླ་མ་དང་ལྷའི་རྣལ་འབྱོར་ sso
lasogs pa 'bum khrag gi mtha' brten pa'i gyisabacadapa dag bsgrub par ston pade thabs kyi cha yin la/de thams cad 'khor gsumazham par mirtog pa'i shes rab kyis zin par spyod pas thabs shes gnyis ldan yin no/_/de skad du 'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa_/

@#/_//thugs spru bstan pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyi 'bazhi gang/_smar pa zhigangazhin/[ anw]dparasridabar 'gro ba yongs su 'a[th= Rgma]nyid[was]'i 'a[ g]ba'o/[ an]sakyis med pa'i 'gro bar baspro ba nyi shayapa'o/_zhes 
rab med par yid par 'gro ba yongasu 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'chara'othugs smra ba gu 'dzin pa ni byang chub sangs ba'o
_//_zhes rnam kyis phyid pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba ni thar pa'o//[a]pas kyis ma zin pa'i ras ngas zhi 'chi ba'o//thabs kyis sminaba'ishes rab ni thar pa'o/_shes rab kyis mthun 
pa'i thabs ni 'chi ba'o//shes rab kyis zin pa'i thabs ni[a]japa'o/[ @] zhes gsus pasas na lus sa[s] rje gnyis klung du chud pa ni rnam pa thapa'i[a]chog [=& zx]pa'i myong pa nyirapalen_/_5[&w]na chenapo che'i mdo las/_de larnam pa b+hir[ 》]mchog yang ldan pa stob[ 593]
rgyud nyid gang zhe na/_gdun pa dang ma thul ba dang /_tshul khrims dang ma phrum pa dang /_zhes panam sa bkyi bar rgyas par bka' stsal zhing /_spyod pa nyid spyi gzugs thogs pa'i tshul rgyud bla ma las kyang /_yin dang tshul khrims bzodapa sogs//_ma la 
a/ ཀུན་གྱི་མཆོག་ལྡན་པ། །སྟོང་པ་ཉིད་ཀྱི་གཟུགམུ་བརྗོད། །ཅེས་སོ།།ང་ཉ་པསྤྲུབ་པའི་ལམ་མ་ནོར་བར་ངོས་པསྨས་དེ་གང་གིས་བསྒྲུབ་པར་བྱེད་པའི་གང་ཟག་འདི་བློ་སྙིགས་ཀྱིpརཔ་པགསུམ་ལ་ལྟོས་ནས་ལམ་བགྲོད་པ་མྱུར་བུལ་ན། མི་སྟབསམསུམ །
sgrubakhyed rgyal sras gsum/_/rang don ston byas 'grol sgrol 'dod pa//[p]la po lta bu'i 'dod chen sems bskyed dang //rang dang 'gro ba stobasacig sgrol 'dzob//glu ba lta bu ye shes dam pa'i semasaM//'gro ba sngon bsgril rjes la zhi 'dod kyi_na nyon 

dbo med sems bskyed de/_/rtul pos grungasamedasum culcagasum dang //'bring pos mdunang rnon pos_gsumanagrol//del khyadachub sems dpa' dbang po rtul pornams ni thog mar rang nyidasam rgyu ba'i thabs dang shes rab labatsonAbabaskyed nas phyis 'gro 
ba bsgral ba ni/_rgyal po 'dodachen pa'i sems bskyed ces bya ste/_'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal bo ni ston la rgyal sridarang gis thob par byas nas phyisamanga' ris bde ba la 'god pa'i thabs bsam pa 'phags pa byams pa lta bu'i sems bskyed do//dang dang sems 
can nyan cig tu thar bar 'dod bamanyan ba 'grul bo dang lhan cig chu'i pha rol tshor ba lta bu ma yishes dam ba'i sems bskyedaces bya ste dbang po 'bring po'o/'dod chen ma yin pa rdzi bo lta bu'i sems bskyed ni dpe med pa zhes bya ste/_skyong byed dgalaM 'phrapadaM/[ 594]
gcanagazan la sogs pas nyam nga ba'i gnas mtha' dag las pa lang dang ra lug sogs dbugs ma phyin pa de srid du bdag nyid bag phebs par mi 'gyur la/_de bzhin du byang chub tusems bskyedams bslab pa la bslabs shing rus pa rdzogs kyang /_byang chub 
sems pa'as bcu pa'i dang tshul du gnas nas 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du sangasamirgya ba ni lags pa 'jam dpal dang spyan ras gzigs lta bu ste/_khos grangs med sum curtsagasum dang /_'bring pos bdun/_rnon pos gsum gyis bla na med pa'i byang 
zutu 'tshang rgya bar dkon brtsegs las/_de la 'dodachen bzhisims bskyed bas ni grangs med sumacu rtsa gsum gyis la bor ba las thar ba yinano/_ye shes dam pa'isems bskyed bsanagras med bdun gyis tshar phyinab yinano/dpe med pa'i sems

ka_
@#/_/bskyedapas ni grangs med pa gsum gyis mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa yin no//de ci'i phyir na/sems stobs chung du dang /'bring dang /_chen por gyur pa'i phyir te/'didag dper bya na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_glu'i kha lo pha dad//
skyong byed lta bu'o//_zhisaso//de bas na bla'i nus pa ji tsam che ba de srid du srol myur ba yin pas snying stobs kyi go cha bskon par bya'o/_/de la 'di snyam du las dang po pa ni bdag tu blta ba la goms pa/_nyon mongs pa dang saMcas ti da ltar skye ba mi 'dod snyam pa'i 
zhum pa spang bar bya ste/_ci'i phyir na 'jig tshogs la blta ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung yin par bshad de bdag tu blta ba la brten nas byang chub kyi sems skye ba'i tshul/_'od srung gis zhus pa las/_dper na lung bcas 'dam rdzab chu las mipad+ma skye [595]
bden gnyis shing rta nyis brgya go brgyad yi thang lasanam yang min//de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la//rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyal ba'i chos rnams skyo//zhes dang /_rin chen phreng ba las/_ji srid phung pora'an yod pa//de srid de la par 'dzin yod/_dara'adzin de las yang las skad 
[# ]las kyang ni skye ba yin/_/ces thabs kyis zin pa'i bdag 'dzin dang nyon mongs pa ni yon tan skye ba'i rgyu yin pa 'di theg pa chen po'i khyad chos so//spyir sems stobs kyi khyad par 'dirabad pa'i dgos pa'ad/2la dang sngags kyi lam ni sngonal 
sdom pa ma bzung na bslab byamanyan du mi rung la//byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni sngon du bslab bya legs por shes nas dad cing bsgrub par nus pa'i tsho bslab pa yang dag par blang ba byas las bshad pa ltar yin pas 'dir 'jug pa'i spyod pa la blo stobs 

kyi khyad par gong nas godadu 'phel ba'i bsgrub pa chen po dang ldan pa'i don du yin te/_mdo kun las btusapar/_pharol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de bzhin gsheT pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba yin//zhes bsngags 
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro las mgyogs pa ni gzhan med do//b.rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_sa bcu lam gtogs bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tumyur bar 'jug pa'i lam gzhan med do//des sems kyi rgyun 'dag pa bzhin du rims 
dag par 'gyur ro zhes mdo sde las kyang bka' stsal to//zhes lung girgyabaskyor nas bshadado//de bas na thabs la mkhas pa dang/_snying stobs che ba dang /_smon lam gyi rang 'bras mngon du gyur pa nyid kyis gzhan don du dmigs pa rgya che ba dang /_mngon mtho [ 596]
dang nges legs grub pas don che ba rnams 'jig rten las 'das pas zad zid med pa dang /_dge ba gong du 'phel bas mi zad pa ste/_rgyan las/_rgya che ba dang zad zid med//don che ba dadami'adapa//sbyin pa la sogs thams cad kyi//_yon tan bzhi mi shes 
parabyu//zhes bshad pa la dmigs te glu ba dang /_skyong byedal bu'i sems stobs bskyed nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam bcu dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod parlabs po che labaslabs te thad mkhyonapa'i grong khyer 
du gcig car 'jug pa'i sgo de bzhin nyid dam/_

@#/_/byed par khas blangs nas ltung ba khur du bzung ste ngan 'gro'i lam la dal gyis 'gro ba ni rmongs pa dang ma rig pa'i gdon gyis btab pa yinapa'i phyir ro//de skad du'ang mgolasems can khur chen khyer ba yi/_sems dpal 
2_mchog rnams dal gyis 'gro mi mdzes//bdakaM ba zhan sna tshogs 'chid pas rab bcings pas//brtson pa brgya 'gyur gyis kyang bya bar rigs/_zhes bshad pa ltar ro//dal bag phyag gi yin pas khang byang chub kyi spyodapa rlabs powanas rdzogs pa la bskal ba

@#/_/_la bslab par bya'o//mdo las de la zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bsodanams gyi tshogs rdzogs la chos kyi sbyin pas ni ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs te 'di gnyis ni rnam pa thad du bsgrub par byed do//de la zur zing gi sbyin pa gang zhin/'di lta ste/_gtong ba dang*/
sgyu[ |]gtong ba chen po dang /_shin tu gtong ba'o//de la gtong ba zhes bya bzhi bras dang /gos dang /_glang po che gzhan la byin pa'o//zhesaso//gtong ba'i yul yang yon tan gyi zhing mi bzang po yin to/_nyon mongs pa can ni de las ldog pa yin no snyam par mi bya ste/des chos
nyid mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i gegs byed la/_khyad par dam pa'i zhing la snying rjes gtong ba'i theg pa chen po'i lugs yin pa'o//de skad du mdo las/_somasacan thadi la sems mnyam zhing snyoms la bye brag mi phyed pa'o//_kon cog gsum bdag gi [601]
yon tan gyi zhing yin gyi/_dud 'gro la sogs pa ni ma yin no snyam na byang chub sems dpa' des chos nyid mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_de bas na dkon cog gsum dang bla ma ni spyin gnas kyi zhing bzang po yin la/dud 'gro la sogs pa ni ma yin te/

srong rgyas bas[@ ]sa pa las/sbyin pa bla na med pa ni lnga ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /dge 'dun dang*/_ces smra ba dang /_nad pa dang /_pha dang ma'o/chos dang /gzhan yang 'phags pa min yang pha ma dang /nad pa dang ni chos smra dang*//_skye mtha'i byang chub sems dbal

la//yon gzhal du med par gsungs//zhes pa ltar ro/_de ltar sbyin pa'i dngos po chung na'ang rnam smin dang 'bras bu la re ba med na bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag par 'gyur lags po rgya che yang 'dod pa la'i kun slong dang 'dres na 'bras bum nges par 'byin 
skasa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa las/sems can kun la phan bde'i phyir gyi rnam smin 'bras bu'i phyir ma yin/sbyin pa dngos po byin pa chung yang //yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur/_sbyin pa dngos po mang du byas kyang //'ad pa rnam lnga dag la    
gnas nas//'phags pa dag gis phyag rgyas ma btab//_ma nges pa yi tshogs la gnas 'gyur//zhes so//gtong ba chen po ni mdo las/gtong ba chen bo zhes bya ba ni bu dang /_bu mo dang /_khyim thab byin pa'o//zhes pa ltar rgyal po thang sgrol la 'gan [ sm]

dang bcas pa bslangs pas ded de dag la yid shin tu bzhugs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas snying 'gas pa ltar du gyur na yang gtong sems las phyir phyogs pa ma yin pas 'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyis byin pa lta bu ste

@#/_/'dzin chags pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir//sems la rtog pa'i rnam pa 'didag rtogs/[\]]zhes pa ltar ro//_bya dka' ba'i gnas shin tu gtong ba ni mgo dang yan lag gtong ba ste/_mdo las/_shin tu gtong ba zhes bya ba ni bya dka' ba ste/mgo dang tshig 
dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa lasogs pa gtong ba'o//zhes pa ltar bdag cag gi ston pas spyod dbal gyi sdor gyur pa'i tsho rgod skabs chad pa'i slongapa pos sta zur man chadabaslangs pas/_shing gi bzo gnas pa mang du bsags nas sog la rnon pos rang gi rgod pa 'phrog tu bcug 
nas phyin pa dang /_rgyal po zla 'od du gyur pa'i tshe bram ze drag po'i mig la mgo bo bcadazhas byin pa dang /_saspyodanamakhar gyur pa'i tshogatong ba dang /_gtong ba chen po drang shin tu gtong ba gsum gad du blas shing /_gtong ba phyi ma'i dus rang gi lus khrag gi rba rlabs [603]
'byo zhing /_mtshon chas rig pa'i tshor ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu bzod par dka' ba'ang lo brgya phrag bcu'i bar snyed du mi zad pa'i smon lam gyis mtshams sbyar ba'i tshul yang nas yang du bsam zhing /_de skad du ba chu klung gi mdo las//chung ma rnams dang bu che rgyal srid 
[1 ]dbang phyug chen po dang /_/_sha rnams dang ni khrag dang tshil dang lus dang yig/pha rol dga' ba'i dbang du byas nas ngas zhi btang pa yin//gangagi sems can rnams la phanan pa la mchod mchog yin//_sems can rnams la gnod pa byas na nga la gnod pa byas//zhes so//_de bas na 
'di ltar bdag gi lus ni mi gtsang ba ngan skyugs kyi phung po lta bu//srog ni 'thor rlung drag po bzhin du shin tu g.yo ba de gnyis ka'ang las kyi phyi bzhin 'bang bas gzhan dbang can yin te/_rang gi rnam pa thams cad du sgedu mas bslus kyang me dang chu dang g.yangs dang*/

rgyal po dang gcan gzan dang chom rkun la sogs pas shin tum rungs par byed pa yodapas bdaganyid kyi dbang canam yin pa dang /de ltar ma gyur kyang gsal rgyal gyis zhus pa las/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang khyodaglang bo che'i byal kha 'am/rta'irgyab 'am/_shing rta la zhon te dung dang /rta dang 
rdzordu dang /_'khar rnga dang /rol mo solasnyon gyi bya brog len pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dazhani bats+tshang /_bsil yabanor bu'i yu ba can dang /rnga yab dang /_shing rta la las byas pa ni g.yob cing*/_glang po che dang /rta pa dang /_dpung bu chung du ma ni_/
bzhin 'brang /_rgyal bu dang /_bram ze bsrung ba yog pa'i blon po dang /_mdunan 'don dang /_skye bo thal mosgyur ba brgyastong du mas phyag bya zhing rgyal bar spyon cig_/rgyal bar spyon cig cesasnyan par brjod de/_phyir 'byung bamyong ba yang ring po mi thogs par g.yo ba med cing mal du shim mi bzhis [ 3 %o4]
bteg te/pha dang ma dang pa yun dang /_sring mo dang /_chung ma dang /bu pho dang bu mo dang /rten grags dang /_bran yol mo dang las byed pa dang*/_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer ba'i skye bo dag kyang mya ngan gyi dbang du song te/_lag ba bteg nas brang brdung zhing mchog tu snying 
rje bar kyi nyud bu/_kyi hud mgon po//_nyid yo bo//kyihud jo bo zhes  shing /_zham ring pa dang /_grong khyer gyi skye bo de dag gi 'jigs pa dang bcas par mthong ste/_grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor byung nas sa'i 'og tu bcug gam/_'brog dgon pa rasa'i 'og tu bcug kyang /_bya 
rog dang /_bya rgod dang /_wa la sogs pas zos shing rus padi dag mes bsregs sam/_chu la skyur ram/sa'i 'og tu bcug kyang rlung dang /nyi ma dang /_char bas phye mar byas te/_phyogs phyogs su 'thor zhing de nyid du rul bar 'gyur ro//_rgyal po chen po de ltar thams cad kyi lus kyi rang 

zakha/
_/bzhin ni 'di yin te/_'di ltar mirtag pa/_'di ltar mi brtan pa/'di ltar yid brtan mi rung ba/_'di ltararnam par 'jig pa'ichos can/_yun thung ba/_mi gnas pa/_g.yo ba/'gul_/_mthur 'jigal/_skacig pa/_mthur sgrig ba/
zad cing 'jig pa'i sgo sogasanas/_/rnam par 'jigapa'i chos canate//zhes dang /rgyal srid dang /_dbang phyug dang /_'dodapa'i khongs spyod kyi bde brnams la yang chags par mi bya'o//srog dang nad med pa'i rgyugs pas rgyags dar mi bya'o/_/zhes 
gsungs ba ltar mthar gyis des par rang dbang ma yin par 'dor dgos pa'i lus 'digazhan langs nam zhig gtod bar nus snyam pa dang /_bsam pa'i sgo nas brtang ga la yang nas yad du blo spyad par bya ste/_de ltar ma sbyangs na mos pa smin pa dang /da [1605]

[@ ]snas bsdams pa'i skyes bu'i lag pan//gcig nas gcig shos spyin par bsamaba'i sems//_yad yad spos bsatshod ma lasogs la//brkam chags 'jig pa stobs sugyur labaslab//de la thog mnas ser sna'i 'ching ba dam po dang ldan pa dga'i sngon khyim 

bdag 'juragegasacan zhig la/_rang gi lagapacig shosasusbyin pa'i dngos po dan don cung zad bzung nas cig shosasu sbyin pa'i tshul la bslab tu cug pas mthar sbyin pa rgya chen po gtong nus par byung ba bzhin dur cagakyang tshod tsam la sogs pa phra mo la thog 
mar gtod sems goms su bcugs pa phyis nas blo'i mthu de ngor 'phel bar 'gyur te spyod 'jug las/_/_tshod ma la sogasasbyin pa la'ad ka'adun pas thog mar sbyor bar mdu//de la gomasasae nas rim gyis rang gi sha yang gtod//gang tsho rang gi lus 
ལ་ན།།ཚོད་སོགས་ལྟ་བུའི་བློ་སྐྱེས་པ།།་ཆོ་ཤ་ལ་སོགས་གཏོང་བ། །དེ་ལ་དཀའ་བ་ཞིག་ཡོད།།ཅེས་དང་།གོམས་ནས་སླ་བར་མི་འགྱུར་བའི། ། དངོས་དེ་གང་ཡང་ཡོད་མ་ཡིན།།ཞེས་སོ། །དེ་བས་ན་བྱང་ཆུབ་སེམས་དཔའ་སློབ་པ་ལམ་གྱི་གནས་སྐབས་ན་སྦྱིན་་་' sos
pa'i bkangasa'i yang steng la 'jogs nas slong ba po rgyud ring po nas mthod pa 'damig gis bsuzhing dga' ba bsgom pa ltar/_sbyin gnas la 'di ni bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pardzogs par byed pa'i deg ba'i bshes gnyenan snyam du bltas 
dngos po 'di dang bdag na gdonami za bar 'bral te 'dis kyang bdag 'dor/bdagagisakyang 'di 'dor bas da lta btang na phyi ma'i dus 'gyod pas mi gdung zhing chags zhen med pas yid dga' bar 'gyur ro snyamadu sbyin pas bkamachags 'jig pa'i 
thabs la bslab par bya ste mdo sde'i rgyan las/_/donarnams gtong bar byed pa dang /rtsa ba sems la brten pa dang //lus dang longs spyod phunatshogs dang //gnyisarjes 'dzin dang rdzogs byed dang /_/de yang ser sna med ldan dang /_chos dang mi 'jigs zang zing 

/_gtong*//_sbyin pa de 'drar yongs shes nas/_/_mkhas pas yang dag sgrub par byed//ces so//_mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni/_mi 'jigs sbyin pa gzhan gyi srog bsrung dang*//'jigs pa'i yul bsgral dbuDa

[1 ]slog gi mchod sbyin rgya chen po sems par byed do//de'i tshe rgyal po de ni snying rje chen po'i gzhan dbang can yin pas yid shin tu mi bde bar gyur nas thabs bsams te smras pa/'di lta zhings rnamasazhi than bsam sa par byas shing /'dzum bu'i gling gi rtsa 
dang shing gel pa dang chu klung rnams kyang med par 'gyur na/_char ba'i slad du mchod sbyin gzhan pasani nyam chung gi rang gi mda' ga gang yin nas skyes bu yid gcugs pa brgya phrag bcu'isrog gi mchod sbyin gyi sta gon tshoms shigaces blon po

gtong ba dang /_thabs lamakhas pa dang /bdag nyid kyi zho shi las su 'khol bar byasazhas gzhan la mi 'jigs pa'i gnas sbyin pa la nan tan chen pos bslab par bya'o/_de ltar slob pa'i tsho'ang de ltar sgrub pa'i mdzod/minus bzhin du babacolatsho ga yi/_/rnam par sbyar

gyis zhus pa las/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa la gnas pa nyid gyis gtong ba dang /_gtong ba chen podang gtong bachen po dang rab tu gab/rab tu gtong ba dag kyang bya'o//zhes gsungs so//de bas na da lta mos pa stobs sum gyur la/_las dang po pa'i semasarma'i sha 'u ltar sran mi

_gyur nas dgo ba'i bshes gnyenadu gyur par yongasamu bskul bar bya'o
las/_dachub sems dpa' las dang po ba de ni thog ma nyid du ka thog ma nyid du kha ton la bskul bar bya'o//mang du thosanas dben par gnasab la bskal bar 
bdazhaganyis shing rta sum brgya bdun

[\[ |]gnyen gyis gdams pa dang /_bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab dang /_

dang /de bzhin gshegasapa'i bka' la mos pas theg pachen po'i sdesnodaklog pa la brtson pas gzhan phan chen por 'gyur bani/_gang gisamado sde 'di bklagasasam drananam/_kha ton byed dam/_yi ger 'bri ba dang 'dir 'jug pa de'i rnam par 
smon pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab bo//zhes pas spyir mtshon la khyad par slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdo sde zhal 'don mdzadab gdungaphrag gi phugaron gyis thos pas las bsrabasatitsho 'phos nas slobam dbus paslob yon blo gros brtan par gyur 
pa dang /gzhan yang byams pa dang snying rje mchog la gnas pas gsung rab 'don pal/namakha' nas lha rnamasakyang nyan pa'i lo rgyus yod pa'o//de bzhin du ldanAtshad byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa dag gis bzhugs pa'i gnas su 'ang gzhi bag [64]
la sogs pa rgyud 'jam par gyur pas gnas der bkra shis pa'i yon tan tshang ba yin la/_de'ang des dngos su chos bshad pa yod dmamed kyang rung ste/chos kyitshig don zab mo kha ton dang /_than chu gtor tsam gyi rjes kyi bya ba la 'dachos kyi sbyin pa/
de bas na sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa bsal ba la dmigs shing byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas g.yung rad zabamo 'don cing chos kyismin pa la dmigs pasu 
yodapa des de'i rgyud 'jam zhing des par gyur pa yin no//

[1:| ]@#/_/than sgrung rgyud dang /chos kyi phyogs mumos par 'gyur ba'i gtam dang /dge sdig dang las 'bras kyi chos su gtogs pa cung zad tsamakyi gleng mos kyang da lta bstan pa migs pa'i dusan gzhan la phan pa chen por gyur ba yin 
no//de nas rang gi rgyud grol ba dang gzhan la chos kyi phan gdags pa ni sbyin pa'i gtso bo yin te/zang zing la sogs pas gnas skabs kyi sdug bsngal las dbugs phyud pa tsam las med pa'i phyir ro//_de bas na gdul bya'i blo tshod dang bstun 
sgo nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod thunamong   ston pan 'bring po ste/_de'ang yang byed sdom pa'i tshul khrims/_rnam mkhyen gyi chos la mos shing gzhan gyi gshe pa bzod pa'i bzod [su5]
pa/_gong 'phel du 'dun pa'i brtson 'grus/_thog dman dang ma 'dres pa'i semasakyi dge ba rdzogs byang du bsngo ba'i bsam gtan/_chos nyid stong par shes pa'i shes rab ste phar phyin drug ldan du bya ba brgyad stong 'grel chen gyis bshad do/_/
[g| ]blo mchogarnams nan mkha' ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la 'god pa drungasam thag pa'i lung de nyid kyis gsal bar bstan to//de'ang byang chub sems dpa' khyimapasan gtso bor zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa gnyeral/
rab tu byung nasani chos kyi sbyin pa byabar byang chub sems pa'i so so tharapa las/_shAri'i bu/byang chub sems 'khyim bgang gis sangs rgyas kAng+gA'i klung gi khyim snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs mu bkang ste/_de bzhin gshigs pa gra btso 

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i mangs rgyas rnams la dbul ba phul ba las/_shA ri'i bu rab tu byung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang gis tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zhig bstan na 'di ni dbas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed de/_/
ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni rab tu byung bas zang zing gi sbyin pa bya bar ma gnang ngo*//zhes so//de'i dgongs pa ni/_zang zing ni phal cher khyim pa dang 'brel pa las 'byung sla ste/_de bas na rab tu byung ba dag gis tshul khrims la rma byang chos btsal zhing2
bsags pa'i dngos pos sbyin pa byas nas 'dzin pa'i nyes dmigamal cang mi bsam pa 'gog pa'i slad du ste/_gzhan du na sngon gyi sbyin 'bras kyi mthus rang bzhin du chud pa la gtong pa'i phan yon bkaganas sbyin par ma gsungs yin te/mgon pog [sis]
sgrubakyis dge 'dun mang po la 'tsho ba sbyar ba dang /_slob dpon dpa' bos sngon gyi bsod nams kyi stobs las nyin rer bsod snyoms rgyu chen po rnyed pas dge 'dun thams cad la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa bzhin no//_khyim pa'i phyogs byang chub sems 
dpa' blo gros chen po dang ldan pa dag la'i chosakyi sbyin pa bkag pa yang med de/_li tsa blo dri mamed par grags pa'i khyiman ngo mtshar ba'i gnas brgyad dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i tshos kyi 'khor lo'i gtamatshatshe 'bra_sa dang nga 
de ltar min pa'i pharol tu phyin pa de thad kyang dmapa drug ldan du bya bar phar phyin bsdus pa las gsus pa'i don ni/_kun slong byang chub kyi sems la brten pa ni rten dam pa dang*/_sbyin pa spyi dang bye brag pa'i khyad bar gang la 'jug kyang de'i bsam pa ma dor 

@#_/_/pa'i dngos po dam pa dang /_sems can thams cad la 'phral du bdeb dang yun du phan pa'i phyir gtong ba ni ched du bya ba dam padang /_rnamapar mirtog pa'i ye shes kyis zin pa ni thabs lamakhas pa dam pa dang /_gtong 
ba'i dge ba rdzogs byang du bsngo ba'i bsngo ba dam pas zin pa dang /_nyon shes kyi sgrib pa gnyis 'gogapa'i rnam par dag pa dam pas zin pa'o//dam pa ma yin pa'i bsam pa la ni byi dor bya ste/_sbyin pa la 'bras bu med do snyam pa'i lta ba ngan 
kabaden gnyis shidirta mumabargya_
gnod 'tsho'ang chos su 'gyur ro snyamanas sems can gyi srog la sogs par 'tsho zhing g.yo sgyus phyogs bslad pa'i sems tshod lasogasapas 'gro ba gzhan dag phyogs su ring ba'i 'gro ldogo la khur gyis dub par byas pa'i dngos pos [kr]
[? ]pa dang /
sbyin pa byed pa ni 'tshe ba chos su smra ba kla klo'i grub mtha' dang mtshungs la/_gzhan yang dgemachan dang bkra shis dang sbyar te sbyin pa dang /_khengs pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa dang /_gzhan dang 'gran pa'i phyir sbyin ya dang*/_slong ba la brnyas bzhin du sbyin pa 
dang /bdag ni gtong phod can yin rgyu gzhan ni de ltar ma yin no snyam pa'i rlomasems kyis byin pa dang /_sbyin pardzegs patsam gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chags bral du 'gyur ro snyam pa lasogs rtemadoranam dag pa'i sbyin pa sum cu 
dgu 
rtsa drug tu gsungs pa mtha' dag yi ge'i khur gyi 'jigs kyis/rang la gtod yod cung zad yod pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan par rlom pasagazhan 'jungs bdang /_spyod pa lhod pa dag lasun 'byin par byedapa dang /_'dis lhagamarnams la'ang mtshon to gzhan 

la khong khro ba bskyed pas dmyal bar 'gro ba'i tshul las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i mdo lasakyang /_so so skye bo rnams sbyin pa gtong pa'i tsho ser sna can rnams la mi dad bar byed cing /_des kyang khong khro ba bskyed nas dmyal par 'gro bas sbyin pa la sgrib pa dang /_tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshe 
yang tshul 'chalalamisnyan par smra bas skye bo mang po mi dad par byed cing ma dad pa des ngan 'gror ltung ba dang /_bzod pasogs la gnas nas de dag gi mi mthun phyogs la gnas pa lami bldags pa brjod pa'i tshul khrims la mgos la sgrig pa'o//zhes so//de bsamagon po klu'i dbang bos//bag la phun sum
ཚོགས་ཡོད་ཀྱང་།།གཞན་ལ་བརྙས་པར་མི་བྱ་སྟེ།[ཞུན་མར་ལྟ་བུའི་སེམས་ཀྱིསཨུ།།ཡོན་ཏན་མཐའ་དག་ཁོང་དུ་སྦྱ།།ཞེས་གསུངས་པའང་ཁོང་དུ་ཆུད་པར་བྱའོ།།གཞན་ཡང་བྱང་ཆུབ་སེམས་དཔའི་སྦྱིན་པ་ནི་ལོངས་སྤྱོད་ཐོབ་པའི་མོདལ་སློང་བ་པོ་ཐུག་ཕྲད་ལ་སྟེར་བ་ཡིན་ཏེ་མང་པོ་བསགས་ནས་དུས་གཅིག་ཏུ་ sla
gtong ba ni rlomasems dang gzhan dring 'jog pa'i rgyur ma zad de'i ri la ser sna la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dang*/_bsrung ba dang /_spel ba'i kun tu rtog pas dge ba'i bya ba mang por bar du gcodacing /_bar skabs su brlag par gyur nam smyon pa'i las kyi mtha'ami 'grub pa'ang 
yod do/_/mdor na myur por mi ster ba dang drin bgrang ba sogs pha rol po'i sems sun phyung ba ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i phan yon ni/bden pa po'i le 'ur/_rim gror bgyis te bstsal bsazhi gnyen la sogs pas rim gro bgyid par 'gyur/_lag bdar te bstsal 
bas ni rim gro thob par 'gyur/_dus su bstsal bas na don rnams dus su 'grub par 'gyur/_gzhan la mi gnod par bstsal bas na longs spyod brtan pa dag 'thob par 'gyur/_mi bde ba bzod pas bstsal pas ni 'khorasnying nye bar 'gyur/_zhesaso//gzhan 

/_yang skye bo ser sna'i drim can dag gi nyes pa de bsal ba'i phyir rang gis thabs la mkhas pa'i ngag 'jam po dang /_zang zing khyad cud zad byin nas ngesbyin pa la bskul ba dang /_yo byad med pa rnams la sbyin pa'i rgyu sbyin nam dkon 
chog la sbyin pa byed du 'jug cing*/_rang la'ang yo byad med na khan ma tho ba med pa'i bzodapa rang nyid kyi logs bsgrubs pa'i lasakyi gnas du mas nor bsgrubs te sbyin pa'i las lo 'jug cing*/gzhan sbyin pa gtong ba'i gags su 'gyur bami byed/

spong dge sgrub tu 'gyur ba dang /_'phral du bde bar mi 'gyur yang phugs su phanapa'i rgyu gang yin pa byang sems kyis sbyin par bya ba'o//_gang zhig btang ba des 'phral du bde ba bskyed khyad phugs su gnod par 'gyur ba dang*/_'phral phugs gnyisaka gdung

[\[ ]mi rung pa'i rdzas dang /_zas skom gyi lhagam ster ba la sogs pa'o//de bzhin du snying rje'i bsam pa duganas lus srog ster ba'i dus su bab kyang /_dgosapa phun tshogs kyi phyir du chen po yan lag lta bu mi btang ba dang /_rang ngogs spyin pa'i snying stobs 
rdzogs kyang gzhan ngos nas lus ma btang ba nyid sems canamang po'i don 'grub pa'i dgos pa che ba dang /_bdud ris kyi lha dang /_des 'jug pa byas pa'i semasacan mi bsun pas mtho ba tsomasanaMs bslang budang /_smyon pa dang sems 'khrugs parnams

byas pa mi gzopa dang /dam bca' brjod par 'gyur bzhams la bu dang /_chung mdang /bran la sogs pa ster ba dang /_nadabu can la bza' btung mi 'phrod pa dang /_mu stegs can klanag 'tshol ba dang chos lugs la gus pa ma yin kyang zhor du 'du shes nas

pa byedapa'i tshul snga ma las//zang zing sogs sbyin yid dang ba gzhan gnod bzod cingan grogs btson/[jg]'phrul blang dor rnam 'byed pa//gzhan gyi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs byed//ces so//spyir b.rol tu phyin pa'i sgra don yang /_'jig rten pa dang nyan rang gi dge

yin pas phyogs kyi glang pos//shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis med//_ye shes de nid bzhin gshegs/_/bslab bya de don skyo nga ba yis/_gan dad lam la de'i sgras brtags//zhesapa ltar ro//de lta bu'i phyin drug re 'dusbyin pa lasogs gatshon drug tu dbya ba'i tshul/_mngonartogs [ |]

[हमने]
_gzugs kyi sku ni mdor bsdu na//bsod namasatshogs las 'khrungs pa ste//chos kyi skuzhimador bsdun//rgyalabo ye shusatshogs las 'khrungs//zhes so/_/de ltar dag ba'i chos spud pa'i tshul khrimasa'i yarol tu phyin pa gaka'i ngo bor gnas bas

la brjod byayad kun tu 'dres par 'byung la/_kun kyang rang rgyud lam skyes pa bskyed cing //_skyes zin nyams pa med par gong nas gong du 'phel bar byed pa'o//gsumapasems canadon byed kyi tshul khrimasazhi//dngos sam brgyud nasagazhan gyi donalarnamapa _ 
thams cad du 'jug pa'i sems mtshungs ldan dang btsas ba ni'i ngo bo yin no//da yang 'di ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yongs sum brtan na bslab par bya ba'i don gang yin pa bsgrub par minus pasan _pad+ma spungs pa las kyang /_sbyinapa'i g.yab 
chos legs bos to//zhes sogs sngar drangs pa ltar ro//de la thogamar zang zing gi sbyin pasasems can rnams legs par bsdus nas snyan par smra ba'i gtam gyis de dag gi yid drung zhing dam pa'i chos bsgrub pa langon gnyer gyi mos pa dang /[ 629]
'dun pa dang /_spro ba bskyedapu bcuganas gdul bya rang rang gi blo dang 'tsham pa'i chos kyi don la spyod du 'jug pa ste/_'diltar theg pa dman pa lamasapa dgazhir zhig de dang mthun pa'i chosakyisarjesasu bzungs rimagyo kha drung bar bya zhing /mchog tu zab pa 
dang rgya che ba la mos pa dag ni spyod pa dusatshod dang 'brel ba'i thabs kyis gdul ba la mkhas par bya ste/_slob dpon zhi ba lhas//dman lamachogagis mi bstan// chen chos kyi snod gyur ba/_/_man pa'i chos la sbyar mi bya//zhes so/_/de ltar gzhan dag thabs gang 
gyis lam la 'dzad pa'i don mthun pa la bdag nyid khyad gnas dgos te/rang gisam bsgrubs na gzhan 'jug ldog gi lamasrol la bcug kyang nyan du mi 'ong ba mthong chos la gnas pa'i phyir ro//de la sbyin pasazhi gnas skabs kyi bzhapa 'ang bsgrub la snyanapar smra

ka bden gnyis shing rta sumaca_can don byed tshe tshul khrims yin yang byangs las gzhan don byed tshul rnam pa bcu gnyis su bsdus pa'i tshul 'og tu dpe la nyan nas 'chad par 'gyur lo/_de ltar byang chub sems pa'i tshulakhrims gsumapo'i ngo bo zhi zhacog btsugs po las/_de la sdom

spang pa bdun bsdus [SIShaza]

bslab bya basmon pa'i tshul gyis 'phagasachos su bsgrub pa ste/_'di ltar so so thar pa ni rang rgyud kyi las spyod sdomapas gzhan gnod gzhibacas las ldog pa tsam gyi sdom pa'i tshul khrims la brtenano//byang chub sems pa'ani gzhan la mi'achi pa'i smad

zla_@#/_/_pa las ni gzhan don du gyur kyang bcas pa dang 'dral bar ma gnang la//byang chub srems dpa' ni gzhan don du 'gyur bar dang /_'gyur bar rig pa dang*//_rang gi dag ba de las gya nom pa la bar du mi gcod kyi steng du sems kyi 'phen pa'i 
stobs kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i gnasaskabs gsum brtags nas gnang ba'i skabs yod de//dbeg ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa las/_gang dag bdag gi don la blta bcung zad tsam yang mad la/_byed pa gzhan gyi don 'ba' zhig 'dod cing thams cad du snying 
sgyurje dang ldan pa dag la_/_yid kyi nyes par spyod pa gsumam gtogs pa 'am log par blta ba nyidam gtogs pa dag la lar rjes su gnang ba snang te/_de la byang chubasems dpa'i sdom pa gtan la phab pa'i gtsug lag dag la blta'o//zhes 'byung lo//de ni kun slang [ 63|]
gnyis po 'ang dang por skyed byed kyi rtsa ba la rig pa'i dpyad pa rnon pos brtags par zad de ngo bo phan sems rgyunachags dang 'brel dgos pas yid kyi las lams la byung nas de gnyis kyang gnang ba'i skabs yin par bsdu'o//la la 'di dag la dpagasas_ma 
cha_pal dad pa log nas kun tu rgyu'i nang du zhugs pa'i tsho ltung ba glongs pas med par gsungs pa lta bu dper sbyor ba ni rig pa ma yin gyi/_bcas pa'i tshul khrims yig dang rna ba'i rjes su 'brang bas lus ngag gi sgo nas log lta skyes par bstan yang /_ma bcas pa'i 
ba:_tshul khrims yid kyi shis par bya ba'i sgowis de dag gdul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa nyid du zhugs pa'i phyir dang /_log par blta ba med pas par dang bar du dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan brjod par gsungs pa yin no//log par blta ba nyid ni kun slong ngan pas 

bskyed cing rnam pa thams dpa yin pas gnang ba'i skabs med par rig par bya'o//_lus ngag gi las ji ltar gnang na/_'di ltar las byed pa po dngamyong ba po gnyisaka'i rgyu 'bras la snying rje chen po'i rtsis zin pa gzhir bzhag nas mang po'i srog skyob pa'i phyir gshed ma'i srog 
'brog pa lta bu ste/dper na mi nagamadung thung can gyi tshong pa la brgya'i srog 'phrog pa shes nas/ded dpon snying rje chen pos sreg tacan las kyirnamasmin las thar ba dang /_tshodi pa rnams srog gi 'jigs pa las grol ba'i sems bskyed nasami nag mdung thung can bsad pa dang /
'byor yang ser snas mi sbyin pa dang /_bkres pas srog la thug pa gnyis ka'i don du sems bskyed nas phyug po las brkus te dbul po la ster blta bu dang /_byamaze'i khye'u skar ma la dga' bas lo grangs brgyad khri nyis stong nags khrod du tshangs par spyad pa'i mthar grong khyer[ls32]
dbasod snyoms la byon pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo de la chags te 'dod pas gdungs nas skabs de nyid du 'chi bar brtsam pa las ldog pa'i slad du tshangs spyod btang bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes pa dang /_gsod nges pa srog las thar bar bya ba'i phyir brda' sprad cing /

@#/_/_da ni shi gyur kyang //_mtshams med sbyor bam yin no//zhes dang //de phyir bsam pa'i khu ba la//bsod nams sdig pa rnam par gnas//zhes dang*/_bzhi brgya bar//bsam ba byang chub sems dpa' yi/ngag 'am yang na mi dge ba//thams cad dag

@#/[ \] ]kyi bar du rjesasu 'jug pa dang /sdom pa 'di ni 'dod chags las byung ba'i/_ltung ba la ltung bar nga mi smra'o//zhes pa dang rjes su mthun par 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mtshan nyidamadapar gtan la dbab pa'i tshul mdong nyid lasargya cher gsungs 
lha[, ]shangs so thar ba ltar spongasems mi ston no/_/spyir so so thar pa zhes bya ba'i sgra bshadunaso so thar pas na rgyu la 'bres bu'i ming du chags pa'i so so tharapaste/_legs pa'i lam bstan pa las/_lam 'di saMsaM bar pang 'gro bsanasos paste/_dper na 
blogrong khyer du 'gro ba'i lam la grong khyer gyi lamazhes bya ba dang 'dra'o//_yang na sdig pa las moso thar bas na saMsir thapa'am sdom pa zhes bya ba la slob par byed pas na dgacing grol bar byed pa yin pa'am bsodanams phun sum tshogs pa la lhag par [\[639]

dang /thunamo ma yin pa'i [) ]thunamod bzhi dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa'am/_yang narab tu byung ba'i so so thar pa'i sdom pabasnyen par rdzogs pa'o/thun mong ma yin pa sems can thamasacadalasemasamanyam pa'isoms dang /gnodapamed pa'i sems dang /'khon du [ 640]
'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims bsrung ba'o/_/srid pa'i rnamaparasmin pa thams cad lami blta bar bsung ngo*//zhes gsungs pas gsal lo//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyiman gan shi sos thar pa'i rtags dang chog mabyas pa'ang rab tubyung 
ba'i bslab pa laganas pa'i yod da drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyiman gnas pa/_khyiman gnas pa'i nyes pa la mkhas par bya'o//khyimazhes byab ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'joms par byedapa/'byung bsun 'byin pa 
dge ba'i sdong po 'gyel bar byed pa ste/de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o//khyiman gnas pa zhes bya ba ni nyonams thams cad kyi gnasami dge ba'i ba lamangon par rtog ba rnamasakyigs/_byis pasoso'i skye bomajul baspusaparnams kyi gnas mi dgopaspyod parnams kyi

zla@#/_/_gnas/_skye bo ngan pa 'dus pa yin te de'i phyir khyiman gnas pa zhesabya'o//zhes dang /_khyim zhes bya ba 'dazhi bsadapang /bcing ba dang /brdeg pa dang /sdigs pa dang /_gtso ba dang /_mi snyan pa dang /_gshe ba drang /_ngan du brjed pa dang /_ngan du bya

[I]khrims dag par byadapal bsnyenapar rdzogs nas lo bcu phrag dang /_ldaphrug bdamachad du brtan mkhas kyi yon tan gnyis dang ldan par ma gyur par rang gi mkhan po yod na dang /_med na bla mAr 'osapa'i dge slong zhig la gnas 'cha' ba'i cho ga byas nas/ka ka las//_bla ma 
dag gi mduzhu dgatu//mchil lham skyugs pa mi 'dor zhing //sashing khri bar mi bya ste_/brtul zhugam dun gyi snyana'adug min/_/mdun du bcug par mi bya zhing /_gos gcig dag kyang bsgomi bya//zhes pa la sogs pa ltar mkhan po dang mnyam par brten nas bya ba 
thams cad dang nyams su mi gtong bar de la zhus nas bya dgos pa yinato bshas spring las kyang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten patshongs par spyod/_/_yongs su rdzogs par thub pas gsungs de'i phyir//_zhes pa ltar ro//de la ji ltar bsrub pa'i ngos bono//[ 652]

@#/_/bzhin du rin thad tshadaba'i dngos po dgu ba dang mi_mi_sabar spyod pa dang*/mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzun te rma 'bazhil gzhi bsam sbyor bamathar thug gi[ux]lag tshongan[4]ma pa ces bya stephrimasa'_ladu gyur pa yin no//de[u]nga 'cha'amedazhigaso ba rung zhing /_/
kabaden gnyas sharot+tA_
'chab btsas so b.ramarung bsob rangasa'i 'dodapa nyid kyang /_'od ldan las/migasolasogs gzhirnams kyis/dgetsholasaninyams gyur na//dge slong bzhin du dge tshul yang da phyinasasdomaskye'i skal pa med//ces dpagargyatshor 'grel las/_rtsa ba bzhil

bdun/_gnod pa las gyur pa gnyis/bsgo ba las gyur pa bzhi ste bcu gsum las/_dang po 'byin lhagaman[) ]gleng gzhi mnyan yod du 'char ka la bcas te/_bgrod bya'i yul lam gsumam yin pa'i rang ngam gzhan gyi yan lag gi gnamasu 'dod pa'i bad ba nyams su

nang nas bdag dang 'dod pa bstan panimachog go zhes rang gis smras pa 'am/_pha rol po smras pa dang du blangs kyang rung ste/phan tshun go brda' 'phrod pa'o//lnga pa smyan byed pa ni/_mnyan yod du drug sde la bcas te/_rang las gzhan pa'i ye mi sprod du rung ba phan tshun reg pa

pa:_ka la 'drab/_dung gi sgra la khyi'i spyodapa can/_rtag tu rdzun smra zhing bden pa'i tshig medapa/_ser sna dang*/_phrag dog dang /_gtamug dang*/_nga rgyal gyis zin te/_las kyi mchog dam pa gsum las ring ba/_khe dang*/_bkur sti dang grags pa la zhen pa /_yul

gnas pa dang /_bshol gyi zla ba dang bcas te'o/_/zhes so//_yang dge slob ma'i sdom pa 'dod pa bsten pa khas blangs pas gtong te/_de skad du/bsten pa'i phyiragazhan la khas blangs pa na bslab pa 'khrug pa nyid do//zhes so/_/_sde pa so so'i dbang du byas na/_gos_/
dmar ba'i sde pa lung gi dmachosazhub pas gtong ste/_bslab pa'i mtshamasarnam par bzhag pa med pa'i phyir/_zhes 'dod pa dang /_mdo sde ba rtsa lang 'chab bcas byung bas gtang ste/_rgyud ngo tsha dang khrel medachen pos nyams pa'i phyir/_zhes 'dod pa dang /_khachubye

bzhibazhis 'dod de/[ Q]tshul yang*/_khaMche rnams ni byung ba la/_/_bu lon nor bzhin gnyis su 'dod//zhes ltung ba thams cad ga'i bsam sbyor ba mthar thug rgyu tshogs tha dad pa'i phyir/_dang por sdom pa skye ba'i tshe yang sdom rdzas gcig nas bdun pa'i bar dngos 
su skye ba dang grangs mtshungasapa'i 'byung ba bzhitshand skyed 'byung bas nyer len gyi rgyu byas/_mthun pa'i skyon mkhan slob la sogs pa'i byed rgyu dang skal mnyam lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu'i tshul gyis rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs can du skye ba'i dag 'bram spong ba

'bags byed kyi rnam bzhag med pas gsar du skye ba med kyang /sdom pa sngaruyodagatong ba'i rgyu med de/de'i rgyud kyi rtogs pa'i dam chos ma nus pa'i phyir ro//daskad du thogs med sku mched kyis/_lung chos nub pa tsam gyis sdom pa sngar yod mi gtong

ka 'danaganyis sum brgyas dgu
/zin kyang /_de lta mod kyi dgos pa med pa nyid du 'gyur te/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /_longs spyod pa med pa'i phyir dang /sdom pa yang dag par blangs pani rnam par grol pa'i ched yin la/_desarnam par grol ba thag ri 
zhis pa'i sa ma 'baa ra bar tshor bas gzi ri nas sems rnal du mi phabs pa'i gzhan dbang 
des na de'i sdom pa rim bda' 'o_'on kyang dang po'i las can bsam pa rang bzhin du mi gnas pa dang 
da byas pa'i phyir/_zhes pa'i rjes su 'brus nas b.rapa'i don la 'jug go_/

du gyur nas bsgrub par mi nus pa la sde lnga'i dngos bzhi ji lta ba bzhin mi bskyed de/_nyams pa dang ma chags po gnyis ltadapa la sbyoran nyes byas so//zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro//de bas na 'dir ni bar pa'i don dang 'brel ba ste/_'chab bcas kyis    

gtong yang /_'chab mad gsor rung ba nyid yin no//de la phyir bcos pa'i tshulan/_mi spro bzhin tshur gyis bcos pa dang /_spyobamathol bshags kyis bcos pa'i tshul gnyisas/_dang po ni/_sdigs pa dang /_dadapa dang /_bskrad pa dang /_phyir 'gyed pa ste bzhi/_gso _/
dgag bzhag pa gnyis te drug_/_ma mthong ba gnasanas dbyung ba/_phyir mi 'chos pa/_sdig lta can/'thabakrol byed pa/_'thabakrol gyi rgyu bar bsgrub pa/dge slong ma dang 'dris shing gnas pa/_chosarnam par gtan 'bu pas zhi par ma bas pa ste gnas dbyung 
བདུན་པོ་གཅིག་ཏུ་བྱས་པ་སྤམའི་དྲུག་པོ་ལ་བསྲེས་པསནན་ཏུར་བདུན་ཞེས་བྱ་སྟེ། འོག་ཏུ་གཞུག་ཅིང་གཤུང་བའི་དོན་ཏེ།།དེ་ཡང་དགེ་འདུན་བྱ་འགྱུར་གྱི་དགག་བྱ་མེདཔ་དང་། བྱེད་པ་པོ་མཚན་ཉིད་དང་ལྡན་པ་དང་། དབྱར་གྱིནང་མ་ཡིན་པ་དང་། གློང་དྲན་དང་། kr

@#/_/tog gnyisaso/_/_phung po dbyung ba'i don du ni rtog med pas byi ba'o//gnod pa bzlog pa'i don du ni ma nges pa ste de'ang rgyud re re la 'jug thengs so lnga 'am/_so drug re 'dod pa'i phyogs gnyis kyi gcig pa nas bco brgyad par je che dang /_bcu dgu

tshu rgyal po gang cho yul 'khor du/_/_gan+d+haM don grags gyur pa/_/der na6la dang grags pa dang /_/'dod pa dang ni lo legs 'gyur/_/zhes pa la sogs dang /_/dus bzhi dag tu thos pa'i/_/de rnams byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/_gang zhig snying nas yi rang ba/_/_de ni gro [683]
'gyur the tshom med//ces pa la sogs pa'i phan yon dang*/_rgyu tshad dang b.rung lugasatshul ma yin pas yul 'khor la 'tsho ba dang /_dge 'dun mi mthun pa dang /_ma bsdams bar 'gyur ba'i nyes dmigs kyang de nyid las gsungasaso//de nas dgu 'dun/
rnams 'dus nas/_las grul du lhung ba drananam/_yid gnyis su gyur na dung na mo la byin gyis brlabs/_rgyud dag par byed pa'i tshul glo nas ma yin par tsog pur 'dug ste/_ltung ba byin brlabs la thugs gnyad par zhu zhes nyams sad nas btsun pa dgongs /
lcusu gsol/_dang dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcu bzhi ba 'am/_bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i yang gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa'am bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu

brjod/_the tshom za ba la/_sang nang par zhes pa'i rkang pa gcig po'i dod du/_sang nad par dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te/_dogs pa dang yidaganyis bsal nas ltung bdachos bzhin du slar bgyi'o//_zhes brjod/

@#/_/_/dbus/_/_sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rol rtsedamathu/_/kun gyis khyod la btud cing grags pa yi/_/_skye dgu'i rnam shes mig dang rna bar rdzogs/_/'dod sred zhags pas gzhan dbang ma gyur bzhin/_/_yab gcig dgyes slad btsun mo'i sgra 
lcam la/_/_sgyu ma'i lta bas bltas na so rgyal po'i khab//bskyangs pas don kun grub pa la phyag 'tshal/_/_shin tu g.yo zhing 'jig pa rgyal srid kyi/_/_lcags kyu'i dbang du ma gyur 'ga' med kyang /_/nges par 'byung ba'i rkyen bzhis khyod kyi thugs/_/_phrogs nas ring 
tshabyung dge slong nyid du bstan/_/_brtson 'grus rlabs kyis mi dala'i rany+dzam/_/dka' thub gdung ba brjod pa'i snying stobs dang /_/kun rtog 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i bsam gtan la/_/phyogs bcu'i bde gshigs dgyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/grangs med [_ 685]
6_gsum gyi srid du rnam rig kun/_/tshogs gnyis tha gus bcings pa don yod phyir/_/byang chub shing drung bdud rnams skrag byas nas/_/_mngon par rdzogasasangs rgya brgyalakun gshis/_/'khor ba gtadematha' med pa'i g.yangs la/_/rgyug pa'i 'gro ba 'khor

par gyur pa'i 'gro ba rnams/_/dkar po'i chos rab 'phel ba'i tshong zong ni//'dzad pa med pa'i ring bsrel chabargyad du bzhag ste chos kyi dbyings su gzims pa ltar/_/bdag kyang rdzogs smin sbyangs gsum mthar phyin nas/_/_khams

nas/_3_rgyag skad du/_shrIl saM yut+ta sU tra/_bod skad du/_tshul khrims yang dag bar ldan pa'i mdo/_/thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'diskad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal bu [ 686]

bdenaganyis shing rta sum brgya zhe bzhi mgu lan la gnod med gzhan ci smos/_/_tshul khrims ldan pa'i dge slong 'od dang lhan/_/tshul khrims ldan pa grags 'gyur bde ba thob/_/_ji ltar mig med gzugs mthong mi rung ltar/_/_de bzhin tshul khrims med na chos mi mthong //ji

[# ]jal bas chos kun gtugs/_/dang po tshul khrims med par gyur pa de_/phyis nas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob snyam mam/_/_sna mod sna rdum la sogs gang yin pa/_/de la me long dag na dgos mi 'gyur/_/rna bas ma thos mig sngar 

mamathong yang*//bstan srung mi de mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/thos mang thos ldan thos bsrung mtho ris nyid/_/_bud med bsten du ga la rung /_/rgyal po'i pho brangag la dga'/_/_lba ba snying po ga la yod/_/budamedadag la rung ba med//rgyal srid 
dag la jaga' bam_/_wA ba dag la snying bo med//_longs spyod dag la rtag pa med/_/_longs spyod dragani 'bab chu bzhin/_/_gru tsa'adra bar khyim pa 'dra/_/_ma rtog ci 'drar gzugs de bzhin/_/sroganA chubur 'du ba yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_nyo ba 'khor la sogs pa'i dge slong de dag yi ras te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/dus gsum gshags pa'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/bsngo ba gang la sogs kyis bsngo bar bya'o/_/[ 688]
de nas spyi bshags dang /_mthong sdom dri ba byas la/_dag tshul gyi gso sbyong ni/_dge slong rgyud bzang po la phyag gsum btsal nas/_gso sbyong la thugs gtad par zhu/_zhes brjod nas dge slong ra re'i mdun du gsum gsum man chad 'dug 
sde gnas brtan dgos su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong pachu bzhi pa'am bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dag tshul ming 'di zhes bya ba'i yang gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa'am bco lnga lags na/_bdag dge rtsol ming 'dri zhes bgyi ba'i bar 
da kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes bdag mchi'o/_/bdag yongs su dag par gnas brtan sogs kyis gzung du gsol/_zhes gsum brjod nas/_thabs legs bya'o//de ltar yosadag blangs nas dag tshul rnams las 

[， ]/_mi thos pa'i sar logs su bkar nas/_mdo 'don pa pos/_ltung ba thun mong pa rnams gsel ba 'ba' zhig pas byin gyis brlabs par bgyi bas/_dge 'dun rnams spyod lam bstunanas gsol ba'i las la thugs gtad 
par lhu_zhes 'dun pa bcos nas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dung dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa'am bco lnga pa lags pas/_bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba dang bcas par gyuran/_gang gi mdun du bdag cag ltung bde chos bzhin du /
ka'adonaganyimarerta rtsomabargya_
[\[]slar bgyi ba bdagacig las dge slong gnas gzhan du mchis la/_dge slong gi mdun du lta ba de dag chos bzhin du slar mdzad de//'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de nas gnas kyi blo mthun ni/_ltung ba thun mong ba'i byin rlabs las/_gzhan pa thams cad la ngos par [ \[687]
/_/dgos las/_gsolab dad gnyis kyi las kyi gnas la blo bstan pa la thugs gtad pa zhu/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis pa 'am/_lags pa nang mchoms dang phyi rol nyi 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas 
pa 'di dag 'dun gyi gso spyod gi gnas su bzhed na/_gal te dag 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang*/_dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad grub pa 'am/_bgyis pa'am/_lags pa nang mchoms dang /_phyi rol 
zhe waM 
nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas pa blo mthun par bgyi'o/_/'din gsol ba'o//brjodapa mjug bsdu ba dang bcas pa la thugs gtad par zhu/_dge 'dun btsun pa sogs nas/_gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed de/

de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi/_gnas thamasacad grub pa'am/_sogs sngar bzhinanas/_gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi na/_tsho dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad grub pa'am sogs nas/_gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi bar bzodapa de dag ni 
tsangam gsung zhig_/gang dag ma bzod pa dAdagazhi gsungasashig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyi gnas thamasacad grub pa'am sogs nas/_gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyis lags te/_'di ltar dud mi gsung bas de bzhin du 'dzin 
to//zhes brjod do//de la grubapa ni skyes bu'i rtso la bsam byasapa bsdupa dang po'i gnas rgyal po'i khab kyi rgya gro d+ha'i phug pa bzhin no/_/
bgyis pa ni skyes bu'i rtsol bas byas pa bsdu ba gsum pa'i gnas kha che'i yul rna rgyanagyi gtsug lag khang bzhin no/_/[\[ 690]
lags pa ni/_bya ba byed pa'i gnas su rung ba ste gnas kyi tha snyad rdzogs pa'o/_/de bas da lta ni gtsug lag khang du gso sbyong byed pa'i phyir/_bgyis pa'i zhis mchoms sbyar pa legs so/_/_de nas dngos gzhi la gnas brtan gyis so so thar pa'imado 
nyan par gdams nas/_gsol ba 'ba' zhig pa'i las kyis dge 'dun thugs bstan/_mdo 'don pa pos thal mo cung zad sbyar ba'i stang kAs/_rgya garaskad du/_pra timok+Sha sU tra/_bod skad du/_so so thar pa'i mdo/_/thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 
'tshol lo/_/sangasargyas 'dul ba gdachanamatsho/_/gting mtha' med pa thams cad kyi/_/gnas pa'i snying dang snying po ni/_/_so so tharapa 'deyinano/_/zhes pa nas/_'jog bral rnam par 'khyams par 'gyur/_/zhes pa'i bar brjod nas/_dge 'dun 

@#/_/btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_de dag 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa'am/_bco lnga pa lags te/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la khrabacing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dang dag 'dun 
gyis gso sbyong mdzad de/_sos thar pa'i mdo 'don pa gdon to//'dren gsol ba'o/_/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag gso sbyong bya ste/_so so thar pa'i mdo'adon pa gdon gyis/_/khyed cag su la ltung ba yod pa dramathol zhig_/_ltung ba medan cad ma sna_/
gabaden gnyis rta lum brgya_
zhig_/cang mi smran bdag gis tshodang ldan pa dag yongs su dag par rigs bar bya'o/_/_de ltar so sor dris nas dge slong gis lan brlab pa de bzhin du dge slong gi 'khor 'di lta bur yang lan gsumagyi bar du bsgrug por bya ba yin no/_/yang [\]69I]
dge slong gang dge slong gi 'khor 'di lta bur lan gsum gyi bar bsgrags pa na/_ltung ba yod la dran bzhin du mimathol na de shes bzhin du rdzun du smra ba yinano/_/_tshodang ldan pa dag shes bzhin du rdzun dusmra bzhi bcom ldan 'das kyis bar 
zhe drug [@ ]ngugacod ba'i chos su gsungs so/_/de bas na dge slong ltung ba byung brnam bar dag par 'dod pas ltung ba yod la dran cing mthong ba malar 'ab_ba yod la dran cing mthong ba_ra bya'o/_/mtholan bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_mamathol ma bshags

dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//slad ma pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma'ichos bcu gsumadang /_ma dam pa'i chos gnyis dang /_spradapa'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang /_'ba' zhig pa dgu bcu dang /_sosor

nas byin gyis brlab cing /_rang gcig bu yin na yidagyis bsam zhing brjod/_gzhan yang dge slong nad pa dang /dbang med pa dang /_srog dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyi rkyen gyis las kyi gnas su 'du bar mi nus pa dang /_gzhimagronatshon

zla_@#/_/pa'i tshes gcig nas/_/_sdu ma'i dbyar de gtso bo yin/_/_de nyid khrums kyi zla ba yi//_tshes gcig nas ni phyi mar grags/_/zhes so//_yun ni mdo ra/_dbyar gnas par khas blang par bya'o//_zla ba gsum ngu'o_/zhes so/_dgos
