gyis bsdus pa dang //bar chad med pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa'o/_/sbyor ba'i lam gyis bsdus pa ni gang phan chad sgrib pa thams cad kyis mi phyed cing /_sgrib pa thadi ni bshig pa'o//bar chad med pa'i lam gyis bsdus pani/_gang gi 'og tu zadapa shes pa dang /_mi skye bshes pa 
'byung pa ste/_zhes so//de la theg dman ltar gyi mi phyed po'i don ni nyon sgrib tshung ngu'i chu thim/_theg chen gyis shes sgrib phra mo'i phra mo nyams dmas pa la 'jog ste/_sbyor ba'i lam gang zhe na/_gang gis nyon mongs pa spong ba'o//zhes so//de yang sbyor lam gyi dus nalam 
de'i ngo bo thob yan chad sgrib pa thod kyis tshur mi phyed cing/_phar sgrib pa thad bshig par byed pa'i don to/_bar chad med lam gyis bsdus pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni rgyun mtha'i ye shes nyid de/_skad cig phyi ma la mi slob lam 'byung ba'i phyir ro//de bas na nga nge 'dzin/
nga ba'ang /[ 808]
dag la brten nas byang chub bla na med pa nyid thob pa'i phyir na/_shes bya thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid dmigs kyi bsam gtan rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o//de nas thun mchams la bab pa na skyil mo krung bshig ste/_phyogs [|]
bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs te phyag 'tshalashing yan lag bdun pa byas la phal po che las 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa smon lam du gdab cing /_de nyid las/_thabasad shes rab ting 'dzin rnam 
thar dang /_yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur//zhes pa'i don bsgrub pa la'angadamigs par bya'o//rjes thob thad du sbyin pa la sogs pa bsod nams kyi tshogs gsum dang /_mnyam gzhag tu bsam gtan gyi ngo bo zhi gnas dang /_shes rab kyi ngo bo lhag mthang 

@#/_/gis ye shes kyi tshogs pasgrub ba gnyis ka'i chings su brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcis na/_bsam gtan nges rnam pa spang kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa yin te/_'phags pa gtsug na ren po che'i mdolas
de byams pa'i go chabagos shing snying rje chen po'agan la gan+dazhu rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam gtan byed do//de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_gang sbyin pa dang ma bral ba/
kabaden gnyis shing rta bzhi brgya lhag 
tshul khrims dang ma bral pa/_bzod pa dang ma bral ba/_brtson 'gras dang ma bral ba bsam gtan dang ma bral ba/_shes rab dang ma bral ga_thabs dang ma bral ba/_zhes pa la sogs rgya cher bka' stsal to/_/de bas na byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan zhing yon tan thong[ 809]
[@] bsgrub pa'i bsam gtan /_ting nge 'dzin dge ba ji lta bu bsgrubs kyang dam pa drug dang phyin drug tu 'brel bar bsgrub pasasems can don byed kyi bsam gtan yin la/de'ang 'di ltar rang bsam gtan la gnas nas gzhan bde ba la 'god pa ni/_bsam gtan gyi sbyin pa yin pa ltar 
[g ]gzhan rnams la'ang shes par bya zhing /_bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi'i sems thob nas gang 'dod cing mos pa der sprul pa bgyi nas gzhan don byed pa lasogs pa rnamaso//de skad du mdosde'i rgyan la_/_rgyal ba'i gras rnams ting 'dzin mang ldan bsam gtan rnam pa thad bsgrub bsam gtan/
bde ba phul gyis gnas shing stade rjes skye ba dman la brten/_bsam gtan de nyid kyis kyang skye bo thams cad byang chub gsum la bkod/_/bsam gtan ye shes kyis yongs nyin bas 'jig rten dag na mi zad bzhag_/ces so/_/da ni pha rol tu phyin pa ldaka'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu _/

phyin pa ston pa ni/_lhag pa shes rab bslab pa'i nges 'byed ni/_ti de 'dzin gyi sbyor ba las skyes shing*/_/dngos dang rjes las byung ba'i shes rab bam//thos dang bsam pa bsgom pa las byung ba'i//shes rab gsum gyis lhag mthong yang dag 'grug/de la chos mngon pa'i sde snod kyi 
brjod bya'i don ma 'khrul bar rab tu 'byed pa ni lhag pa shes rabagyi bslab pa'i ngo bo ste/_nges par 'byed pa'i tshadang mthun pa yin no//de'ang ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba la goms pa dang /_yongs su spyad pa byas pas sems las su rung zhing sgrib pa'i rnyog pa dang bral ba'i shes rab dngos sam/
རྗེས་སུ་མཐུན་པ་ལ་མངོན་པར་ཕྱོགས་བསམ་རྨོངས་པའི་ཤེས་རབ་དང་། ཐོས་པ་དང་། བསམ་པ་དང་། བསྒོམ་པའི་ཤེས་རབ་ལ་བརྟེན་ནས་ཆོས་ཐམས་ཅད་ཀྱི་གནས་ལུགས་ཇི་ལྟ་བ་བཞིན་དུ་ཤེས་པར་བྱེད་པ་དང། སེམས་ཅན་གྱི་རྒྱུད་ལ་དོན་ཕྱིན་ཅི་མ་ལོག་པརྭ་འདོམས་པར་བྱེད་པའི་རབ་ཏུ་] sIo
byed pa gang yin pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin te/_shes rab dalta bun nyan thos la sogasal lamed pas gzhal du med pa'ang yin no//de skad du 'grel chung las/_thos padang/bsam pa dang bsgomapalas byung bdag gam/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba dang /_dngos dang /_rjes las byung ba'i shes rab

ba/_ma'o 'amani yos zin mig medapa//ji srid migam bris par dran pa mi thob bzhin/_/zhes ro/_/de bas na thog mar shes rab kyi phan yon cung zad rnam par gzhagan/_slob dpon 2bags pas/_mashod dad ma mthong yon tan 'di//kunagyi ba shes rab yin//datings_/
_ka bsgrub pa'i phyir//_shes rab yongs su gzung bar bya_/zhes so//_yang dang por tshogs lam gyi gnas skabs na rdzu 'phrul gyin pa'i byed pa'adzin rnams kyang shesarab la brten nas bsgrub dgos shing /_'di ltar nor bu dang marame lasogs pa'i gsal ba'anangan[?]zla2[ \]]

gsal ba mchog yin pa ltar shes rab ni shes bya gsal b.rabyedapa'i mchog go zhes slo ba spring gi 'grelapas kyang bstan pa ltar sbyor lam du dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga la sogs pa'i gtso bo'ang shes rab yin la/_shes rab mgon yod na sbyin pa laser snas 
gnod pa dang /_dad pa la log ltas sgrib pa sogs kyi skyon legs par shes pas nyon mongs pa zadapa dad/_yon tan 'phel ba'i thabs lamakhas pa yin te/_slob pon dpa' bos/_sbyin la sogs pa'i bsod nams 'di dag gi/_shes rab mgon bcas lhag par 
mthuldan 'gyur//zhes dang /dad lasags pa'i dbang po'i rnam pa yang dbang po gzhan la blo bzhinashes rab gtso//de yi mgon ldan yon tan skyon shes pas//nyon mongs zad pa'i tshul la mkhas par 'gyur//_zhes so//'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' [\]a12]
slob pa lam gyi gnas skabs su rang gi lus las sha bcad de byin kyang nang kyi gdung ba can sman gyi sdong bu las len pa ltar mthong zhing sbyin pa la brten nas bde 'gro thub pa'ang ma nges pas da rgyal dang zhum pa'i rnam rtog mi 'byud bdang /
tshul khrims kyis spyod pa'i dka' spyodami bzod bas dal rlom semasami'abyung zhing gzhan don la dmigs pa dang /_bzod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pamagominon zhing /_spyod pa rgya chen po la zhum pa dang /_sngangs pa sogs dgag mi nus shing mi bzodapa dang*/_bzod 
པའིསྐྱོན་ཡོན་ཤེས་པwལོག་བསྒྲུབ་ལ་སྐྱོ་ངལ་མི་འབྱུང་བ་དང་། བརྩོན་འགྲུས་བརྩམཔའི་གཞིཕྱིནཙམལོག་པར་ཤེསནསལ་ལསྡིག་པ་ལ་མཁས་པསལམཆོད་མྱུར་བ་དང་། སྲིདབའིརྒྱུདང་། བྱང་ཆུབ་ཀྱི་ཡན་ལག་གང་དུ་འགྱུརམ་ནོར་བའི་བསམ་

zla_/_/gtan gyi rang bzhin dmigs phyed pa lasogs pa mtha' dag kyang shes rab kyi de kho na nyid mngon du gyur pa la rag las te/_sarab mig gsalarnam par phye gyuran/byang chub sems dpas rang gi sha byin khyod//sman gyi shing ltar rnam

[# ]bslar mtshugs pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i sems can la byams pa'i blo shugs drag kyang 'dod chags dang mi 'dre ba dang /_gzhan gyi sdug bsngal lami bzod pa'i snying rje skyes kyang mya ngan gyis zhen nam dge ba'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'i le lomed pa dang /gzhan [\] s13]
phun sumatshogs pa la dga' latshodamed pa dang ldan yang de'i sems sgyu ma'i sprul pa lta bu dang /_btang snyoms chen po kunalakhyab par brdal yang thadakar gang babs kyi gzhan don lami g.yel brnams kyang blon po lta bu'i shes rab las 'byung ba'i tshul/_snga ma las/

pa dang*//gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod snying rjel//mya ngan khur gyi le las mi dma' dang //dga' mchog dpaldan yang dag g.yeng medadang //'gro don mi g.yel btang snyoms chen po dang //yon tan de dang de dag gnyen po'i lam//shes rab chen pos bkag pasarnam 

paramadzes//zhesaso//mdor na rgyu 'bras bslu ba medapa la nges parnyedapa nga /chos dang chosamayin pa shes pa dang /_ston pa dang bstan pa'i yon tan la snying thag pa nas nges shes skye ba dang /_yon tan rgod dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pa dang /_'jigarten gyi spyod pa'i

[4g ]po med pa'i bdud kyi gsang tshig sgrog pa yod do//_le lo snyom las bsten ngan bsten pa dang /gnyid kyi dbang gyur mi rtog ngang tshul dang /_/thub pa'i ye shesamachog lams med dang /log pa'i nga rgyal non pas don 'dri dang //dma' sems bdag la zhon pa byung ba'irgyus/[\]]
brgyud 

mkhas pa'i skye bo bsten par ma dad dang //log pa'i rnam rtog dug che log lta dag/gti mug rgyu yin mkhas pas spang bar bya_/zhesaso/de bsan thog mar thos pa'iyon tan la brten dgos pa'itshul/de'ang 'din so soskye bo'i sar//blom pa las byung shes rab mkhartenan/
bsam dang bsgom pa'i yon tan gnas miny+nyakhyams//thos pa'i shes rab kun gyi rgyu ru gsus//de la gang zag gang gi rgyud 'phagasapa yinananisngon gyi goms pa'i stobs brtan pas skye ba dal thos bsam rgya chen po ma byas khyed rang stobs kyi rig pa srid kyi/de ltar 
srid na'ang so so yang dag pa rig pa bzhi dang ldan pas dgu pa'i yon tan rgyud la ma skyes pa de srid du 'bad dgos pa yin te/gzhon nunor bzang gis yon tanarnams kyang tshad bzung med par shog_/ces smon lam btab pa bzhin no/_/_de bas na rang rgyudasoso myi [816]
rmongs pa'i phyogs 'gro ba gzhan dang gzhan dag dang mtshungs par ldanAn de dag gi legs smon gsol bas phan par mi 'gyur bas thog mar thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab 'tshol bar bya 
ba yani ba'i rtags mu sems nyonamos pa can du yod cing /
de ltaram byasanabasam pa dang bsgom ba'i shes rabatsem po pa kha ba'i 'og gi 'bar 'bur dang 'dra ste gnas min du 'khyams pa'i phyir ro//de skad du slob dpon dpa' bos/thos ltung dmus lobasgom ba'i tshul mi shes//de medad kis ci zhig bsam par bya de bas
thosal tshon bya de la//bsams bzhin bsgoms pas shes rab yangs pa 'byung*//zhes so//de bsan shes rab 'byung ba'i rgyu klog pa yinapa'itshulang /thos nasazhagasu 'gro ba'itshul/mgon po byams pas/shes rabamachog yin de'i gzhin/thos pa de phyir thos ba mchog/

ka_
@#/_/_ces dang /_bslab btus las/_brjod bya thosapa btsal b.rubyu//de nasazhugs su gnas par bya//mnyam par gzhag la brtson bya zhing /zhes bshad do//de la thos pas gtan la ji ltar dbab na/_dbab bya chos nasangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che zhing de 
de'ang mdzod las/_ston pa'i dmatshosarnam gnyis te//lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can_/

shesanas rang rgyud la bkal te de'i rtogs brgyud la mngon sum du bsgrub pa yin na rtogs pa'i bstan pa mnor bar rtogs pa ni lung gi bstan patshul bzhin du go ba la rag las pa'i phyir ro
 bde zhaganyis shing rta bzhi rgyu dgu //da ltamod kyi blo gros chung ngu dag de lazhum bar bya mi dgos [\]a17]
7_kyirang gi blo nyams la dpags pa'i thos pa re la ma 'bad na chos dang gong zag phyogs 'dzol ba de 'ang bas/_gad bsgrub pa'i gnas de nyid la thos bsam mthil phyin par goms su 'jug cing //_mthar gyi blo'i mthu je cher bskyed pa la bslab bo/ci'i 
phyir na gang bsgrub pa'i gnas rgya chung du las medakyang de nyid rang la thos bsam mthil phyin na de'i don ma 'khrul ba nyams su longs shing /_de ltar de lam du song na bsgoms byung gi shes rab nang nas skye ba tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro//de bas na bsgom pa de ma 
nor ba'i rtags su jitsam bsgoms pa de tsam du sosor rtogs pa'i shes rab je cher 'phel ba zhig dgos te ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi ngo bo lhagamathong gi ye shes yin pas so
//de yang shes rab kyi rab dbyen rnamapa gnyis te kun rdzob 

rtogs pa dang /don dam rtogs pa'o//dang po ni mdo sde'i rgyan las/rag pa'i gnas lnga dag la brtson par ma byas na//'phags mchog gis kyadathamasacadamakhyen nyid mi 'gyur te//de lta bas na gzhan dgatshar gcad rjes gzung dang //bdag nyid kun shes bya phyir de la de brtson 
byung zhes pa ltar/bstan pa'amadad parnams tsher bcad pa'i phyir sbradang gtan tshigs_rog pa dang /dad pa can rnamasarjes su bzung ba'i phyir bzo dang gso ba rig pa dang /rang nyid kyis kun shes par bya ba'i phyir nang rig pa 'tshol ba ni skabs 'di'i dgos pa bye brag pa yin la
de thad kyang sangasargyas 'thob pa'i phyir du sems bskyed nas 'tsholana'i bye brag dbye bamed do
'dir ni bdagamedapa'i de khon nyid don spyi'i sgos 'jal ba dang jal byed shes rab kyiwemagarnam par gzhag pa [318]
dang /
gzhal ba dmapa'i chos kyi mdzod rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir drang nges gnyis kyi rnam gzhag ni gzhal bya'i chos la 'jal byed shes rabs_/

zla_@#/_/_na nges pa'i don yin la/_chos can snang tshod ltar 'jug paskye 'gag dad/_'gro 'ong dang /_dag grol dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la sogs pa'i rnam pas tshogs par snang zhing /_blo dang*/_snyamakhyed dang /_brjod pas thug

6[# ]skyes pa dang*/_ma byung pa dang /dngos po med pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /gang zag med pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i bar du med par bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don zhes bya ste/_'di ni res

lamiton pa'o//zhes so//de latshig 'bru zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten pa'i chos dang /don zhes bya ba ni de las 'das pa'o//rnam shes zhes bya bzhi/_gzugs dang /'du shes dang 'du byed la nye bar 'gro zhing gnas pa'o/_/_ye shes zhes bya ba ni/_phung bo bzhi la gnas 
pa'irnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su shes pa'o//drang pa'i don ni lam la 'jug pa'i 'i bstan pa'o//nges pa'i don ni 'bras bu la 'jug pa'i phyir bstan pa'o//chos nyid ces bya ban 'gyur ba med pa la sogs pa'o//_gang zag ces bya bzhig zagatu blta ba [eno]

sems can gyi blo drung zhing /_ma dag pa 'khrul pa dang de'i rab tu dbye ba la sogs pa ston ba thod drang ba'i don gyi chos zhes bya ste/_'di'i gsung rab blta ba'i me long dang /'byed pa'i lde mig dang po yan par bzung ngo //yang /_de dag rang bzhin gsal bar bya ba dang /_/

rdzas 'gal bas mgrub la/_rgyu med na skye ba'i 'bras bu bgags pa'i phyir dang /_ji ltar snang tshod dang mthun pa'i skye ba la sogs pa tsama'i rmi lam mam skyam rtsom du rten cing 'brel 'byung las snang ba ste/'jamadapalarmilam ni snang la yodapam yin no/_da bzhin 
du chos thad snang la yod pa ma yinano//zhes pa lasogs rgya cher bka' bstsal to//yongs grub las don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid med de bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin don dom par gnas pas ma dag pa la sogs paspres pa'i ngobo med pa'i phyir ro//de'i don yang dgongs 'grel

@#/_/_pa rnamasalani ma yin no//zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o//spyir yang rlom sems dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i mngon zhen 'di dgazhi phyin drug la sogs pa'i mi mthun phyogs chen po yin ci'ajam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u las/_lha'i bu

rang don du tshogs rdzogs pa dang chos sku thob par mnyam/_gzhan don du 'gro don mdzad par mnyam pa gsum la dgongasaso/_da skad du mdzod las/_sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang ni//chos sku 'gro ba'idon sbyod pa//mnyam panyid de sku tsho dang //rigs dang sku bongasatshadakyis
min/zhes so//bsgyur ba ldem por dgongs pa ni/_dge spyong go ta mnanan tan gyis ma bskul yang chos 'chad do zer ba'i dbye ba bsal ba dang /_lo drug dka' ba spyad pa kho nasakhyadapar thob na thob bya'i chos de'ang gting dpag chung ngo snyam pa lta bu bsal ba'i phyir/_zab mo chaT 
brala'od gsal 'dusam byas/_/bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos shig bdag gis rnyed/_/su la bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur te//bdag nyid gcig pu nags su bsgom par bya//zhes gsungs nas chos nyid de shin turtogs dka' bar stonapa lta bu dang /khyad par don dang tshig tu 'gal 

/bar bsgyur nas gsusapa'i tshul/ngas byang chub sems dpa'ame tog zlamadzom 'asad doTalcelkogama'i 'og nas phyung ngo //zhes pa lta bu 'am/_tshoms las/bdang mazhi gsad bya zhing /_/rgyal po gtsang sgra can gnyis dang /_/yul 'khor skor bas bcom na/_mi de dag 
pa nyid du 'gyur/_zhes pa lta buste/_'di ltar 'khor bar 'du byedapa'i rtsa bsred pa'i 'khor ba'i bde ba la chags pas ya'o/_/len pa'i 'dodapa la 'dun pa'i'adodachagasanyid de ma'o//kun gzhi'i bag chagasasna tshogs pa'i rten namasnodadu gyurabasargyal po'o//de bzhin du bram ze 'jig
rgyu tshogs la blta ba dang*/_dge sbyong tshul khrims dang brtulazhugs lamachog 'dzin gyi blta ba'i gtsang sbra can gsaso//nang gi skyemachedagazung 'dzin gyis bsdus pa'i rnam shes tshogs brgyad ni yul 'khor skor bcas te/_de dag bcom pa'i tha snyad kyis rang rgyudal mi ldan par dag pa'itshe[ 827]
/'chang rgyab la sbyar ba gang dao bstanadu 'khrul na nor pa chen po'o//de ltar bzhi po ni mdo sde'i rkyen las/_zhugs pa ldem por dgos pa dang*/_mchin nyid ldem por dgongs pa gzhan/_/gnyen po ldem 'dagos pa dang /_bsgyur ba ldem par dgongs pa ste/nyan thos dang ni ngo bo/
nyid//de bzhin nyes pa gdul ba dang /_/brjod pa zab pa nyid lani//_ldem por dgongs parnam pa bzhi/_zhes so//_mdon dgongs dang ldem po'i khyad par ni//dgongs pa yid la rnam par gzhag pa tsam//_yin gyi pha rol bzung la ltos pa min//ldemapor dgongs pa pha rol bzung ba 
Tཐལ།ལྟོས་པའི་རྣམ་འབྱེད་གསུང་རབ་བལྟ་བའིམིག།དེལདགོངས་ལྡེམགཉིས་པོའི་ཁྱད་པར་ནི།།བཤད་སྦྱརལས།དགོངས་པའི་ཡིད་ལ་རྣམ་པར་གཞག་པ་ཙམ་ཡིན་གྱི་ཕ་རོལཔོ་གཟུང་བ་ལ་ལྟོས་པ་ནི་ཁས་མི་ལེན་ནོ།།ལྡེམ་པོར་དགོངས་པའི་ཕ་རོལ་གཟུང་བ་ལ་ལྟོས་པའོ།}l

zhes bshad do//dgongs ldem gyi gnas 'dilasngonagyimakhan po rnams bzhedapa mi mthun pa cudazad yodad/_slob dpon 'phags pas/_sangasargyas rnamasakyis gdul bya la/ji ltar mosapa'i chos gsungs te//kha cig lani sdig pa las//rnam par bzlog pa'i chos gsungs*//kha

cig lani rgyu 'bras gnyis//_chud migasan zhesachos gsungs te/[j]kha cig lan bden pa gnyis//rnam par dbye ba'i chos gsungasaso//za'amo'akhu 'phrig can rnams la//stobanyid snying rje'i stengepocan/_/ji ltar mos pa'i chos gsungasaso/_/zhes pa ltar gdul bya'i snod dang sbyar nas 'byung 
tshul legs par 'byed shes [1]nas pa ltar gdul bya'i snod dang sbyar nas 'byung
ba'i tshul legs par khong du chud pa'i blo chen rnamasal 'gal ba 'du ba ma yin pas sgra dang /don dang /_dgongs pa dang /[ @]gos ched kyi gnas skabs legs par shes pas gsung rabarnams kyi tshul legs par 'byed shes pa ni mdo rgyud blta ba'i lde mig gnyis pa'o//_ni gzha[828]
'jig rten kun gas pas gsung rab rnams
bya dam pa'i chosakyi rnam paragazhag pa ston pa'i phyir/gzhal bya'i ngos nasargyal bsachosakyi sgo/_/brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa mtha' dag don////'jig rtenakun rdzob pa dang don dmaste/_/bden pa gnyis las gsum pamamachis so//sems can gyi khams la rang rgyud ldan nyon mos pa 
rdzong gsungs pa mtha' dag don
gsum gdul ba la ltos nas/_'dul byed dam pa'i chos 'dul ba dang tshama'adul ba dang //_mdo ste dang mdo ste dang /
/_mngon
mngon pa ste lungasde snodagasum dang /_mngon rtogs bslab pa gsum mam/_grangs ngesargya chaba'i ngos nasachosakyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pamatha' dag snang lugs kun rdzob dang /
'a_
gnas lugs don dam pa'i bde[a]pa
gnas lugs don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis lam bsten pa med pas gsum pa la dgagasgra zhugs pa'o//de skadangu yab sras mjal ba'i mdo las/_'jig rtenamakhas pa'i bden pa'adi gnyis te_/khyodakyis gzhan lasamagasan rang gis gzigs//de ni kun rdzob bde/

@#/_/dang don dam ste//ban pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so//zhes so//kun rdzob pa la snang lugs rnam pa gnyis//'khrul shes do snang ba ji snyed kyi//_snang tshod nyid dang mthun par don byed rnams//yang dag kun rdzob nyid de snang na'ang //don mi byed la log pa'i /
gabaden gnyis shing rta _kun rdzob grags/_de la sems can gyi dus rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad kyi rang bzhin 'dus byas kun rdzob pas bskyed pa'i 'khrul snang de la 'khrul 'dzin dang /'khrul shes la shar ba tha dad pa rnams te/_bslazhing pardzun pa dang /_mi bden zhing 'gyur ba dang /_'khrul pa 
dang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par 'char zhing/_blo yul dang 'du shes khyi cha nas btags pas don dang shin tu 'gal ba can yin la/_de ldana' dus de'i snang ba dang /_shes pa'i chaganyis ka la rozhig bden brdzun gnyis su gdags su rung ba la bltos nas yang [\]s29]
[1 \[] _nar ba dang lag pa'i kun rdzob ces bya ste/_'di ltar snang tshod dang mthun par don byed nus pa/_rgyu las skyes pa/_mthun snadagrub pa ste/_phyi rol tu 'byung ba bzhi/nad du rang gi shes pa dang bcas pas bsdus pa ni yang dag pa'i kun rdzob dang /_snang /
bzhi bcu _
yang don byedaminus brdzing bur zla ba shar ba'am/_ri mo mkhan gyi shing rta lta bun logapa'i kun rdzob tu 'dod do//bden gnyis las/_snad du 'dra yang don byedadag nus ba'i phyir dang mi nus phyir//_yang dag yang dag ma yin pa'i//kun rdzob kyis dbye ba'ang 
btsolnga 
byas/_zhes so//'di gnyis ka'ang tshig tu smin gnyis su snang yang /_gshisanas gzhal na tha dad par mi mdon te/_bag chags dang 'khrul de la skyes pa mnyam/_dbang po'i yul so se la snang bar mnyam rezhig 'khrul ngo tsam du snang ba'i don byed 

kyang mig shes kyi blta yul du yod na yod mnyam/_med na medamanyam du gcig pas rang bzhin gyis ma grub pa'o//khyad par dbye ba'i gzhi yul chos dbyings tshomal ltos na 'phags pa'i ye shes thob pa'i tshe/_blo la bden zhen dang bcas pa'i sems rtog dang snang ba thod 
log pa'i kun rdzob bden zhon med pa'i 'char sgo dang sgrung ba thams cad yang dag pa'i kun rdzob dang /_'khrul gzhi dang 'khrul pa'i blo rtog dbyings su grolanas rang bzhin med pa'i gnas lugs rtogs pa'i phyir te ljon pas zhus par/_me long dkyil 'khor yongs 
dag la//bzhin gyi zla ba snang ba ltar//ji ltar rang bzhin ma grub par/_zin pasachosarnams shes par gyis//zhes so//don dam bden pa gshes kyi bzhugs tshul te//'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa'i chos//ngo bo gnyisamed gdeng nas bsam brjod 'as/[ je30]
rtog dang ma rtogs blo yis ma bzhag go/dal don dam pa'i bdenapa ni/_gshis kyi gnas lugs rang bzhin gyis zhi ba/_spros pa medapa gcig dang tha dad pa las 'das shing /'khor ba dad chos so cog gdong nas ngo bo nyid med pas sos skye ba'i rtogs ma rtogasakyi blos 
/rnam rtog medadon thadad med/_/de ni da yi mchon nyid do//_zhesas//gal te blos ma bzhag na bden pa gnyis su dbye ba'ang mi rudaste rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu'o snyam du 
dgaman slob dpon 'phags pa'i bsgom rim las/_snying bo med pa'i chos 'din[)]/rtog pa las ni ma lus 'byung //gad rtog de yang stong pa nyid//deltar stong nyid grol ba yin//ji ltar mtsho chen stongasapa la//rlabs 'byung ba yodamayin/_/de bzhin sna tshogasarnam shemani//

@#/_/dngos po med la 'jug pa med//ces pas gzhal bya'i chos rnams gzhal byed kyi ngo bo dang por rtog pa las byung kyang /_gang rtog de'i rang bzhin stong par rtogs pa'i tshogrol ba zhes bya ba'i tha snyad grub pa yin te_rlabasagyi 'byung gnas med pa'i tshe rlabs 
rgyu zhes bya ba'i ming du 'byung ba yang ma grub bo//de skad du snam las/_gang tsho de nyid don mthong ba//de[&]rnal 'byor mnyam gzhag pas//_mi rtog brjod pa yod ma yin//rang gi mthong ba the tshom med//nam mkha'i chos ni 'ba' zhig bzhin//_gang la rnam rig cud 
zadamed//de bzhin chos 'di rnam shes pa//cung zad shes pa yod ma yin/_/_'byung ba dang ni gnas pa nyid//byis parmongs pa rnams la snang //_shes rab rig pas blta ba la//skye ba dung ni gnas pa med//ces sogs rgya cher gsungs so//de bas na 
kabaden gnyis shing rtabazhibargya bcu drug 
gshis la dam bca' ba dang /_khas blang ba'i yul/_len pa po dang /_len byed kyi dos bzung gang yang med pa de rnam par rig pa can gyi blos dpags shing skye 'gag med par sgro btags pa tsam gyis ni rtagachad kyi 'phrang las thar pa med pas [\[ 831]
/bden gnyis las/_skye la sogs pa 
skye ba dang de nyid 'gag pa la sogs spros pa'i mtha'o thams cad zhud du byed pa'i skyes bu dang bral bar gshis thogatu grol ba'i rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam ste
brdar btagasarnam grangs pa'i don ma dang /
bkag pa yang //_yang dag pa dang mthun nyid bzhod/_skye med spros kun zhi ba la//don dam zhes pa'i brdab mdzad do//zhes so//de ltar bden pa gnyis kyang sems can gyi don du thabs lamakhA pA gsungs kyi/_dngos po'i cha nas ma he'i rwa ltar tha dad pa med 

pa'i tshul/_bden gnyis 'dres pa'i snang stong zung 'jugani/rdzing bur zhugs pa'i zla ba'i skye mched bzhin/_snang ba'i cha nas kun rdzob bden pa dang //rang bzhin ma grub don dam bden pa'o/_/kun rdzob kyi gnas lugs rdzing bu zha du zla ba'i skye mched zhugs pa ltar mthong dus[@]snang 
de gnyis zla ba'i gzugs dang rdzing bur 'dres pa med bzhin du snang par ngo bo gcig pa'i bden gnyis zung 'jug rang bzhin med pa nyid du nyams su myong ba ni bden gnyisartogs pa zhes 
ba'i tshanas kun rdzob tu grub kyang /_zla bar bdon pa ma yin pa'ichanas don dmadu mnyamal/
bya ste/de'ang rang gi blo po'i shis ba 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cha nas don dam pa'i bden pa dang /'jig rten du gnas pa'i chanas kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin pa'i tshul/_mya ngan las 'das pachen po'i mdo las 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsel [\[ 832]
to dbacom ldan 'dasakun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bgyi ba'i don ji lta bu lags/_don dam pa'i bden pa la kun rdzob kyi bden pa mamachis sam/kun rdzob kyi bden pa la don dam pa'i bden pamachis sam/ci ste mchis na bden pa gcig tu 
bas so//ci ste ma mchis na de bzhin gshegs pas_gsungs pa rdzun dumi 'gyur ram/_bka' bstsal pa/rigs kyi bu kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid don dam pa'i bden pa'o//bcom ldan 'das de ltar na bden pa gnyis sumachis so//bka' bstsal pa/_rigs kyi bu thabs la mkhas 
pas sems can gyi don du bden pa gnyis gsungs so//rigs gyi butshogatusmra ba ltar narnam pa gnyis te/_'jig rten gyi chos dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'ichos so//rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gang zag gi shes pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o//gang 

@#/_/zag ga shes pa de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o//zhesaso//de la gang zag gi shes pa zhes bya ba'i kon mchog 'byung gnas las/_bar snang bya rjes ji bzhin du//'gro ba de yang yinas med//sbal ba'i spu la blta ba ltar//de bzhin zhi ba'i chos nyid 
blta//bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan me long la//rang bzhin stong par mkhas pas bshad/cesago/de lta na'ang re zhig yularishes pa tshon ris ma 'dres ltas//gzugasasogs 'dod pa'i longs spyodacha bzung ba//de la der 'dzin dgag bsgrub blo rtog gi 'khrul 
blta//
bzhin gyi gnyid du brtag
nad 'u da brgyang zhing du brtag
'di lta'amos pas spyod pa'i lam la snang ba'i chos gzugs dang*_ro dang /_reg bya ste 'dod pa'i yul lnga la yul can gyi sems zhugs nas dgar _gyi blo rtag tu shar ba'i 'khrul snang thams cad sgyu ma'i 
ga 'don gnyis shing rta bzhibargyabacu'adun 
dpe brgyad kyis snang rang bzhin med par brtag cing /_rgyud las thar ba'i lam sna zin bzhes kyang bya ste
de ltar goms shing rtogs ba rnams ni srid pa'i grong khyer las thar bas thar ba'i lam sna zin ba zhes byang bya ste de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin par byang chub sems dpa'i lam latshe thad du bgyid pa_'i tshul gsang 
de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin par byasgrubasaba'i dngos po bzhis semasacan baspro ba'i brtson
chen thabs lamakhas pa las/_nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jug ci thang mod kyi/_nyan thosani bdag nyid mya ngan las 'das pa kho na shes par byed kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can bslu ba'i brtson 
'grus rgyun mi gcod cing pha rol phyin drug gisasems can yongs su smin par byed la/_sems can rnams la yang snying rje chen po bskyed par byed de/de yang byang chub semasadapa'i thabs lamakhas pa yin no//_zhis sogs rgya cher 'byung ngo*//_de ltar ba ni pa gnyis 

su dbye ba'ang mnyam gzhag gi dusan/_mthar thug blo yis rnam thor pyad bzod na/_/don dam ma yin blo ni kun rdzob phyir//gcig dang du mar 'gal ba'i mchon nyid rnams//_blo yi yuman nam yang gnas myong //de ltar don dam bden pa'i gshis blo snang gzung 'dzin dang 
bral ba/_de'i ngor spres par snang ba ni kun rdzob phyir gcig dang tha dad gang du'ang grub pa medapas bden pa gnyis zhesatshig bla dgas su byas pa tsam las gzhi gcig gi steng nas phyogs su ma lhung bas zlos dpyad du med pa nyid do//gal te blos dpyad du bzod pa don dam pa'i bden pa 
yin na ri bong gi rwa la yang dbyibs dang kha dog yod par grub ste/_'di ltar blos dpyad bzod de ni blos brtags pa kho na yin pas rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dang bcas pa'i 'dus byas kun rdzob pa las nam yang 'da' bamed pas don dam pa dang shin tu 'gal[g34]
'dir don dam zhes bya ba'i smani thams cad pa'i ming yin yang shinatu lkog00 
ba'i tshu'adabang 
ga las/_dan dum bla ya spyod yul man//blun kun rdzob yin par 'dod//ces dang /_'grel pa rgya gzhung las/_don dam dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_
tu gyur ba dngosapo thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhinal bya bar bshad la/de nyid ni zhi don dam pa ste/_de (yo nanyid yin gyis ltos partsom gyi de khon nyid zhi btags pa tsam du zad pa yin te/_rtog pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro//de gzhan yang rnam pa dang bcas pa dang*/
rnam pa med pa'i mngon sum la sogs pa'i blo ni kun rdzob ces bya ste/_'dis don dam pa mthong ba la sgrib pa'i phyir ro//zhes pas shin tu gsal go_gzhan yang blo yul gyi rnam pa dang /_de'i spros ba rnams kyi 'or ni chos thams cad yang nan gcig tu 'du la/

zla_a/_yanganan du ma dang bcasapa nyid du gnas kyang don dam pa'i de dang shin tu rdzas 'gal bas blo dang lhan cig tu 'du ba'i srid pa'i phyir ro//de ltana'ang dgongs pa nges 'grel las/_'du byed khams dang don dmamatshan nyidan//gcig 
dang tha dad bral ba'i mtshan nyid de/_/gcig dang tha dad nyid du gong rtog ba/_/de dgatshul bzhinam yin zhugs pa yin/_zhes pa'i 'jigarten gragasasde spyod pa ltar grub mtha' khas blangs pa'i 'dod pa ste/_kun rdzob dang don dam snangan snang mnyamadang ga med namedamanyam du 
do bo gcig ces brjod par zad do//re zhig grub pa'i mthu' yi rnam gzhagan//_shes pa'i don dam blo yis dpyad pa dang //dosapo'i sha dam tho bas bcom pa yi//rdul phranacha med nyan thos sde pa'i lugs//de lanang gses su phye bas bye brag tu smra ba dang mdo sde pa 
kabaden gnyis shing rta bzhi brgya bcol rgyad 
gnyis las/_dang po ni/rang rig za snyad du'ang khasayilen pa'i theg dman gyi grub mtha' smra ba'i gang zag de'i bye bragatu smra ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de la gzhi lam 'bras bu las/_gzhi'i chos shes pa'i don dam la blo ngo'i dpyad pa thugs pa dang /_dngos po'i don dam tho bas 
bcom pa lasogs pas gnod par mi nus te/_shis pa'i rgyun dang /_dngos po'i rags pa ni kun rdzob shes pa'i skad cigamadang /_dngos bo'i rdul phran cha medapa don dam du dod pa'i tshul/_dbyig gnyen gyis/_gal bcom dang blo yis gzhig_/bsalan de blo mi 'jug 
[g]pa/_bumachu bzhin du kun rdzob tu/_/_yod de don dam yod gzhan no//zhes nyanathosabye brag tu smra ba'i lugs la gnyen pos chom pa'am blos gzhig ba gang rung gi chanas der 'dzin kyi blo 'dor du rung ba'i chos thams cad kun rdzob bden ba ste/_'di ltar dngos po'i rnam pa 

gang yadarung ba zhig rnam pa ma nyams par yod dus de dang de'o snyam pa'i blo skye yang /_de tho ba dang gartan bu la sogs pas bcom pan dpyad pa'i rnam pa de med bas der 'dzin gyi blo rags pabada'agags par 'gyur ba la dmigs pa'o//don dam bden pa ni rdul phra rab gnyen pos 
bcom pa dang rig pas gzhig ste pasal yang rang 'dzin gyi blo 'dor du mi rung ba'i chos rnams ni don dam pa'i dngos por 'dod de/_mchon gzhi rdul phran cha med dang*/_/_shes pa skad cig mamed dang*/_'dusamabyas kyi chos rnams so//de'ang kun rdzob bden pa dang btags yod don 
gcig la/don dam bden pa dang rdzas yod don gcig par 'dod do/_/spyir grub pa'i mtha' 'dis phyi rol pa rnams 'dod pa'i gang zag gi bdag legs par bkaganas bdag med du khas blangazhing /_de'i lta ba go ba las mdo sde pa'i lta ba legs par go ba'i lam [36]
stegasatsam las gzhan du nam mkha' rtag dngos gnyis ka yin pa dang /_lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu 'bras dang /_mchongs pa lnga ldan gyi 'bras sogs khas len zhing /_dus gsum yang rdzas grub dang dngos por 'dod pas nam yang med par mi 'gyur ba sogs shin tu 
rags pa yin la/_/khache bye brag tu smra parnams la mdo sde pa dang mthun bar las kyi 'brel ba'i rten du las kyi rgyun khas len pa'i khyad par yod do//lam gyi rnam gzhag nibaden bzhi'i rnam pa mi rtag pa sogs bcu drug po la dmigasanas lam lnga'i rnam gzhag tsam byed
kyad/_sa bcu la sogs pa'i rnam gzhagami 'dod la/_lam dedagagi spang bya nyon mongs can dang /_de las ldog pa'i mi shes pa gnyis las/_sngam spangs pa las dman pa'i dgra bcom pa'i go 'phang dang /_phyimanyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa spangs 

ka[ \]]pal sangasas tshigo 'phang thob b.ra'adod cing /_bcu drug pa lam rjes shes bsgom lam dang mdo lam skad cig bcolnga bodagakhyad can skye bar 'dod ba'o/_de yada'abras bu'i cha nas brjodan/_bshadamathag kha'i dman ba'i dgu 
bcom pa la'ang nyams pa'i chos can sogs 'dapas ji ltar thob pa'i spangs rtogs las nyams nas rgyun zhugs su 'gyur ba'adasridabar khasalenag_
bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi tshogs mi rtag ba bcu drug gi lam dang 'brel bar nyams sukhrungs pas mi shes 
pa gnyis ka spangs te sangs rgyas thob par 'dodapa de'ang bdag cagagi ston pa la mtshonan/dadapo thugs bskyod pa nas bzung ste srod la bdud btul ba yan chad tharab cha mthun rtsom la gnas pa'iso so skye bo dang /_gang gi mtshan thog gcig po de nyid la sbyor lam [\[337]
padon gnyis shing rta bzhibargyabacu dgu gyi gnas skabs drod lasogs pa bzhi/_mthong lam gyi gnas skabs skad cig ma bco lngarnams/_stan thog denyid du rdzogs bar mdzad nas tho rangs bsgom lam rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa drung nas phyud stesangs rgyas par 
'dod la/_de rasangs rgyas pa de yad thugs rgyud gyi zadapa dang mi skye ba shes ba'i ye shes de nyid yin _phyi'i gzugs bud de nyid ni sdug bsngal bden pa yin pas sangs rgyas sku mi 'dod de/_lhas byin gyis skyogs 'phangs pa'i mo zhibs bsnad pa'i tshor 
klug nyams su myod ba sogs tshul bstan ma yin par bzung nas drang don tha dadrang du khas len/_'on kyang thugs rgyud la dpags nas sangs rgyas pa phyin gyi mdzad pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang /_sku lus la dpags nas lhag bcas dgra bcom pa zhes 'dodacing /

mya ngan las 'das pa nas lhag med kyi dbyings su bzhugs pa yin pas bem rig gi 'jug ba rgyun chad nas zhing khams gzhan du gzugs sku'i rnam 'khrul ston pasogs pa/_longs spyod rdzogs sgyu lasogs pa'i rnam gzhagakhyadami'adod cing lhag bcas lhag med gnyis las 
logs su gyur pa'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'apakhas rmi len la/_de bzhin du skyes bu zung bzhi dang /_gad bragaya brgyad kyi rnam gzhag tsam 'dod kyang /_de dag gdab yin pas dge 'dun dkon mchog tu mi 'dod cing /_de dag gi rgyud kyi slob pa dang mi slob 
pa'i chos rnams la dge 'dun dkonamachog du 'dod pa'o/_/_mdo sde pa ni/_don byed nus pa gabayin de 'di ni don dag yod tshun gzhazhani kun rdzob yod/de yang rang spyi'i mtshan nyid gyis bshadapag/mdor ba'i lugs ngo bo rtog gar mthun//_'di ltar bden zhen[ 338]
gyi ngosazhas phyi don dang rang rig gnyis ka khas len pa'i theg dman gyi grub mtha' brjod pa la zhugs pa'i gang zag deni gdon+ta pa'i mtshan nyid de/_bya ba'i chos lung dang rigs pa'i rjes 'dag ma ste gnyis las/_dadabo na phyi bgam+b+ha brnams bkar 
'dodaba'i mngon pa sde bdun po shA ri'i bu la sogs pa'i dgra bcom pa bdun po'i bstan bcos su 'dams grub mtha' de las smra ba yin gu/_phyimani chodagasde 'dun la sogasanas bshad cing mdo sde ba bton nas grub mtha' smra bsachosakyi ched gang
zag la chags pa ste/_chos rnams dpe dang 'brel bar stonapas dpe ston bzhis mang grogs gzhi'i chos lakun rdzob bdenab gang gi bden bar 'jog pa ni rtog pas btags pa tsam gyi blo ma jo bo ba ste/de nyid kyis don dmatshan gyi gnas lugs 

rgyu/_@#/_/_mthong ba la sgrib pa'i phyir ro//'diltar rtog pa'i snang yulal spyi'achon gyis khyab pa dang /_spyi mtshon dam med kyi chos dang bden pa kun rdzob parnams tha dad du med pa'i yin khyab ma[? ]ma la/_mngon sumapa'i snang yul la rang mtshan gyis 
khyab cing /_changamachan dad dngos po dang /don dam bdenab rnams yin khyab mnyam du 'dapa'od[i]'dir rnam 'grel las/don byed nus pa gang yin pa//de 'der don ma yod pa yin/_gzhan zhi na spro ba yod pa de dag rang spyi'[0]chen[9]da bshad//casabagalas nas 
gnya[8]shi
rgyu[ *]
_ra 'dod de ngo bo rtog ge ba rnams mthun par gnas so//lam gyi rnam gzhag ni bden bzhi'i rnam pa mi rtag pa sogs bcu drug po nyid kyang ming gis btags pa gang zug rang skya thub pa'i rdzas yodakyi stong par rtogs ba'i gang zag gi bdagamedirtogs pa'anas rab [\[839]
ta[ .j]ba thabs med rje chenapo sogs dang ma 'brel bar nyams su len pa ni theg dman rangal ma yin la/_shes rab de dang sems can la'ang phan par 'dod pa'i bsam ba phun sum tshogs pa zung du sgrila'ani theg chen gyi nyams su lenatshuladang /_dmas chos/[ |]
tagazhibargya nyi shu thos
_lam bgrod tshulas mdapaphyogasamatshungs pa las/_lam gyi spang bya sgrib pa layad gang zag gi bdag 'dzin dang nyon mongs pa can gyimi shes pa dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin ba'i mi shes pasogs kyi tha snyad tsam las/_chos kyi bdag 'dzin dang /_shes sgrib 
sogs kyi tha snyad khas milenano/'bras bu'i do nas brjod nami rtag pa sogs bcu drug po rkyang ba rtsom bsgoms pasatonamongs canagyimi shes pa camaslangs te/dgra bcom pa'i go 'phang mngon byedazhingaman pa'i byang chub dang /_de bzhin du myang 'das gnyis kyis mtshana'/

'gog bden rnams chos dkonamachog dang lam bden dag 'dunadakon mchog tu 'dod pa'o//thabs snying rjechen po la sogs theg chen gyi lam dang rjes su 'brel ba nyams su blangs pas mi shes pa gnyisaka'i sa bon drung nas byung ste/spas pa khyadapar can gsumaldan 
rtogasapakhyad par gsum ldan gyis rang don mthar phyin pa'i bdagashegs gnyis las gzhan don mthar thug skyob pas gdul bya la bden pa bzhi'i chos 'khor bskor te smin grol la 'god pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bur 'dod do
//de'ang rigs kyi sgo nas dbye 
cha 'dod de jo bos/nyan thos rnam bzhi sprul pa dang //rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'gyur ba dang*//_zhi pa grong grub mtha' 'dzin ba'o//zhes bshad pa las/sprul pa'i nyan thosazhi mchog zung dang rab 'byoradangam 'gags pa lha sogs so//myang 'das las ni lhas byin dad drug [840]
me[u]'der bsod rdzogad pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba ni sbyor lam bzodapo thob nas sangasargyasasu 'gyur ba'i tshul bshad ma thag pa mdzod rtsa 'bril gyis bstan to//_zhi ba bgrodapa ni rang lam nas ji ltar bshad pa ltar 'jug pa'o//grub ma[4]'a 'dzin pa ni bsam pa 
theg chenapasanyan thos kyi grub mtha' 'dzin bko'ong mdo sde rgyun las/nyan thos so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa theg chen gyi lam la 'jug pa gnyis las 'phags pa rgyun zhugs dang phyir 'ong 'dod khams su lusartenamacho[a]nyid pa bzung nas theg chen gyi spyod pa bsgrub la phyir 
'od ni sprul pa'i lus kyis gzhadon byedapar gsungs so//ji ltarayang /lhag med kyi ma 'das zhing dag parapad+ma'i sbubs su skyes pa lasangs rgyas gyis bskul sogazhan don byas te/tshogs bsags nas 'tshang rgya ba ni slob dpon klu sgrub kyi dgongs pa'o//theg pa chenapo 

@#/_/sems tsam pa bshad pa'i phyir//gzung 'dzin gnyisasu snang ba'i yulayulacan/_/_kun rdzob bden pa nyid de gang las gzhan/_/gnyis med shes pa don dam bden pa ru//'dodapa sems tsam pa yi grub pa'i mtha'//de la phyi don med kyang bden grub khas lan 
/_ma grub par 'dod pa ni rnam 
dbyinaso so skye bo'i rgyud kyi dbang po'i mngon sum la snang ba'i gzugs rags par snang ba 'di dag snang ba ltar du grub par khas len pa ninam 'donapa dang

ka danaganyisazhi bzhirgya_
rdzun pa'o//sems com pa la'ang lung dang rig pa'i rjes 'brang gnyis la/_slob dpon so so'i bzhed gzhung gi dbye bsdu'i khyad par yod kyang /

nyer gcig

don dam pa'i bden par 'dod pa'o//gnyis pa larnam shematshogs brgyad khamalen pa dag ni kun gzhi rnam shes sgo lnga'i yid dang bcas par ma 'gyus pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo ma bsgribs lung ma bstan du gyura'i gtso bo yid kyi rnam par rig pa can no//de dgra bcom pa'i rgyud 
la'ang yodapas bsgribs lung ma bstan ma yin/dge rtsachad pa'irgyud la'ang yodapas dge ba ma yin/'ams gong ma'i rgyud la yod pas mi dge ba'ang ma yin/_nyon yidazhi dmigs pa'i cha nas kun gzhi dang /_rnam pa'i cha nas rangasems ba'i ngo bo bsgribs lung dum 
bstan pa'o//'jug shes drug pospyi dang mthun kyang tshur mthong gi rgyud kyirang rig dang rnal 'byor mngon sum gnyis las gzhan pa 'khrul pa'i chacan du 'dod pa'o//'on kyang mngon sum ni rtog bral gyi khyab pa can yin no//lam la theg pa dmanamachog gnyis las/dman [\[347]
lam la bden bzhi'i rnam pa mirtag sogs bcu drug la dmigs nas bskal pa rgya mtsho'i bsod namasakyi tshogs dang 'brel bar spyod pa'i yun gyi goms pa dang bsring ba'i khyad par gyi rang rgyal dgra bcom pa'i go 'phang dang /nyan rang gnyis bsgom spungs kyi cha nas khyad par 
mdakyang /bsodanams kyi tshogs dang ma 'brel ba'i gang zag gi bdag medachung pa tsam gyis nyan thosakyi byang chub tsam las mi 'thob bo//da bsan rang rgyal la sde snod logs pa med do//thegachen gyi lam la gang zag rang stobs ldan gyisadz+dzas yod kyis stod pa'i gang zag 
gi bdag med dang /gzung 'dzin rdzas gzhan gyis stong pa dang /kun brtags rang gi mtshan nyid gyis grub pas stong pa'i chos kyi bdag med gsum la dmigasanas grangs med gsum gyi tshogs dang 'brel bar lam lnga dang sa bcu rim gyis bgrod/_gang zag gi bdag 'dzin nyon sgrib dang 

[B ]/_chos kyi bdag 'dzin shes sgrib bradaparaslangs te sku gsumachi'as bu dpaldanapa'i byang chub bla named pa 'dod pa'od 'bras bu'i chazhilhag bcas lhagamed mi gnas pa'i myong 'dus te gsum/_sangs rgyas skugasumakyirnam gzhag dang /
chos skul ngo bo nyid dung ye shes kyi tshos sku gnyis/_lhun grub dang rgyun mi 'tshed pa'irnam gzhag rnams kyang 'dod ba'o/_de drag ni grub mtha'i snying potsamastemachinanyid zhib pa grub pa'i mtha'arin pochir shes par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba

ma

[@]/_/gzhan las min/dganyis las ma yin rgyu med min/_/dngos po gang dag gdan yang //_skye ba nam yang yodam yin//zhes pas/_chos can dngos bo tsam yang don dam par bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka dang rgyu med pa lasam skyes pa gang zhig laskye

'dod pa de'itshochad par 'gyur na zhes pa lasogs bshadapa'i phyir/_

1_don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du rtogs na'ang kun rdzob de bas logs su dmigs pa'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'dasapami thob par 'gyur ba dang /_kunardzob dang dngos po tha dad pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa de kun rdzobagyi bden pa'i chos nyid ma yin par /

'gyur te/

tsa_

[I]sharaphanang gsangajus[@ ]skyashadra'ajogapaganyis kaTirnam pa dang don spyil sogs pangon dang shes pa'i ngo bo gnyis ka ma yin pa bzhin du 'jig rten na grags tshod kyi dngos po ridang khang khyim 'gro ba dang /_rdzusakyirnamapa lasogs pa'ang /_phyi don dang shes pa'i dngos po gnyis sa sanga'anyon
du b+hagamamadapanas bodomasapa'am ra'ipa'i bgachagasakyisamed bzhin du snang bar zad pas/kun rdzob tu yod pa'i dngos po 'dzin char gsal ba'i bde galasogasab sems dang sems las byung ba 'ba' zhig tu zad par 'dodapa sogs rnam gros du ma smos kyad/nyan thos bye brag pa lta 
rdzulaphun 'dus pa las rags pa brtsam pa'i dngos po mchin nyid padang /_semasasems byung rang rig pa mdabar rtsa ba lasogs 'dod tshul gzhan yang yod mod kyi/_don du snang ba shes par mi 'dod pa dang /_lang rgyu mamalas skyes pa sogs mtshungs pamed la/_de'ang soms rtsom 
pa ltararang rig khami len kyang /_yod med gang du'ang me pa'i ye shes tsam zhig khas blad pa ste/_'grel chung las/_so sorang gi rig pa'i ye shes kyis zhes bshad pa bzhin no//da nargyumatshan nyid kyi theg pa'i tshemor phyin pa dbu ma thala'agyur pa'i tshulani/_'di ltar snang ba nyid ni 
kun rdzob dang /_/_stong pa don dam zhes[g]tha snyad kyis//btags pa gangayang spros pa'i mtha' dang bral//snang dus nyidanas skye 'gag 'gro'odamed//gzhan dbang dam por 'dod pa'i kun rdzobakyang //de yi grub pa'i mtha' ru bsam blangs/_/de ni thal 'byung shing rta'i srol 'byedache/
kludabang zla ba grags pa'i khyad chos yin/_/'dir ni thog ma'i rnamapa thams cad la//_cad cing brtags pas gong mnor mi 'gyur//bdi ltar snang ba nyid kun rdzob dang /_stong pa nyid don dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i thos bsam las byung ba'i shes pasachos thams cad bden 

ka_pa gnyis kyi tshul du slob par ston pa skye/_tshu rol mthong ba'i blo can bden pam mthong ba rnams kyi dor bsnyad la brtenanas zhen pa'i bsam pas spyarab tsamamo//bdenapa gnyis kyang yang dag par na gcig dad thami dad bar bstan te/_gcig 
ni kun rdzob spyodapa bzhin du don dam yadad ltar du 'gyur la/_kun rdzob tha dad pa bzhin du don dam yang de bzhin dang /_kun rdzob dri ma dang bcas pa bzhin du don dam yang dri bcas su 'gyur ro/_/_tha dad nani chos can nyid du yang mi 'gyur la/_'dus byas kyi mtshanam bril gyis 
tshugazhon par yangami 'gyur ro//lam bsgom pa yang don dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro//de bas na gcig dang tha dad pa la ni rang rgyud kyi gtan tshogs yod pas thal 'gyur bar mi 'gyur ro//brdarabatags kyi grub pa'i mtha' 'dis ni gzhan gyi dam bca' 'gog cing*/_radargyud kyi gtan[ 35|]
tshigs khas len thams cad dang bralabs pha rol gyi dam bca' 'gog pa'i 'gal chos thal 'gyur gyi sgo nas gtso bor byed pas thal 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/dpal ldananA gArdzunas/_gal te ngas dam bca' 'ga' yod/_/de tshong laskyon de yod/_/nga la dam bca' med pas na//
'den gis shing rta bzhi brgya nyer drug 
nga ni skyonamed khon yin/_/zhes dang /_'phags pa lhas/_yod dang med dang yodamad ces/_/gang la phyogs ni yod min pa/_/de la yunani ring po'ang/_/klanaka brjod par zhusam yin//zhes lo dang sang rang gi mtshananyid dang*/_rang rgyud dang*/_rang rig khas mi len pa'i khyad par bden 
'dzinakon sgrib tu 'dod pa dang /_bdag medaganyis la phra rags mi 'byed pa'i khyadapar/_'gog bden don dam ba dang*/_nyanarang 'phagasapa chos kyi bdag medartogs pas khyab par khas len pa'i khyad par/_so skye'i shes pa 'khrul shes dang /_dpyad shes tshad mar

@#/_/_ma'i lta bar 'dod kyi/_/gtan la 'bebs yul gyi stong nyid mtha' bral dbu ma'i lta bar 'dod zhu zhi mtha' bzhi po de kamathar 'dzin gyi lta bar 'gyur bas mtha' dang mthar 'dzin gyi khyad par ma phyed pa yin te/_ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi

རྣམ་དག་དང་། ། བློཔོ་བྱ་དོར་བྱའི་སྤྲོས་བཀུན་བྲལ་བ། ། ལྟ་བའི་ཡུལ་དུ་ཚངས་པ་བ་ཡང་འདོད། །མཐའ་བྲལ་ལྟ་བའང་ཕྱིནང་གཉིསཀའདོད།རིག་བྱེད་མཐའ་བྲལབསྒྲུབ་པའི་མཐུན་དཔེར་ནི། ། རྨི་ལམདྲི་ཟའི་གྲོདཁྱེར་འཛིན་པ་ཡོགས།དེ་འདྲའི་རྣམ་བཞགམུ་སྟེགས་ཁྱོད་] asg
pa'ang smra//_gnyisamed bde ba zab lamamachog yin zhes//thosachung gang dag mchog tu 'dzin na'ang //dbang phyug bsakyang de kun gsal bar 'dod/_rang bzhin mgrub 'dzin medami rtog cing /_/cir yang ma grub dwangs la'agagamed pa'i/_/_lta ba'i nyams len zhang zhung bon/

zla_@#_/_/_phyir ma rig 'joms nus pas/_/_de dganang nas stong nyid lta bamachog_/_man ngag lugs la'ang bdagadaparnamarig sogs/_/_phyi nang 'chol ba'i lag len mang mod kyi/_/dalta bod na grags pa'i semam 'chol gcig_/bsam 
shu_gortan dkrog pa'i rnam g.yeng tshosasu mthong /_/ka shasems dang sems nyid rang lus kyi/_/phyinang kunal rnamapar btsal na/_/btsal bas ma rnyed yulatsan shes rab sogs/_gnasaskabs shig tu lta b.ra'adod na'ang/_/blos byas gzung 'dzin spros pa kun bral 
བློ ''བའི། །གཉུག་མའི་ཡེ་ཤེསརང་ངོ་འཕྲོད་པ་ཡི། ། ཤེས་པ་གསལ་དྭངས་རྟོག་མེད་ཡེ་ཤེས་དེ། །བསྒྲུབ་རྒྱུདཀུན་གྱི་བསྟན་པའི་གཙོ་བོ་ཡིན། །རྗེས་ཐོབ་དུས་ཀྱི་ཐ་སྙད་དེ་ལྟ་ནའང་མཉམ་གཞག་དུས་མུམཐོའ་བྲལ་ནམ་མཁའི་དབྱིངས། བལྟ་བྱ་ལྟ་བྱེད་སྒྲ་རྟོག་འཇུག། Lare

rton byed/_/_zhang zhung bon dang mustegs byed la yang /_/mngasargyas bstanadang 'dra mtshungs bcos pa yi/_/rnam gzhag de 'dra shin tu mang ba'i phyir/_/chos lugs 'ga' zhig dogs pa'i gnas su mthong /_/'ga' zhig 'di na 'phagasamachog rnam gnyis kyi/_/rigs pas bkral ba'i

dpyad pa dang bral bas/_/_lagapa'i lam du mngon zhen mi 'dor bar/_/_rang nyid khas len gzhan la 'doms pa dag_/bshad dang bsgrub pa'i chos tshul kun mthong zhing /_/bsam sbyor dman pos gzhanargyud mi bsreg pa/_/yid ches lung dang rnam dag rigs pa yis/_/rtsod 
b.ra'adod na rtsod pa'i skabs bye zhig_/_tsho'adi'i che thabs rnyed bkur lhur blangs nas/_/_ba rol brnyas dang phrag dog 'granasems kyis/_/rang nyid bsgom dang gzhan la 'doms kyang rung /_/_sgo gsum bya ba phal cher don med yin/_/de phyir blo gsal klog ba lhur len 
rnams/_/rang gzhan grub mtha'i rnam dbye legs rtogasanas/_/sngar bshad mkhas pas bkral ba'i bshadasrol la/_/rnam dpyod brtson pas thos pa'i pha mthar skyel/_/rig pa'i gnas la thos bsam mthar phyin nas/_/thos pa'i don rnams don yod bya ba'i 

/phyir [(]ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i bya ba lhur blangs nas/_/dben pa'i gnas su rang rgyud smin par mdzod/_/rang rgyud smin nam 'khor mang dbus su_//dri med gzhung la rig grolaslobasab yis/_/rtsod btsamamakhas pa'i bya ba rnam gsum 
gyis/_/gcig tu bstan pa 'ba' zhig lhag par dgongs/_/'chadab rna ba'i bdud rtsi lha yi dbyangs//'jigs med spobs pam zadachubo'irgyun/_/rtsom phreng thub bstan mdzes pa'i khang bzang rgyun/_/_dadag gsum gyis gzhan la 'doms par mdzod/_/dgos dusatshig 
don mtshams sgyur brgal lan bcas/_/bsgrub dang sun 'byin tshor ma dbyung la mkhas//_sgra gnas brgyad kyi tshig sbyor kunatshang ba'i//'tshad khyodatsom ba'ang de ltaratshim bar mdzod//ne tso'i 'don bsamakhas par rlom pa dag/tshul 'chos spyod pas btsun par [ \[ 861]
ka bdon gnyes shing rta byazhibargya so gcig 
'chos pa dang /_/_stong pa'i 'ud kyis bzang por brdzu drub yi//klog pa pa de 'jig rten sgyum mkhan/_/'gro kun srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir//gcig tu bstan pa 'ba' zhig nyer dgongs nas/_/rnam dag gzhung lugs nyan dang 'chad pa yi/_/_klog ba pa de  
lha yi mchod gnas yin//rnam rig mkha' dang stong par blta ba dang /_/dran tshor 'od shes gsal cha dor ba yi/_/_zhi gnas tsam la'ang zab lamamachog yin zhes/_/sgom chen 'ga' zhig nan gyis 'jug pa mthong /_/gsal stong rig pa dang dangs mi ldan 
pa'i/_/_zhi bar gnas munatshom med tsamadud 'gro'i khrod na'ang mang //zab lam bral ba'i chos kun rnam rig dang /_/mkha' sogs sgom pa gzugs med lhala'ang yod /_yid byed bulatsam zab lam mchog tu 'dod//gzhan dang ma 'brel de nyid bsgoms 

pa'i 'bras/_/bskal chen brgyad khrir tshe yi dngos grub 'byu_/_da phyir lta khrom gnas la mkhas par mdzod//dam pas bkral ba'i lam srolarmad du byung /_/dpyad dang 'jog ba'i sgom tshul rnam pa gnyis//rtog dang mirtogasbyor ba'i dus yin gyis//dngos 
gzhi'i dus su yid byed bral bar mthun/_/_sbyor ba'i dus su mtshon ma 'byung ba'i gzhi//_de nyid dpyadabu'i rten du nges byasanas//_mtha' bzhirnam grol dngos gzhi'i dus su ni/_/gsal stong 'dzin med sngonarabasamakhas pa'i lugs/_/_dngos gzhi'i dus 
su yid byed mi ldan na/_/dpyad pasngonAkhaMtang gnyid log skabs dang mtshungasaM/_/des na dus der stong ba nyid do zhes//rtog cing dpyod pa phyis 'byung mkhas pa'i lugs/_/rtag dang dpyod pa'i blos byas kun dor nas/_/gnyug ma'i ye shes rang das rjen pa de/_/bod mdag [ a62]
bzomedam yi pas slar yang 'phro ba'i tshe//rang zhal blta ba'ajog bsgom lugs yin no/_/_dpyad dang 'jog pa'i bsgom tshul ci yang rung /_/rang gi mtshan nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal ba//gsal dwangs sharalabasgom med ma yengs pa//_sgrub rgyud kun gyi bsgom pa'i 
gtso bo yin//_mnyam gzhag dus kyi nyams len de lta na'ang /_/rjes thob dus su gang shar snang bkun/_/rmilamasgyu ma'i dran 'dun drag po yis//_legs par bsgomasan snadang dbyer med 'char_/bde chen 'khor khor pad dkar nyi zla'i steng /_rtsa ba'i bla ma gsum 
ldan rdo rje 'chang/_/sas rgyas dngos su zhen mang mos gus kyis/_/ma yengs gsol 'debs lam srol kun tu gces//sems nyid ngo sprod tha snyad rnama'angayang /_/gnyug ma'i ye shes rang zhal bltas pa na/_/_shes pa gsal dwas zung 'jug ye shes te//rnam dag 

/chos skur kun gyis ngo sprod mdzod/_bsam gtan gsum dang bzhi pa'i tang 'dzin dang //gzugs med bzhi la srid pa'i sems rtse gcig_/bde gsal stod pa'i mi rtog gol sa yin/_/lam dang golasaTirnam dbye mkhyen 
par mdzod/_/_sangs rgyas sku dang sha za'i gzugasal sogs/_/tshogs drug yuladu snang ba gang shar yang /_/gang sharasemasad sems nyid stong ba ru//_legs par rtogs na bar chad dngos grub 'gyur//bde gsal mi rtog yul snang gsal mthong dang*//
mkha'al 'bur dang chu ste bgrod la sogs/_/mchog 'dzin na nga yang rtogs pas ma zin na/_/nyams snang snatshogs dbang bo'i gzhu dang mtshungs/_/sngags rdzas gnyis dang bsgoms pa'i stobs sogs gyis/_/_rlung sems 'chol ba'i nyams snang sgyu tshogs la/[ as3]
mgu pa bskyedapa'i sgom chen mang modakyi/_/_mcher g.yeng ba'i g.yang la lhung nyenatshe/_/mdo nag zhig nyams su blangs pa las/_/drung sogasadage pa dang gis 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/chags sogs mi dge dang gsa'abribagyur na/_/_chos de rgyalapa'i lagla _ _ 
bzung rmad du byung /_/shapas ri'i mguladang mthon po'anags khrod sogs/_/thar 'dod skye bo'i bsti gnas nyams dga' bar/_/'dod chung chog shes bsodasnyoms 'tsho ba dang /_/phyag dar khrodapyidamanaba'i gos gyon la/_/_legs gsum 'dul ba'i bslab 
las 'da'azhing /_/_rgyal grwas spyod ba'i lam la ring nas slobs/_/spang bshad srol phyi ltasgom spyod nga yis//da lan tsho la btsanas zin par mdzod//rang don nyams len rtogs pa'i khor yug dang /_gzhan don 'brelatshod den ldan mngon gyur nas/_/rang gi 

nyams myong gzhan rgyud gdams parnams/_/_snod ldan 'grolatshul bzhin 'doms par mdzod/_/_bya btang khas lematsho'adi'izhin pas bcings//'khrul zhig khas len gzung 'dzin du bar chud//grub thob khas len rtogs pas rgyud dben pa'i/_/slong pa de 'jig 
rten sgyu ma mkhan//rnamo dag 'dul ba'i khrimasakyis legs bsdumaso nas/_/rgyal sras spyod pa'i bsam spyod rmad du byung /_/_gsang chen lamagyi rnam 'byor mingaman pa'i/_/_spong ba pade lha mi'i mchod gnas yin/_/_zhes so//de ltabu'i mtshan nyid thams cad thosapa dang bsam 
klagyurab 'barten nag zhags 'og tu chud pas rgyal ba bden par sla bas drang nges ldem dgongs bzhir bstanipa'i bka' dngos dang 
'phags pa'i yul gyi dgongs 'grol mkhan po de dag gis phyin ci log bzhi'i gnyen por stong pa nyid kyi dngos don gcig

thog mar ni/_/thams cad yod cesabarjodapar@#/_/don dmartogasashibachags med la//_de nAsarnam par dben don nyid/_/ces bshad pa ltar ro//_de bas na yang dag dang /_ltar snang dang /_gnyis ka ma yin pa dang /_'dod zhen gyis sgyur ba thams cad _

[1: | ]ka_/bcom zhing /_phyi'i rgol pa danagayu'ajigs pa med pa'i spobs pa rgya chen po thub pas/_bdud sdig to can gyi sems kyi 'jug las kyang rgyugs phulta kyis mi ma ti/_phred med kyi bus pa yis/_rigs kyi bu thos pa dang ldan na 
las rab 'byung bar 'gyurar/_/_shes rab dang ldanon nyinatse su yi sa tu zhi bar 'gyur mod_/'on chos ming la mi mang kyis glugs minyid yo ga zhesaso/_/'dir bzung na gnyis kyi bzhugs tshul la/_/_spyi bos brjod mang don dam brtan pa yin//_blo

bskye/_yulacan ye shes kyi 'jugaba'ang zhipa de'i tshogIs dang sems las byung pa'i 'jug thums cad rgyun chad de las brjod du med pa'i chos nyid rtag tu ni rten dam pa'i bden pa ste/_dkon mchog brtsegasapa las/[ /]3_3dasungs don yin pa stong pa

phugs nas sa

@#/_/par du ngo bo 'od dang bral ba'o/_/_zhes so/_de mid 'di lta'i nga ba'ajim tshogs su snang de tsi'amu rag mi ngo gnyid dus su rje[ag]ba zhis de lta bu kun khro ba tsamadu'ang med de/_lang kar gshegs pa las/_ji ltar gzugs rnams ma 
long la/_/gcig dang gzhan rnams rnam grangs _slar yang de ni yod ma yin/ shing gis gatshudas pa gdo/_/_te 'a[w]na thu[ =]da gnyis ka'i gzhung chung zhamasaru/_bden paramed/_ngo bo nyid kyisamed/_de kho nar med/_ces pa la sogs pas don 
dmal dpyod pa'i rtags kyi dgag bya phra mo thams cadagagapa'iganam bas mtha' dag tuchos chu'i mthun spyod du khyab pa med pa'alta'ol nyid la brten nas gdags pa yazhig dbu ma'i lam bu 'dod pa'i tshul/_rtsa shelas/_rten cing 'brelapar 'khyud ba [ Is69]
gdad /_/de ni stong pa nyid du bshad/_/de'i tshe'i las 'dags pa ste/_/de nyid dbu ma'i lam yin no/_/zhe6lo//de lta bu'i lam gyi blos gtod pa'i tshul/_dag dang ma dag glo bur ba//don lazos da kyang med bzhin snang /_/kun tu btags pas nye bar len//rtog cing dpyod

///de lta bu'i 
de lta bu'i ltos ba byung don dam par skye 'jug gzhi gsum dang bral ba'i tshularnam par rig pa can kyi shes pa 
gnam mchis pa'i drin las shes par byar yod de/res pa drug cu gang/thon+tisuming dmigs pa yid mi yi'i_'a[Qw]par rigang byan gyi gdusanomig sogs drab_/dmigs pa'i gzugs sogs[gQj]myo_pan kun gzhi bag chags/_gnasapani rnam 
[h]par shesapa skye bzhi pa de dag na [3]brel rtem rgyu zhi tshun lcos grub tu gnas kyakhamado las/_chus shu[NSq]gzhimadapa'/[\]]zhes dub chos kyi rgyali shi'i ri ngo_go_da kyi phu thu'i bar gro'i garatongan/[ 3]dod[Q] na ga btsadalase[av]gsum mi [ ero]
na_/_ga dban [5]ra du da lu byung med pa'i nga[g]ma btang nga se[s]kyi de banyid kyi[ % ]lan steng pas/_sem[N]kyid nyidanu'agro22[gs]'dub[acjs1ag]bka[z]nga_7ga ba[n]nga chung /_du+i[u]nga mang ba 'di'i ming ni byang chub [11 @ ]sa sa

ka_
yin dris/_/de la de ni yod min pas/_/_smra bar nus pamayin no/_/zhes so/_/gnyis pa 'khor ba'i rten cing 'brel 'byung ni/_/snang yul sa chu me rlung mkha'/_/ri dunganags chilakhang bu brtsegs/_/'du byasargyu lam thams cad skyes 
'khor brten cing 'brel 'byung yin/_/'di ltar lang kar gshags srol sogs pa zab mo'imado sde dgalas kun gzhi'i rnam par shesapa dgongs pa can gyi gsungs pa des/_thogamar mustegs can gyi lugs bsal ba'i don chenapo 'dren par 'gyur ba dang 
bden gnyis shing rta _
byinam gsung rab zabamo'i don rig pa rnams kyis kun gzhi'i rnam shes yod par 'dzin pa spong ba nyid de/_'dir re zhig 'khor ba'irten cing 'brel 'byung can dag ni shes partog med yengs thabs kyi dus snang yul 'dzin pa'i kun gzhi dang /gsal[873]
snang la der 'dzin mi 'jug pa de'i rnam shes/_de sgo lnga'i yul la dgag bsgrub gzung 'dzin du rten cing 'brelapasarnam shes bdun du btags pa'i 'khrul ngo la 'byung ba lnga dang /_redang /nags tshal dang*/_khang brtsegs dang*/rtsom dang /snam bu dang re lde dang /_sa bon 
las myu gu dang /_zho las mar bskyed pa ji bzhin ngu 'du byed kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bem pomatha' dag ni phyi nyinacing 'brelapara'abyung ba ste/_gcig la gcig bltos kyi tshul du byung ba'o/_/de skad du/_lang kar gshegasapa las/_blo gros chen po/ji ltar 'dzin 
bzhi brgya so bdun 
pa'i gong bu las rdza ma byung ba de bzhin du thag las snam bu dang /rtsiskyang las re lde dang /sa bon las myu gu dang*/_srub ma la sogs pa mi'inan tan dang zho lamamar 'byung ba 'di ni/_blo grosachen po/_phyi'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung bsdam laphyimar 

'byung ba'o//zhes so//nang gi rten cing 'brela'abyung nu marigapa las 'du byed ste/_/de bzhin gcig lab cig brten gyis/_/_shi'i bar du 'brel pazhi/_/zhang girten cing 'brel par 'byung /_/de la theg pa chen po'i lugasani sngar bshad zin la/_'der nyan thosakyisde snod kyi dbang du 
byasan/chosnga ma'i nyon mongs paspyod dus kyi phung po de ni marig pa'o/_/de bzhin du phra ma'i lasagasog dus kyi phung po wani 'du byed do/_/nga nasama'i mngal du nying mchimasusbyor ba'i gnasaskabs kyi phung po lnga'i rnam shes so//de nas mer mer po lasogs 'gyur ba'i gnasaskabs lnga 
nyamasasumyong nas dbang po'i sgomadodakyi bar gyiphung po lnga ni ming dang gzugs_//dbang po' sgo dod nas yul 'byed mi sapa'i bar gyi phung po lnga na skyemad drug go_/dbang po yula'asad pa sa babu stebade sdug gi bye brag mi shis pa'i bar gyi phung powan rig pa'o//bde sdugastas byed[s74]
'khrig pa bsten nus pa sabazung ste 'dod pa'i yul dang du ma blangs kyi bar gyi phung po lnga na srid pa'o/_/'dod pa'i yul dang du blas pa'i gnas skabs kyi phung powanilen pa'o/_/de nas

@#/_/sdugalasogs[2\] ]/chu shes nusab tshun chad do//tshor 'khrig tshun chad sred pa'i//longasaspyod 'khrig pachagasacan gyi/_/nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams/_/thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa//de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i/nying mtshams spyor 
bskye ba yin/_/tshor pa'i bar ni rga shi yin/_zhes dang /_stsalu ljang pa las klad/_ming dang gzugasakyi skye mched gang yin pa de ni rga shi'o/_/_skye ba stetshor ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o//zhes so//de lta bu'i rten 'brel bcu gnyis rdzogasatshul laskad cig dang rgyun chagasaganyis

པའིཚུལ། བྷ་ག་ལའི་པཎྜི་ཏས། སློབ་དན་འཕགས་པ་ཐོགསམེད་ནི་ཡང་དད་པ་གཉིས་ཚུམེདལའི་ཡིasumadapa'i yidi[g]nga mi bzhud la@ གྱུར་མི་བཤད་ལ། རྨ་པོ་རེདཔའི་ཡིད་ཀྱིgzg<0ཡོལ༦༢t < ཡི་བཞེད་དེ་ཨ་ རི་བུ་ཕྱག་བརིགgཆོ% %83ང་སྐྱིད་སྐྱིད་

nga'acha' la' dang /_'jamapalertsa ba'irgyudachen pornamasamu yad du ya[q]nga 'dabastan pa'i 21ga'[pys @ ]sa khyadi ga'u nyal yagazhin[d]phu_phulubud don ngo 5[,]zhepa'i_/wu'ugatsamadzad chogazhoms chos kyi skur gyur cing de'i rishes kyang rtogapa/

nang 
[1:|:]kyis29khor[4: ]ma ltang la//_thugs kun kyis ma na 'us shus_rgyu mi 'dang bas nga rang lugs pa de bzhin bshegs[c]karing ba'i mod las rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dbang na me'i rgyu las 'bar ti/_rgyu med na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_bzhin du dmigs pa las_/
mas 'dun gyi gsad soms zhi gal [<1 ]/de bas_ myu'i_kyangagyi ma dpa'ashes bya'i sha lngal mdza[N]u rog ris dmigs pa nyi yul zhebu'adu shes_/dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa mang zhi bar[ 3ss]
ka bden gnyis shing rta bzhibacu zhe gsum

'disani sgro skur gyi ra b+ha' spa sa pa'i dbu ma'i lam mkhyed pa_/_yin[u]'i [ng] ngan la/_thapaspyirjed kyi u pa ti[ag]92 lho'i ba dang /_mtsho las kyang ri[a]zhin gshegs pa ni thabs dpas rab kyis bskyed pa gzhan 
klo*mu [21ag]da pa tshos bya tshulnga ldan du bab nas

mar 

duti shes 'ga'ati gtib+hawan chud parnams kyis dus thamus rabasnyenus na bla spyi byedu 'bya' zhig ni bgano/_zhes so/gal te sheng du bu[a:]ba'i thugs 'gyud pachen po dang ldan yang mu stegs can gyilam bzhin du phyin ci log kho nas 'ching ngo /_/
de bzhin du thabs dang brel ba'i shes rig gling nyan thos 'azhi'ami_ta'akhrid dang mi ldan khyen yab+ha gcigatshun myang 'dasal gzhol ba'i phyir/_shin tu mit+taman zhig pa'i gnas skabs dag tu thabs la brten pami 'byung du zin kyang sbyor ba 'am/_rjes la thob pa'i 
tshathabs shes gnyisagacig can zhajug pa ste/_tshul shes na ba lasnying de yi rje bas rgyud la brten la chog du yum ni/_spyir 'thatshan mchog man chu du[1]la1sa rjes spyod dang skyed 'brema'asu zhes smos nas/'di ltar mnyam gzhag tu stong nyid dang rjes thob [ 886]
snying rje'i snying po can gyi sbyin pa la sogs pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ma[a]2'bad ba bar la 'jug bzhi thogs kyi lam ste/_theg chen gyi sems bskyed gsar du skyes pa'i rten la pa yin pa des thegachen sems bskyed dang por thob nusatshogs lamachudapur 
'jug zhus pa yin la bsgom tshul phyi bal ya'atshan patshog sa kas do la lha 'phying chung gsum gnyi_ rum yun nyi khar gzhag bzhi la basmim bzhi dang po lumadran paskyabar gzhagapanamanyam gzhag tu nam mkha' ltar sgom zhing /rjes thob tu mi gtsang ba dang /
sgyu ma lta bu'i bsgom pa'o//tshor ba dran pa nye rigazhag lamanyami la zhes pa yo ba dang go rjes thob tu tshor srabar dag blug basprul ba chu shing lta na spyi la med par bsgomamo//sems dran pa nyer gzhag mnyam gzhag tu 'ad bzhin gyis stong ba dang /rjes thob tu mi 

ku@#/_/2gag lami kunasu par bsgom mo/_/chos dran pa nyer gzhag na mnyam gzhage chus nyam pa shen dang*/rjes thog lus ma'i dpe brgyad lasog[i]paratsha mod/de'ang chung ngur dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi bsgoms pas mthong lam gyi bden pa bzhil 
gnyis pa tsho la ma gi gan+tit+ta ngu shes kun 'byung gling ba la'ajug go_/gsum pa semasami rtag par bsgoms pas rtag 'dzin 'gog pa

gzhagag pa bsgom/[ 499 Sz]gas nas 'bab du mi dge ba'i nyis shu lon ma sa[s]rnam mibaskyed skye77rgyun gtsapa'i phyiradang[t]2kacho[Rj]rna[ty@ ]sku bskyed/_skyes pa gang du sel ba'i phyir brtson pas 'jug cing gnyen po bdag med pa dang /_sgyu 
ma'amalam sogs bskyom 'du de nyid las mithun phyogs dang gshen po rnams/_/rnam po tha[8j]sa cad yodza[4%]zhesazhasu/_lag spyalta phyi'i bskyon[Qg $1:]rnam thu'i ragarab tu 'byung[\] ]zhesaso/[j]tshogs lam chen por rdzu 'bras gyi rkang pa bzhin/_'dun 
[5]sa[g]
_'gus/_sems spyod pa'i do'adzub gzhi'i _ga_yomanyos zhing spyan [31]gis bsam gtan gyisaMms ma su tshung skyob kyis 'grub pas[sg48]gyi rkang pa zhes bya ste[jj]stam las de gnas las su rung ba nyidi[1]don rnams thamasacad 

'byed par 'gyur//zhes so/
de'i rjes la ma bar mi rtogapa'i yathosamathong lami 'tshub tu sbyor bas sbyor ba'i lamameg lus kyi don ni 'gro ba lnga gang rus

pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang/ shis la skye ba'i lo lnga'abro chos gnyis su dad pa'i stobs la sogi_
bathun pa ljabasgom lci dbus ma'i las dbang po ldadad skyebs ltadad ngesa'abyedachamathun gnyis gnyis so
//zhes so//deyang rnam byang bskyed de
pas dbang po dngamamathun phyogasajomes pos babasazhes bya stegs ma las/_thar patshadang mthun phyiskyedanaso[\] ]ri'anyer dpus dub byed de yis ma do brjodapem gyurd_mi' sha rnam par 'khyer spyad do/_/zhes dang rgyun las momathun phyogasanyams chung bas[a88]
no/_/do dganyor stobs zhis zhes 'a'a'o zhes kyi tsho byin[A $ ]
nga ba'i nu ka'ib kyis shis paru[g]pa'i don myur brjes brtson 'gar kyisamo[j]dzinus mi bar/[ # ]
nga nge 'dzin gyis gshesarab kyis rang bzhin shes pa'i tshul gyis bsgomaba'[\]]
de'ang des bur 'byed pa'i chabazhi lachung 'phrin chen po'i dbyibs btsugazhis su gnas bzhir mtsho'i rtogs rgyan lasar ltad des 'bye'u cha mthun ning dang ba'i nga chen po yin
/_ces so//
dedag la rim bzhin theg pachen shi[Y]dub thob padang /_/
bamadzadapa dang /_ches[9]nga ba[S]gas gcig pa la zhugs pa dang /_de ma zlogo la'i ste[Q]na zhes[g]ma[n]pa'i 'du po ni_/_chos thamasacu[s/ ]kyi_

/_pa'i gnyen po byed pas dro bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/_rgyan las/_de dang de 'drar gyur pa yi//_byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag pas//_yid kyi brjod pa ma rtogasapar/_/donakun rab tu mi mthong ngo //zhes so//gnyis pa_/_shes 
snad de da sdon pas gsal bar gyur pas chosi snang ba 'bal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtan par bya ba la 'jug pas rtse mo zhes bya ste/_chos kyi snang ba 'phel bya'i phyin//brtson 'grus brtan pa kun tu brtsam/[\] ]zhes so//gsum pa ni/_de kho na nyid kyi phyogs 
gcig la zhugs pas phyi don gzung ba'i rnam pamisnang bas shes pa'i rnamapa'abyung ba de'i tsho sems tsam la gnas pa'i phyir bzod bzhes byasde/_chosakyi snang ba 'phel nas ni//semasatsam la ni gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas don kun snang ba ni/_/_sems su[ess]
dus su rdzogs 
pas chosakyimachog ces bya ste/_denas de la 'dzin pa yi/_/rnam par g.yeng ba 'ba' zhig bsdus//zhesaso//'di man chad kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo mnyam gzhag gi cha ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes stong pa nyid dang /_du laso langs pa'i rjes thob ni snying rje 
chen po'i chartog bcas rtog med ci rigs su yod pa'o//de ltar chos mchog chen po 'di ni thog chen mthong lam dang gzhan gyis bar mchod pa yin te/_detshobar chad medapa yi//ting nge 'dzin lamyur du regaces so//de'ang drod rtse gnyis ni chung du ste/_/

mthong lam skye ba la dus ma nges pa'i sbyor lamamo//bzod pa ni 'bring ste rmi phyim la mthong lam skye bar nges pa'i sbyor lam nyid do//chos mchog ni chen po ste tshod nyid lamathong lam skye ba'i sbyor lamamo/_/de 'ang thabs la brten pa'i gnas skabs 'di ni byang chub sems 
dpa' sgyum mkhan ltar phyin ci ma log pa'i phyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes la sbyor ba'i lam thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel bar 'jug cid mes pa shin tu brtan pa com du budapas/_bdag med gnyis kyi de kho na nyid mngon sum dumi byed pas mos pas spyod 
pa'i sar bzhag ste/_lam 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni so so skye bo yin mod kyi/_'on kyang khyad par gyi chos lnga dang ldan par 'phags pa dkonamachog sprin las bshad de/_gnyen po'i khyad par la sun 'byin pa'i/_spong ba'i/_rten gyi thag bsring gi[ 890]
gnyen po bzhi dang /_spangs ba'i khyad par la sgrib pa'is bon dang mngon gyur nyams smad pa dang /_byis pa'i phongs pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang /_rtogs pa'i khyad par ni bsgoms byung gis nas bdag med gnyis rtogs pa dang /_yon tan gyi khyad 
par ni ting nge 'dzinang /_spyan dang /_mdon shes dang /_rdzu 'phrul la sogs du ma dang ldan pa dang /_tshogs lam las 'phags pa'i khyad par ni/_tshogs lam chen po'i gnas skabs dang bsgoms byung du 'dra yang /_mthong lam la nye ring dang ye shes la 
da brtan mi brtan gyi khyad yod par brgyad steng 'grel chen las/_bar chad med na mthong ba'i lam ches nye bar 'byung zhes pa 'di'i khyad par du rig par bya'o//mthong lam thob nas gnyis po ni//zung du 'jug cing 'du 'bralamed//rab tu dga' ba dang po'isam/

@#/_/chos nyid bden pa mngon sum mthong //zhes smos nas/_gang gi tshe chos mchog gi rjes thogs de nyid du 'gro ba lha gang yang rung ba'i lus kyi rten la bsam pa'i rten ni bsam gtan bzhi paste/'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shesaspros pa thams cad 
ba'i de kho na nyid yang dag par mthong ba la zhugs pas mthong lam thob pa zhes bya ste chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba thob pa yinano//de skad du blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa'i mdo las/_'dod pa dang gzugasan spyodapa'i lha'i bu rnams/_/

[# ]las dang po thogachanatshogs sbyor gyi lam mo//gas pani bsgomalam dang mi slob pa'i lam gnyis so//gsum pa lamatshan nyid/_mtshan gzhi/_bya ba/_khyad chos dang bzhi las/_dang po ni/_theg pachen po'i chos brjod dang chos shes/rjes bzod dad 
rjes shesate bzhitshan bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa la theg chen mthong lam gyi tha snyad bya rung du mtshon thogachen gyi sbyor lam rdzogs ba'i rjesal 'byung zhing de nyid kyis bsdus pa'i dge ba gang zhig theg pa chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsgom 

lam skad cig dang po rgyud la skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o//gnyis pa ni/_bden ba bzhi bo re re la'ang chos shes pa'i bzodapa/_chos shes pa/_rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa rjes ushes pa bzhi bzhi ste brgyad tshan gnyis 'khor dang bcas pa ste rgyan las/_sdug bsngal la  
sogs bden pa la//_chos shes rjesau shes pa dang /bzod shes skad cig bcudrugazhi//zhesaso//sa'i dbang du byasan/_'jigarten las 'das pa'i ye shes dad por mngon du byas pa 'tsho byung chub lanye ba dang /_gzhan don grub par mthong ba'i dga' ba rgya chen po 
sngonachad mamyong ba thob pas rab tu dga' ba ste/_de nyid las/_byang chub la yang nye ba dang /_sogs le'u drug par drangs pa ltar dang /_gsum pa ni/_sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog bden bzhi'i rim pa'i ra la 'ang chos bzod lasogs skad cig bcu drug gi rang 
bzhin hun nums so/_/bzhi pa lanas gses lnga las/_dang po la gnyen po'i khyad bar dad spungs pa'i khyad par gnyis kyi dang po ni/_rgyud bla ma las/_ser sna la sogs rnam rtog gdu/_nyonamongs pa yi sgrib par 'dod//'khor gsum rnam bar rtog pa gang //de nyi 
shes bya'i sgrib par 'dod/_/ces pas nyon sgribakun btags pa rnams ni mthong sbangs yin pas de'i sa bon rtsa banas spyod ba'i gnyen po'i khyad par chos bzod bzhi na bar chad med pa'i lam mo/_/_chos shes bzhin rten gnyen pornam grol gyi lam mo//rjes bzod 
bzhi dang rjes shes bzhin thag bsring gi gnyen po khyad bar can lam mo/_/de'ang sdug bsngal kun 'byung /_'gog pa/_lamagyi chos shes ba bzhi/_blo rjes gtsang gi ngo bo bden bzhi'i ldog chas bzhir phyob bzhin_/_rang rang gi rjes bzod dang /_rjes su shes 

zla[| ]@#/_/pa'ang gcig go_/gnyis pa spras pa'i khyad par la do bo dang rnam grangs gnyis kas do bon dbus mtha' las/_nyon mongs pa yi sgrib pa dang*/_/_shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis su bstan/_/der ni sgrib pa thams cad de//de zad nas 'grol
sgruba'a'adod/_/cas pas pad de'i mthong spangs nyon sgrib dang shes sgrib gnyis ka'i cha las grol ba'o/_/de yang sems rab tu mazhi bar byed pa gang mi dge ba'am/_bsgribs lung ma bstan sar sna la sogs pa'i nyon sgrib dang /_'khor gsum la bden zhin 
rgyas dang bcas pa'i dge khra zag bcas sam/_ma bsgribs lung ma bstan gyi ngo po gzung ba'i yul dang 'dzin pa yul can gyi rtog pa ni shisasgrib yin no/_/de dag myang nyon sgrib kun brtagasarnamasazhi mthong spangs yin la/_lhan skyes na bsgoms spangs [\[393]

tsha[1 ]dbye ba dang spong tshul gnyis las/_dang po la ngo bo'i sgo nas phye ba/_log par 'jug tshul gyi sgo nas dbye ba dang gnyis las/_dang po ni/_'dod chags/_khong khro_/_nga rgyal/_mjig pa/_the tshom ste lnga/_gnyis pa ni/_'jig tshogs la blta ba/_mthar 
'dzin pa'i blta ba/_log parabaltab/_lta ba la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i blta ba/_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i blta ba lnga sdoms pas bcu'o/_/de ltar blta ba lngas 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la sogs pa 

bzhi la zhugs pan/_ltayin lnga'i rjes su mthun par zhugs te bcu bcu yod pas bzhi bcu/_de'i steng du khams gong ma gnyis kyi bdan pa bzhi la khong khro lasagazhan pa'i dgudagu 'jug pas/_bsam gtan pa'ibadenapa bzhi'asum cu rtsa drug/gzugs med 
pa'i bden pabazhi la sumacu rtsa drug rnams bsdoms pas dmigs pa dang khams dang log par 'jug rtsolagyi tshanasamathong spangs brgya rtsa bcu gnyis te/_kun las btus par/_nyon mongs brgya rtsa bcu gnyis ni mthong bas spung bar bya ba'i nyon mos pa'i rigs zhes 
so/_/_gnyis pa sbyong tshul ni/_nges 'byed chamathun gyis ni mthong spangasakyis bon mgo non tshul du spong la/_chos shes pa'i bzod pa lasogs pasartsa 'don gyi tshul du spong ngo //de 'ang bden bzhiso so'i skad cig dang de'i spang bya la ltos nas dri ma rim pa'i gnyen[ia94]
po byed la/_ye shesaskyeb la ltos nas bar chad med pa dang rnam grol lam gnyis chos bzod du byung dusum mthong bsazhu mthong ba'i lam zhes bya ste/_mdo sdes bcu pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe de bzhin nyid la gnas par gyur pa de'atsho sa dang por chud 
pa yin te/_de nas rimagyis gong ma rnams yongasasu sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sul 'jug go zhes so/_/de'i chochosakyi dbyings rang gzhan thams cad la kun tu 'gro ba'i khyad par rtogs pas bdag gzhan mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub dmuba'i sems kyis bdag

@#/_/brgyal sangs rgyas brgya'i zhal bltab nas/'dzam bu'i gling rgyal po'i skyeba'adzin nusapa'i bar le'u drug par bshad pa ltar dang /de nas 'phags pa'i bsgom lam du//sa bcu rgyun gyimashA'atshal//_rdo rje lta bu'i ting 
/'dzin gyis//_shesasgrib bcomanamangon byang tshub//de las lhag ma rnams ni bsgom lam gyi ngo bo nyid yinate/_lus kyi rtenani gling gsumagyi skyes bu yemerams pa 'dod gzugs kyi lha dang bcas pa laskye ba mang zhing /_mdo sde rgyan las/bsams 
bzhin srid pa len pa dang //zhes pas gzhan la'ang skye bar rung ngo /_/bsamapa'i tshadazhi ba ma gtan bzhi pa'o/_/rgyun thegachenagyitshogasaspyor mthong lam gsumamo//'brasabunimi slob pa'i lamamo//mtshan nyid nas gas pa yar bcudasabacurgyun[895]
ny+tsamatha' mar bcad kyi theg chen bsgom lam gyi tha snyad byarung dumatshon/thig patshon pa'i mthong lam rdzogs bsal 'byung zhing rang lam gyi dge bas bsdus pa gang zhig thegachen mi slob pa'i lam gyiskad cig dang po skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o/_mchon g.yo/
nas bcu'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor du gtogs pa'i dge bas bsdusapagangazhig go/_byab bsgom pa'i lam da lachung ngu /'adz+dzid dang /chen po gsum lagasumagasumadu bya bas dgu'o//de la chung ngu'i chung ngunas gnyis pa rlom med po ste_/_sa dang po'i gso 
skabs pa desadzesrid du lhung ba'i 'khrul pa phra ba rnams la shes bzhin du gnas minus pa gang zhigalas gnyis pabs shes bzhin duganasajusapa'i yan lag yongs sudzogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan ba'o//sa la lhung ba'i 'khrul patshaphra ba kun tulospyod/

pa'am/rang bzhin gyis rnam paradagapas tshulakhrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pasache zhing /'chal tshul gyidim thamasacadadad mi ldan pasadrimamed pa'i sgra khyugs pa ste/_rgyan las/'chal tshulaphyolaba'i dri bral phyir/dri ma med pa'i su zhesazhesaso//_chung ngu'i 
'bring sa gsum pa 'od byed pani/_sa ga'is pa'i gnasaskabs na 'jigartenapa'i ting nge 'dzinamatha' dag lasnyomasapar 'jug pa dang /_thos pa'i don kun tu 'dzin par ma nus pa gang zhigs gsum pa bsagos pas gzung ba dang /ting nge 'dzin mdon par bsgrub 
sapa'i yan lag longs su rdzogs pa'i khyad par dad ldan pa'o//de'anga'ajig rten pa'i rting du 'dzinathamasacadamangon par bsgrub pa'i dka' thub bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shas che zhing /_tid pa'adzin de dag thob pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes [b96]
byisnang ba tshad medapas 'od byed pa'isgrazhuN6ste/_chosakyi snang ba chen po_//byed pa'i phyiranA'od byed pa//_zhesaso//chung ngu'i chen po sa bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba ni sa gsum pa pa'i gnas skabasan 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzinamatha' dag thob kyang /ji ltar thob 
chos dang snyomasapar 'jug pa'i sems btang snyoms su byed minus pa gang zhigasabazhi pa ba anus pa'i yan lagayosusu rdzogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'o//de 'ad rgyun mi 'chad par dgadung 
pa'i byang chub phyogs kyi chosarnams lan du mar gnas pa dang /
yid kyi brjod pa las yangagapar 'dam pa'i phyir byang gsakyi chos rnamasakyi gnas pas nabartson 'grusakyi pha rol tu phyin pa shas che zhing nyon mongasapa'i bud shing ma lus pa bsregacus pa'i byang chub phyogs kyi chos kyi 'od shin tu 'phro bsan 'od 'phro ba'i sgra 

[\[ # ]/_/_zhugs paste/_'di ltar byang chubaphyogs mthun chos/_rab tusreg byed 'od lta bu/_/_de dang ldan phyir sa de ni//_gnyisapo bsregs pas 'od 'phro can//zhesaso//'bring gi chud du sa3pa sbyang dka' ba sa bzhi pa bu des bden pa rnam par 
/_/de'ang bden pa'irnam pa bsgom 
bsgoms nas 'khor ba lamiphyogs pa dang myang 'das lamangon du phyogasapa lasasems bzlog skyethabasakyisazin ba'i byang chub phyogs bsgom mi nus pa gang zhig sa phab ba des nus pa'i yan lagayongs su rdzogs pa'i khyadapang ldan pa'o
[# ]pa lan mang du byed pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shasatshe zhing /thabasagyis zin pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs la lanamang du gnas shing bsgom pa de yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni shin tu sbyang dka' bas na sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba'i sgrazhugs ba ste/_sems can [ \[397]
rnams yongs smin byed cing //rang gi sems khyad bsrung ba'i phyir//blo ldanarnams kyis sbyang dka' ba//de phyir sbyang dka' zhes brjod do//zhesaso//'bring gi 'brings drug pa mngon du gyur pa ni/sa lnga pa ba des 'khor bar 'jug pa laso sor rtogatsing skyo ba dang bcas pas

chags dang bcas pa'inyis pa'i chakun rnam par spangs shing /_rtog pa med pa'i chos nyidal maTam par gzhag pa'i shes rab kyisamathong ba yin te/_/thog ma dbus mtha' med cing rnam dbyeramed/_/gnyisamed gsum bral dri med rnamartog med/_/chos dbyings rang

/_spangs pa'o//zhes so//longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skrun/_'khor ba'i cha'adus byas pa rnam par shesapa'i tshogs brgyad kun gzhi dang bcasapa dbyings su nub pa'i stobasakyi chanas bzhig pa'igazhi'i gnas[3]gas kyisadacha'i pha \u0f7c
tan mtha' dgardzogs pa'i nges pa lnga dang ldan par yod do/_/gnas nges pa 'ogamin stug po bkodapar/_'khor nges pa sa bcu'i sems dpa'a'aba'azhig la/_chos nges pa theg pa chen po/_ston pa nges parnamapar snang mdzadal sogs rigs lnga'i chas rgyas/
bdenabs shing shiskyang lnga dus nges pa rtag pargyun gyi 'khor lor bzhugasakyang*/_tha mal 'dus byasakyi dngos po ltar rags pa ther thug gi rnam pa yang ma yin/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa ltar snang minus pa'ang mayin/_'dod dgu 'byung bas nor bu dang /_/_snangayang ngo bo med pas 'ja' [909]
tshon dang*//rig pa'i ye shes 'dus ma byas su gnas pa'i tshul/_mgon po byams pas/_sna tshogs dam chos 'od zer mnga' ba'i sa/_/'gro ba'i rnam grol don grub la brtson pa/_/mdzad pa yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal bzhin te/_/sna tshogs

de'ang sangs rgyas rnams thog mar mdon par byang chub ba'i gnas khams gsum las 'das pa'i gnas sdug po bkod paste
