[7 ]
pa'i tsho stong gzugs kyi snang ba mthong ba de da lta 'din yod do zhes phyogs dang ris kyi chad pa ma yin pa ltar/_gang du khams kyisgrib pamatha' dgasparaMsazhas dbyings dang ye shes ro gcigatu 'dres pa de na yod de/_rgyan stagapo bkod pa'i mdo 

las/_gzugasameda'adod dang gzugs khams dang /_/'du shesamedapa da bzhin te//khams las 'damasamangasargyasadang /_/bzhugasaso stag po'i dkyil 'khoran//zhes pas khams gsum las 'das par bstan cing /_de'angashes ngo'i bdag 'dzin dang /_ming du 
btags yod kyi gnas tha dadapagasum las 'das pa'i tshul/_chosakyi byings su bstod pa las/_/dbang phyug chen bo'i gnas mchog dang /_/'og min de nyidarnamamadzes pa/_/_tha dad gsum po gcig nyid du/_/'dus par gyur la bdagasmra'o//zhes dang /_theg bsdus las/_/
bdag tu 'dzin pamedapa'i phyir//gnasal tha dad yod ma yin//sngon gyi rjes mu 'brang bas_/_/_de lagadags bas tha dad 'byed/_/ces sogo/daldana'angabadagacag giston pa shAkya thub pa ni/_thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas bshad ma thag pa'i 'og min de nyid du sangs rgyas [\]910]
zin kyang /_
sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir mi mjed 'di chagasanas kyang sems can so so'i snang ba dang mos pa'i ngo thog mar gzugs khams kyi 'og min du sangs rgyasaMnas lha rnams bsdu dag mdzad nas
/_slar yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdo rje'i gdan du 
sangs rgya ba'i tshul bstan pa nyid de/_zla gsang thig ler/_'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs medadu//sangs rgyas mngon par sangs mi rgya/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi 'og min du/_/'dodachags bral khyod do sangasargya/_/zhes so/_/gzugs kyi khams de'ashin tumathong ba 
man chad lamathol ba'i pha rol gyi 'og min ni lang kar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa ste
/_gtsang ma'i gnas dag glangasanamasu/_/'ogamin zhes bya nyams dga' bar/_/_yang dag sangasargyas der sangs rgyas//sprul pa po zhig 'dir sangs rgyas/_/zhes so//de lta bu'i rten 

/gzhal med khang gi brten pa_rigs lnga'i sangasargyasarnamasan mtshan sum cu chu ras dang /_sdebyad brgyadacu'i ngo bonyid byang chub sems dpa'as bcuparnams dang thabasagacig tu theg ba chen po'i chos kyi losaspyod kyis dga' 
bas nye bar spyod pa'i phyir longasaspyod rdzogs pa'i sgyu zhes bya ste/_mngon rtogs rgyan las/_mtshanan sumacu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad brgyadacu'i bdag nyid 'di//thegachen nyebar longs spyod phyir/_/thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed/_/ces so/_/dus nges pa'i rgyu 
mtshan ni longs sku de nyid chosaskudang dbyer med ngo bo gcig la bsam gyis mi khyabarjing /_'pho 'gyuramed pa dang /_lhun gyis grub cing 'aam byas pa nyid dang /_gdulabya'i bsodanams tshadamedapal 'khor ba ji srid du rang snang pas rtag pa stargyud bla ma las/chos [\[91]
kyi dbang phyug 'chi ba'i bdud bcomadang//ngo bo med phyir 'jig rtenamagon po rtag_/cesadang /'jug pa'am/_zhi skudapagabasam shing ltar gsal gyural/ yid bzhin nor bu jiltar rnamami rtog/'gro grol bar du 'jig rten 'byor slabartag_/_'dzin spres dang bralal 
snang ba yin/_/zhes so//sprul pa'i skuni/_chos sku'i gdangs longs sku'i rnam par rol pa'i ngang de nyid las/_gdul bya'i donagangal gang 'dul du 'byungabasargya che ba'i rtag pa zhes bya ste/_rgyudablam 'jig rten zhi ba'i lamal 'jug pa dang /_rab tusmin dang lung 
rtogasany+tsayi gzugs//gang yin de la 'dir ni rtog gnas_/_/nam mkha'i khams su gzugasakyi khams bzhin no/_/de yang chusmod yodan bla gzugs yodapaltar/_gdul bya yodana'akhyol byed yod la/_zla ba yodakyanga'achar gzhi medan gzugs brnyan rang 

'gags pa bzhin/_sangs rgyas yod kyang de nyidabaskrunapa'i dge ba medan rgyu med pasa'abrum bu mi 'byung ba'am/_sabon rul pa'aphel du mi rung bular skal bamed pas mi myong ba'i tshulargyan las/_rgyu yongs su smin gyur nas//gang dang gangalagang dang ni/_/_gang cho byas bas 
banagyurapa/_/de dang du lad snang ngo //lham rgyal pos char phabakyang*//_sa bon ming mi 'khrungs lar//sangs rgyasarnam[w]ni byon gyur kyang /_/skal bamed pas bslang mi myong//zhes so/_/sprul pa'i rnam pa gsumoste/_/bzo dang skye dang de bzhin du//byang chub mchog gi sprul pa ste/_/sangs 
rgyas sgrolapa'i sku 'din//rnam par grol pa'i thugs chen bod zhesabs/_bzo sprul pa'i lugs dang / bris dang /_glegs bams mtshon 'du byed kyig byas pa'am/_rang byung tu grub pasdusem[w]tshan la phan pa'i dngos po thams cad do/_/skye ba sprul pa ni/_des pa la sogs par sprul [\[912]
nag nad dang /1 bo cher sprul nas mu ge medage'i rgyal paral pa can bzhin du 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabanus pa mtha' dushago[j]mchog gi sprul pa ni/_ma dag pa'i 'jig rten rnams su chos sku las gzugs sku raganas shing sku gsum gyis bsdus pa'i sangs rgyas mdzad pa 
bcu gnyisan+ton pa shAkya thubapa lta busnye/_rgyud bla ma las/_thugasarje chen pos 'jig rten mkhyen//'jig rten kun la gzigs nas ni//chos kyi sku las ma g.yos pa/_/sprulapa'i rang bzhin satshol sakyis/_/skye ba mngon par skye ba dang*/_/dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho ba dang*/_/
lhums su 'jug dang bltams pa dang /bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa dang /_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyis rol pa dang /_/nges 'byung dka' ba spyad pa dang /_/byang chub snying po'i gshegs pa dang /bdud sde bcom dang rjod pas par ni/_/byang chub chos kyi'akhor lo dang*/_/_mya ngan 'das

@#/_/bar gshegs mdzod rnams/_/yongs mumadag zhing rnams su/_/sridapa jiyid ya/nus pa la ston/_/laso//gnyis pa brten pa ye shesagyi khyad par zhi/_chos nyid ji lta bamakhyen padang /_sa bya ji snyed pa mkhyen ba'o//dang po ni/_rang gi ngo bo dang /_rgyu 'bras 
la sogs pa shes bya thums cad spros pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i chos nyid mngon sum du mkhyen pa'o//de la chos kyi dbyingasi ye shes zhes bya pa'i tha snyad kyang 'dogs te chos nyid shin tu zhi ba can yin pas so//_de skad du/_yum bar ma las/_chos gcig mkhyen pas rnam pa 
thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ste/_chos nyid zhi ba'i rnam pa 'o//_zhes so//gnyis pa la gsum ste/_dang po rang bzhin gyi ngos nas/_rang gi ngo bo dang*/_
ka bden gnyis shing rta bzhi brgya nga bdun rgyu 'bras la sogs pa'i shes bya rnam pa thams cad pa sgyu ma lta bur ma 'dres shing ma nor bar mngon sum du mkhyen pa ste snga ma[913]
las/_rnam pa gang dag dang /_rtags gang dag dang /_mchon ma gang gis chos rnams rab tu brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang*/_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pas thugasasu chud par gyur to/_/zhes so//gnyis pa dbye ba'i nas/_mo 'od

ba dang 'tsham par ston pa dang /_
gzhan don bsgrub pa'i grogs byas pas rang gnas kyi ye shes bzhi bo'ima'i drim dag nas 'grub pa'i rgyu byed pa'i tshul/_mdo sde'i rgyan las/_'dzin pa'i phyir dang semasamanyam phyir/_/_yang dag chos rab ston phyir dang /_/bya ba grub pa nyid kyi phyir/

tshul 'azhis so_    
ye shes bzhi po yang dag 'byung //zhes so/bsam ba rang bzhin gyi rgyur g.yum phyi yi shes de'ilcing gi 'byed khyon yongs ba de dang de dag bulastobs kyis mngon du byung ba'i chazhas gzhan 'gyur du btags pa tsam ste/_'di ltar ma dag pa'i gnas skazas kyi rnam shes tshogs bcad rten 
kun gzhi dang bcas pa logs ye shes chu shur ba'i tshul/_sku gsum la 'jug pa'i mdo la_//kun gzhi'i rnam paras pa dbyings su nub bzhi mi long lta bu'i shes so/_/_ched spyi rnam bas shes pa dbyings su nub pa zhinyam pa nyid wiye shes_/_/nyon mongs bcan gyi yidadabyings su nub 
ba sosor rtog pa'i ye shes so/_/_sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa dbyings su nub pa ni bya ba grub pa'i shes so/_/zhes pas gsal lo//de'ang rang mchan du nyon mongs ba dang yishis gnyis shin tu 'gal bas gnas 'gyur bar mi srid kyang /_dag bya dag 'bras kyi mal de skad du btagasab[b14]
ste/_de dag ma dag na rang gi chos bzhag pa'i yon tan rnams mngon du snang ba med pas so//semed pazhin ni/_mi long lta bu'i shes kyi ngo de tshes lnga dpaldan ba ste/_mdo[Q]tshan _/_me long ye shes yi med//_yongasasu mchad rtag tu ldan/_/_shes bya kun lamachongs pa//_rtag tu 
de la mdon phyogs yin//_zhes pas nga yir 'dzin pa'i ris su bcad pamed pas rgyun chas/_ma pa dang /_yul da na yod pa shel gzhanon yod ba gi sa ba'ang ma yinabs yul yongs su ma chad pa dang /_'pho 'gyur dang mi rtag pa las 'das pas dus gsum kun rdzob med pa'i phyir yi 
shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa rtag tu ldan pas dus ma chad pa dang /_chos can ma lus pa'i shes bya mkhyen pas dmigs ba[@ ]chad ba dang /_yu+i_ rnam ba rab la mngon du mi phyogs bamashesachal yodatsam gyis mkhyen pasan+ni pa'achad pa'o//_yi shes gzhan gsum ni de'i 

/grogs su ldan pa'i tshul yin te/_me long ye shes yig yo /_/ye shes gsumazhi de la brten//mnyam panyid dang so sor rtog_/bya ba grub pa kho na'o/_/zhes so//byed las ni mi long byed bzhin dang phradanagazugs brnyan 'char ba ltar/_ye shes 'di gdul bya'i 
ma lang dang thun longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skung yi shes gzhan ba dngam po gzugs brnyan par 'byung bas spudaShIny+tsa'i 'gro gzhi byed pa yin te/_/yig drun gyi mtshon phyir/_/_ye shes 'byung gnas chen po 'dra//longs spyod rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas nyidad ye shes gzugs 
ka'aden gnyis shing rta zhes rgya dag
_rten 'byung phyir do//_zhes pa ltar ro//mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pasasrid zhi'i mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i zhi ba dam pa ste/_mi gnas zhi bar bzhugs pa'i/_/_mnyam nyid ye shes yin par brjod//ces so//de'i grogasani byams [215]
pachen po dang thugs rje chen po ldan la/_byed las gdul bya'i mos pa dang mthun par gzugs sku'i snang ba mngon sum du ston pa ste/_de'ang sku'i 'char gzhi mi lo lta bu byed pa/_gdul bya la snang ba'i byedapomanyam pa nyid_ye shes te/_dus rnams kun tu byams pa dang*/_/khrug 
rje chen po dag dang ldan//semasacanarnams mos pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas sku zhe pes par ston//_zhes so/_/_so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ni chos can thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i de shes 'jug tu'i shes bya kun la rtag mi thogs pa nyid de/_so sor rtog pa'i ye shesani/_/
shes bya kun7rtag mithogs//zhes so/_/de'i grogs ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs la sogs pa mi zad pa'i gter dang 'dra ba kho nas byed de/_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungasanams kyis/_/gter dang 'dra ba lo na yin//zhes so/_/byed las ni shes bya yul la smad pa'i tshesku'i 'byor 

ba sna tshogs bstan nas the tshom dad ma rig pa'i drab gcod gru'i chos char 'bebs pa lce/_21poragyi nga spyi 'khor rnams su ni//'byorapa thams cad ston mdzad cing //the tshom tham[a]cadas cod mdzad pa'i/_/chom char nang du 'bebs/_zhes so//_bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo sags 
can gyi khams dang /_zhing dpag tu med par sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas par sprul nas de dag gi donog desasna tshogs par bsgrub pa'i ye shemanyid de/_bya ba grub pa'i shesan//khams rnams kun tu sna tshogs zhing //dbagamed bsamayas sprul pa yis//sems can don kun 
grub ba'o//_zhes so//byed lasani gdul bya'i don bsgrub pa la mdzad pa'i bye brag mtha' gcig tu ma nges pa can te/_sams sprul pa de dag tu/_/mdzad pa bsgrub pa'i bye brag dang /_/_grangs dang zhing gi rnam kun tu/_/bsam mikhyab par shes parog_/zhes so//de lta bu'i ye shes [。 ]8
dad shes bya mkhyen pa'i tshul yang /_rang snangal ltosan 'khrul pa'i cha dang bcas pa gtan nas spus pa'i phyir shes bya'i spros pa dang /_des bskyed pa'i ye shes rang mtshan pa yod pa ma yin te/_stod ngos tshos sgrub ye shes yodamed gnyis kar ma grub pas bsam 
gyis mi khyab pa'i don dran par bya la/_gzhan snang la ltos nas thugs rje'i 'jug pa dang ye shes kyi 'char tshul de dag gi rgyu 'bras dang bcas pa mtha' dag 'gags pa med cing lag mthil tu skyu ru ra bzhag pa bzhin du mkhyen pa yin te/_sna ngos gzugs sku'i cha nas 
gdul bya'i snang ba dang mthun pa'i don mdzod cid ye shes kyi rtsal 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de'ang[u]shes gcig gis du mnyam du rang gzhan gyi snang ba thams cad ma 'dres par mkhyen pa yin to thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro//'on 'jug pa los/sems 

ka
_/'gags pa de sku yis mngon du mdzod/_ces gsungs pas rig pa ni rig pa'i khyab phye na yin la/_khyad byed mag pa ldog pas khyab spyi rig pa gapa'i gli[rua]nga shes nyid kyang med par grub po zhi nA/_de na cang medachad par 'dod pa rgyud 'phen 
pa'i 'dod ba yin te/'jug pa'i don ni sogs sems byung kun gzhi chogs brgyud kyis bsdus ba gang zhig rig pa ye shes kyi stod du 'gags pa'i don yin no//stug po bkod pa'i mdo las/_ji ltar shin tu bzang po'i gser//_gser gyi dbyibs la mi snang ste//bcol 
bas shin tu zhib btags nas//yomasu sbyangs na snang bar 'gyur//_de bzhin na gzhi'i rnam par shes/_/rnam shes 'dun dang bas gang /_/ting de 'dzin gyin ming spyong ba'i rnalubo can gyi rtag rtamathong /_/_zhes so//gzhan yang rig pa ma [1917]
gsarnamar bcalasams
bden gnyis shi rta bzhi brgya ra dgu sangs rgyas pa'i chos skani rig pa'i ye shesachos kyi dbyings su gyur pas 
/_sems byung 'gags pa tsam gyis sems 'gal gas par 'gyur bachos can/_
ba'artan yan kyang khyab byud ma yin pas mi rig pa lagapatsam gyis reg pa log par yang mi 'gyur te
ba/
mngon du byed par gsungs te/_shes rab 'bum mdo las/_chos kyi dbyings shes na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa yang shes pa yin no//zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na sems 'gags pas rnam par mi rtog kyangachosakyi dbyings mi 'gag pas 
thugs rje'i 'jug pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar smon lam gyi rjes su 'gro zhing /_zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar chu snod dang 'tsham par 2char ba'i tshul/_phal po che las/_yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po de_/_ci yi bsam pa rdzogs byed pa//de bzhinasangs rgyas 

chos nyid kyang /_rtag tu smon lam rdzogs par 'grub/_/mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten der//'jig rten pa yi 'dren bar gyur/_/de yi smon lam de dag gis/_/phyogs bcu de dag rgyal bas gang //ji ltar zu bshar gyur pa//tshod med ba yi gzugs brnyan rnams//_rtswa 
yi snod du sha khyu brgyad/zla ba gnyis su gyur pamed//de bzhin chagasamed mkhyen ldan rnams//chags med rnam par 'ching sgrub//_zhing rnams kunan rab tu snang /_/_sangasargyas la gnyis kyang med//ces bka' bstsal to//_dobazhin du shes bya mkhyen ba'i 
tshul yang rnam pa gnyis te/_ji lta ba mkhyen pa ni/_

[1918]
dmigs kyang so skye'i gnas skabasan mthong spangs kyisam dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs na bsgoms spos kyis dgu ba'i rjes gnyis ka las yang dag par grol ba'i so so rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyidamangon sum 
du thugs su chud pa 'phags pa sdud pa las/_gang tsho'adus byas 'dus ma byas dang dkar nag chos/_shes rab rnam par bshig nas rdul tsam mi gnas tshe/_'jigarten dga' shes rab ba rol phyin grangs go_/namamakha'agapala'aducung zadami gnas do ra/
dra//zhes dang /_mdosde las/_'ga'o yang mtho ba med pa ni chosamathong ba yin no/_/zhesaso//ji skadapa mkhyen pa'i tshul//_de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mnyam pa la zhug pas g.yo ba med bzhin du/_dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab kyis shes bya /

[- ]/mthA'adug btsun pa'i rang bzhi'i sgyum[g]bur ma 'dres mngon sum du mkhyen pa nyid de/_mdo sde las/rnam pa thu[s]chud mkhyen pa nyid spyir sangs pa'i dngos po med pa'o//zhis go/de'ang yulasosor 'dzin pa dbang shes 
ny+tsa/_'bral bltabusamakhyen pa ma yin te/_gzigs pa'i yul ma rig par mtshon can mi spyod pa'i phyirago/delana'ang bden pa med kyang ba[g]na pa yod pas shes bya 'dusrid pa mkhyen dragos te/_mamakhyenan thams cadamakhyen panas budapasaso//de bas na bla 
ka'adonyi shati bzhicarUbacu na mdapa' ye shes dang rjes gcig pa'i shes pas dus skad cig la mkhyen pa yin te/phal po che las/_rgyalaba'i ye shes bla med kyis/_/skad cig gis ni don kun rig/ciso//_de bzhin du dus gsum gyi shis bya rnams kyang kun brtags kyi rjes mu 'gro ba'adzam[919]
spyi btsan du mkhyen pa ma yin par yaphyi medapa'i gcig charadumakhyen pa yin te/mdo sde'i rgyan la//nyi ma'i 'od zer gcig btang pas//'gro ba mang bar byed pa ltar//de bzhin shes bya thams cad la//_sangs rgyas ye shes gcigatsang snang /cesaso//de'angasapas 
rgyas kyis ni g.yeng bgachags dang bcas pa spangs pas rtag tu chos sku las mi g.yo bsamanyam par gzhag pa nyid yin te/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa las/glang chen bzhugs byangamanyam par gzhag/_klu chen gzims_dmanyam par gzhag_/
la glang chonamanalo yang mnyam gzhag yin//_zhes so//de ltana'ang gzhan don phrin las kyi 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pasarjes thob tu gdags pa tsam yod de/_rgyud bla ma las/_sgrib pa gnyis dang bral ba gi rgyuniye shes gnyis yin te/_/_mi rtog pa dang /

de yin/_/rjes thob de ni mishes 'ad/_tshes so//gsum pamadzad pa phrin las ni/_gdul ba'i yul srid pa ji srid gnas kyi ba chosau'i rang bzhin las lhagayos bzhin du gzugs sku gnyis de la der brten phrarags tshuladu 'phro ba rgyun mi 'chad pa 
'gro ba'i mos pa bzhin 'byung semangon rtogs rgyan las/_da bzhin 'khor ba ji srid 'di//lasan rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod/_ces so//de'ang longs sku'i ngang las 'byung ba'i sprul pa'i sku la ltos nas rgyud blamalas/_gzhan gyi dbang gi nges 'byung dang/
bdag dang sems can mtshusaM gzigs dang /mdzod pa yongs sumardzogs phyir//'khor ba jiphring mdzodami 'chad//cisago//de'i tshul yangasemar can gyi khaadang /de nyid gdul ba'i thabs dang /_thubs bya ba dang /_dus las yol ba medabar 'doms pa[\[920]
la sogs pas gzhan don la lhun gyis grub par 'jugapa'i tshul dpe dgus bstan te/_'di ltar lha'i dbang po'i gzugs brnyan khru'i sa gzhi tshang ma lasnang ba ltar 'gro ba'i semasargyud dge zhing rnyog pa medapa'is gzhi gtsang ma la thub pa'i dbang 
po'i snang brnyan 'char bu dang /_lhornams phyir lo che'i sgra rang gi las las byung ba ltar 'gro b.rang rang gis/_sangasargyasAmathong nas chos thos pa'i las bsags bgang zhigalan ba yodabs sgra thos ba bzhin legs par 'doms pa'i chos kyi sgra thos ba 
dang /'di ra sprin gyi tshogs ni nam mkha'i khyon la thogs rdugs medapar 'gro zhing 'char nub byed pa ltar/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang brtse ba'i thugasarje'i sprin 'gro ba'i mos pa dang rjes su mthun ba nyid srid rtse'i bar du khyad 

ka_
pa dang /_tshangasapa bzhin du zag pa med pa'i gnas las ma bskyod par sprul pa rnams du ma ston pa dang /_nyi ma bzhin du nye ring med pa'i 'gro ba'i khamasal yi shes kyi snang bgacig car du 'jug padang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'in po 
tsho ltar thugasarnam par mi rtog bzhin du gang gi smon pa'i don yid bzhin du 'grub pa dang /_sgra snyan bzhin du rgyal rnams kyi gsung gi gsang ba'i tshig dang yi ge med kyang nyonamongs pa med yid canarnams kyi rna ba'i lam du 'byung zhing /_rang girnam rig las skyo ba 
spyi dang /_nam mkha' bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni phyogs bcu'i'ajig rten gyi khams yos la khyab kyang gzugasasusnang ba medapas yongs su rtag pa nyid dang /_man kun gyi gzhi rten du gyur pa bzhin du 'gro brnams kyi dkar po'i chos kyi slasham lus pa [\[ 921]
sazhaganyis shing rta bzhibargya ragacig 
skyeba'i gzhi rten sangasargyas kyis/nga yinapa'o/_/de skad du sdum las/_gang zhig brgya byin ja dang sprin bzhin dang*//chings ti rin chen yid bzhin nor rgyal bzhin/_/sgra snyan namamakha' sa gzhi sridapa'i bar//'bad med gzhan don byedad rnal 'byor rigs_/rin chen 
dbadasnang bzhin skyon pa de//_legs par 'domasamadzad lha yi rnga dang 'dra//_khyab bdagamakhyen dang btso chen sprin tshogs_//mtha' yasa'agro ba sridatse'i bar du khyab//_tshangs bzhin zagamed gnas masam bskyodapar//sprulapa rnams dum rab tu ston//nyi bzhin ye shes 
ngab rabasngo ba//rnam dgarin chen yid bzhin nor 'du'i thags//rgyal brnams kyi gsung de nyid/_/brag ca bzhin du yi gemed//skunanamamakha' lta bu ste//khyabadang gzugasamed rtagapa nyid//sa bzhin 'gro ba dkar po yi/_/chos kyismanani ma lus pa'i//rnam pa kun 

ju zhi gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sa yin no//zhesaso//de dag kyang mdor bstun/_/skugasung thugasamizad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa khyab_pani rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ces bstan te/_/sems kyi rnam grangs   
mkhyenapas de rtogasapa semasacan gyi sems kyi spyod pa zab mo snang ba ni kun brjod pa'i tsho 'phrul lo//dgagi dbyangs brjod pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam las brtsams te de 'doms pa dang rjes su bstan pa'i che 'phrul lo//_de lta bu'i mi slob pa'i lamani khyad par 
gyi chos gsum dang ldan pa ste/_spangs pa'i khyad par ni sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcasapamatha' dag spangs ba ste/_rdo rje rtse mo las//nyon mongs pa dang de bzhin skyes//khyonamongs shes bya'i sgrib de bzhin/_/gang yang mimathun phyogs chos bcom//de 'ding bcom [ 922]
ldan 'dasasu bshad/_cesaso/_/rtogs pa'i khyad par ni chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum par rtogs pa ste/_yum bar ma las/_de bzhin gshegs parnam[w]kyisajichos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par[w]ngasamargyas pa'am/_ma gzigasapa'am/_ma 
mkhyen pa 'ga' yang med do/_chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dumangon sumadu thabacu mkhyen to//_yon tan gyi khyadapa ni 'jigarten dang 'jigarten las 'das pa'i yon rtan gyi cha ma lus pasku gsung thugasami zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i yon tan dgacu rtsabazhi'i
gter du 'char ba ste/rgyud blama'i 'grel pa las/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhidang*/_sangasargyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang*/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag rnam pa gcig tu mngon par 

/bsdus te drug cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro/_/zhes so/_/de dag gi rang bzhin ni le'u drug par yang bshad zin kyang so so'i sa khongs 'dzin pa'i chedu las zlos pa'i skyon du mi gzung ngo /_/_yon tan 
rin po che'i mdzod las/_smon 'jug gi bslab bya bstan pa'i tshoms te le'u dgu ba'i 'grel pa yan gyis rgyu mtshan nyid kyi thig pal yos su grags pa'i rgya chen spyod pa drang /_zab mo lta ba'i grub pa'i mtha' legs 
tshapar gtan la phab zin to/_/_nying 'khrul lam du dpal ldan na ga rdzus/_/bshes spring lung gis zab dang rgyacha'i don/_/_bdag rgyud bde gshegs snying po la sbyar ba/_/'dris kyang rgyal bstan mi nub dpal du shog_/sa [23]
tsha_skya bdag po rin po che ngag dbang kun dga' blo gros sangs rgyas bstan pa'irgyal mtshan dpal bzang bos bstan pa 'ba' zhig thugs la bcangs nas sa snying srung lo khor/_rin chen gnyis pa'i rta rmig_/nang mdzod sna lnga'i 
skyos dang bcas te bkas bskul ba las/_dban pa'i'i ngogs na gnas pa'i gtsug lag khangapad+ma 'od gling zhes bya bar rdzogs chen pa rang byung drodramakhyen brtsi'i 'od zer gyis zin ris su btab pa'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rnal 'byor 
spyod pa chos rje brag phug pa'i/_/_ka_!_oM swa sti/_'jigs bral gling pa'i dgongs bcudachu 'dzin las/_/zab rgyas shing rta phrin las dbyar gyir/_/mdo rgyud yos steng snyan 

dbyas bsgrags pa na/_/_skal bzang rma bya'i brtse dga'aci yangarol/_/tha snyad grub mthar zhen pa'i mad+hubs//gzhan dbadu gyur pa'i theg mchog ke la sha_/_sngon bo 'khrul ba'i log rtogamakhas 
rlom kun/_/_yul byung theg mchog snod du skal bar dman/_/zur mdzod sku mched gsum gyi lhag bsaMm gyis/_/_bden gnyis shing rta bzhes pas dge tshogs zlos/_/_las nyon smug rum drungs [1924]
byung das grub do/_/_snang ba'i skye dgu'i pad dkar bzhad gyuratshig_/ces pa'ang chos kyising+gas so//_//_zhes bstan dang 'gro ba thams cad la phan thog rgya chen 'byung ba'i bsam pas kun 
nas blang te chos rgyun rgya cher spel ba'i ched du sbyar gzhi gsar bskrun mdzad mi zung gzhon nu'i dus nas theg pa chen po'i chos la dad gus che ba dang /_khyad par kun mkhyen chen po 'jigasamang glipa la mi phyed 
pa'i dadamadun gyi ring nas sgyu ma'i nor la snying po len shes ba tha napo slob dpon lags nas dngul srang nyi shu dang /skal bzang bu khrid kyis le sbram gyi se mo do'i rin dngul srang bco lnga/_'phreng po bsam gtan 

/kha bal ldan chos 'byor nas dngul srung do zho doskor lnga dang phyi mdzod gcig_/zur mdo+i_ gza' zlarnam rgyal bu srid nas mgrin pa'i do shal rin dngul srang lnga bcu/_'phyos zur 
mdzod tsho ring don 'grub nas dngul srang dgu bcu go brgyad dang zho lnga skar lnga bcas ming gong 'khod rnams kyi khyon bsdoms dngul srang brgya dang brgyad cu gya drug dang zho de   song ba'i par yig 'drimi phun tshogasarnam 
[925]
rgyal dang /_ bar bshos bu tshoring dang ngag dbang sbyin pa brgya byin nor bu bcas kyi gtsos mi granganyi shu paskor nas lhag bsamarnam dag bgyis pa'i dge tsarnams 'khor gsum yang dag gi bsngo smon gyis mtshams sbyor 
ka bden gnyis shi rta bzhi brgyare ga'i bod

la lan  
gsum myur du tshang bar shog/_dge legs 'phel
